GS24jvkasipu:15: a i u ityanena krameṇa varṇān-upadiśyānte ṇakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhārārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:20: teṣāṃ sāvarṇya-prasiddhy-artham akāra iha śāstre vivṛtaḥ pratijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24: ṛ ḷ ity etau varṇāv updiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante kakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:31: akāra-ādayo varṇāḥ pracura-prayoga-viṣayāsteṣāṃ sujñānam upadeśe prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:35: tasya-asiddhatvād ṛkāra eva ackāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti iti kim-artham ḷkāra upadiśyate?
GS24jvkasipu:36: latva-vidhānād yāni parāṇy ackāryāṇi tāni ḷkāre yathā syur iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44: ṛtakaḥ iti prayoktavye śakti-vaikalyāt kumārī ḷtakaḥ iti prayuṅkte,
GS24jvkasipu:47: e o ity etau varṇāv upadiśya ante ṅkāramitam karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:52: ai au ity etau varṇāv upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante cakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:64: varṇeṣu ye varṇa-ikadeśā varṇa-antara-samāna-akṛtayasteṣu tat-kāryaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:65: tac-chāyāmukāriṇo hi te na punas ta eva /
GS24jvkasipu:75: ha ya va ra ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ṭakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:79: tasya yar-grahaṇena yay-grahaṇena ca grahaṇe sati,
GS24jvkasipu:84: bhadra-hrada ity atra dvirvacanaṃ prāpnoti aco ra-hā-bhyāṃ dve (*8,4.46) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:86: vanaṃ rathena ity atra anusvārasya yayi parasavarṇaḥ(*8,4.58)
GS24jvkasipu:89: ākṛtau pada-arthe samudāye sakṛl-lakṣye lakṣaṇaṃ pravartate ity etasmin darśane yaro 'nunasike 'nunāsiko vā (*8,4.45)
GS24jvkasipu:90: antaratamo bhavati ity evam etat pravarttate /
GS24jvkasipu:91: tad-anena gakāra-ādīnāṃ ṅakārā-adayo ye yathā-svaṃ sthānato guṇataś ca ataratamāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:95: sthāna-mātreṇa guṇa-mātreṇa vā antaratamās te sarve nivartitāḥ iti sthāna-mātra-antaratamo rephasya ṇakāro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:96: dvirvacane 'pi rephasya yar-antarbhāve sati yarkāryaṃ prāptam,
GS24jvkasipu:97: tat sākṣāc-chiṣṭena nimitta-bhāvena bādhyate iti na dvirucyate rephaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:99: ity etad apy anusvāra-antaratamaṃ sakṛdeva parasavarṇaṃ vidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:100: na ca rephasya anusvāra-antaratamaḥ savarṇo 'sti iti na bhaviṣyati kuṇḍaṃ rathena,
GS24jvkasipu:102: aṭāṃ madye visarjanīya-jihvāmūlīya-upadhmānīyānām apy upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:106: atra aḍ-vyavāye iti ṇatvaṃ yathā syāt iti // [4]
GS24jvkasipu:108: la ity ekaṃ varṇam upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ṇakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:118: atha kim artham ajgrahaṇam eva-itan-na kriyate?
GS24jvkasipu:120: antaḥ-sthānām api hi savarṇānāṃ grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:127: lokam ity atra anusvārasya anunāsike yayi parasavarṇe kṛte tasya yar-grahaṇena grahaṇād dvirvacanaṃ yathā syād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:132: ity atra ra iti pratyāhāra-grahaṇāl-laparatvam api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:134: ña ma ṅa ṇa na ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante makāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:143: kecit-tu sarvāṇy-etāni pratyāhāra-grahaṇāni ñakāreṇa bhavantu iti makāram anubandhaṃ pratyācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:144: tathā ca sati ṅamo hrasva-adaci ṅamuṇ nityam(*8,3.32)
GS24jvkasipu:145: ity atra-āgaminoḥ jhabhor abhāvād-āgamābhāva-pratipattau pratipatti-gauravaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:147: jha bha ity etau varṇāv-upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ñakārāmitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:152: gha ḍha dha ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ṣakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:156: ja ba ga ḍa da ś /
GS24jvkasipu:157: ja ba ga ḍa da ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante śakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:168: kha pha dha ḍha tha ca ṭa ta v /
GS24jvkasipu:169: kha pha dha ḍha tha ca ṭa ta ity etān varṇān upadiśyānte vakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:175: ka pa ity etau varṇāv upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante yakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:186: śa ṣa sa ity enān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante rephamitam karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:198: ha ity ekaṃ varṇam upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante lakāramitam karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:212: atha kim artham upadiṣṭo 'pi hakāraḥ punar upadiśyate?
GS24jvkasipu:213: kittva vikalpa-kṣa- iḍvidhayo yathā syuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:214: snihitvā, snehitvā ity atra ralo v-y-upadhād-dhal-ādeḥ saṃś-ca (*1,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:216: liheḥ alikṣat iti śala ig-upadhād aniṭaḥ kṣaḥ (*3,1.45)
GS24jvkasipu:218: rudihi, svapihi iti valādi-lakṣaṇa iḍ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:220: jhalgrahaṇeṣu ca hakārasya grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:221: yady evam, ha ya va ra ḍ ity atra tarhi kim artham upadiśyat?
GS24jvkasipu:223: devā hasanti ity atra aḍ-grahaṇeṣu ca aś-grahaṇeṣuca hakārasya grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:226: ekasmān ṅañaṇAvaṭā dvābhāṃ ṣastribhya eva kaṇamāḥ syuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:227: jñeyau cayau caturbhyo raḥ pañcabhyaḥ śalau ṣaḍbhyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:235: taparakaraṇam aij-artham tād-api paraḥ taparaḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:263: vṛddhi-guṇau svasañjñayā śiṣyamāṇau ikaḥ eva sthāne veditavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:295: tasya lopo yasminn ārdhadhātuke tad-ārdhadhātukaṃ dhātu-lopaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:301: lolūya-ādibhyo yaṅantebhyaḥ paca-ādy-aci vihite yaṅo 'ci ca (*2,4.74)
GS24jvkasipu:302: iti yaṅo luki kṛte tam eva acam āśritya ye guṇa-vṛddhī prāpte tayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:337: acinavam, asunavam ity ādau lakārasya saty api ṅittve yāsuṭo ṅid-vacanaṃ jñāpakam ṅiti yat-kāryaṃ tal-lakāre ṅiti na bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:341: dīdhī-vevyoḥ iṭaś ca ye guṇa-vṛddhī prāpnutaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:347: vṛddhir iṭo na saṃbhavati iti laghu-upadha-guṇasya-atra pratiṣedhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:350: bhinna-jātīyair ajbhir avyavahitaḥ śliṣṭa-uccāritā halaḥ saṃyoga-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:353: tena dvayor bahūnāṃ ca saṃyogasañjñā siddhā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:366: pacati panasam - skoḥ saṃyoga-ādyor ante ca (*8,2.29)
GS24jvkasipu:373: tayā ya uccāryate varṇaḥ so 'nunāsika-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:389: tulya āsye prayatno yasya varṇasya yena varṇena saha sa samānajātīyaṃ prati savarṇasañjño bhavati / [9]
GS24jvkasipu:390: catvāra ābhyantarāḥ prayatnāḥ savarṇasaṃ jñāyām āśrīyante -- spṛṣṭatā,
GS24jvkasipu:394: a a a iti trayo 'kārā udātta-anudātta-svaritāḥ pratyekaṃ sānunāsikā niranunāsikāś ca hrasva-dīrgha-pluta-bhedād aṣṭādaśa dhā bhidyante /
GS24jvkasipu:411: tarptum ity atra jharo jhari savarṇe (*8,4.65)
GS24jvkasipu:415: kiṃ ca syāt ? aruścyotati ity atra jharo jhari savarṇe (*8,4.65)
GS24jvkasipu:420: ubhayoḥ ṛvarṇasya ḷvarṇasya ca āntaratamaḥ savarṇo dīrgho nāsti iti rkāra eva dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:426: tulya-āsya-prayatnāv api aj-jhalau parasparaṃ savarṇasañjñau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:435: īt ūt et ity evam-antaṃ dvivacanaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ pragrhya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:456: adasaḥ sambadhī yo makāras-tasmāt pare īd-ūdetaḥ pragrhya-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:478: chāndasam etad eva-ikam udāharaṇam - asme indrā-bṛhaspatī iti /
GS24jvkasipu:480: itarat tu laukikam anukaraṇam - yuśme iti,
GS24jvkasipu:486: nipāto ya ekāc āṅ-varjitaḥ sa pragṛhya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:504: odanto yo nipātaḥ sa pragṛhya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:510: sambuddhi-nimitto ya okāraḥ sa śākalyasya ācāryasay matena pnagṛhya-sañjño bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:525: uñaḥ pragṛhya-sañjñā bhavati itau śākalyasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:530: uñaḥ itāv-anārṣe ūṃ ity ayam-ādeśo bhavati dīrgho 'nunāsikaśca,
GS24jvkasipu:532: śākalyasya grahaṇaṃ vibhāṣā-artham iha apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:533: tena trīṇi rūpāṇi bhavanti - u iti, viti, ūṃ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:537: īdantam ūdantaṃ ca śabda-rūpaṃ saptamy-arthe vartamānaṃ pragṛhya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:556: vacanādy-atra dīrghatvaṃ tatra api sarasī yadi /
GS24jvkasipu:557: jñāpakaṃ syāt tad-antatve mā vā pūrvapadasya bhūt //2 //
GS24jvkasipu:561: dhā-rūpau ca dvau dābdaipau varjayitvā ghu-sañjñakā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:575: asahāyasay ādyanta-upadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi na sidhyanti iti ayam-atideśa ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:577: ādāv-iva ante iva ekasminn-api kāryaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:578: yathā kartavyam ity atra pratyaya-ādy-udāttatvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:579: evam aupagavam ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:580: yathā vṛkṣābhyām ity atra ato 'ṅgasya dīrghatvam evam ābhyām,
GS24jvkasipu:587: tarap tamap ity etau pratyayau gha-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:596: bahu gaṇa vatu ity eta saṅkhyā-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:613: bahu-gaṇa-śabdayor vaipulye saṅghe ca vartamānayor iha grahaṇaṃ nāsti,
GS24jvkasipu:616: ardha-pūrva-padaśca pūraṇa-pratyayāntaḥ saṅkhyā-sañjño bhavati iti vaktavyaṃ samāsakan vidhy-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:618: ardhaṃ pañcamaṃ yeśām iti bahuvrīhau kṛte ardha-pañcamaiḥ śūrpaiḥ krītaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:621: ity anuvṛttes tataḥ saṅkhyā-pūrvasya dvigu-sañjñāyāṃ śūrpād añ anyatarasyām (*5,1.26)
GS24jvkasipu:630: ṣa-kārāntā na-kārāntā ca yā saṅkhyā sā ṣaṭ-sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:644: ḍatyantā yā saṅkhyā sā ṣaṭ-sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:649: ktaś ca ktavatuś ca kta-ktavatū pratyayau niśṭhā-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:660: sarva-śabdaḥ ādir yeṣāṃ tāni-imāni sarva-adīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:675: ubha-śabdasya sarvanāmatve prayojanam-- sarvanāmnas-tṛtīya ca (*2,3.27) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:697: tva tvat iti dvāv api ca anudātāu iti smaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:724: tasmin nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte vibhā-ṣeyam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:726: dig-upadiṣṭe samāse bahuvrīhau vibhāṣā sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:736: dig-grahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe jñāyate dig-upadiṣṭa-samāse vibhāṣā,
GS24jvkasipu:750: sarvanāma-sañjñāyāṃ tad-anta-vidher abhyupagamād bahuvrīher api sarva-ādy-antasay sañjñā syāt iti pratiṣedha ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:751: bahuvrīhau samāse sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:758: bahuvrīhau iti vartamāne punar-bahuvrīhi-grahaṇaṃ bhūta-pūrvamātre 'pi pratiṣedho yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:767: samāse iti vartamāne punaḥ sammasagrahaṇaṃ tṛtīyā-samāsa-artha-vākye 'pi pratiṣedho yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:778: dvandve ca samāse sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:783: pūrveṇa nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte jasi vibhāṣā ārabyate /
GS24jvkasipu:784: dvandve samāse jasi vibhāṣā sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:794: prathama carama taya alpa ardha katipaya nema ity ete jasi vibhāṣā sarvanāma-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:807: ubhaya-śabdasya tayap-pratyaya-antasya gane pāṭhān nityā sarvanāma-sañjñā iha api jaskāryaṃ prati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:811: pūrva para avara dakṣiṇa uttara apara adhara ity-eṣāṃ gaṇe pāṭhāt pūrveṇa nityāyāṃ sarvanāma-sañjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ jasi vibhāṣā ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:812: pūrvādīni vibhaṣā jasi sarvanāma-sañjñāni bhavanti vyavasthāyām asañjñāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:826: satyām eva vyavasthāyām iyaṃ teṣāṃ sañjñā //
GS24jvkasipu:829: atra api nityā sarvanāma-sañjñā prāptā jasi vibhāṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:830: svam ity etac-chabda-rūpaṃ jasi vibhāṣā sarvanāma-sañjñaṃ bhavati ,
GS24jvkasipu:836: dhūmāyanta iva aśliṣṭāḥ prajvalanti iva saṃhatāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:837: ulmukāni iva me 'mī svā jñātayo bharatar ṣabha //
GS24jvkasipu:844: atra api pūrveṇa nityā sarvanāma-sañjñā prāptā sā jasi vibhāṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:845: antaram ity etac-chabda-rūpaṃ vibhāṣā jasi sarvanāma-sañjñaṃ bhavati bahiryoge upasaṃvyāne ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:860: vibhāṣā-prakaraṇe tīyasya vā ṅitsu sarvanāma-sañjñā ity upasaṃkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:948: sadṛśaṃ triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:949: vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yanna vyeti tad-avyayam //
GS24jvkasipu:967: ej-antaś ca tad-antaṃ śabda-rūpam avyaya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:976: iti se-pratyaye kutve ṣatve ca kṛte rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:977: eṣe iti iṇaḥ se-pratyaye guṇe ṣatve ca kṛte rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:978: jīvase iti jīveḥ ase pratyaye rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:979: dṛśe iti dṛśeḥ ken-pratyayo nipātyate - dṛśe vikhye ca (*3,4.11) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:987: ity evam antaṃ śabda-rūpam avyaya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:993: iti iṇaḥ, kṛñaś ca tosun pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1013: tatra avyayībhāvasya avyayatve ataḥ kṛ-kami-kaṃsa-kumbha-pātra-kuśā-karṇī-ṣv anavyayasya (*8,3.46)
GS24jvkasipu:1015: sarvam idaṃ kāṇḍaṃ svara-adāv api paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1019: purā krūrasya visṛpo virapśin iti na la-u-uka-avyaya-niṣṭhā-khal-artha-tṛnām (*2,3.69)
GS24jvkasipu:1037: suṭ iti pañca vacanāni sarvanāma-sthāna-sañjñāni bhavanti napuṃsakād anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:1040: tena jasaḥ śeḥ sarvanāma-sthāna-sañjñā pūrveṇa bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:1050: tayoḥ pratiṣedha-vikalpayoḥ vibhāṣā iti sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1053: tatra pratiṣedhena samīkṛte viṣaye paścād vikalpaḥ pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:1062: ik yo yaṇaḥ sthāne bhūto bhāvī vā tasya saṃprasāraṇam ity eṣā sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1066: kecid ubhayathā sūtram idaṃ vyācakṣate vākya-arthaḥ sañjñī,
GS24jvkasipu:1068: ig-yaṇaḥ yo vākya-arthaḥ sthāny-ādeśa-sambandha-lakṣaṇaḥ sa samprasāraṇa-sañjño bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1069: yaṇ-sthānika ig-varṇaḥ sa samprasāraṇa-sañjño bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1070: tatra vidhau vākya-artha upatiṣṭhate ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ putra-patyos tatpuruṣe (*6,1.13)
GS24jvkasipu:1073: saṅkhyāta-anudeśād iha na bhavati - adhitarām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1090: acāṃ saṃniviṣṭānām antyād acaḥ paro mit bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1103: eco hrasva-ādeśe kartavye ik eva hrasvo bhavati, na anyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1113: iha śāstre yā ṣaṣṭhī aniyata-yogā śrūyate,
GS24jvkasipu:1118: yathā-darbhāṇāṃ sthāne śaraiḥ prastaritavyam iti darbhāṇāṃ prasaṅge iti gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1119: evam iha api asteḥ sthāne prasaṅge bhūr bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1127: prasaṅge sambandhasya nimitta-bhūte bruva iti ṣasṭhī / [21]
GS24jvkasipu:1129: tatra yāvantaḥ śabde sambhavanti teṣu sarveṣu prapteṣu niyamaḥ kriyate ṣaṣṭhī sthāne-yogā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1131: ata eva nipātanāc ca saptamyā aluk //
GS24jvkasipu:1133: sthāne prāpyamāṇānām antaratam ādeśo bhavati sadṛśatamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1139: dvayor akārayoḥ kaṇṭhya eva dīrgha a-akāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1140: arthataḥ - vataṇḍī ca asau yuvatiś ca vātaṇḍya-yuvatiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1146: iti ca-kārasya alpa-prāṇasya aghoṣasya tādṛśa eva ka-kāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1153: sthāne iti vartamāne punaḥ sthāne grahaṇaṃ kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:1154: yatra anekam āntaryaṃ sambhavati tatra sthānata eva āntaryaṃ balīyo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1162: iti ha-kārasya pūrva-savarṇe kriyamāṇe soṣmaṇaḥ soṣmāṇaḥ iti dvitīyāḥ prasaktāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1164: tamab-grahaṇād ye soṣmāṇo nādavantaś ca te bhavanti caturthāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1166: uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamāna eva raparo veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1184: ṅit ca ya ādeśaḥ so 'neka-al api alo 'ntyasya sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1188: tātaṅi ṅit-karaṇasya guṇa-vṛddhi-pratiṣedha-arthatvāt sarva-ādeśaḥ tātaṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1192: parasya kāryaṃ śiṣyamāṇam āder alaḥ pratyetavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:1211: sthāny-ādeśayoḥ pṛthaktvāt sthāny-āśrayaṃ kāryam ādeśe na prāpnoti ity ayam-atideśa ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1232: kimaḥ kaḥ (*7,2.103) iti ka-ādeśe kṛte 'ṅga-āśrayā ina-dīrghatva-aisbhāvāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:1235: ktvo lyab-ādeśe kṛte hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,1.71)
GS24jvkasipu:1254: pada-ādeśaḥ padavad bhavati -- grāmo vaḥ svaṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:1258: sthānī ādeśasya sañjñā mā vijñāyi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1261: - āhata, āvadhiṣṭa iti ātmanepadam ubhayatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1263: ānumānikasya apy ādeśasya sthānivadbhāvo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1277: aj-ādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvavidau kartavye sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1281: paṭumācaṣṭe iti ṇiciṭi-lope kṛte tasya sthānivad-bhāvāt ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,2.116)
GS24jvkasipu:1283: avadhīt -- ato lopasya sthānivad-bhāvad ato hal-āder laghoḥ (*7,2.7)
GS24jvkasipu:1291: praśnaḥ iti praccheḥ naṅpratyaye c-cḥ-v-oḥ śūḍ-anunāsike ca (*6,4.19)
GS24jvkasipu:1292: iti cha-kārasya śa-kāraḥ paranimittakas tuki kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1294: iti sico lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ kṛṣeḥ ṣa-kārasya ṣaḍhoḥ kaḥ si (*8,2.41)
GS24jvkasipu:1295: iti ka-kāre kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1297: ity anunāsika-lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ tuki kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1305: vaiyāghrapadyaḥ iti na paranimittakaḥ pādasya antalopaḥ padbhāvaṃ na pratibadhnāti /
GS24jvkasipu:1306: ādīdhye iti dīdhīṅa uttamapuruṣa-ikavacane ṭeretvasya-aparanimittakatvād yi-i-varṇayor dīdhī-vevyoḥ (*7,4.53)
GS24jvkasipu:1311: he gauḥ iti vṛddhir aj-ādeśaḥ sambuddhi-lope kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1312: bābhravīyāḥ iti bābravyasya amī cchātrāḥ iti vṛddhāc chaḥ (*4,2.114) iti chaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1314: iti ya-kāral-ope kartavye av-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1318: iti dvy-aj-lakṣaṇe pratyaya-vidhau na sthānivad bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1320: pūrveṇa atiprasaktaḥ sthānivad-bhāva eteṣu vidhiṣu pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1326: śna-sor al-lopaḥ kṅiti sārvadhātuke iti paranimittakaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1327: sa pūrva-vidhāv āv-ādeśe yaṇ-ādeśe ca kartavye sthānivat syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:1329: dvirvacana-vidhiḥ -- dvirvacana-vidhiṃ prati na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1334: iti dha-kārasya dvirvacanaṃ na syād asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1335: varevidhiḥ -- vare yo 'j-ādeśaḥ sa pūrva-vidhiṃ prati na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1340: tasya sthānivattvād ato lopa iṭi ca (*6,4.64)
GS24jvkasipu:1343: ya-lopa-vidhiḥ -- ya-lopa-vidhiṃ pratyaj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1348: iti yalope sthānivat syād asmād vacanān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1349: svara-vidhiḥ -- svara-vidhiṃ prati aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1351: jihīrṣakaḥ ṇvuli kṛte ato lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ, liti (*6,1.193)
GS24jvkasipu:1353: iti svare kartavye na sthānivad bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1354: savarṇa-vidhiḥ -- savarṇa-vidhiṃ prati ajādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1360: anusvārasya yayi parasavarṇe kartavye na sthānivad bhavati / [25]
GS24jvkasipu:1361: anusvāra-vidhiḥ -- anusvāra-vidhiṃ prati aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1365: iti anusvāre kartavye śnasorallopaḥ na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1366: dīrgha-vidhiḥ -- dīrgha-vidhiṃ prati ajādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1370: ity adhikṛtya tṛtīya-ikavacane caturthy-ekavacane ca allopo 'naḥ (*6,4.134)
GS24jvkasipu:1374: na hy ayaṃ va-kāro hal-paraḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:1376: jaś-vidhiḥ -- jaś-vidhiṃ praty-aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1377: sagdhiś ca me sapītiś ca me /
GS24jvkasipu:1405: carvidhiḥ -- carvidhiṃ prati aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1418: akṣan iti adeḥ luṅ bahuvacane ghas-la-ādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1430: vāyvoḥ iti sthānivattvāt svara-dīrghaya-lopā na bhavanti // [26]
GS24jvkasipu:1435: tena kṛte dvirvacane punar ādeśa rūpam eva avatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:1440: iti ā-kāra-lope kṛte tasya sthānivad-bhāvāt eka-aco dve prathamasya (*6,1.1)
GS24jvkasipu:1445: ity aupadhā-lope kṛte anackatvād dvirvacanaṃ na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:1448: aṭateḥ ṇici luṅi caṅi ṇilope kṛte tasya sthānivattvād aj-āder dvitīyasya (*6,1.2)
GS24jvkasipu:1452: karoteḥ atusi usi ca yaṇ-ādeśe kṛte anackatvād dvirvacanaṃ na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:1456: nayateḥ lunāteś ca uttame ṇali guṇe kṛte vṛddhau ca ay-av-āy-āv-ādeśāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1457: teṣāṃ sthānivattvān ne nai lo lau iti dvirvacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1477: tasya lopaḥ iti iyaṃ sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1509: pratyaya-nimittaṃ kāryam asaty api pratyaye kathaṃ nu nāma syāt it sūtram idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1510: pratyaya-lope kṛte pratyaya-lakṣaṇaṃ pratyaya-hetukaṃ karyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1513: ity atra sup-tiṅoḥ luptayoḥ sup-tiṅ-antaṃ padam (*1,4.14)
GS24jvkasipu:1515: adhok iti duheḥ laṅi tipi śabluki tilope ghatva-bhaṣbhāva-jaśtva-cartveṣu kṛteṣu rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:1516: pratyaya iti vartamāne punaḥ pratyaya-grahaṇaṃ kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:1522: tatra pratyaya-lakṣaṇena jhali ity anunāsikalopo na bhavati (*6,4.37) /
GS24jvkasipu:1528: pūrveṇa atiprasaktaṃ pratyaya-lakṣaṇam iti viśeṣe pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1534: yañ-śapor lumatā luptayor aṅgasya vṛddhi-guṇau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1552: dhātv-ādau varṇa-samudāye 'ntyād alaḥ pūrvo yo varṇaḥ so 'l eva upadhā-sañjñao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1563: tasmin iti saptamy-artha-nirdeśe pūrvasya-iva kāryaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1572: tasmāt iti pañcamy-artha-nirdeśa uttarasya-iva kāryaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1576: iha na bhavati -- pacaty odanam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:1578: śāstre svam eva rūpaṃ śabdasya grāhyaṃ bodhyaṃ pratyāyyaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1581: śabdena artha-avagater arthe kāryasya asambhavāt tad-vācinām śabdānām sampratyayo mā bhūt iti sūtram idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1603: tato vaktavyam tad-viśeṣāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1612: ca-kārāt svasya rūpasya tad-viśeṣāṇāṃ ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1623: tato vaktavyam paryāya-vacanasya-iva grahanaṃ bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:1635: tato vaktavyam tasya ca grahaṇaṃ bhavati tad-viśaṣāṇāṃ ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1649: aṇ gṛhyamāṇa udic ca savarṇānāṃ grāhako bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1666: ātmanā tulya-kālasya guṇa-antara-yuktasya savarṇasya grāhako bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1670: aṇāmanyeṣāṃ ca taparāṇām idam eva grahaṇaka-śāstram / [30]
GS24jvkasipu:1672: ity evam ādiṣu pūrva-grahaṇaka-śāstraṃ na pravartata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:1683: ādir antyena it-sañjñakena saha gṛhyamāṇas tan-madyapatitānāṃ varṇānāṃ grāhako bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1690: suṭ iti tṛtīya-ikavacanena ṭā ity anena grahaṇaṃ mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:1692: yena viśeṣaṇena vidhir-vidhīyate sa tad-antasya ātmān tasya samudāyasay grāhako bhavati ,
GS24jvkasipu:1703: iha mā bhūt -- kaṣṭaṃ paramaśrita iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1706: iha mā bhūt-- sūtra-naḍasya apatyaṃ sautranāḍiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1709: ugitaś ca (*4,1.6) iti ṅīp-pratyayaḥ tad-antād api bhavati -- bhavatī,
GS24jvkasipu:1714: al-grahaṇeṣu yasmin vidhistad ādau iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:1715: aci śnu-dhātu-bhruvāṃ yvor iyaṅ-uvaṅau (*6,4.77) iti-- śriyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1717: vṛddhir yasya acām ādis tad vṛddham (*1,1.73) /
GS24jvkasipu:1758: eṅ yasya acām ādiḥ tat prācāṃ deśābhidhāne vṛddha-saṃjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1769: prāg udañcau vibhajate haṃsaḥ kṣīrodake yathā /
GS24jvkasipu:1770: viduṣāṃ śabda-siddhy-arthaṃ sā naḥ pātu śarāvatī //
GS24jvkasipu:1771: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyām vṛttau prathamādhyāyasay prathamaḥ pādaḥ // [32]
GS24jvkasipu:1778: kuṭādayo 'pi kuṭa kauṭilye ityeta dārabhya yāvat kuṅ śabde iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1779: egyo gāṅ-kuṭādibhyaḥ pare añṇitaḥ pratyayā ṅito bhavanti ṅidvad bhavanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1801: asmāt paraḥ iḍ-ādiḥ pratyayo ṅidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1811: asmāt paraḥ iḍādiḥ pratyayo vibhāṣā ṅidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1818: sārvadhātukaṃ yad apit tan ṅidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1832: asaṃyogāntād dhātoḥ paro liṭ pratyayaḥ apit kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1845: indhi bhavati ity etābhyāṃ paro liṭ pratyayaḥ kiḍ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1860: mṛḍa mṛda gudha kuṣa kliśa vada vasa ity etebhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā-pratyayaḥ kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1861: na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18) iti pratiṣedhaṃ vakṣyati tasyāyaṃ purastādapakarṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1862: gudha-kuṣa-kliśīnāṃ tu ralo v-y-upadhād-dhal-ādeḥ saṃś ca (*1,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:1873: ruda vida muṣa grahi svapi praccha ity etebhyaḥ saṃśca ktvā ca kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1892: igantād dhātoḥ paro jhal-ādiḥ san kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1904: yatha-iva tarhi dīrghatvaṃ guṇaṃ bādhate tathā ṇilopamapi badheta /
GS24jvkasipu:1905: tasmād dīrghatvasya avakāśa-dānāya kittvam idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1906: cicīṣati ity ādiṣu sāvakāśaṃ dīrghatvaṃ partvād ṇilopena bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1908: ikaḥ kittvaṃ guṇo mā bhūt dīrgha-ārambhāt kṛte bhatet /
GS24jvkasipu:1909: anarthakam tu hrasva-arthaṃ dīrghāṇāṃ tu prasajyate //1//
GS24jvkasipu:1914: halantād iko jhal kit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:1938: ṛ-varṇa-antād dhātoḥ parau liṅ-sicau ātmanepadeśu jhal-ādī kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1950: gamer-dhātoḥ paru liṅ-sicau ātmanepadeṣu jhal-ādī vā kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1957: hanter dhātoḥ paraḥ sic kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1963: iha tu parasmaipade hanter vadhabhāvasya nityatvāt kittvasya prayojanaṃ na asti //
GS24jvkasipu:1967: yamer dhātor gandhane vartamānāt paraḥ sic pratyayaḥ kid bhavati ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1985: yamer dhātoḥ upayamane vartamānāt paraḥ sic-pratyayao vibhāṣā kid bhavati ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1999: tiṣṭhater dhātoḥ ghu-sañjñakānāṃ ca i-kāraś ca antād eśaḥ sic ca kid bhavati ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2004: icca kasya takārettvaṃ dīrgho mā bhūd ṛte 'pi saḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2005: anantare pluto mā bhūt plutaś ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2008: ktvā pratyayaḥ seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2011: seṭ iti kim ? iṛtvā ' gutvā ' ktvā-grahaṇaṃ kim ? nigṛhītiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2021: śīṅ svidi midi kṣvidi dhṛṣ ity etebhyaḥ pro niṣṭhā-pratyayaḥ seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2037: mṛṣer dhātoḥ titikṣāyām arthe niṣṭhā seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2044: niṣṭhā seṇ na kit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2045: udupadhād dhātoḥ paro bhāve ādikarmaṇi ca vartamāno niṣṭhā-pratyayaḥ seḍ-anyatarasyāṃ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2070: pūḍaḥ paro niṣṭhā-pratyayaḥ itvā ca seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2075: tathā ca-uktaṃ nityam akittvam iḍādyoḥ ktvā-niṣṭhayoḥ ktvā-grahaṇam uttara-artham iti // [37]
GS24jvkasipu:2079: nikāra-upadhād dhātoḥ thakārāntāt phakarāntāc ca paraḥ ktvā pratyayaḥ seḍ va na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2089: vañci luñci ṛt ity etebhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā pratyayaḥ seḍ vā na kid bhvati /
GS24jvkasipu:2095: sa yatra pakṣe na asti tatra-idam udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:2100: na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18) iti pratiṣedhe prāpe kittvaṃ vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2101: tṛṣi mṛṣi kṛśi ity etebhyaḥ paraḥ krvā pratyayaḥ seṭ kāśyapasya ācāryasya mate vā na kiḍ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2109: vā iti vartate seṭ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:2112: ukāra-upadha-adikāra-upadhac ca dhāto ralantād-dhalādeḥ paraḥ saṃś ca ktvā ca seṭau va kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2129: ū iti trayāṇām ayaṃ mātrika-dvimātrika-trimātrikāṇāṃ praśliṣṭa-nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2131: u ū ū3 ity evaṃ kālo aj yathā-kramaṃ hrasva-dīrgha-plutaḥ ity evaṃ sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2153: paribhāṣā iyaṃ sthāni-niyama-arthā hrasva-dīrgha-plutaḥ svasañjñayā śiṣyamāṇā aca eva sthāne veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2177: udātta-ādi-śabdāḥ svare varṇadharme loka-vedayoḥ prasiddhā eva /
GS24jvkasipu:2179: uccair upalabhyamāno yo 'c sa udātta-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2180: uccaiḥ iti ca śruti-prakarṣo na gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2183: kiṃ tarhi ? sthāna-kṛtam uccatvaṃ sañjñino viśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:2184: tālv-ādiṣu hi bhāgavatsu sthāneṣu varṇā niṣpadyante /
GS24jvkasipu:2185: tatra yaḥ samāne sthāne ūrdhva-bhaga-niṣpanno 'c sa udātta-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2197: yasminn uccāryamāṇe gātrāṇām anvavasargo mārdavaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:2208: sāmarthyāc ca atra loka-vedayoḥ prasiddhau guṇāv eva varṇa-dharmāv udātta-anudāttau gṛhyete, nā 'cau /
GS24jvkasipu:2209: tau samāhriyete yasminn aci tasya svaritaḥ ity eṣā saṃjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2219: tatra na jñāyate kasminnaṃśe udāttaḥ kasminn anudāttaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:2220: kiyān vā udāttaḥ kiyān vā anudāttaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2226: sarveṣām eva hrasva-dīrgha-plutānāṃ svaritānām eṣa svara-vibhāgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2227: śikyam ity atra ardha-mātrā ādita udātta,
GS24jvkasipu:2230: kanyā ity atra ardha-mātrā ādita udattā adhyardha-mātrā anudāttā /
GS24jvkasipu:2232: ity atra ardha-mātrā ādita udāttā ardha-tṛtīya-mātrā anudāttā //
GS24jvkasipu:2235: traisvarye padānāṃ prāpte dūrāt sambuddhāv-aikaśrutyaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2236: ekā śrutir yasya tad idam ekaśruti /
GS24jvkasipu:2238: dūrāt sambodhayati yena vākyena tat sambodhanaṃ sambuddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2240: svarāṇām udāttādīnām avibhāgo bhedati rodhānam ekaśrutiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2247: teṣāṃ yajña-kriyāyām api tatha-iva prayoge prāpte eka-śrutir vidhīyate japa-nyūṅkha-sāmāni varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:2249: agnir mūrdhā divaḥ kakut patiḥ pṛthivyā ayam /
GS24jvkasipu:2266: yajña-karmaṇi vaṣaṭkāraḥ uccaistarāṃ vā bhavati eka-śrutir vā /
GS24jvkasipu:2269: yady evaṃ vauṣaḍ-grahaṇam eva kasmān na kṛtam ?
GS24jvkasipu:2278: vā iti prakṛte vibhāṣā-grahanaṃ yajña-karmaṇi ity asya nivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:2279: tena ayaṃ svādhyāya-kāle 'pi pākṣika aikaśrutya-vidhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2288: na subrahmaṇyāyāṃ svaritasya tu udāttaḥ // PS_1,2.37 //
GS24jvkasipu:2290: subrahmaṇyā nāma nigadas tatra yajña-karmaṇi iti vibhāṣā chandasi (*1,2.36)
GS24jvkasipu:2293: yas tu lakṣaṇa-prāptaḥ svaritas tasya-udātta ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2298: gaurāva-skandinnahalyāyai jāra kauśikabrāhmaṇa gautamabruvāṇa śvaḥ sutyāmāgaccha maghavan /
GS24jvkasipu:2299: atra subrahmaṇyom ity okāras titsvareṇa svaritas tasya-udātto vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2302: udāttād anudātasya svaritaḥ iti svaritaḥ prasaktas tasya anena-udāttaḥ triyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2303: tad evam indra āgaccha iti catvāra udāttāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2305: hariva āgaccha ityanayaiva prakriyayā catvāra udāttāḥ dvāv anudāttau /
GS24jvkasipu:2306: medhātitheḥ iti ṣaṣṭyantaṃ parama-amantritam anupraviśati subāmantrite parāṅgavatsvare (*2,1.2) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2307: tataḥ sakalasyā mantritādy-udāttatve iṛte dvitīyam akṣaram anudāttaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:2313: gaurāvaskandin iti tatha-iva dve ādye akṣare udātte,
GS24jvkasipu:2315: ahalyāyai jāra iti subantasya amantrita-anupraveśāt t advadeva svaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2317: kauśikabrahmaṇa iti samastamāmantritamādy-udāttaṃ tatra pūrvavad dvāv udāttau śeṣam anudāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:2318: evam gautama-bruvāṇa iti dvāv udāttau śeṣam anudāttām /
GS24jvkasipu:2319: śvaḥ sutyāmāgaccha maghavan iti śvaḥ-śabda udāttaḥ sutyām ity antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2321: iti kyapo vidhāne udāttaḥ iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2327: subrahmaṇyāyām eva devā brahmāṇaḥ iti paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2331: dvayor api padayor āmantrita-ādy-udāttatve śeṣanighāte ca+udāttād anudāttasya svaritaḥ kṛtas tasya-anudātto bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2335: saṃhitāyaṃ viśaye svaritāt pareṣām anudāttānām ekaśrutir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2336: imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri /
GS24jvkasipu:2339: me iti anudāttaṃ vidhi-kāla eva nighāta-vidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2342: tasmāt svaritāt pareṣām anudāttānāṃ gaṅgeprabhṛtīnām ekaśrutir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2353: udāttaḥ paro yasmāt sa udāttaparaḥ svaritaḥ paro yasmāt sa svaritaparaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2354: udāttaparasya svaritaparasya ca anudāttasya sannatara ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2359: tatra anudāttayor ekādeśa okāro 'nudāttaḥ tasya-udātte parabhūte sannatara ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2360: imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri /
GS24jvkasipu:2362: śutudri ity etad āmantritaṃ pādādau tasmān na nihanyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2364: tasya prathamam akṣaram udāttaṃ tasmin parabhūte pūrvasya sarasvati iti ikārasya sannatara ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2366: kva iti svaritas tasmin parabhūte ka iti anudattas tasya sannatara ādeśo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2369: apṛktaḥ iti iyaṃ sañjñā bhavati eka-al yaḥ pratyayas tasya /
GS24jvkasipu:2398: prathamayā vibhāktyā yan nirdiśyate samāsa-śāstre tadupasarjana-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2417: eka vibhāktir yasya tad idam eka-vibhākti /
GS24jvkasipu:2419: dvitīye sambandhini bahubhir-vibhaktibhir yujyamāne 'py ekayaiva vibhaktyā yujyate tad-upasarjana-sañjñaṃ bhavati apūrva-nipāte,
GS24jvkasipu:2422: pūrva-pade nānāvibhaktike 'py uttarapadaṃ pañcmyantam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2444: vanam, dhanam iti na antasya avadher mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:2460: kṛtas taddhitāḥ samāsāś ca prātipadika-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:2461: apratyayaḥ iti pūrvatra paryudāsat kṛdantasya taddhitāntasya ca anena prātipadika-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2471: samāsa-grahaṇasya niyama-arthatvād vākyasya arthavataḥ sañjñā na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2474: napuṃsaka-liṅge 'rthe yat prātipadikaṃ vartate tasya hrasvo bhavati ādeśaḥ alo 'nyasya acaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2486: go iti svarūpa-grahaṇaṃ strī iti pratyaya-grahaṇaṃ svaritatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2490: upasarjana-go-śabdāntasya upasarjana-strīpratyaya-antasya ca prātipadikasya hrasvo bhavati / [44]
GS24jvkasipu:2510: taddhita-luki sati strī-pratyayasya upasrjanasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2536: lupi iti lup-sanñjñayā luptasya pratyayasya artha ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2538: yuktavat iti niṣṭhā-pratyayena ktavatunā prakṛtyartha ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2541: atha vā yuktaḥ prakṛty-arthaḥ pratyaya-arthena sambaddhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:2552: yathā teṣu kṣatriyeṣu vyaktivacane tadvajjanapade bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2574: khalatikasya parvatasya adūrabhavāni vanāni khalatikaṃ vanāni //
GS24jvkasipu:2578: lub-arthasya yāni viśeṣaṇāni teṣām api ca yuktavad vyakti-vacane bhavataḥ jātiṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:2591: tena jāt-idvāreṇa yāni viśeṣaṇāni teṣām api yuktavadbhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2607: tatra liṅgaṃ vacanaṃ ca svabhāva-saṃsiddham eva na yatna-pratipādyam,
GS24jvkasipu:2621: na hi pañcāla varaṇāḥ iti yogaḥ sambadhaḥ prakhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2634: yadi pañcālādi-śabdo yogasya pramāṇaṃ yogasya vācakaḥ syāt tatas tadabhāve 'darśanam aprayogaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2635: dṛśyate ca samprati vanaiva kṣatriya-sambandhena janapadeṣu pañcālādi-śabdāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:2637: kiṃ tarhi ? rūḍhirūpeṇaiva tatra pravṛttaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2643: tābhyām artha-vacanam artha-abhidhānam anena prakāreṇa bhavati iti pūrva-ācāryaiḥ paribhāṣitam /
GS24jvkasipu:2649: śabdair artha-abhidhānam svābhāvikaṃ na pāribhaṣākam aśakyatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2651: yair api vyākaraṇaṃ na śrutaṃ te 'pi rāja-puruṣam ānaya ity ukte rājaviśiṣṭaṃ puruṣam ānayanti na rājanam na api puruṣa-mātram /
GS24jvkasipu:2652: aupagavam ānaya ity ukte upaguviśiṣṭam apatyam ānayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:2654: yaś ca lokato 'rthaḥ siddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena //
GS24jvkasipu:2663: iha anye vaiyākaraṇāḥ kāla-upasarjanayoḥ paribhāṣāṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:2671: yairapi vyākaraṇam na śrutaṃ te 'py āhur idam asmābhir adya kartavyam idaṃ śvaḥ kartavyam idam hayaḥ kṛtam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2674: vayamatra gṛhe grāme vā upasarjanam apradhānam iti gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2675: yśca lokato 'rthaḥ siddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena /
GS24jvkasipu:2676: yady evaṃ pūrvasūtra eva kāla-upasarjana-grahaṇam kasmān na kriyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:2680: tathā ca pūrvācāryāḥ paribhaṣante matvarthe bahuvrīhiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:2689: tad-abhidhāne ekavacanam eva prāptam ata idam udyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2691: jāty-ākhyāyām ekasminn arthe vahuvacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2693: tena tadviśeṣaṇānām ajāti-śabdānām api sampannādīnāṃ bahuvacanam upapadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2705: bhavatyayaṃ jāti-śabdo na tvanena jātir ākhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2713: asmado yo 'rthas tasya+ekatve dvitve ca bahuvacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2728: phalgunyor dvayoḥ proṣṭhapadayoś ca dvayor nakṣatrayor bahuvacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2738: dvayor dvivacane prāpte punarvasvoś chandasi viṣaye ekavacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2748: dvivacane prāpte chandasi viṣaye viśākhayor ekavacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2751: tiṣya-punarvasvor nakṣatra-dvandve bahuvacanasya dvivacanaṃ nityam // PS_1,2.63 //
GS24jvkasipu:2758: niṣyapunarvasvoḥ nakṣatra-viṣaye dvandve bahuvacana-prasaṅgo nityaṃ dvivacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2766: nanu ca prakṛtam eva nakṣatra-grahaṇaṃ kim-arthaṃ punar ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2772: yastiṣyastau punarvasū yeṣāṃ te ime tiṣya-punarvasavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2773: unmugdhāḥ tiṣyādaya eva viparyayeṇa dṛśyamānā bahuvrīhiṇocyante /
GS24jvkasipu:2778: sarvo dvandvo vibhāṣā ekavad bhavati ity asya+etada eva jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:2783: sarūpāṇāṃ śabdānaṃ ekavibhaktau parata ekaśeṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2786: vṛkṣaś ca vṛkṣaś ca Vrkṣaś ca vṛkṣāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2802: brāhmaṇābhyāṃ ca kṛtaṃ brāhmaṇābhyāṃ ca dehi //
GS24jvkasipu:2803: vṛddho yūnā tal-lakṣaṇaś ced-eva viśeṣaḥ // PS_1,2.65 //
GS24jvkasipu:2807: vṛddho yūnā sahavacane śiṣyate yuvā nivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2808: vṛddha-śabdaḥ pūrvācārya-sañjñā gotrasya apatyam antarhitaṃ vṛddham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2809: vṛddha-yūnoḥ sahavacane vṛddhaḥ śiṣyate tal-lakṣaṇaś ced eva viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2815: vṛddha-yuva-nimittakam eva yadi vairūpayam bhavati tato vṛddhiḥ śiṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2828: kutsā sauvīratvaṃ ca bhāgavittikasya aparo viśeṣo vidyate //
GS24jvkasipu:2832: vṛddho yūnā iti ca sarvam strī vṛddhā yūnā sahavacane śiṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2843: striyā sahavacane pumān śiṣyate strī nivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2855: yathā saṅkhyaṃ bhrātṛ-putra-śabdau śiṣyete sahavacane svasṛ-duhitṛbhyam /
GS24jvkasipu:2864: ekavac ca asya kāryaṃ bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:2871: śuklaṃ ca śuklaṃ ca śuklaṃ ca suklāni /
GS24jvkasipu:2888: tayd-ādīni śabda-rūpāṇi sarvaiḥ sahavacane nityaṃ śiṣyante tyad-ādibhir anyaiś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:2893: tyad-ādīnāṃ mitho yadyat paraṃ tattac chisyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2901: iti puṃsaḥ śeṣe prāpte strī-śeṣo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2916: iti srījayādityaviracitāyaṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // [51]
GS24jvkasipu:2919: bhū ity evam ādayaḥ śabdāḥ kriyāvacanā dhātusañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:2925: tad iha api pūrvācarya-sañjñāśrayaṇāt kriyāvācinām eva bhūvādīnāṃ dhātusañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2927: bhūvo vārthaṃ vadanti iti bhv-arthā vā vādayaḥ smaṛtāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2935: tatra yo 'c anunāsikaḥ sa itsañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2941: ac iti kim ? ato manin-kvanib-vanipaś ca (*3,2.74) /
GS24jvkasipu:2959: hasya l hal iti dvitīyam atra hal-grahaṇaṃ tantreṇa+upāttaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:2960: tena pratyāhāra-pāṭhe hal ity atra lakārasya itsañjñā kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2961: tathā ca sati halantyam ity atra pratyāhāre na+itaretarāśraya-doṣo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2964: pūrveṇa prāptāyamitsañjñāyāṃ vibhāktau vartamānānāṃ tavarga-sakāra-makaraṇāṃ pratiṣedha ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2983: ñi-ṭu-ḍu ity eteṣāṃ samudayānām ādito vartamānānām ity sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3003: ādiḥ ity eva - avimahyoṣṭiṣac - aviṣaḥ, mahiṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3029: taddhita-varjitasya pratyayasy ādito vartamānā lakāra-śakāra-kavargā itsañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:3061: samānāṃ samasaṅkhyānaṃ samaparipahitānām uddeśinām anudeśināṃ ca yathā-kramamauddeśibhir anudeśinaḥ sambadhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:3074: iha kasmān na bhavati veśo-yaśa-āder bhagād yal (*4,4.131)
GS24jvkasipu:3097: aviśeṣeṇa dhātor ātmanepadaṃ parsmaipadaṃ ca vidhāsyate,
GS24jvkasipu:3100: tebhya eva ātmanepadaṃ bhavati na anyebhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3107: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ (*3,4.69)
GS24jvkasipu:3108: iti bhāva-karmaṇor vihitasya lasya tib-ādayaḥ sāmānyena vakṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:3120: tena kartiva yaḥ kartā tatra prasmaipadaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:3132: kartṛ-grahaṇam uttara-arthaṃ śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam (*1,3.78) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:3136: gaty-arthebhyo hiṃsā-arthebhyaś ca dhātughyaḥ karma-vyatihare ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3150: anyonyaḥ ity evam upapadād dhātoḥ karma-vyatihāre ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3158: iti prasmaipade prāpte ni-pūrvād viśa ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3163: ya-dāgamās tad-grahaṇena gṛhyante tena aṭā na asti vyavadhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:3178: paryādaya upasargā gṛhyante tena+iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:3184: viparā pūrvāj jayater dhātor ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3194: āṅ-pūrvād dadāter anāsya-viharaṇe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3202: iha mā bhūt, vyādadate pipīlikāḥ pataṅgasya mukham // [56]
GS24jvkasipu:3206: etasmād anu sam pari ity evaṃ pūrvād āṅ-pūrvāc ca-ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3248: sam ava pra vi ity evaṃ pūrvāt tiṣṭhater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3262: prakāśane stheya-ākhyāyāṃ ca tiṣṭhater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3271: utpūrvāt tiṣṭhater anūrdhva-karmaṇi vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3278: iha mā bhūt, asmād grāmāt śatam uttiṣṭhati /
GS24jvkasipu:3286: upapūrvāt tiṣthater mantrakaraṇe 'rthe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3298: mitrakaraṇaṃ tu vināpy upaśleṣeṇa maitrīsam Bandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3306: upapūrvāt tiṣṭhater akarmakāt akarmaka-kriyāvacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3316: ut vi ity evaṃ pūrvāt tapater akarmaka-triyāvacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3328: svāṅgaṃ ca+iha na pāribhāṣikaṃ gṛhyate adravaṃ mūrtimat svāṅgam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:3356: iti prāpte sampūrvebhyo gami ṛcchi pracchi svarati arti śru vidi ity etebhyo 'karmakebhyo dhātubhya ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3373: arty-ādeśasya tv arti ity eva siddham ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:3389: ni sam upa vi ity evaṃ pūrvāt hvayater dhātor ātnamepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3401: spardhāyāṃ viṣaye āṅ-pūrvād hvayater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3415: gandhana-ādiṣv artheṣu vartamānat karoter ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3436: tasya sato guṇantarādhānaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3449: adhipūrvāt karoteḥ prasahane vartamānāt ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3460: vipūrvat karoter akartrabhiprāye kriyāphale śabdakarmaṇa ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3470: vipūrvāt karoter akarmakād akarmaka-kriyāvacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3472: sādhu dāntāḥ śobhanaṃ valganti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3480: ṇīñ prāpṇe ity etasmāt dhātor ātmanepadaṃ bhavati sammānana-ādiṣu viśeṣaṇeṣu satsu /
GS24jvkasipu:3486: te yuktibhiḥ sthāpyamānāḥ sammānitāḥ pūjitā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:3489: ācārya-karaṇam ācāryakriyā -- māṇavakam īdṛśena vidhinā ātma-samīpaṃ prāpyati yathā sa upanetā svayam ācāryaḥ sampadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3491: ātmānam ācāryīkurvan māṇavakam ātma-samīpaṃ prāpayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3496: vigaṇanam ṛṇāder niryātanam -- madrāḥ karam vinayante /
GS24jvkasipu:3507: kartṛsthe karmaṇy aśarīre sati nayater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3522: śeṣat kartari parasmaipade prāpte vṛtty-ādiśv artheśu karmer dhator ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3538: upaparāpūrvāt kramater vṛtty-ādiśv artheṣu vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3552: āṅ-pūrvāt kramater udgamane vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3559: iha mā bhūt, ākramati dhūmo harmyatalāt //
GS24jvkasipu:3562: vi-pūrvāt kramateḥ pada-viharaṇe 'rthe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3567: yady api kramiḥ pāda-viharaṇa eva paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:3574: pra up ity etābhyāṃ parasmāt kramater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:3575: tau cet propau samarthau tulya-arthau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3586: ity anena ātmanepadam atra karmān na bhāti ?
GS24jvkasipu:3600: śeṣāt kartari prasmaipade prāpte jānater apahnavi vartamanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3602: sopasargaś ca ayam-apahnave vartate, na kevalaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3629: sam prati ity evaṃ pūrvāj jānāter anādhyāne vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3641: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prāpte bhāsana-ādiśu viśeṣaṇeṣu satsu vadater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3643: bhāsamāno dīpyamānas tatra padārthān vyaktīkaroti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3664: nanu vada vyaktāyāṃ vāci ity eva paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:3678: vadaḥ iti, vyaktavācām iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:3679: anupūrvād vadater akarmakād vyaktavāgviṣayād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3683: yathā kalāpo 'dhīyāno vadati tathā kaṭhaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3692: vipralāpātmake vyaktavācāṃ samuccārane vartamānād vadater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:3698: yugapat paraspara-pratiṣedhena viruddhaṃ vadanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3709: na tu gṝ śabde iti kryādipaṭhitasya /
GS24jvkasipu:3710: tasya hy avapūrvasya prayoga eva na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:3711: śeṣāt kartari parsmaipade prāpte avapūrvād girater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3718: saṃpūrvāt girateḥ pratijñāne vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3726: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prāpte utpūrvāc carateḥ sakarmaka-kriyāavacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3740: ubhau lokau sañcarasi imaṃ ca amuṃ ca devala / [64]
GS24jvkasipu:3744: dāṇaś ca sā cec caturthy-arthe // PS_1,3.55 //
GS24jvkasipu:3750: vaktavyam eva+etat -- aśiṣṭavyavahāre tṛtīyā caturthy-arthe bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:3753: kāmukaḥ san dāsyai dadāti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3756: samaḥ praśabdena vyavadhāne katham ātmanepadaṃ bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:3757: samaḥ iti viśeṣaṇe ṣaṣṭhī, na pañcamī // [65]
GS24jvkasipu:3760: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prāpte upapūrvāt yamaḥ svakaraṇe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3768: jñā śru samṛ dṛś ity eteṣāṃ sannantānām ātmanepdaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3787: anupūrvāj jānāteḥ sannantād ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3788: tathā ca sati sakarmakasya+eva ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ sampadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3794: prati āṅ ity evaṃ pūrvāc-chṛṇoteḥ sannantād ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3806: śito vā sambandhī tasmād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3828: yena nimittena pūrvasmād ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate tena+eva sannantādapi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3830: sannantād api tad eva nimittam - āsisiṣate,
GS24jvkasipu:3847: avayave kṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ samudāyasya viśeṣakaṃ bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:3857: udumbhāñcakāra iti kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale atmanepadaṃ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:3865: kathaṃ punar asya anuprayogaḥ yāvatā kṛñ ca anuprayujyate liti (*3,1.40)
GS24jvkasipu:3866: ity ucyate ? kṛñ iti pratyāhāra-grahaṇaṃ tatra vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3869: iti kṛ-śabdād ārabhya yāvat kṛño dvitīya-tṛtīya-śamba-bījāt kṛṣau (*5,4.58)
GS24jvkasipu:3874: tasya kartr-abhiprāye kriyā-phale siddham eva ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:3876: pra upa ity evaṃ pūrvāt yujer ayajña-pātra-prayogaviṣayād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3903: anavana iti pratiṣedhena raudhādikasya-eva grahanaṃ vijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:3904: na taudādikasya bhujo kauṭilye ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:3907: ṇe raṇau yat karma ṇau cet sa kartā 'nādhyāne // PS_1,3.67 //
GS24jvkasipu:3909: ṇicś ca (*1,3.74) iti kartr-abhiprāye kriyā-phale siddham eva ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:3912: katham ? aṇau yat karma ṇau cet tad eva karma,
GS24jvkasipu:3921: ṇeḥ iti kim ? ārohanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:3929: ṇau ced-grahanaṃ samāna-kriya-artham -- ārohanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:3951: vibheteḥ smayateś ca ṇy-antād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati hetubhaye /
GS24jvkasipu:3963: atra kuñcikā bhayasya karaṇam, na hetuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3969: vañcu gatau ity etayor ṇy-anatayoḥ pralambhane vartamānāyor ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3976: gardhanam asya-utpādayati ity arthaḥ ahiṃ vañcayati /
GS24jvkasipu:3982: līṅ śleṣaṇe iti divādau paṭhyate lī śleṣaṇe iti ca kryādau /
GS24jvkasipu:3984: liyo ṇy-antāt saṃmānane śālīnīkaraṇe ca vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4002: ṇyantāt karoter mithyopapadād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati abhyāse /
GS24jvkasipu:4005: sāpacāraṃ svarādiduṣṭam asakṛd uccārayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4016: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prapte svariteto ye dhātavo ñitaś ca tebhyaḥ ātmanepadaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:4019: yad-artham asau kriyā ārabhyate tac cet kartur lakāra-vācyasya bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4029: yady api dakṣiṇā bhṛtiś ca kartuḥ phalmihāsti tathā api na tad-arthaḥ kriyārambhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4033: apapūrvad vadateḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4048: sam ud āṅ ity evaṃ pūrvād yameḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:4065: anupasargāj jānāteḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4075: iti pañcabhiḥ sutrair ātmanepadaṃ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale dyotite vihitam /
GS24jvkasipu:4076: tad-upapadena dyotite na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4078: tena pratīyamāne kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale vibhāśā ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4092: yebhyo dhātubhyo yena viśeṣaṇena ātmanepadam uktaṃ tato yad-anyat sa śeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4108: tena kartā-eva yaḥ kartā tatra prasmaipadam bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:4112: kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale gandhanādiṣu ca karoter ātmanepadaṃ vihitam /
GS24jvkasipu:4114: anu parā ity evaṃ pūrvāt karoteḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4120: tataḥ kartr-abhiprāya-kriyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4121: abhi prati ati ity evaṃ pūrvāt kṣipaḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4132: tatra kartr-abhiprāya-kriyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4140: tataḥ tathā+eva ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4146: vahatim api kecid atra anuvartayanti - parivahati //
GS24jvkasipu:4151: viāṅ pari ity evaṃ pūrvāt ramateḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4171: pūrveṇa nitye parasmaipade prāpte vikalpa ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4172: upapūrvad ramater akarmakād vibhāṣā parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4178: ṇicaś ca (*1,3.74) iti kartr-abhiprāya-triyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4179: budha yudha naśa jana iṅ pru dru sru ity etebhyo ṇyantemyaḥ parasmaipadam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4189: ity evaṃ siddhe vacanam idam acittavat-kartṛka-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:4194: ye 'tra calana-artha api teṣām nigaraṇa-calana-arthebhyaś ca (*1,3.87)
GS24jvkasipu:4195: iti siddhe yadā na calana-arthās tad-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:4210: nigaraṇa-arthebhyaś calana-arthebhyaś ca dhātubhyo ṇy-antebhyaḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4226: aṇyanto yo dhatur akarmakaś cittavat-kartṛkaś ca tasmād ṇyantāt parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4236: tasmād iha cetayati iti parasmaipadena+eva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4237: idaṃ tu pratyudaharaṇam -- ārohayamāṇaṃ prayuḍkte ārohayate /
GS24jvkasipu:4245: pūrveṇa yogadvayena kartrabhipraya-kriyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepada-apavādaḥ parasmaipadaṃ vihitam /
GS24jvkasipu:4249: pā dami aṅyama āṅyasa parimuha ruci nṛti vada vasa ity etebhyo ṇy-antebhyaḥ parasmaipadaṃ na bhavati / [73]
GS24jvkasipu:4276: atha atra prasmaipadena mukte katham ātmanepadaṃ labhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:4278: ity evam ādinā prakarṇena tan niyatam ?
GS24jvkasipu:4279: evaṃ tarhi ātmanepadam eva atra vikalpitaṃ vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:4280: tac ca anantaraṃ parasmaipada-pratiṣedhena sanidhāpitam iha sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4281: tena mukte, śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:4286: tats-āhacaryād luṭhādayo 'pi kṛpū paryantās tathā+eva vyapadiśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:4288: anudāttettvān nityam eva ātmanepade prāpte dyutādibhyo luṅi vā parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4299: etebhyo dhatubhyaḥ sye sani ca parato vā parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4315: vṛtāditvād eva syasanor vikalpaḥ siddho luṭi vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4316: cakāras tarhi syasanor anukarṣaṇa-artho na vaktavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:4317: evaṃ tarhi iyaṃ prāptiḥ pūrvāṃ prāptiṃ bādheta,
GS24jvkasipu:4319: luṭi ca syasanoś ca klṛpeḥ parasmaipadaṃ vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4328: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau prathamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ // [75]
GS24jvkasipu:4334: tatra ekā sañjñā bhavati iti veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4337: anyatra sañjāsamāveśān niyama-arthaṃ vacanam ekaiva sañjñā bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4344: ekā sañjñā iti vacanād gurusañjñā eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4351: yatra dvau prasaṅgāv anyārthav ekasmin yugapat prāpnutaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:4354: utsarga-apavāda-nitya-anitya-antaraṅga-vahiraṅgeṣu tulyabalatā na asti iti na ayam asya yogasya viṣayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4357: paryāyeṇa vā pravṛttau prāptāyāṃ vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4373: īkāra-antam ūkara-antaṃ ca stryākhyaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ nadīsañjñaṃ bhavati / [75]
GS24jvkasipu:4404: pūrveṇa nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte āmi vikalpaḥ kriyte /
GS24jvkasipu:4405: iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānau yū āmi parato vā nadīsañjñau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4415: ṅiti parato hrasvaś ca yvoḥ sambandhī yaḥ stryākhyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:4416: stryākhyau iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānau ca yū vā nadī sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4432: stryākhyaṃ ca yan na nadīsañjñakaṃ, sa śeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4445: pati-śabdasya ghisañjñāyāṃ siddhāyām ayaṃ niyamaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:4457: pūrveṇa niyamena asamāse na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4458: ṣaṣṭhyantena yuktaḥ pati-śabdaḥ chandasi vaṣaye vā ghisañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4467: mātrikasya hrasvasañjñā kṛtā tasya anena laghusañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4473: laghu-pradeśāḥ - puganta-laghu-upadhasya ca ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4478: saṃyoge prato hrasvam akṣaraṃ gurusañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4493: yasmāt pratyayo vidhīyate dhātor vā prātipadikād vā tad-ādi śabda-rūpaṃ pratyaye parato 'ṅgasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4504: ner biśaḥ (*1,3.17) ity upasargād vidhir asti,
GS24jvkasipu:4522: subantaṃ tiṅantaṃ ca śabda-rūpaṃ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4524: padasañjñāyām antagrahaṇam anyatra sañjñā-vidhau pratyaya-grahaṇe tad-anta-vidheḥ pratiṣedha-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:4531: kye iti kyac - kyaṅ - kyaśāṃ sāmānya-grahanam /
GS24jvkasipu:4532: na-antaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ kye parataḥ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4537: na-antam eva kye parataḥ padasamñjñam bhavati, na anyat /
GS24jvkasipu:4544: siti pratyaye parataḥ pūrvaṃ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4554: pūrveṇa padasañjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ tad-apavādo bhasañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4555: yakārādāv ajādau ca svādau sarvanāmasthāna-varjite pratyaye parataḥ pūrvaṃ bhasñjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4565: vṛṣan ity etat vasvaśvayoḥ prato bhasañjñaṃ bhavati chandasi viśaye /
GS24jvkasipu:4573: takāra-antaṃ sakāra-antaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ matv-arthe pratyaye parato bhasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4582: ayasmaya-ādīni śabdarūpāṇi chandasi viśaye sādhūni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:4583: bhapada-sañjña-adhikāre vidhanāt tena sukhena sadhutvam ayasmaya-ādīnāṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4596: lasya tibādayaḥ iti sāmānyena bahuvacanaṃ vihitaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:4599: bahutvam asya vācyaṃ bhavati iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:4604: yatra ca saṅkhyā sambhavati tatra ayam upadeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4605: avyayebhyas tu niḥ-saṅkhyebhyaḥ sāmānya-vihitāḥ svādayo vidyanta eva //
GS24jvkasipu:4618: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ kārake ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4629: , akathitaṃ ca kārakaṃ karmasañjñaṃ bhavati - māṇavakaṃ panthānaṃ pṛcchati /
GS24jvkasipu:4632: kārakasaṃśabdaneṣu ca anena eva viśeṣaṇena vyavahāro vijñāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:4635: dhruvaṃ yad apāyayuktam apāye sādhye yad avadhibhūtaṃ tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4648: bibhety-arthānāṃ trāyaty-arthānāṃ ca dhātūnāṃ prayoge bhaya-hetur yaḥ stat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4666: vāraṇa-arthānām dhātūnām prayoge ya īpsito 'rthaḥ tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4675: antardhi-nimittaṃ yena adarśanam ātmana icchati tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4682: adarśanecchāyāṃ satyāṃ saty api darśane yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:4687: upayoge sādhye ya ākhyātā tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4711: karmaṇā yam abhipraiti sa sampradānam // PS_1,4.32 //
GS24jvkasipu:4713: karmaṇā karaṇa-bhūtena kartā yam abhipraiti tat kārakaṃ sampradānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4724: karmaṇaḥ karaṇasañjñā vaktavyā sampradānasya ca karmasañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:4739: ślāgha hnuṅ sthā śapa ity eteṣām jñīpsyamāno yo 'rthah,
GS24jvkasipu:4744: devadattaṃ ślāghamānastām ślāghāṃ tam eva jñapayitum icchati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4786: tasmāt sāmānyena viśesaṇam yaṃ prati kopaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4797: krudha-druhor upasṛṣṭayor upasarga-sambaddhayoḥ yaṃ prati kopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:4806: rādher īkṣeś ca kārakam sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4813: naimittikaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ san devadattasya daivaṃ paryālocayati ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4816: prati āṅ ity evaṃ pūrvasya śṛṇoteḥ kārakam sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4818: pratipūrva āṅpūrvaś ca śṛṇoti rabhyupagame pratijñāne vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:4819: sa ca abhyupagamaḥ parena prayuktasya sato bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4820: tatra prayoktā pūrvasyāḥ kriyāyā kartā sampradānasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4827: anupūrvasya pratipūrvasya ca gṛṇāteḥ kārakam pūrvasyāḥ kriyāyaḥ kartṛ-bhūtaṃ saṃpradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4831: anugaraḥ, pratigaraḥ iti hi saṃsituḥ protsāhane vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:4836: kriyā-siddhau yat prakṛṣṭopakārakaṃ vivakṣitam tat sādhakatamaṃ kārakam karaṇasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4846: pūrveṇa karaṇa-sañjñāyāṃ karana-sañjñāyāṃ prāptāyām karmasañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4847: divaḥ sādhakatamaṃ yat kārakam tat karmasañjñam bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:4854: pūrvena karaṇa-sañjñāyāṃ prāptāyā sampradāna-sajñā pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4855: parikrayaṇe sādhakatamaṃ kārakam anyatarasyāṃ sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4865: kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kriyāśrayabhūtayoḥ dhāraṇakriyāṃ prati ya ādhārah,
GS24jvkasipu:4875: adhipūrvāṇāṃ śīṅ sthā ās ity eteṣām ādhāro yaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:4887: yā yā sañjñā yasmin yasmin sañjñiny abhiniviśate iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:4893: upa anu adhi ā ity evaṃ pūrvasya vasater ādhāro yaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:4905: kartuḥ kriyayā yad āptum iṣṭatamaṃ tat kārakaṃ karmasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4914: itarathā ādhārasya+eva hi syāt gehaṃ praviśati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4916: saktūn pibati ity ādiṣu na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:4922: yena prakāreṇa kartur īpsitatamaṃ kriyayā yujyate,
GS24jvkasipu:4923: tena+eva cet prakārena yad anīpsitaṃ yuktaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:4932: akathitaṃ ca yat kārakaṃ tat karmasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4936: bruviśāsiguṇena ca yat sacate tad akīrtitam ācaritaṃ kavinā //
GS24jvkasipu:4966: tatha śabda-karmakāṇām akarmakanām ca aṇy-antānām yaḥ kartā,
GS24jvkasipu:5018: ani karta sa ṇau iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:5019: harateḥ karoteś ca aṇyantayor yaḥ kartā sa ṇyantayor anyatarasyāṃ karmasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5059: hetutvad ṇico nimittaṃ kartṛtvāc ca kartṛ-pratyayena+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5074: rīśvarādvīśvarān mā bhūt kṛnmejantaḥ paro 'pi saḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5209: upasarga-pratirūpakāḥ -- avadattam vidattaṃ ca pradataṃ ca adikarmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:5210: sudattam anudattaṃ ca nidattam iti ceṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:5274: ūrīsyāt ity atra upasarga-prādurbhyām astir y-ac-paraḥ (*8,3.87)
GS24jvkasipu:5286: punaścanasau chandasi gatisañjñau bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:5296: ūry-ādayaḥ śabdāḥ cvy-antā ḍaj-antāś ca kriyā-yoge gati-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5298: tat-sāhacaryād ūry-ādīnām api tair eva yoge gati-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5402: kaṇe-śabdo manas-śabdaś ca śraddhā-pratīghāte gati-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5405: tāvat pibati yāvad asya abhilāśo nivṛttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5433: sa gaty-artheṣu dhātuṣu vadatau ca gatisañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5447: svayam eva tu yadā buddhyā parām ṛśati tadā na asty upadeśaḥ iti so 'sya viśayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5452: adaḥ kṛtvā kāṇḍaṃ gataḥ iti parasya kathayati //
GS24jvkasipu:5467: tiraḥ-śabdaḥ karotau parato vibhāṣā gati-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5479: upāje 'nvāje-śabdau vibhakti-pratirūpakau nipātau durbalasya sāmarthyādhāne vartete /
GS24jvkasipu:5488: sākṣāt-prabhṛtīni śabdarūpāṇi kṛñi vibhāṣā gati-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5529: tad-abhāve 'natyādhāne urasi-manasī śabdau vibhāṣā kṛñi gati-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5540: madye pade nivacane ity ete śabdā anatyādhāne vibhāṣā kṛñi gati-sajñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5547: vācam niyamya ity arthaḥ anatyādhāne ity eva,
GS24jvkasipu:5552: haste pāṇau ity etau śabdau kṛñi nityaṃ gatisañjñau bhavataḥ upayamane /
GS24jvkasipu:5563: tad-ānukūlyaṃ vandhana-hetukaṃ yadā bhavati tadā prādhvaṃśabdaḥ kṛñi nityaṃ gatisañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5570: jīvikā upaniṣad ity etau śabdau aupamye viṣahe kṛñi gatisañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5583: prāk prayoge prapte chandasi pare 'pi abhyanujñāyante /
GS24jvkasipu:5584: chandasi viṣaye gatyupasarga-sañjñakāḥ pre 'pi pūrve 'pi prayoktavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5585: na ca preṣāṃ prayujyamānānāṃ sañjñā-kāryaṃ kiñcid asti /
GS24jvkasipu:5586: kevalaṃ praprayoge 'pi kriyāyoge eṣām asti iti jñāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5593: vyavahitāś ca gatyupasarga-sañjñakāḥ chandasi dṛśyante ā mandrairindra haribhiryāhi mayūraromabhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5598: yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ karmapravacanīya. sañjñāste veditavyāḥ adhir īśvare (*1,3.97)
GS24jvkasipu:5624: hīne dyotye ayam anuḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5629: upa-śabdaḥ adhike hīne ca dyotye karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5635: apa-parī śabdau varjane dyotye karmapravacanīya-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5643: āṅ ity eṣā śabdo maryādā-vacane karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5656: vīpsāyāṃ ca viśāya-bhūtāyāṃ prati pari anu ity ete karmapravacanīya-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5657: lakṣaṇe tāvat - vṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotate vidyut /
GS24jvkasipu:5663: bhāge - yad atra māṃ prati syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:5671: atha pariśabda-yoge pañcamī kasmān na bhavati pañcamy-apa-aṅ-paribhiḥ (*2,3.10)
GS24jvkasipu:5676: lakṣana-ādiṣu eva bhāga-varjiteṣu abhiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5682: yad atra mama abhiṣyat tad dīyatām /
GS24jvkasipu:5683: yadatra mama bhavati tad dīyatām ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5688: pratinidhiviṣaye pratidānaviṣaye ca pratiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5693: adhiparī śabdau anarthakau anartha-antaravācinau karmapravacanīya-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5721: samuccaye ca vartamānaḥ apiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5722: padāntarasya aprayujyamānasya arthaḥ padārthaḥ - sarpiṣo 'pi syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:5725: stokam ity asya arthe 'pi śabdo vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:5726: sambhāvanam adhikārtha-vacanena śakter apratighātāviṣkaranam - api siñcen mūlaka-sahasram /
GS24jvkasipu:5741: tad ayam svasvāmi-sambandhe adhiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5742: tatra kadācit svāminaḥ karmapravacanīya-vibhaktiḥ saptamī bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:5759: śatṛkvasū ca parasmaipada-pradeśāḥ - sici vṛddhiḥ prasmaipadeṣu (*7,2.1)
GS24jvkasipu:5765: pūrveṇa parasmaipadas-añjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ taṅ-ānayor ātmanepada-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5778: tatra parasmaipradeṣu trayastrikāḥ yathākramaṃ prathama-madhyama-uttama-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5795: supaś ca trīṇi trīṇi padāni ekaśa ekavacana-dvivacana-bahuvacana-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5803: trīṇi trīṇi vibhakti-sañjñāś ca bhavanti supas tiṅaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:5806: yuṣmady-upapade samāna-adhikaraṇe sthāniny api madhyamaḥ // PS_1,4.105 //
GS24jvkasipu:5808: lasya (*3,4.77) ity adhikṛtya sāmānyena tib-ādayo vihitāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5810: yuṣmady-upapade sati vyavahite cāvyavahite sati samānādhikaraṇe samāna-abhidheye tulya-kārake sthānini prayujyamāne 'py aprayujyamāne 'pi madhyama-puruṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5817: prahāse ca manya-upapade manyater uttama ekavac ca // PS_1,4.106 //
GS24jvkasipu:5820: prahāse gamyamāne manya-upapade dhātor madhyama-puruṣo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:5837: asmady-upapade samānābhidheye prayujyamāne 'py aprayujyamāne 'pi uttamapuruṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5847: yatra yuṣmad-asmadī samanādhikaraṇe upapade na staḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:5874: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5879: yaḥ kaścidiha śāstre padavidhiḥ śrūyate sa samartho viditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5884: vigrahavākyārthabhidhāne yaḥ śaktaḥ sa samartho vidhitavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5923: subantam āmantrite parataḥ parasya aṅgavad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:5970: sup iti saha iti supā iti ca trayam api adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:5987: anvartha-sañjñā ceyaṃ mahatī pūrvapadārtha-prādhānyam avyayībhāvasya darśayati /
GS24jvkasipu:5993: vibhaktyādiśv artheṣu yadavyayaṃ vartate tat samarthena sub-antena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5996: vibhaktivacane tāvat -- strīṣvadhikṛtya kathā pravartate adhistri /
GS24jvkasipu:6001: samṛddhir ṛddher ādhikyam -- samṛddhir madrāṇāṃ sumadram /
GS24jvkasipu:6003: vyṛddhir ṛddher abhāvaḥ -- gavadikānām ṛddher abhāvaḥ durgavadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:6013: tasya ayam upabhogakālo na bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6020: yathā-arthe yad avyayaṃ vartate tat samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6021: yogyatā vipsā padārthānativṛttiḥ sādṛśyaṃ ca iti yathārthāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6035: sampattiḥ anurūpa ātmabhāvaḥ samṛddheranyaḥ -- sabrahma bābhravāṇām /
GS24jvkasipu:6039: na kiṃcid abhyāvahāryaṃ parityajati ity ayamartho 'dhikārthavacanena pratipādyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6044: iyaṃ samāptirasakale 'py adhyayane bhavati iti sākalyāt pṛthag ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:6047: yathā ity etad avyayam asādṛśye vartamānaṃ supā saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6054: yathārthe yadavyayam iti pūrveṇa+eva siddhe samāse vacanam idaṃ sādṛśya-pratiṣedha-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:6057: yāvat ity etad avyayam avadhāraṇe vartamānaṃ supā saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6061: yāvantyamatrāṇi sambhavanti pañca ṣaṭ vā tāvata āmantrayasva /
GS24jvkasipu:6064: na avadhārayāmi kiyan mayā bhuktam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:6070: mātrā-arthe vartamānena pratinā saha subantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6076: sup iti vartamāne punaḥ sub-grahaṇam avyayanivṛtty-artham // [103]
GS24jvkasipu:6084: pañcikā nāma dyūtaṃ pañcabhir akṣaiḥ śalākābhir vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6085: tatra yadā sarve uttānāḥ patanti avāñco vā,
GS24jvkasipu:6087: tasya+eva asya vipāto 'nyathā pāte sati jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6088: akṣeṇa+idaṃ na tathā vṛttaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ jaye akṣapari /
GS24jvkasipu:6095: akṣādayas tṛtīyāntāḥ pūrvoktasya yathā na tat /
GS24jvkasipu:6108: apa pari bahis añcu ity ete subantāḥ pañcamyantena saha vibhāṣā samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6121: āṅ ity etan maryādāyām abhividhau ca vartamānam pajcamyantena saha vibhāṣā saṃsyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6130: tad-vācinā subantena saha abhipratī śabda-avābhimukhye vartamānau vibhāṣā samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:6134: agniṃ lakṣyīkṛtya abhimukhaṃ patanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6147: anuryasya samīpa-vācī tena lakṣaṇa-bhūtena saha vibhāṣā samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6160: anuryasyāyāmavācī tena lakṣaṇabhūtena saha vibhāṣā samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6172: tiṣṭhanti gāvo yasmin kāle dohanāya sa tiṣṭhadgu kālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6173: khaleyavādīni prathamānatāni vibhaktyanatarenṇa na+eva sambadhyante 'nyapadārthe ca kāle vartante /
GS24jvkasipu:6225: vidyayā janmanā vā prāṇinām ekalakṣaṇasantāno vaṃśaḥ ity abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6229: dvau munī vyākaraṇasya vaṃśyau dvimuni vyākaranasya /
GS24jvkasipu:6231: yadā tu vidyaya tadvatām abhedavivakṣā tadā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6249: nadībhiḥ saha subantam anyapadārthe vartamānaṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣye samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6306: svayam etad avyayam ātmanā ity asyārthe vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:6307: tasya dvitīyayā sambandho 'nupapannaḥ iti dvitīyā-grahaṇam uttarārtham anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:6308: svayam ity etat subantaṃ ktāntena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6315: khaṭvā-śabdo dvitīyāntaḥ ktāntena saha kṣepe gamyamāne samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6322: sarva eva avinītaḥ khaṭvārūḍhaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6331: tasya asattvavācitvād dvitīyayā na asti sambandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6341: kālavācinaḥ śabdāḥ dvitīyāntāḥ ktāntena saha samasyante vibhāṣa,
GS24jvkasipu:6357: kālavācinaḥ śabdā dvitīyāntā atyantasaṃyoge gamyamāne supā saha samasyante vibhāṣā,
GS24jvkasipu:6366: tṛtīyāntam guṇavacanena arthaśabdena ca saha saṃsyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6380: pūrva sadṛśa sama ūnārtha kalaha nipuṇa miśra ślakṣṇa ity etaiḥ saha tṛtīyāntaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6382: asmād eva vacanāt pūrvādibhir yoge tṛtīyā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:6406: kartari karaṇe ca yā tṛtīyā tadantaṃ kṛdantena saha bahulaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6423: kartṛkaraṇayo yā tṛtīyā tadantaṃ subantaṃ kṛtaiḥ saha samasyate 'dhikārthavacane gamyamāne vibhāṣā,
GS24jvkasipu:6431: iha mā bhūt, kākaiḥ pātavyā iti //
GS24jvkasipu:6435: vyañjñavāci tṛtīyāntam anavācinā subantena sahā samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6444: miśrīkarana-vāci tṛtīyāntam bhakṣya-vācinā subantena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6455: tat iti sarvanāmnā caturthyantasya arthaḥ parāmṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6457: tadartha artha bali hita sukha rakṣita ity etaiḥ saha caturthyantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6465: tādarthye caturthī ca asmād eva jñāpakād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6493: adharmajugupsuḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:6496: apeta apoḍha mukta patita apatrasta ity etaiḥ saha pajcamyantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6506: bhojanād apatrastaḥ ity evam adau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6511: stoka antika dūra ity evam arthāḥ śabdāḥ kṛcchra-śabdaś ca pañcamyantāḥ ktāntena saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6550: siddha śuṣka pakva bandha ity etaiḥ saha saptamyantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6563: dhavāgkṣavācinā subantena saha saptamyantaṃ subantaṃ subantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6564: tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati kṣepe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:6575: tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati ṛṇe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:6584: ṛṇe iti kim ? māse deyā bhikṣā //
GS24jvkasipu:6587: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye saptayantaṃ supā saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6600: aharavayavāḥ rātryavayavāś ca saptamyantāḥ ktāntena saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6607: etat tu te divā vṛttaṃ rātrau vṛttaṃ ca drakṣyasi /
GS24jvkasipu:6615: tatra ity etat saptamyantaṃ ktāntena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6624: kṣepe gamyamāne saptamyantaṃ ktāntena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6632: niṣphalaṃ yat kriyate tad evam uchyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6637: pātresamita-ādayaḥ śabdas tatpuruṣa-sañjñā bhavanti kṣepe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:6638: ye ca atra ktāntena saha samāsāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:6639: teṣāṃ pūrvena+eva siddhe punaḥ pāṭho yuktārohyādi-parigraha-arthaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:6641: yuktarohyādiṣu hi pātresamitādayaś ca iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6645: pātre eva samitā na punaḥ kvacit kārye iti /
GS24jvkasipu:6692: pūrvakāla eka sarva jarat purāṇa nava kevala ity ete subantāḥ samānādhikaraṇena supā saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6718: digvācinaḥ śabdāḥ saṅkhyā ca samānādhikaraṇena subantena saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6719: tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati sañjñayāṃ vaṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:6730: taddhita-arthe viṣaye uttarapade ca parataḥ samāhāre ca abhidheye dik-saṅkhye samānādhikaraṇena supā saha samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:6754: ity atra yaḥ saṅkhyā-pūrvaḥ samāsaḥ sa dvigu-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6755: taddhita-arthe tāvat - pañcasu kapāleśu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6758: iti iha aṇ, tasya dvigor lug-anapatye (*4,1.88) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:6768: kutsita-vācīni subantāni kutsana-vacanaiḥ subantaiḥ saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6772: iti paranipāte prāpte viśeṣyasya pūrvanipāta-artha ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6789: pāpa aṇaka ity ete subante kutsita-vacanaiḥ saha samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:6798: upamāna-vācīni subantāni sāmānya-vacanaiḥ subantaiḥ saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6814: tadvāci subantaṃ vyāghra-ādibhiḥ sāmarthyād upamāna-vacanaiḥ saha sāmasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6818: iti paranipāte prāpte viśeṣyasya pūrvanipāta-artha ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6846: viśeṣaṇa-vāci subantaṃ viśeṣya-vācinā samānādhikaraṇena subantena saha bahulaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6866: pūrva apara prathama carama jaghanya samāna madhya madhyama vīra ity ete subantāḥ samānādhikaraṇena supā saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6880: śreṇya-ādayaḥ subantāḥ kṛta-ādibhiḥ samānadhikaraṇaiḥ sahaḥ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6936: tena nañviśiṣṭena ktāntena samānādhikaraṇena saha anañ ktāntaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6961: sat mahat parama uttama utkṛṣṭa ity ete pūjyamānaiḥ saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6963: pūjyamānaiḥ iti vacanāt pūjāvacanāḥ sadādayo vijñāyante /
GS24jvkasipu:6973: vṛndāraka nāga kuñjara ity etaiḥ saha pūjyamāna-vāci subantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6975: pūjyamānam iti vacanāt pūjāvacanā vṛndāraka-ādayo gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:6986: katara-katamau jātiparipraśne vṛtamānau samarthena supā saha samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:6995: evaṃ tarhy etaj jñāpayati katama-śabdo 'nyatra api vartate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:6996: tathā ca pratyudāharanam - kataro bhavator devadattaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:7000: kim ity etat kṣepe gamyamāne supā saha samasyate taturuṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7040: te ca āviṣṭaliṅgatvād anyaliṅge 'pi jāti-śabde svaliṅgopādānā eva samānāhikaranā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:7055: prātipādika-grahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahanam iti jñāpaka-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7066: kṛtyapratyaya-antās tulyaparyāyāś ca subantā ajāti-vacanena samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7079: varṇaviśeṣavāci subantaṃ varṇaviśeṣavācinā subantena samānādhikaraṇena saha samasyte,
GS24jvkasipu:7085: avayavadvārena kṛṣṇaśabdaḥ samudāye vartamānaḥ samānādhikaraṇo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:7094: taiḥ saha strīliṅgaḥ eva kumāra-śabdaḥ samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7199: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyām kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7205: tadvācinā subantena saha pūrva apara adhara uttara ity ete śabdāḥ sāmarthyād ekadeśabacanāḥ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7208: ekaṃ ced adhikaraṇam ekadravyam ekadeśi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7221: iti jñāpakāt sarvaṇaikadeśa-śabdena ahnaḥ samāso bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:7227: ardham ity etad napuṃsakam ekadeśinā-ekādhikaraṇena samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7246: iti pratiṣedhaś ca ata eva anyatarasyāṃ grahaṇa-sāmarthyān na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:7263: prāpta āpanna ity etau dvitīyāntena saha samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:7272: tadbācinā subantena saha sāmarthyāt parimāṇavacanāḥ kāla-śabdāḥ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7287: īṣat ity ayaṃ śabdo 'kṛdantena supā saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7301: ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ subantaṃ samarthena subantena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7305: kṛdyogā ca ṣaṣṭhī samasyata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7309: pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti vakṣyati,
GS24jvkasipu:7315: iti pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam idam ārabhyate pratiprasavārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:7333: tatsthaiś ca guṇaiḥ ṣaṣṭhī samasyate iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7345: nirdhārane yā ṣaṣṭhī sā na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7350: pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7355: pūraṇa guna suhitārtha sat avyaya tavya samānādhikaraṇa ity etaiḥ saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7374: kiṃ ca syāt ? pūrvanipātasya aniyamaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7375: anantarāyāṃ tu prāptau pratiṣiddhāyāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam (*2,1.57)
GS24jvkasipu:7384: kto yaḥ pūjāyāṃ vihitastena ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7402: karmaṇi ca yā ṣaṣṭhī sā na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7412: kartari yā ṣaṣṭhī sā tṛcā akena ca saha na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7423: kartari ca yau tṛj-akau tābhyāṃ saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7429: nanu ca bhartṛ-śabdo hy ayaṃ yājakādiṣu paṭhyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:7437: kriḍāyāṃ jīvikāyāṃ ca nityaṃ ṣaṣṭhī samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7439: tṛc kriḍā-jīvikayor na asti ity aka eva+udāhriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7451: ku-gati-prādayaḥ samarthena śabdāntareṇa saha nityaṃ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7482: ivena saha samāso vibhaktya-lopaḥ pūrvapada-prakṛtisvaratvaṃ ca vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7491: upapadam atiṅantaṃ samarthena śabdāntareṇa saha samasyate nityam,
GS24jvkasipu:7497: nanu ca sup supā iti vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:7499: evaṃ tarhi jñāpayati etayor yogayoḥ sup supeti na sambadhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:7500: tena gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prāk subutpatteḥ ity etad upapannaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7507: avyayena-upapadasya yaḥ samāsaḥ so 'mā+eva bhavati, na anyena /
GS24jvkasipu:7515: amā+eva yat tulya-vidhānam upapadaṃ tasya samāso yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:7516: amā ca anyena ca yat tulya-vihdhānaṃ tasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:7523: ity ataḥ prabhṛti yāny upapadāni tāni amā+eva avyayena saha-anyatarasyāṃ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7526: yad amā+eva tulyavidhānam upapadaṃ tasya prāpte,
GS24jvkasipu:7528: yat punar amā ca anyena ca tulyavidhānaṃ tasya prāpte,
GS24jvkasipu:7541: tena anyatra na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7542: ktvāpratyayena saha tṛtīyā-prabhṛtīni upapadāny anyatarasyāṃ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7566: anekaṃ subantamanyapdārthe vartamānaṃ supā saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7568: prathamārtham ekaṃ varjayitvā sarveṣu vibhakty-artheṣu bahuvrīhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7569: prāptam udakaṃ yaṃ grāmaṃ prāptodako grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7580: samantaśitir andhreṇa dvayor vṛttau na sidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:7590: uṣṭrasya mukham iva mukhaṃ yasya sa uṣṭramukhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7592: samudāya-vikāraṣaṣṭhyāś ca bahuvrīhir uttarapada-lopaś ca+iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7596: prādibhyo dhatujasya+uttarapadasya lopaś ca vā bahuvrīhir vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7610: saṅkhyeye yā saṅkhyā vartate tayā saha avyaya-āsanna-adūra-adhika-saṅkhyāḥ samasyante bahuvrīhiś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7633: dakṣiṇasyāś ca pūrvasyāś ca diśor yad-antarālaṃ dakṣiṇa-pūrvā dik /
GS24jvkasipu:7639: iha ma bhūt, aindryāś ca kauberyāś ca ciśor yad-antarālam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:7645: tatra iti saptamyante sarūpe pade teneti ca tṛtīyānte idam ity etasminn arthe saṃsyete,
GS24jvkasipu:7647: itikaranaś ca+iha vivakṣārtho laukikam artham anusārayati /
GS24jvkasipu:7650: yuddhaṃ ca samāsa-arthaḥ iti sarvam itikaranāllabhyate / [127]
GS24jvkasipu:7651: yat tatra iti nirdiṣṭaṃ grahaṇam cet tad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:7652: yat tena iti nirdiṣṭaṃ praharanaṃ cet tad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:7653: yat idam iti nirdiṣṭaṃ yuddhaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7654: keśeṣu keśeṣu ca gṛhītvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ keśākeśi /
GS24jvkasipu:7656: daṇḍaiś ca daṇḍaiś ca pragṛtya idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ daṇḍādaṇḍi /
GS24jvkasipu:7664: halaiś ca musalaiś ca prahṛtya idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttam //
GS24jvkasipu:7667: saha ity etac chābdarūpaṃ tulyayoge vartamānaṃ tena iti tṛtīyāntena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7674: vidyamātair eva daśabhiḥ putrairbhāraṃ vahati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7688: tatra samuccayānvācayayor asāmarthyāt na asti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7691: dhavaś ca khadiraś ca palāśaś ca dhava-khadira-palāśāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7713: anyasya api yathā lakṣaṇaṃ vihitasya pūrvanipātasya ayam apavādaḥ paranipāto vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7786: aj-ādy-ad-antaṃ śabdarūpaṃ dvandve samāse pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7800: alpāctaraṃ śabdarūpaṃ dvandve samāse pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7814: abhyarhitaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nipatati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7829: sarvopasarjanatvād bahuvrīher aniyame prāpte niyama-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:7830: saptamyantaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ ca bahuvrīhi-samāse pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7840: anayor eva mithaḥ saṃpradhāraṇāyāṃ pratvāt saṅkhyāyāḥ pūrvanipātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7846: saptamyāḥ pūrvanipāte prapte gaḍvādibhyaḥ saptamyantaṃ param /
GS24jvkasipu:7858: nanu ca viśeṣaṇam eva atra niṣṭhā ?
GS24jvkasipu:7861: kathe kṛtam anena iti vā vigrahītavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7872: praharaṇārthebhyaś ca pare niṣṭhāsaptamyau bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7879: niṣṭhā iti pūrvanipāte prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7895: guna-śabdānāṃ viśeṣanatvāt pūrvanipāte prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7915: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīya pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7934: samāsaḥ - prāptam udakaṃ yaṃ grāmaṃ prāptodako grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7937: vahuṣu bahuvacanam ity evam ādinā saṅkhyā vacyatvena vibhaktīnām upadiṣṭāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:7938: tatra viśeṣaṇa-artham idam ārabhyate - anabhihitakarmādyāśrayeṣvekatvādiṣu dvitīyādayo veditavyāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:7941: dvitīyādayaḥ śabdāḥ pūrvācāryaiḥ supāṃ trikeṣu samaryante,
GS24jvkasipu:7943: karmaṇi kārake yā saṅkhyā tatra dvitīyā vibhaktirbhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7966: chandasi viṣaye juhoteḥ karmaṇi kārake tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati, dvitīyā ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7978: antareṇa śabdas tu tac ca vinārthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7979: antarā tvāṃ ca māṃ ca kamaṇḍaluḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7980: antareṇa tvāṃ ca māṃ ca kamaṇḍaluḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7983: antarā takṣaśilāṃ ca pāṭaliputraṃ srughnasya prākāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7986: kāla-śabdebhyo 'dhva-śabdebhyaś ca dvitīyā vibhaktir bhavati atyantasaṃyoge gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:8007: apavarge gamyamāne kāla-adhvanor atyantasaṃyoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8015: kartavyādṛttau phala-siddher abhāvāt tṛtīyā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8021: kārakayor madhye yau kāla-adhvānau tābhyāṃ saptamī-pañcamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8022: adya bhuktavā devadatto dvyahe bhoktā dvyahād vā bhoktā /
GS24jvkasipu:8025: iha stho 'yam iṣvāsaḥ krośe lakṣyaṃ vidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:8027: kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kārakayoḥ karma-apādānayoḥ karma-adhikaraṇayor vā madhye krośaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8036: yasmād adhikaṃ yasya ca+īśvara-vacanaṃ tatra saptamī // PS_2,3.9 //
GS24jvkasipu:8039: yasamā dadhikaṃ yasya ca+īśvaravacanaṃ karmapravacanīyair yukte tatra saptamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8042: yasya ca+īśvaravacanam iti svasvāminordvayor api paryāyeṇa saptamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8048: apa āṅ pari ity etaiḥ karmapravacanīyair yoge pajcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8059: yasmāt pratinidhiryataś ca pratidānaṃ tatra karmapravacanīya-yukte pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8069: gatyarthānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ceṣtākriyāṇāṃ parispandakriyāṇāṃ karmaṇi kārake 'dhvavarjite dvitīyā-caturthyau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8116: pītā varṣāya vijñeyā durbhikṣāya sitā bhavet //
GS24jvkasipu:8122: kriyārthā kriyā upapadaṃ yasya so 'yaṃ kriyārthopapāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8125: kriyārthopapadasya ca sthānino 'prayujyamānasya dhātoḥ karmaṇi kārake caturthī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8155: namaḥ svasti svāhā svadhā alam vaṣaṭ ity etair yoge caturthī vibhaktir bhvati /
GS24jvkasipu:8167: tena āśīrvivakṣāyām api ṣaṣṭhīṃ vādhitvā caturthy eva bhavati /
