GS24jvkasipu:8173: manyakarmaṇi prāṇivarjite vibhāṣā caturthī vibhaktir bhavati anādare gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:8185: andhāyāstaṃ sutaṃ manye yasya mātā na paśyati //
GS24jvkasipu:8188: yad etad aprāṇiṣviti tad anāvādiṣviti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8190: na tvā nāvaṃ manye yāvad uttīrṇaṃ na nāvyam /
GS24jvkasipu:8191: na tvā 'nnaṃ manye yāvan na bhuktaṃ śrāddham /
GS24jvkasipu:8195: iha caturthī dvitīyā ca bhavataḥ - na tvā śvānaṃ manye,
GS24jvkasipu:8202: kartari karaṇe ca kārake tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8220: saha-arthena yukte apradhāne tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8225: sahārthena ca yoge tṛtīyā-vidhānāt paryāya-prayoge 'pi bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:8235: yena iti ca tadavayavo hetutvena nirdiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8236: yena aṅgena vikṛtena aṅgino vikāro lakṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:8259: sampūrvasya jānāteḥ karmaṇi karake dvitīyāyāṃ prāptāyām anyatarasyāṃ tṛtīyāvibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8275: tataḥ pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati tṛtīyā+apavādo yogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8285: guṇe hetāv astrīliṅge vibhāṣā pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8298: hetu-śabdasya prayoge hetau dyotye ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8302: sarvanāmno hetu-śabda-prayoge hetau dyotye tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati, ṣaṣṭhī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:8303: pūrveṇa ṣaṣṭhyām eva prāptāyām idam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8318: tena+iha api bhavati - kiṃ prpayojanaṃ vasati,
GS24jvkasipu:8351: anya ārāt itara ṛte dik-śabda añcu-uttarapada āc āhi ity etair yoge pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8372: dvik-śabda ity atra śabda-grahanaṃ deśakālavṛttinā 'pi dik-śabdena yoge yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:8392: atas-arthena pratyayena yukte ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8413: pṛthak vinā nānā ity etair yoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:8422: vinā vātaṃ vinā varṣaṃ vidyut-prapatanaṃ vinā /
GS24jvkasipu:8423: vinā hastikṛtān doṣān kenemau pātitau drumau // [141]
GS24jvkasipu:8426: stoka alpa kṛcchra katipaya ity etebhyo 'sattva-vacanebhyaḥ karaṇe kārake 'nyatarasyāṃ tṛtīyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8428: tṛtīyā tu karaṇe ity eva siddhā /
GS24jvkasipu:8429: yadā tu dharma-mātraṃ karaṇāyā vivakṣyate na dravyam,
GS24jvkasipu:8448: dūra-antika-arthaiḥ śabdair yoge ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:8506: carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti dantayor hanti kuñjaram /
GS24jvkasipu:8507: keśeṣu camarīṃ hanti sīmni puṣkalako hataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:8512: yasya ca bhāvena yasya ca kriyayā kriyāntaraṃ lakṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:8527: anādara-adhike bhāva-lakṣane bhāvavataḥ ṣaṣṭhī-saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8535: svāmin īśvara adhipati dāyāda sākṣin pratibhū prasūta ity etair yoge ṣaṣṭhī-saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8548: ṣaṣṭhyām eva prāptayāṃ pakṣe saptamīvidhāna-arthaṃ vacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:8554: tābhyāṃ yoge āsevāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhī-saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8565: jāti-guṇa-kriyābhiḥ samudāyād ekadeśasya pṛthak karanaṃ nirdhāranam /
GS24jvkasipu:8566: yato nirdhāranaṃ tataḥ ṣaṣṭhī saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8570: goṣu kṛṣṇā sampanna-kṣīratamā adhvagānāṃ dhavantaḥ śīghratamā,
GS24jvkasipu:8577: yasmin nirdhāraṇa-āśraye vibhaktam asya asti tataḥ pajcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8582: sādhu nipuṇa ity etābhyām yoge 'rcāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ saptamī vibhaktir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:8598: prasita utsuka ity etābhyāṃ yoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:8601: yas tatra nityam eva avabaddhaḥ sa prasita-śabdena+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8638: kuṇḍam ity atra api yathā syat /
GS24jvkasipu:8641: āḍhakam ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:8653: tad-adhike prātipadika-arthe prathamā na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8660: sambodhane yā prathamā tad-antaṃ śabda-rūpam āmantritasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8681: jānāter avidarthasya ajñāna-arthasya karaṇe kārake ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8688: cittabhrāntyā tadātmanā sarvam eva grāhyaṃ pratipadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8698: eteṣaṃ karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8710: karoteḥ karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite pratiyatne gamyamāne ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8720: rujārthānāṃ dhātūnāṃ bhāva-vacanānāṃ bhāva-kartṛkāṇāṃ jvari-varjitānāṃ karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8725: jīva putraka mā maivaṃ tapaḥ sāhasamācara //
GS24jvkasipu:8737: tasyāśīḥkriyasya karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8744: jāsi niprahaṇa nāṭa krātha piṣ ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ hiṃsā-kriyāṇāṃ karmaṇi kārake ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8746: jasu tāḍane iti ca curādau paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:8748: na daivādikasya jasu mokṣaṇe ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:8762: śratha knatha kratha klatha hiṃsa-arthāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:8763: tatra ghaṭādayo mitaḥ iti mitsañjñāyāṃ mitāṃ hrasvaḥ (*6,4.92)
GS24jvkasipu:8777: vyavahṛ paṇa ity etayoḥ samarthayoḥ samānārthayoḥ karmaṇi kārake ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8793: vyavahṛpaṇisamāna-arthasya dīvyateḥ karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8802: iti nityaṃ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ prāptāyāṃ sopasargasya vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8803: upasarge sati divas tadarthasya karmaṇi kārake vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8813: brāhmaṇaviṣaye prayoge divas tadarthasya karmaṇi kārake dvitīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8820: tatsāhacaryād bruvir api tadviṣaya eva gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8821: preṣyabruvorhaviṣaḥ karmaṇaḥ ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati devatāsampradāne sati /
GS24jvkasipu:8822: agnaye chāgasya haviṣo vapāyā medasaḥ pre3ṣya /
GS24jvkasipu:8831: indrāgnibhyāṃ chāgaṃ havirvapāṃ medaḥ prasthitaṃ preṣya3 // [148]
GS24jvkasipu:8834: chandasi viṣaye caturthy-arthe ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:8843: yā kharveṇa pivati tasyai kharvo jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8852: yajer dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake chandasi bahulaṃ ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8860: kṛtvo 'rthānāṃ prayoge kāle 'dhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8867: gamyate hi dvis traś catur veti,
GS24jvkasipu:8877: kṛt-prayoge kartari karmaṇi ca ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8891: itarathā hi kartari ca kṛti ity evaṃ brūyāt // [149]
GS24jvkasipu:8898: tatra karmaṇy eva ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati, na kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:8903: āścaryam idam odanasya nāma pāko brāhmaṇānaṃ ca prādurbhāvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:8908: akākārayoḥ strīpratyayayorgrahanāt tadapekṣayā śeṣaḥ strīpratyaya eva gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8909: śobhanā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ pāṇineḥ pāṇininā vā /
GS24jvkasipu:8911: śabdānām anuśāsanam ācāryaṇa ācāryasya iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:8915: iti pratiṣedhe prāpte punaḥ ṣaṣṭhī vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8916: ktasya vartamāna-kāla-vihitasya prayoge ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8943: dvikarmakāṇāṃ prayoge kartari kṛti dvayor api ṣaṣṭhī dvitīyāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:8951: la u uka avyaya niṣṭhā khalartha tṛn ity eteṣāṃ prayoge ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8991: inas tu bhaviṣyati cādhamarṇye ca vihitasya prayoge ṣaṣthī vibhaktir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9009: iti nityaṃ ṣaṣthī prāptā kartari vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9010: kṛtyānāṃ prayoge kartari vā ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati, na karmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:9020: tulyārthaiḥ śabdair yoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavaty anyatarasyām,
GS24jvkasipu:9023: śeṣe viṣaye tṛtīyā-vidhānāt tayā mukte ṣaṣthy eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9031: vā iti vartamāne 'nyatarasyāṃ grahanam uttarasūtre tasya cakārena anukarṣaṇa-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:9035: āśiṣi gayamānāyām āyuṣya madra bhadra kuśala sukha artha hita ity etair yoge caturthī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9037: śeṣe caturthī-vidhānāt tayā mukte ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9041: ciraṃ jīvitaṃ devadattāya devadattasya vā bhuyāt / [152]
GS24jvkasipu:9063: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:9069: ekasya arthasya vācako bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9081: aṅga-śabdasya pratyekaṃ vākya-parisamāptyā trīṇi vākyāni sampadyante /
GS24jvkasipu:9090: hasty-aśva-ādiṣu paratvāt paśud-vandve vibhāṣayā eakvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9100: caraṇānāṃ dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati anuvāde gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:9104: kaṭhakālāpa-ādīnām udaya-pratiṣṭhe pramāṇa-antaravagate yadā punaḥ śabdena anūdyete tadā+evam udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:9117: adhvaryukratu-vācināṃ śabdānām anapuṃsaka-liṅgānāṃ dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9118: adhvaryukratur anapuṃsakaṃ dvandvaḥ iti gauṇo nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9130: adhyayanena nimittena yeṣām aviprakṛṣṭā pratyāsannā ākhyā,
GS24jvkasipu:9141: jāti-vācināṃ śabdānāṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati prāṇino varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:9152: jāti paratve ca jāti-śabdānām ayam ekavadbhāvo vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:9153: na niyata-dravya-vivakṣāyām - iha kuṇḍe badarāmalakāni tiṣṭhanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:9156: viśiṣta-liṅgānāṃ bhinna-liṅgānāṃ nadī-vācināṃ śabdānāṃ deśavacināṃ ca grāma-varjitānaṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9159: nadī deśaḥ ity asamāsa-nirdeśa eva ayam /
GS24jvkasipu:9160: uddhyaś ca irāvatī ca uddhyer āvati /
GS24jvkasipu:9162: deśaḥ khalv api - kuravaś ca kurukṣetraṃ ca kurukurukṣetram /
GS24jvkasipu:9173: tathā ca parvatānāṃ grahaṇaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:9175: agrāmā ity atra nagarānāṃ pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9176: iha mā bhūt, mathurā ca pāṭaliputraṃ ca mathurā-pāṭaliputram /
GS24jvkasipu:9188: kṣudra-janturanasthiḥ syād atha vā kṣudra eva yaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9189: śataṃ vā prasuṛtau yeṣāṃ kecidā nakulād api //
GS24jvkasipu:9190: ā nakulād api iti iyam eva smṛtiḥ pramāṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:9196: yeṣāṃ śāśvatiko virodhaḥ tadvācināṃ śabdānāṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9202: tena paśuśakuni-dvandve virodhinām anena nityam ekavad bhāvo bhavati - aśvamahiṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:9209: yair bhukte pātraṃ saṃskāreṇa api na śudhyati te niravasitāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9218: gavāśva-prabhṛtīni ca kṛta-ekavad-bhāvani dvandva-rūpāṇi sādhūni bhavnti /
GS24jvkasipu:9245: rūpāntare tu na ayaṃ vidhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9250: vṛkṣa mṛga tṛṇa dhanya vyañjana paśu śakuni aśvavaḍava pūrvāpara adharottara ity eteṣām dvandvo vibhāṣā ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9269: eṣāṃ bahuprakṛtir eva dvandva ekavad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:9281: vipratiṣiddha-arthānāṃ śabdānām anadhikaraṇa-vācinām adravya-vācināṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9294: yathāyatham ekavad bhāve prāpte pratiṣedha ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9320: tasya+etāvattve parimāṇe gamyamāne dvandvo na+ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9326: adhikaraṇa-etāvattvasya samīpe vibhāṣā dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9337: yasya ayam ekavad bhāvo vihitaḥ sa napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati dvigur dvandvaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:9349: ano nalopaś ca vā ca dviguḥ striyām /
GS24jvkasipu:9381: nañ-samāsaṃ karmadhārayaṃ ca varjayitvā 'nyas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati ity etad adhikṛtaṃ viditavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:9387: dṛḍhaseno rājā anañ iti kim ? asenā /
GS24jvkasipu:9392: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye kanthā-anatas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:9409: yady upajñeyasya+upakramyasya ca arthasya ādir ākhyātum iṣyate tata etad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9411: pāṇiner upajñānena pratham ataḥ praṇītam akālakaṃ vyākaraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:9426: chāyā-antas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati bāhulye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:9452: aśālā ca yā sabhā tadantas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9461: senā surā chāyā śālā niśā ity evam antas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:9473: parasya yal liṅgaṃ tat bhavati dvandvasya tatpuruṣasya ca /
GS24jvkasipu:9481: dviguḥ - pañcasu kapālesu saṃskṛtaḥ puroḍāśaḥ pañcakapālaḥ / [160]
GS24jvkasipu:9489: tatra+ekavad-bhāvād anyatra paravilliṅgatāyāṃ prāptāyām idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9501: hemanta-śiśirau ahorātre ity etayoś chandasi viṣaye pūrvavalliṅgaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9519: rātra ahna aha ity ete puṃsi bhāṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:9544: ardharcādayaḥ śabdāḥ puṃsi napuṃsake ca bhāṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:9549: śabda-rūpa-āśrayā ca+iyaṃ dvi-liṅgatā kvacid arthabhedena api vyavatiṣṭhate,
GS24jvkasipu:9786: kiṃ tarhi ? ekasya+eva abhidheyasya pūrvaṃ śabdena pratipāditasya dvitīyaṃ pratipādanam anvādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9790: etadas tra-tasos tra-tasau ca anudātau // PS_2,4.33 //
GS24jvkasipu:9793: etado 'nvādeśa-viṣayasya aśādeśo bhavati anudāttaḥ tra-tasoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9794: tau ca api tra-tasāv anudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9800: etado 'ś ity ādeśe labhe punar vacanam anudātta-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:9804: dvitīyā ṭā os ity eteṣu parata idam etador anvādeśa-viṣayayoḥ ena-śabda ādeśo ādeśo bhavati anudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9812: etadaḥ khalv api -- etaṃ chātraṃ chanto 'dhyāpaya,
GS24jvkasipu:9824: yatra kiñcid vidhāya vākyāntareṇa punar anyadupadiśyate so 'nvādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9825: iha tu vastu-nirdeśamātraṃ kṛtvā ekam eva vidhānam //
GS24jvkasipu:9830: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyamast ad ārdhadhātuke veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:9835: tena ārdhadhātuka-vivakṣāyām ādeśeṣu kṛteṣu paścād yathā-prāptaṃ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:9839: ado jagdhir lyap ti kiti // PS_2,4.36 //
GS24jvkasipu:9841: ado jagdhiḥ ādeśo bhavati lyapi parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:9860: luṅi sani ca parato 'do ghasḷ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9871: ghañi api ca parataḥ ado ghasḷ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9877: chandasi viṣaye bahulam ado ghasḷ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9882: anyatarasya aṃgrahaṇam eva kasmān na kriyate tad eva+uttara-artham api bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:9893: veño vayiḥ ādeśo bhavati anyatrasyāṃ liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9905: hanter dhātoḥ vadha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati liṅi parata ārdhadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:9909: tasya sthānivadbhāvād avadhīt iti halanta-lakṣanā vṛddhiḥ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:9912: luṅi ca parataḥ hano vadha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9915: ātmanepadeṣu luṅi vikalpo yathā syāl liṅi mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:9919: ātmanepadeṣu parato hano luṅy anyatarasyāṃ vadha ity ayamādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9926: iṇaḥ gā ity ayam āveśo bhavati luṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9928: luṅi iti vartamāne punar luṅ-grahaṇam ātmanepadeṣv anyatarasyām (*2,4.44)
GS24jvkasipu:9946: sani parataḥ iṇo 'bodhana-arthasya gamir ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9958: iṅaś ca sani parato gamir ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9964: gāṅ adeśo bhavati iṅo liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9969: ity atra asya grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:9970: na hi sthānivadbhāvena gāṅ iti rūpaṃ labhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:9973: lugi ḷṅi ca parata iṅo vibhāṣā gāṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9995: ṇau sanpare caṅpare ca parataḥ iṅo vibhāṣā gāṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10004: aster dhātor bhūḥ it ayam ādeśo bhavati ārdhadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:10013: tathā cocyate - anupratoge tu bhuvā 'styabādhanam smaranti kartur vacanān manīṣiṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10050: liṭi parataścakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ ādeśaḥ vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10057: ajer dhātoḥ vī ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty ārdhadhātuke parato ghañapau varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:10075: yau prabhūte aje rvā vī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10083: ṇyāntāt kṣatriyagotrād ārṣād ñitaś ca prayoḥ aṇḍañoryūni lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10097: it yaṇ, tasmād yūni iñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:10100: ārṣa -- ṛṣyaṇ (*4,1.114), tasmād yūni iñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:10108: , tasmād yūni prāg dīvyato 'ṇ (*4,1.83), tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:10139: paila ity evam ādibhyaś ca yuva-pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10145: anye paila-ādayaḥ iñantāḥ tebhyaḥ iñaḥ prācām (*2,4.60)
GS24jvkasipu:10167: gotre ya iñ tadantād yuva-pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10171: yañ-iñoś ca (*4,1.101) iti phak, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:10182: taulvaly-ādibhyaḥ parasya yuvapratyayasya na lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10217: tasya tadrāja-sañjñasya pratyayasya bahuṣu vartamānasya astrīliṅgasya lug bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10218: tena+eva cet tadrājena kṛtaṃ bahutvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10229: priyo vāṅgo yeṣāṃ te ime priyavāṅgāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10234: bahuṣu tena+eva astriyām iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:10235: yaska ity evam ādibhyaḥ parasya gotra-pratyayasya bahuṣu vartamānasya astrīliṅgasya lug bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10236: tena+eva ced gotra-pratyayena kṛtaṃ bahutvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10237: pratyaya-vidheś ca anyatra laukikasya gotrasya grahaṇam ity anantarāpatye 'pi lug bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:10260: tataḥ parebhyaś caturbhyaḥ gṛṣṭy-ādibhyaś ca (*4,1.136) iti ḍhañ /
GS24jvkasipu:10292: yaño 'jś ca gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu vartamānasya astrīliṅgasya luṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10309: yañādīnām ekadvayor vā tatpuruṣe ṣaṣṭhyā upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:10312: evaṃ baidasya kulaṃ baidakulaṃ bidakulaṃ vā /
GS24jvkasipu:10323: atry-ādibhyaḥ parasya gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10324: atri-śabdāt itaś ca aniñaḥ (*4,1.122) iti ḍhak /
GS24jvkasipu:10340: bahvacaḥ prātipadikāt ya iñ vihitaḥ prācya-gotre bharatagotre ca vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:10351: teṣāṃ punar grahaṇaṃ jñāpana-artham anyatra prāg grahaṇe bharata-grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:10353: iti bharatānāṃ yuvapratyayasya lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10358: gopavana-ādibhyaḥ prasya gotrapratyayasya lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10375: tebhyaś ca bahuṣu lug bhavaty eva,
GS24jvkasipu:10380: tika-ādibhyaḥ kitava-ādibhyaś ca dvandve gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10384: vāṅkharayaś ca bhānḍīrathayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95)
GS24jvkasipu:10389: pāphakayaś ca nārakayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95)
GS24jvkasipu:10391: bākanakhayaś ca śvāgudapariṇaddhayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95)
GS24jvkasipu:10395: tayor luk, aubjayaś ca kākubhāś ca ubjakakubhāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10396: lāṅkayaś ca śāntamukhayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95)
GS24jvkasipu:10403: bhrāṣṭakayaś ca kāpiṣṭhalayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95)
GS24jvkasipu:10405: kārṣṇājinayaś ca kārṣṇasundarayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95)
GS24jvkasipu:10413: upaka ity evam ādibhyaḥ parasya gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu lug bhavati anyatarasyāṃ dvandve ca advandve ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10415: eteṣaṃ ca madye trayo dvandvāstikakitav ādiṣu paṭhyante - upakalamakāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:10418: teṣāṃ pūrveṇa+eva nityam eva lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10430: pariśiṣṭānāṃ ca dvandve 'dvandve ca vikalpaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:10459: āgastya-kauṇḍinyayor gotrapratyayayoḥ aṇo yañaś ca bahuṣu lug bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10465: madyodātto hi kuṇḍinī-śabdas tadādeśo 'pi tathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:10469: iti luki pratiṣiddhe āgastīyāḥ chatrāḥ iti vṛddha-lakṣaṇaścho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10476: supo vibhakter dhātu-sañjñāyāḥ prātipadika-sañjñāyāś ca lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10492: chandasi viṣaye śapo bhaulaṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10493: adiprabhṛtibhya uktas tato na bhavaty api - vṛtraṃ hanti /
GS24jvkasipu:10495: anyebhyaś ca bhavati - trādhvaṃ no devāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:10498: yaṅo lug bhavati aci pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10501: tena chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca yaṅo lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10519: chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ śapaḥ ślur bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10522: juhoty-ādibhyast āvan na bhavati - dāti priyāṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:10529: gāti sthā ghu pā bhū ity etebhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10546: ghrā gheṭ śā chā sā ity etebhya uttarasya sicaḥ prasmaipadeṣu vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10558: tan-ādibhya uttarasya sicaḥ ta-thāsoḥ parato vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10569: mantra-viṣaye ghasa hvara naśa vṛ daha āt vṛca kṛ gami jani ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya leḥ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10571: hvara iti hvṛ kauṭilye - mā hvārmitrasya tvā /
GS24jvkasipu:10573: vṛ iti vṛṅvṛñoḥ sāmānyena grahanam -- suruco vena āvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10577: vṛc -- mā no asmin mahādhane parā vṛg bhārabhṛdyathā /
GS24jvkasipu:10591: avyayād uttarasya āpaḥ supaś ca lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10596: na avyayībhāvād ato 'm tv apañcamyāḥ // PS_2,4.83 //
GS24jvkasipu:10599: dantād avyayībhāvād uttarasya supo na lug bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10600: amādeśas tu tasya supo bhavaty apañcamyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10601: etasmin pratiṣiddhe pañcamyāḥ śravanam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10612: pūrveṇa nityam ambhāve prāpte vacanam idam /
GS24jvkasipu:10613: tṛtīyā-saptamyoḥ vibhaktyor bahulam ambhāvo bhavati avyayībhāve /
GS24jvkasipu:10626: luḍ-ādeśasya prathamapuruṣasya prasmaipadasya ātmanepadasya ca yathākramam ḍā rau ras ity ete ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:10634: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:10650: ayam apy adhikāro yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate,
GS24jvkasipu:10652: paraś ca sa bhavati dhātor vā prātipadikād vā yaḥ pratyaya-sañjñaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10661: ādy-udāttaś ca sa bhavati yaḥ pratyaya-sañjñaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10662: aniyatasvara-pratyaya-prasaṅge 'nekākṣu ca pratyayeṣu deśasya aniyame sati vacanam idam āder udātta-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:10668: supaḥ pitaś ca pratyayā anudāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:10677: kita nivāse etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ san pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10682: nindākṣamāvyādhipratīkāreṣu sanniṣate 'nyatra yathā prāptaṃ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:10693: ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ san pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10710: dhātoḥ karmaṇaḥ samāna-kartṛkād icchāyāṃ vā // PS_3,1.7 //
GS24jvkasipu:10713: tasmād icchāyām arthe vā san pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10729: dhātoḥ iti vidhānād atra sanaḥ ārdhadhātuka-sañjñā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10741: sarūpaḥ pratyayo neṣṭaḥ sanantān na saniṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:10745: iṣikarmaṇaḥ eṣituḥ eva ātmasambandhinaḥ subantād icchāyām arthe vā kyac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10763: subantāt karmaṇaḥ ātmecchāyāṃ kāmyac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10773: upamanāt karmaṇaḥ subantād ācāre 'rthe vā kyac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10783: upamānāt kartuḥ subantād ācāre 'rthe vā kyaṅ-prattyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10792: {sakārasyeṣyate lopaḥ śabdaśāstravicakṣanaiḥ} ojāyamānaṃ yo ahiṃ jaghāna /
GS24jvkasipu:10795: salopa-vidhau ca kartuḥ iti sthāna-ṣaṣṭhī sampadyate,
GS24jvkasipu:10807: bhṛśādibhyo bhuvy-acver lopaś ca halaḥ // PS_3,1.12 //
GS24jvkasipu:10809: bhṛśa ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo 'cvyantebhyo bhuvi bhavaty arthe kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10844: lohitādibhyo ḍājantebhyaś ca bhavaty arthe kyaṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10851: yāni lohitādiṣu paṭhyante tebhyaḥ kyaṅ eva,
GS24jvkasipu:10859: yathā ca kakāraḥ sāmānyagrahaṇārtho 'nubadhyate naḥ kye (*1,4.15) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:10860: na hi paṭhitānāṃ madhye nakārāntaḥ śabdo 'sti /
GS24jvkasipu:10861: kṛbhvastibhir iva kyaṣā 'pi yoge ḍāj bhavati ity etad eva vacanam jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:10862: acveḥ ity anuvṛtter abhūta-tadbhāve kyaṣ vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10874: kaṣṭa-śabdāc caturthīsamarthāt kramaṇe 'rthe 'nārjave kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10889: romantha-śabdāt tapaḥ-śabdāc ca karmaṇo yathākramaṃ varticaror arthayoḥ kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10892: iha mā bhūt, kīṭo romanthaṃ vartayati /
GS24jvkasipu:10898: bāṣpa-śabdād ūṣma-śabdāc ca karmana udvamane 'rthe kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10905: śabda vaira kalaha abhra kanva megha ity etebhayaḥ karaṇe karoty arthe kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10928: sukha ity evam ādibhyaḥ karmabhyaḥ vedanāyām arthe 'nubhave kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10949: namas varivas citraṅ ity etebhyo vā kyac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10958: puccha bhāṇḍa cīvara ity etebhyo ṇiṅ pratyayo bhavati karaṇaviśeṣe /
GS24jvkasipu:10971: muṇḍa miśra ślakṣṇa lavaṇa vrata vastra hala kala kṛta tūsta ity etebhyaḥ karaṇe ṇic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10976: vratāt bhojane tannivṛttau ca - payo vratayati /
GS24jvkasipu:10987: dhātor eka-aco hala-ādeḥ kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅ // PS_3,1.22 //
GS24jvkasipu:10989: eka-aj yo dhātur halādiḥ kriyāsamabhihāre vartate tasmād yaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11015: gativacanād dhatoḥ kauṭilye gamyamāne nityaṃ yaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11024: lupa sada cara japa jabha daha daśa gṝ ityetebhyo bhāva-garhāyāṃ dhātvartha-garhāyāṃ yaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11071: tasminn abhidheye dhātoḥ ṇic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11074: tat karoti ity upasaṅkhyānaṃ sūtrayati ity ādyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:11076: ākhyānāt kṛtas tad ācaṣṭa iti ṇic kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivac ca kārakam /
GS24jvkasipu:11077: ākhyānāt kṛdanttaṇ ṇic vaktavyaḥ tad ācaṣṭe ity etasminn arthe,
GS24jvkasipu:11087: ujjayinyāḥ prasthito māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryodgamanaṃ sambhāvayate sūryam udgamayati /
GS24jvkasipu:11093: kaṇḍūñ ity evam ādibhyo yak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11096: tatra dhātvadhikārād dhatubhyaḥ eva pratyayo vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:11100: āha ca ayam imaṃ dīrghaṃ manye dhatur vibhāṣitaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11144: pana ca ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ āya-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11150: stuty-arthena paninā sāhacaryāt tadarthaḥ paṇiḥ pratyayam utpādayati na vyavahāra-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11162: dhātu-vihitānāṃ pratyayānām āyanādayo na bhavanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:11171: ārdhadhātuka-viṣaye ārdhadhātuka-vivakṣāyām āyādayaḥ pratyayā vā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:11175: nityaṃ pratyayaprasaṅge tad utpattir ārdhadhātuka-viṣaye vikalpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:11184: pratyaya-grahaṇa-paribhāṣā+eva pada-sañjñāyām antavacanena liṅgena pratiṣiddhā satī punar iha antavacanena pratiprasūyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11191: tasmin luṭi ca parato dhātor yathā-saṅkhyaṃ syatāsī pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11200: dhātoḥ sip pratyayo bhavati bahulaṃ leti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11210: tataḥ pratyayāntebhyaś ca dhātubhyaḥ ām pratyayo bhavati liṭi parato 'mantra-viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:11224: tasmāc ca liṭi parata ām pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11238: atha vā -- vācya ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvo yaṅ-prasiddhiḥ prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:11245: etebhyaś ca liṭi parata ām pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11253: etebhyo liṭi parato 'nyatarasyām ām pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11264: etebhyo liṭi parataḥ ām pratyayo bhavati anyatarasyām,
GS24jvkasipu:11274: ām-pratyayasya paścāt kṛñ anuprayujyate liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11276: tat sāmarthyād aster bhūbhāvaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11291: kiṃ tarhi sarvāṇy eva loḍ-vacanāny anuprayujyante,
GS24jvkasipu:11299: abhyutsādayām ity evam ādayaḥ chandasi viṣaye 'nyatarasyāṃ nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:11300: sadijaniramīṇāṃ ṇyantānāṃ luḍi ām pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11301: cinoter api tatra+eva+aampratyayo dvirvacanaṃ kutvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:11302: akar iti caturbhir api pratyekam anuprayogaḥ sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11303: pāvayām kriyāt iti pavateḥ punāter vā ṇyantasya liṅi ām nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:11306: vidām-akran iti vider luṅi ām nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:11323: dhātoḥ cliḥ pratyayo bhavati luḍi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11335: āgamān udāttatvaṃ hi pratyaya-svaram iva citsvaram api badheta iti sthāninyādeśe ca dviś cakāro 'nubadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11344: śalanto yo dhātur ig-upadhas tasmāt parasya cleḥ aniṭaḥ kṣa ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11354: śliṣeḥ dhātoḥ āliṅgana-kriyāvacanāt parasya cleḥ kṣaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11364: dṛśeḥ dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ kṣa-ādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11372: śri dru sru ity etebhyaś ca parasya cleḥ caṅ-ādeśo bhavati kartavācini luṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11385: iti yadā ṇiṅ na asti tadaa+etat upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:11394: etābhyām uttarasya cler vibhāṣā caṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11408: gupeḥ parasya cleḥ chandasi viṣaye vibhāṣā caṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11409: yatra āya-pratyayo nāsti tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11413: bhāśāyāṃ tu caṅantaṃ varjayitvā śiṣṭaṃ rūpatrayaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:11420: etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ ṇyantebhyaḥ pūrveṇa cleścaṅi prāpte chandasi viṣaye na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11434: ebhyaḥ parasya cler aṅ-ādeśo bhavati kartṛ-vācini lugi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11435: asyateḥ puṣādipāṭhādevāṅi siddhe punar grahaṇam ātmanepada-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:11449: etebhyaś ca parasya cleḥ aṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11457: lipi-sici-hva ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ cleḥ aṅ-ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:11465: dyutādibhyaś ca dhātubhyaḥ parasya cleḥ parasmaipadeṣu parataḥ aṅādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11478: sṛ gatau, śāsu anuśiṣṭau ṛ gatau ity etebhyaḥ parasya cleḥ aṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11484: cakāraḥ parasmaipadeṣu ity anukarṣaṇa-arthaḥ taccottaratropayogaṃ yāsyati //
GS24jvkasipu:11487: irito dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ aṅ-ādeśo vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11505: etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ parasya cler vā aṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11516: kecit tu varnayanti dvayor upādāna-sāmarthyād gluñcer anunāsikalopo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11520: kṛ mṛ dṛ ity etebhyaḥ parasya cleḥ chandasi viṣaye aṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11532: pada gatau, asmād dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ ciṇ-ādeso bhavati taśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11547: etebhyaḥ parasya cleḥ taśabde parato 'nyatarasyāṃ ciṇ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11556: ajantād dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ karmakrtari ta-śabde parataḥ ciṇādeṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11569: asmāt parasya cleḥ ciṇādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:11577: asmāt parasya cleḥ karmakrtari ciṇ-ādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11585: asmāt parasya cleḥ ciṇādeśo na bhavati karmakartari anutāpe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:11588: tatra hi bhāvakarmaṇor api pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11593: dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ ciṇ-ādeśo bhavati bhāve karmaṇi ta-śabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11595: karmaṇi khalv api -- akāri kaṭo devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:11600: bhāvakarma-vācini sārvadhātuke parato dhatoḥ yak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11612: kartṛ-vācini sārvadhātuke parato dhātoḥ śap pratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11619: div ity evam ādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ śyan partyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11649: tasmān nityaṃ śyani prāpte 'nupasargād vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11657: sampūrvāc ca yaseḥ vā śyan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11662: ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ śnupratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11669: tatsaṃniyogena śruvaḥ śṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11680: asmāt tanūkaraṇe vartamānāt anatarasyāṃ śnu-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11688: tuda vyathane ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ śa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11695: rudhir āvaraṇe ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ śnam pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11704: tanu vistāre ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ kṛñaś ca u-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11710: tanādi-pāṭhād eva u-pratyaye siddhe karoter upādānaṃ niyama-artham,
GS24jvkasipu:11713: iti vibhāṣā sico lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11724: ato lopasya sthānivadbhāvāt guṇo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:11727: ḍukrīñ dravyavinimaye ity evam ādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ śnā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11736: etebhyaḥ śnā pratyayo bhavati, śnuḥ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:11742: udittva-pratijñānāt sautrāṇām api dhātūnāṃ sarvārthatvaṃ vijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:11746: hala uttarasya śnā-pratyayasya śanaj-ādeśo bhavati hau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11752: itarathā hi pratyaya-antaram eva sarvaviṣayaṃ vijñāyeta // [194]
GS24jvkasipu:11755: chandasi viṣaye śnaḥ śāyac ādeśo bhavati, śānaj api /
GS24jvkasipu:11757: śānacaḥ khalv api - badhāna deva savitaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11761: teṣāṃ chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ vyatyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11777: vyatyayamicchati śāstrakṛdeṣāṃ so 'pi ca sidhyati bahulakena //
GS24jvkasipu:11780: āśiṣi viṣaye yo liṅ tasmin parataḥ chandasi viṣaye aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11797: karmasthayā kriyayā tulyakriyaḥ kartā karmavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11798: yasmin karmaṇi kartṛbhūte 'pi tadvat kriyā lakṣyate yathā karmaṇi,
GS24jvkasipu:11802: iti kartṛ-grahaṇam iha anuvṛttaṃ prathamayā vipariṇamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11812: tatra lānuvṛtter lāntasya kartā karmavad bhavati iti kusūlād dvitīyā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11823: karmasthaḥ pacater bhāvaḥ karmasthā ca bhideḥ kriyā /
GS24jvkasipu:11824: māsāsibhāvaḥ kartṛsthaḥ kartṛsthā ca gameḥ kriyā //
GS24jvkasipu:11842: duha sanu nam it yeteṣaṃ karmakartari yak-ciṇau karmavadbhāva-apadiṣṭau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11877: kuṣi-rajoḥ prācāṃ śyan parasmaipadaṃ ca // PS_3,1.90 //
GS24jvkasipu:11881: anayor dhātvoḥ karmakartari prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena śyan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11890: tena liṭ-liṅoḥ syādi-viṣaye ca na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11902: ātṛtīyādhyāya-parisamāpteḥ yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo dhātoḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:11911: dhātoḥ ity evaṃ vihitasya yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:11912: iha mā bhūt, lūbhyām, lūbhiḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:11915: tatra+etasmin dhātv-adhikāre tṛtīye yat saptamī-nirdiṣṭaṃ tad upapada-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11919: itarathā hi saptamī śrūyate yatra tatra+eva syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:11922: yatra vā saptamī-śrutir asti saptamyāṃ janer ḍaḥ (*3,2.97)
GS24jvkasipu:11928: karoti kaṭam iti pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11933: asmin dhātv-adhikāre tiṅ-varjitaḥ pratyayaḥ kṛt-sajñako bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11942: asmin dhātv-adhikāre 'smānarūpaḥ pratyayo 'pavādo vā bādhako bhavati stryadhikāra-vihita-pratyayaṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:11968: prāg etasmāṇ ṇvulsaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:11999: aj-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā halantāṇ ṇyataṃ vakṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:12011: pavarga-antād dhātoḥ akāropadhāt yat prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12034: etebhyaś ca anupasargebhyo yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12048: avadya paṇya varyā ity ete śabdā nipātyante garhya paṇitavya anirodha ity eteṣv artheṣu yathā-saṅkhyam /
GS24jvkasipu:12049: avadhyam iti nipātyate garhyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12068: vaher dhātoḥ karaṇe yat pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12074: ṛ gatau, asmāṇ ṇyati prāpte svāmi-vaiśyayoḥ abhidheyayoḥ yat pratyayo nipatyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12077: yato 'nāvaḥ (*6,1.213) ity ādy-udāttatve prāpte - svāminyantodāttatvaṃ ca vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:12082: upasaryā iti nipātyate kālyā cet prajane bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12096: jīryateḥ nañpūrvāt saṅgate saṅgamane kartari yat prayayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12105: vader dhātoḥ subantoḥ upapade anupasarge kyap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:12115: bhavater dhātoḥ subante upapade 'nupasarge bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12128: hanter dhātoḥ subanta upapade 'nupasarge bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:12133: ṇyat tu bhāve na bhavty anabhidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:12140: eti stu śās vṛ dṛ juṣ ity etebhyaḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12147: kyap iti vartamāne punaḥ kyab-grahaṇaṃ bādhaka-bādhana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:12149: iti ṇyataṃ bādhitvā kyab eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12151: vṛ-grahaṇe vṛño grahaṇam iṣyate, na vṛṅaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12163: ṛkāra-upadhāc ca dhātoḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati kḷpi-cṛtī varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:12165: vṛdhu - vṛdhyam akḷpi-cṛteḥ iti kim ? kalpyam /
GS24jvkasipu:12184: bhṛño dhatoḥ asañjñāyāṃ viṣaye kyap prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12192: sañjñāyāṃ puṃsi dṛṣṭatvān na te bhāryā prasidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:12196: mṛjer dhātoḥ vibhāṣā kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12202: rājasuya surya mṛṣodya rucya kupya kṛṣṭapacya avyathya ity ete śabdāḥ kyapi nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:12204: rājā vā iha sūyate rājasūyaḥ kratuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12209: mṛṣāpūrvasya vadateḥ pakṣe yati prāpte nityaṃ kyab nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12221: bhider ujjheś ca kyap nipātyate nade 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:12229: puṣeḥ sidheś ca adhikaraṇe kyap nipātyate nakṣatre abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:12236: nipūya vinīya jitya ity ete śabdā nipātyante yathā-saṅkhyaṃ muñja kalka hali ity eteṣu artheṣu vodhyeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:12237: vipūrvāt pavater nayateś ca tathā jayater yati prāpte karmaṇi kyab nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12246: prati api ity evaṃ pūrvād graheḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:12254: pade asvairiṇi bāhyāyāṃ pakṣye carthe graher dhātoḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12272: kṛño vṛṣaś ca vibhāṣā kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12273: karoter ṇyati prāpte varṣateḥ ṛdupadhatvāt nitye kyapi prāpte vibhāṣārbhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12278: yugyam iti nipātyate patraṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12289: tasminn upapade vaser dhātoḥ kāle 'dhikaraṇe ṇyat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:12291: saha vasato 'smin kāle sūryācandramasau iti amāvāsya, amāvasyā /
GS24jvkasipu:12293: ity atra amāvasyā-śabdasya api grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12295: tathaikavṛttitā tayoḥ svaraś ca me prasidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:12299: yad iha lakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:12300: niṣṭarkyaḥ iti kṛtī chedane ity asmān nispūrvāt kyapi prāpte ṇyat,
GS24jvkasipu:12304: devaśabde upapade hvayater juhoter vā kyap,
GS24jvkasipu:12342: niṣṭarkye vyatyayaṃ vidyān nisaḥ ṣatvaṃ nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:12344: ṇyadekasmāc caturghyaḥ kyap caturbhyaś ca yato vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12345: ṇyadekasmād ya-śabdaś ca dvau kyapau ṇyadvidhiś catuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12349: ṛvarṇa-antād dhātor halantāc ca ṇyat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12357: uvarṇa-antād dhātoḥ ṇyat prayayo bhavati āvaśyake dyotye /
GS24jvkasipu:12371: āṅ-pūrvāt sunoteḥ yu vapi rapi lapi trapi cama ity etebhyaś ca ṇyat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12389: yaśca gārhapatyād ānīyate dakṣiṇāgnir āhavanīyena saha ekayoniḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:12392: tasya hi yonir vikalpyate vaiśyakulād vittavato bhrāṣṭrādvā gārhapatyād vā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12393: ānāyyo 'nitya iti ced dakṣiṇāgnau kṛtaṃ bhavet /
GS24jvkasipu:12394: ekayonau tu taṃ vidyād āneyo hy anyathā bhavet //
GS24jvkasipu:12405: jyeṣṭhāya putrāya pitā brahma brūyāt praṇāyyāntevāsine,
GS24jvkasipu:12408: tad abhāvena niṣkāmatayā asammatir antevāsī bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12409: tasmai niṣkāmāya mokṣa-arthaṃ yatamānāyāntevāsine praṇāyyāya brahma brūyāt iti yujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:12412: pāyyādayaḥ śabdā nipātyante yathā-saṅkhyaṃ māne haviṣi nivāse sāmidhenyāṃ ca abhidheyāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:12424: tatra ca dhāyyā iti na sarvā sāmidhenī ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:12431: kuṇḍapāyya sañcāyya ity etau śabdau nipātyete kratāv abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:12432: kuṇḍa-śabde tṛtīyānta upapade pibater dhātor adhikaraṇe yat pratyayo nipātyate yuk ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12433: kuṇḍena pīyate 'smin somaḥ iti kuṇḍapāyyaḥ kratuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12442: paricāyya upacāyya samūhya ity ete śabdā nipātyante agnāv abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:12443: paripūrvat upapūrvāc ca cinoter ṇya dāyādeśau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:12446: sampūrvād vaheḥ samprasāraṇaṃ dīrghatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12474: tribhyo gaṇebhyaḥ trayaḥ pratyayāḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:12478: nandi-graha-pacādayaś ca na dhātu-pāṭhataḥ sanniviṣṭā gṛhyante,
GS24jvkasipu:12480: nandana ramaṇa ity evam ādiṣu prātipadika-gaṇeṣu apoddhṛtya prakṛtayo nirdiśyante / [207]
GS24jvkasipu:12591: ig-upadhebhyaḥ jānāteḥ prīṇāteḥ kirateś ca kapratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12602: ākārāntebhyo dhātubhyaḥ upasarga upapade kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12609: pādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ upasarge upapade śa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12646: dāño dhāñaś ca vibhāṣā śa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12655: jvala dīptau ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ kasa gatau ity evam antebhyo vibhāṣā ṇa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12667: vyadha āsrau saṃsrau atīṇ avasā avahṛ liha śliṣa śvasa ity etebhyaś ca ṇa pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12668: ākāra-antatvād eva śyāyateḥ pratyatye siddhe punar vacanaṃ bādhakabādhana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:12685: dunoter nayateś ca anupasarge ṇa-pratyayo bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:12703: graher dhātoḥ ka-pratyayo bhavati gehe kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:12710: dhātoḥ ṣvun pratyayo bhavati śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:12721: gāyateḥ thakan pratyayo bhavati śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:12726: gāyateḥ ṇyuṭ pratyayo bhavati śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:12732: gāyateḥ ṇyuṭ pratyayo bhavati śilpiti kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:12737: pru sṛ lū ity etebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ samabhihāre vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12742: sādhukāriṇi vun vidhānāt sakṛd api yaḥ suṣṭhu karoti tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12743: bahuśo yo duṣṭaṃ karoti tatra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:12746: āśiṣi gamyamānāyāṃ dhātum ātrāt vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12751: amuṣyāḥ kriyāyaḥ kartā bhavet ity evam āśāsyate //
GS24jvkasipu:12752: iti śrījyādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ // [211]
GS24jvkasipu:12760: sarvatra karmaṇi upapade dhātoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12769: himavantaṃ śṛṇoti ity atra na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:12786: māṅ māne ity etebhyaś ca karmaṇy-upapade aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12819: iti uttaraṃ karmaṇi iti ca supi iti ca dvayam apy anuavartate /
GS24jvkasipu:12820: tatra sakarmakeṣu dhātuṣu krmaṇi ity etad upatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:12824: tunda-śokayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ parimṛja-apanudoḥ dhātvoḥ kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12841: dadāteḥ jānāteś ca dhātoḥ preṇopasṛṣṭāt karmaṇy-upapade kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12849: saṃpūrvāt khyā ity etasmād dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12855: gāyateḥ pibateś ca dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade 'nupasarge ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12870: yā bāhmaṇī surāpī bhavati naināṃ devāḥ patilokaṃ nayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:12871: yā brahmaṇī surāpā bhavati naināṃ devāḥ patilokaṃ nayanti // [213]
GS24jvkasipu:12874: harater dhātor anudyamane vartamānāt karmaṇi upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12896: vayasi gamyamāne harateḥ karmaṇy-upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12899: yad udyamanaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ sambhāvyamānaṃ vā vayo gamayati,
GS24jvkasipu:12905: āṅ-pūrvād harateḥ karmaṇy-upapade ac pratyayo bhavati tācchīlye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:12909: puṣpādy-āharane svābhāvikī phalānapekṣā pravṛttir asya ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12923: stamba karṇa ity etayoḥ subantayor upapadayor yathā-saṅkhyaṃ rami-japoḥ dhātvoḥ acpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12925: japeḥ śabda-karmakatvāt karma na sambhavati iti supi ity etad iha abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12934: śamy upapade dhātu-mātrāt sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye acpratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12938: dhātu-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā dhātoḥ iti vartata eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:12939: śami-sañjñāyām iti siddhe dhātu-grahaṇaṃ kṛño hetvādiṣu ṭapratiṣedha-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:12946: śeter dhātor adhikaraṇe subanta upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12963: carer dhātor adhikaraṇe subanta upapade ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12972: bhikṣā senā ādāya ity eteṣu upapadeṣu careḥ dhatoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12978: puras agratas agre ity eteṣu upapadeṣu sarteḥ dhātoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12984: pūrva-śabde kartṛ-vāciny-upapade sarter dhātoḥ ṭapratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12990: karmaṇi upapade karoteḥ dhātoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati hetau tācchīlye ānulomye ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:13006: karmaṇi supi iti ca dvayam apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:13008: divā-ādiṣu upapadeṣu karoter dhātoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13010: divā-śabdo adhikaraṇa-vacanaḥ supi ity asya viśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:13049: karama-śabde upapade karma-vācini karoteḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati bhṛtau gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:13052: karma karoti iti karmakaraḥ bhṛtakaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13056: śabdādiṣu upapadeṣu karoteḥ ṭapratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13070: stamba śakṛt ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ inpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13079: dṛti nātha ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ harater dhātoḥ paśau kartari in pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13086: phalegrahiḥ ātmambhariḥ ity etau śabdau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:13087: phala-śabdasya upapadasya ekārāntatvam inpratyayaś ca graher nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13089: ātma-śabdasya upapadasya mumāgama inpratyayaś ca bhṛño nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13099: etebhyaḥ karmaṇy-upapade chandasi viṣaye inpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13100: brahmavaniṃ tvā kṣatravaniṃ suprajāvaniṃ rāyaspoṣavaniṃ paryūhāmi /
GS24jvkasipu:13106: ejṛ kampane ity asmāt ṇyantāt karmaṇy-upapade khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13118: nāsikāstanayoḥ karmaṇorupapadayoḥ dhmādheṭordhātvoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13122: nāsikāyāṃ tu dhmaś ca dheṭaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:13125: tac ca+etan nāsika-stanayor iti lakṣaṇavyabhicāracihnād alpāctarasya apūrvanipātanāl labhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13126: dheṭaḥ ṭitvāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13130: nāḍī muṣti ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ dhmādheṭoḥ khaśpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13147: vaha prāpaṇe ity etābhyām utpūrvābhyāṃ kūle karmaṇi upapade khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13152: vaha abhra ity etayoḥ karamṇor upapadayoḥ liher dhātoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13158: tasmin karmaṇy-upapade paceḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13164: mita nakha ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ paceḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13170: vidhu arus ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ tuder dhātoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13175: asūrya lalāṭa ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ dṛśi-tapoḥ dhātvoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13182: evaṃ nāma guptā yad aparihārya-darśanaṃ sūryam api na paśyanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:13185: ugrampaśya irammada pāṇindhama ity ete śabdā nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:13188: pāṇayo dhmāyante eṣu iti pāṇindhamāḥ panthānaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:13191: priya vaśa ity etayoḥ karamṇoḥ upapadayoḥ vadeḥ dhātoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13209: dviṣat-parayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ tāpeḥ chātoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13220: vākśabde karmaṇi upapade yameḥ dhātoḥ khac prayayo bhavati vrate gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:13226: pur sarva ity etayoḥ karamaṇoḥ upapadayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dārisahoḥ dhātvoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13233: sarvakūla abhra karīra ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu kaṣeḥ dhātoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13240: megha ṛti bhaya ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu kaṛñaḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13248: kṣema priya madra ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu karoteḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13256: vā iti vaktavye punar aṇ-grahanaṃ hetvādiṣu ṭapratiṣedha-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:13260: āśita-śabde subante upapade bhavater dhātoḥ karaṇe bhāve ca-arthe khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13265: karmaṇi iti supi iti ca prakṛtaṃ sajñāvaśād yathāsambhavaṃ sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13266: bhṛ tṝ vṛ ji dhāri sahi tapi dama ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13279: gameḥ dhātoḥ supi upapade sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13286: anta atyanta adhvan dura pāra sarva ananta ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu gameḥ ḍapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13306: apra āha - ḍaprakaraṇe 'nyeṣv api dṛśyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:13313: āśiṣi gamyamānāyāṃ hanter dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade ḍaprayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13319: dārāv upapade āṅpūrvād hanteḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13329: karmaṇy-upapade sampūrvāt hanteḥ dhātoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13337: apapūrvāt hanteḥ dhātoḥ kleśa-tamasoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ ḍapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13344: kumāra śīrṣa ity etayoḥ upapadayoḥ hanteḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13350: hanteḥ jāyāpatyoḥ karmaṇoḥ uapapadayoḥ lakṣaṇavati kartari ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13352: atha vā lakṣaṇe dyotye ṭak pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:13355: amanuṣyakartṛke vartamānād hanteḥ dhātoḥ karmaṇi upapade ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13368: śaktau gamyamānāyāṃ hasti kapāṭayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ hanteḥ ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13376: pāṇigha tāḍagha ity etau śabdau nipātyete śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:13377: pāṇi tāḍa ity etayoḥ karmaṇoḥ upapadayoḥ hanteḥ dhatoḥ ṭak pratyayo bhavati, [223]
GS24jvkasipu:13378: tasmiṃśca parato hanteḥ ṭilopo ghatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13386: āḍhya-subhaga-sthūla-palita-nagna-andha-priyeṣu cvy-artheṣv acvau kṛñaḥ karaṇe khyun // PS_3,2.56 //
GS24jvkasipu:13388: āḍhyādiṣu karmasu upapadeṣu cvy-artheṣu acvyanteṣu karoteḥ dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake khyun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13400: āḍhyaṃ tailena kurvanti abhyañjayanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13404: nanu ca khyunā mukte lyuṭā bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:13405: na ca lyuṭaḥ khyunaś ca viśeṣo 'sti,
GS24jvkasipu:13407: evaṃ tarhi pratiṣedha-sāmarthyāt khyuni asati lyuḍ api na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13412: āḍhyādisu subanteṣu upapadeṣu cvyartheṣu acvyanteṣu bhavater dhātoḥ kartari kārake khiṣṇuc,
GS24jvkasipu:13438: spṛśe rdhātor anudake subanta upapade kvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13443: subantamātre ca+upapade kartṛpacayo labhyate ghṛtaṃ spṛśati ghṛtaspṛk /
GS24jvkasipu:13454: ṛtu-śabda upapade yajer dhatoḥ kvin pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13472: añcu yuji kruñca ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ kvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13473: nipātanaiḥ saha nirdeśāt atra api kiṃcid alākṣaṇikaṃ kāryam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:13474: añcateḥ subnata-mātra upapade kvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13488: tyadādiṣu upapadeṣu dṛśer dhātor anālocane 'rthe vartamānāt kañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13512: sadādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ subante upapade upasarge 'pi anupasarge 'pi kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13514: anyatra sub-grahaṇe upasarga-grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:13516: sū iti dviṣā sāhacaryāt sūteḥ ādādikasya grahaṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:13555: nayateḥ pūrvapadāt sajñāyām agaḥ (*8,4.3) iti ṇatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:13559: mo rāji samaḥ kvau (*8,2.35) iti matvam /
GS24jvkasipu:13567: bhajer dhātoḥ subanta upapade upasarge 'pi - prabhāk //
GS24jvkasipu:13571: chandasi viṣaye saher dhātoḥ subante upapade ṇvi-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13578: vaher dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye subanta upapade ṇvipratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13584: kavya purīṣa purīṣya ity eteṣu upapadeṣu chandasi viṣaye vaher dhātoḥ ṇyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13590: havya-śabde upapade chandasi viṣaye vaher dhātoḥ ñyuṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13592: agniś ca havya-vāhanaḥ anantaḥpādam iti kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:13603: janādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ subanta upapade chandasi viṣaye viṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13605: iti, viṣeṣaṇa-arthaś ca viḍvanor anunāsikasyāt (*6,4.41) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:13615: ader dhātor ananne supy upapade viṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13621: kravya-śabda upapade ader dhātoḥ viṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13632: duher dhātoḥ supy upapade kap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13639: śvetavaha ukthaśas puroḍāś ity etebhyo ṇvin pratyayo bhavati mantre viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:13642: śveta-śabde kartṛ-vācini upapade vaher dhātoḥ karaṇi kārake ṇvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13644: uktha-śabde karmaṇi karaṇe vā upapade śaṃsater dhātoḥ ṇvin pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13649: dāśṛ dāne ity etasya puraḥpūrvasya ḍatvam,
GS24jvkasipu:13660: ave upapade yajeḥ dhātoḥ ṇvin pratyayo bhavati mantre viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:13665: upe upapade yajeḥ chandasi viṣaye vic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13669: vicaḥ citkaraṇaṃ sāmānya-grahaṇa-avighāta-artham ver apṛktasya (*6,1.67) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:13672: iti yajer api vic siddha eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:13680: ākārāntebhyo dhātubhyaḥ supi upapde chandsi viṣaye manin kvanip vanip ity ete pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:13694: anyebhyo 'pi dhātubhyo 'nākārāntebhyo manin kyanip vanip ity ete pratyayā dṛśyante, vic ca /
GS24jvkasipu:13708: sarvadhātubhyaḥ sopapadebhyo nirupapadebhyaś ca chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13717: sthā ity etasmād dhātoḥ supi upapade kapratyayo bhavati, kvip ca /
GS24jvkasipu:13728: ajāti-vācini subanta upapade tācchīlye gamyamāne dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13735: supi iti vartamāne punaḥ sub-grahaṇam upasarganivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:13746: kartṛ-vācini upamāne upapade dhātoḥ ṇini-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13758: vrata iti śāstrato niyama ucyate vrate gamyamāne subanta upapade dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13764: sati śayane sthaṇḍila eva śete na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:13765: sati bhojane 'śrāddham eva bhuṅkte na śrāddham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:13772: ābhīkṣṇye gamyamāne dhātoḥ bahulaṃ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13779: bahula-grahaṇat kulmāṣakhādaḥ ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:13783: manyateḥ subante upapade ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13787: uttarasūtre hi khaś-pratyaye vikaraṇakṛto viśeṣaḥ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:13791: ātmamāne vartamānān manyateḥ supy upapade khaś-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13793: yadā pratyaya-arthaḥ kartā ātmānam eva darśanīyatvādinā dharmeṇa yuktaṃ manyate,
GS24jvkasipu:13803: bhūte ity adhikāro vartamane laṭ (*3,2.123) iti yavat /
GS24jvkasipu:13804: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ bhūte ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:13805: dhātv-adhikārāc ca dhātv-arthe bhūte iti vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13813: yajater dhātoḥ karaṇe upapade ṇinipratyayo bhavati bhūte /
GS24jvkasipu:13818: karaṇi upapade hanter dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati bhūte kale /
GS24jvkasipu:13826: brahmādiṣu karmasu upapadeṣu hanter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati bhūte /
GS24jvkasipu:13830: kimartham idam ucyate yāvatā sarvadhātubhyaḥ kvip vihita eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:13839: brahmādiṣu hanter bhūtakāle kvip eva na anyaḥ pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:13845: pūrveṇa niyamād aprāptaḥ kvip pratyayaḥ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13846: chandasi viṣaye upapadantareṣv api hanter bahulaṃ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13855: tad-asambhavāt su-śabdam varjayitvā pariśiṣṭānāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13856: svādiṣu karmasu upapadeṣu karoter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13865: dhator aniyatatvād anyasminn upapade api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13871: some karmaṇi upapade sunoter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13879: agnau karmaṇy upapade cinoter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13881: atra api pūrvavac caturvidho niyama iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:13885: karmaṇi upapade cinoteḥ karmaṇy eva kārake kvip pratyayo bhavati agny-ākhyāyāṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:13890: agny-artho hi iṣṭakācaya ucyate śyenacit iti //
GS24jvkasipu:13893: karmaṇi upapade vi-pūrvat krīṇāter dhātoḥ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13894: karmaṇi iti vartamāṇe punaḥ karma-grahaṇaṃ kartuḥ kutsānimitte karmaṇi yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:13903: dṛśeḥ dhātoḥ karmaṇi upapade kvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13911: rājan-śabde karmaṇi upapade yudhyateḥ karoteś ca kvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13919: saha-śabde ca+upapade yudhikṛñoḥ dhātvoḥ kvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13925: saptamyanta upapade janer dhatoḥ ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13930: pañcamyanta upapade jātivarjite janer ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati / [232]
GS24jvkasipu:13939: upasarge ca upapade janeḥ ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:13944: anupūrvāt janeḥ karmaṇi upapade ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati / [232]
GS24jvkasipu:13949: anyeṣv api upapadeṣu kārakeṣu janeḥ ḍaḥ pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13950: saptamyām ity ukatama saptamyām api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13971: ity uktaṃ, sa niṣṭha-sañjñakaḥ pratyayo bhūte bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13982: yasyotpannasya niṣṭhā ity eṣā sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13989: sunoter yajateś ca ṅvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14003: chandasi viṣaye dhātoḥ liṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14020: na pūrvasya+eva prakṛtasya ādeśāvidhāne vibhakti-vipariṇāmo bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:14022: yo 'pi parokṣe vihitas tasya apy ayam ādeśo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:14033: sada vasa śru ity etebhyaḥ parasya liṭo bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye vā kvasur ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14051: upeyivān anāśvān anūcāna ity ete śabdā nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:14087: būte 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ luṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14097: avidyamānādyatane bhūte 'rthe vartamānād dhātor laṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14101: adya hyo vā abhukṣmahi iti vyāmiśre mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:14102: parokṣe ca lokavijñāte prayoktur darśana-viṣaye laṅ vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14108: tadvacane upapade bhūtānadyatane lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14117: yac-chabda-sahite abhijñā-vacana upapade lṛṭ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14127: abhijñā-vacane upapade yac-chabda-sahite kevale ca vibhāṣā lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14130: abhijānasi devadatta kaśmīreṣu vatsyāmas tatra udanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:14133: yadi khalv api - abhijānāsi devadatta yat kaśmīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:14143: ghūtānadyatana-parokṣe 'rthe vartamanād dhātḥ liṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14146: asti tu loke dhātv-arthena api kārakeṣu pratyakṣābhimanaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14147: sa yatra na asti tat parokṣam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14159: bhūtānadyatana-parokṣe 'rthe liṭi prāpte hāśvatoḥ upapadayoḥ laṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14170: āsanakāle pṛcchyamane bhūtānadyatana-parokṣe 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ laṅ-liṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14184: sma-śabde upapade bhūtānadyatana-parokṣe laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14190: aparokṣe ca bhūtānadyatane 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ sme upapade laṭ pratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14197: nanu-śabde upapade praśna-pūrvake prativacane bhūte 'rthe laṭ prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14208: na-śabde nu-śabde ca upapade pṛṣṭa-prativacane vibhaṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati bhūte /
GS24jvkasipu:14216: purā-śabde upapade sma-śabda-varjite bhūtānadyatane 'rthe vibhāṣā luṅ pratyayo bhavati, laṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14217: tābhyāṃ mukte pakṣe yathā-viṣayamanye 'pi pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14227: tasmin vartamāne 'rthe vartamanād dhātoḥ laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14232: laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:14240: laṭ iti vartamane punar laṅ-grahaṇam adhikavidhāna-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:14253: kecid vibhāṣā-grahaṇam anuvartayanti na-nvor vibhāṣā (*3,2.121) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14259: sambhodhane ca viṣaye laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14267: l akṣaṇe hetau ca arthe vartamanāda dhātoḥ parasya laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:14294: pūṅo yajeś ca dhātoḥ śānan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14303: ity ataḥ prabhṛti ā tṛno nakārāt /
GS24jvkasipu:14321: iṅo dhāreś ca dhātvoḥ śatṛpratyayo bhavati akṛcchriṇi kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:14322: akṛcchraḥ sukhasādyo yasay kartur dhātv-arthaḥ so 'kṛcchrī /
GS24jvkasipu:14331: amitre kartari dviṣer dhātoḥ śatṛ-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14338: yajñasaṃyukte 'bhiṣave vartamānāt sunoter dhātoḥ śatṛ-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14357: ā etasmāt kvip saṃ-śabdād yānita ūrdhvam-anukramiṣyāmas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu te veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14361: tacchīlo yaḥ svabhāvataḥ phala-nirapekṣas tatra pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:14363: yaḥ svadharme mamāyamiti pravartate vināpi śīlena /
GS24jvkasipu:14386: tviṣer devatāyām akāraś ca+upadhāyā aniṭtvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14396: alaṅ-kṛñ-ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu iṣṇuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14412: ṇyantād dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu iṣṇuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14417: bhavater dhatoḥ chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu iṣṇuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14425: glā ji sthā ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:14426: cakārāt bhuvaś ca tacchīlādiṣu kṣnuḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14433: kṅiti ca (*1,1.5) ity atra gakāro 'pi cartvabhūto nirdiśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:14444: tras-ādibhyo dhatubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu knuḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14452: śamādibhyo dhātubhyo 'ṣṭābhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ghinuṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14453: śama upaśame ity ataḥ prabhṛti madī harṣe ity evam antaḥ śamādir divādyantargaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14470: pṛcī samparke iti rudhādir gṛhyate natvadādir lug-vikaraṇatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:14474: yujir yoge rudhādiḥ dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:14475: rañja rāge ity asya nipātanād anunāsika-lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14509: etebhyo dhātubhyo vi-śabde upapade ghinuṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14530: vasaḥ iti vasa nivāse ity asya grahaṇaṃ nācchādana-arthasya,
GS24jvkasipu:14534: ninda-ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu vuñ pratayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14550: tācchīlikeṣu vā 'sarūpanyāyena tṛjādayo na bhavanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:14553: devayateḥ kruśeś ca upasarge upapade vuñ patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14562: calana-arthebhyaḥ śabda-arthebhyaś ca akarmakebhyo dhātubhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14584: ju-praghṛtibhyo dhatubhyo yuc pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:14596: calanārthānāṃ padeś ca grahaṇaṃ sakarmaka-artham iha /
GS24jvkasipu:14598: tācchīlikeṣu mitho vā+asarūpa-vidhir na asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14599: tena alaṅkṛñaḥ tṛn na bhavati alaṅkartā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14600: tathā hi paderukañā viśeṣa-vihitena sāmānya-vihitasya yuco 'sarūpatvāt samāveśo bhavedeva,
GS24jvkasipu:14609: maḍi bhūṣāyām ity etad arthebhyaḥ ca dhatubhyo yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14616: yakārāntāt dhatoḥ yuc pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14622: sūda dīpa dīkṣa ity etebhyaś ca yuc pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14627: nanu ca dīper viśeṣa-vihito ra-pratyayaḥ dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:14632: tācchīlikeṣu ca vā+asarūpa-vidhir na asti iti prāyikam etad ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:14642: laṣa-ādibhyo dhātubhaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ukañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14655: jalpa-ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ṣākan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14665: pra-pūrvāj javateḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14671: kṣi kṣaye, kṣi nivāsagatyoḥ iti dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:14672: prasū iti ṣū preraṇe ity asay grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:14673: jiprabhṛtibhyo dhātubhyaḥ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:14695: etebhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu āluc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14707: dā dheṭ si śada sada ity etebhyaḥ ruḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14716: sṛ ghasi ada ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kmarac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14722: bhañja bhāsa mida ity etebhyo ghurac pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu bhaṅguraṃ kāṣṭham /
GS24jvkasipu:14729: jñāna-arthasya videḥ grahaṇaṃ na lābhādy-arthasya, svabhāvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:14730: vidādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kurac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14739: iṇ naś ji sarti ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kvarap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14758: jāgarteḥ ūkaḥ pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:14762: yajādīnāṃ yaṅantānām ūkaḥ pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:14768: namyādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu raḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14775: ajasram iti jasu mokṣaṇe nañpūrvo rapratyayāntaḥ krayāsātatye vartate //
GS24jvkasipu:14778: san iti sanpratyayānto gṛhyate na sanirdhātuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:14780: sannantebhyo dhātubhyaḥ āśaṃser bhikṣeś ca tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu uḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14785: āṅaḥ śasi icchāyām ity asya grahaṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:14790: iṣeḥ chatvam ukāraś ca pratyayo nipātyate tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:14796: kya-pratyayāntād dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ukāra-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14804: ā-kārāntebhyaḥ ṛ-varṇāntebhyaḥ gama hana jana ity etebhyaś ca chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu ki-kinau pratayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14808: mā bhūttād api paraḥ taparaḥ iti ṛkāre tatkāla-grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:14839: svapeḥ tṛṣeś ca tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu nijiṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14848: etābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu āruḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14854: asmād dhātoḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kru-klukanau pratyayu bhavāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14865: etebhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu varac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14873: yā prāpane, asmād yaṅantāt tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu varac pratyayo havati /
GS24jvkasipu:14877: bhrājādibhyaḥ dhātubhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14898: anyebhyo 'pi dhātubhyaḥ tācchīlikeṣu kvip pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14906: tathā ca āha -- kvibvacipracchāyatastukaṭaprujuśrīṇāṃ dīrgho 'saṃprasāraṇaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14920: dṝ bhye ity asya hrasvaś ca dve ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14926: bhavater dhātoḥ sañjñāyām antare ca gamyamāne kvip pratyayo bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:14929: dhanikādhamarṇayor antare yas tiṣṭhati sa pratibhūr ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:14933: vi pra sam ity evaṃ pūrvād bhavater dhātoḥ ḍu-pratayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14945: dhayater dadhāteś ca karmaṇi kārake ṣṭran pratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14947: dhayanti tāṃ dadhati vā bhaiṣajyārtham iti dhātrī /
GS24jvkasipu:14963: etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ karaṇe kārake ṣṭran pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14978: kṅito 'nyasminn api pratyaye nalopaḥ kvacid bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14985: asmād dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake ṣṭran pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15000: etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ karaṇe kārake itraḥ patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15011: pavater dhatoḥ karaṇe kārake itra-pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15018: puvaḥ karane kartari ca itra-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15023: devatāyām - agniḥ pavitraṃ sa mā punātu /
GS24jvkasipu:15024: vāyuḥ somaḥ sūrya indraḥ pavitraṃ te mā punantu //
GS24jvkasipu:15039: etad arthebhyaś ca dhātubhyo vartamāna-arthe kta-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15047: śīlito rakṣitaḥ kṣānta ākruṣṭo juṣṭa ity api /
GS24jvkasipu:15050: kaṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati ity āhur amṛtaḥ pūrvavat samṛtaḥ //2//
GS24jvkasipu:15058: tṛptaḥ ity evam ādayo 'pi vartamāne dṛaṣṭavyāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:15059: itiśrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:15065: uṇādayaḥ pratyayāḥ vartamāne 'rthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye bahulaṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:15077: bāhulakaṃ prakṛtes tanudṛṣṭeḥ prāya-samuccayanād api teṣām /
GS24jvkasipu:15078: kāryasaśeṣavidheś ca taduktaṃ naigamarūḍhibhavaṃ hi susādhu //1//
GS24jvkasipu:15079: nāma ca dhātujamāha nirukte vyākaraṇe śakaṭasya ca tokam /
GS24jvkasipu:15080: yan na padārtha-viśeṣa-samutthaṃ pratyayataḥ prakṛteś ca tad ūhyam //2//
GS24jvkasipu:15081: sañjñāsu dhāturūpāṇi pratyayāś ca tataḥ pare /
GS24jvkasipu:15082: kāryād vidyād anubandham etac chāstram uṇādiṣu //3//
GS24jvkasipu:15093: bhaviṣyati kāle gamyādayaḥ śabdāḥ sādhavo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:15110: yāvat-purā-śabdayor nipātayor upapadayoḥ bhaviṣyati kāle dhātor laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15118: kadā karhi ity etayoḥ upapadayor vibhāṣā bhaviṣyati kāle dhātoḥ laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15131: kiṃvṛtte upapade lipsāyāṃ bhaviṣyati kāle dhātoḥ vibhāṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15146: lipsyamāna-siddhau gamyamānāyāṃ bhaviṣyati kāle dhātoḥ vibhāṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15148: yo bhaktaṃ dadāti sa svargaṃ gacchati,
GS24jvkasipu:15149: yo bhaktaṃ dāsyati sa svargaṃ gamiṣyati,
GS24jvkasipu:15150: yo bhaktaṃ dāta sa svargaṃ gantā /
GS24jvkasipu:15154: loḍ-arthaḥ praiṣādir lakṣyate yena sa loḍ-arthalakṣaṇo dhātv-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15155: tatra vartamānād dhātoḥ bhaviṣyati kāle vibhāṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15167: ūrdhva-mauhūrtike bhaviṣyati kāle loḍ-arthalakṣaṇa-arthe vartamānāt dhātor vibhāṣā liṅ-pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15173: ūrdhvaṃ muhūrtāt upari muhūrtasya upādhyāyaś ced āgacchet,
GS24jvkasipu:15182: kriya-arthāyāṃ kriyāyām upapade dhātor bhavisyati kale tumun-ṇvulau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15190: atha kimarthaṃ ṇvul vidhīyate yāvatā ṇvul-tṛcau (*3,1.133)
GS24jvkasipu:15191: iti sāmānyena vihita eva so 'sminn api viṣaye bhavisyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:15195: kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyāṃ vā 'sarūpeṇa tṛjādayo na bhavanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15197: vikṣipo vrajati ity evam ādi nivartyate //
GS24jvkasipu:15201: bhāve (*3,3.18) iti prakṛtya ye ghañ-ādayo vihitās te ca bhāva-vacanāḥ bhavisyati kāle kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyāṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:15202: kimartham idaṃ yāvatā vihitā eva te ?
GS24jvkasipu:15203: kriyartha-upapade vihitena asmin viṣaye tumunā bādhyeran /
GS24jvkasipu:15204: vā 'sarūpa-vidhiś ca atra na asti ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:15208: yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyo yena viśeṣaṇena vihitā yadi tābhyas tathā+eva bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:15217: dhātoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati bhaviṣyati kāle karmaṇy upapade kriyāyāṃ ca kriyārthāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:15218: karmaṇyaṇ (*3,2.1) iti sāmānyena vihito vā 'sarūpa-vidher abhāvād ṇvulā bādhitaḥ punar aṇ vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:15231: cakārāt kriyāyāṃ ca upapade kriyārthāyāṃ dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15238: lṛṭaḥ sthāne satsañjñau śatṛśānacau vā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15240: tena yathā laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau tathā asya api bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15255: bhaviṣyadanadyatane 'rthe vartamānād dhatoḥ luṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15270: ita uttaraṃ triṣv api kāleṣu pratyayāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15282: sarteḥ dhātoḥ sthire kartari ghañ pratayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15284: sa ciraṃ tiṣṭhan kālantaraṃ sarati iti dhātv-arthasya kartā yujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15295: bhāve vācye dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15300: tena artha-nirdeśaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ sarvadhātu-viṣayaḥ kṛto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15302: yastasya siddhatā nāma dharmaḥ tatra ghañ-ādayaḥ pratyayāḥ vidhīyante /
GS24jvkasipu:15304: liṅgāntare vacanāntare 'pi ca atra pratyayā bhavanty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:15309: kartṛ-varjite kārake sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye dhātoḥ ghañ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15323: tat kriyate prasajya-pratiṣedhe 'pi samāso 'sti iti jñāpana-artham,
GS24jvkasipu:15326: akartari ca kārake iti dvayam anuvartate //
GS24jvkasipu:15329: parimāṇa-ākhyāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ sarvebhyo dhātubhyaḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15335: purastād apavāda-nyāyena hy acam eva bādheta, na apam /
GS24jvkasipu:15353: apādāne striyām upasaṅkhyānaṃ tadantāc ca vā ṅīṣ /
GS24jvkasipu:15362: upasarge upapade rauter dhātor ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15369: sami upapade yu dru du ity etebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15376: śri ṇī bhū ity etebhyo dhātubhyo 'nupasargebhyo ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15391: vāv-upapade kṣu śru ity etābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15399: ava ut ity etayor upapadayoḥ nayater dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15407: pra-śabde upapade dru stu sru ity etebhyo dhātubhyo ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15419: nirabhipūrvayoḥ pū-lvor dhātvoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15428: unnyor upapadayoḥ gṝ ity etasmād dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15435: kṝ ity etasmād dhātor unnyoḥ upapadayoḥ ghañ pratayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15446: yajña-viṣaye prayoge sampūrvāt stauter ghañ partyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15448: sametya stuvanti yasmin deśe chandogāḥ sa deśaḥ saṃstāvaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15454: asmād dhātoḥ pra-śabde upapade ghañ pratyayo bhavati na ced yajña-viṣayaḥ prayogo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15461: asmād dhātoḥ vi-śabde upapade ghañ patyayo bhavati prathane gamyamāne,
GS24jvkasipu:15462: tac cet prathanaṃ śabda-viṣayaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15472: vipūrvāt stṛnāteḥ chandonāmni ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15473: vṛttam atra chando gṛhyate yasya gāyatryādayo viśeṣāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:15484: udi upapade graher dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15489: udgrābhaṃ ca nigrābhaṃ ca brahma devā avīvṛdhan //
GS24jvkasipu:15493: sami upapade graher dhātoḥ ghañ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15503: pari-śabde ni-śabde ca upapade yathāsaṅkhyaṃ niyaḥ iṇaś ca dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15517: pari-śabde upapade iṇo dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15527: vi upa ity etayoḥ upapadayoḥ śeter dhātoḥ ghañ bhavati paryāye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:15531: tava rājānam upaśayituṃ paryāyaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15536: hastādāne gamyamāne cinoter dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15553: eteṣv artheṣu cinoteḥ ghañ pratyayaḥ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15560: iha kasmān na bhavati mahān kāṣṭhanicayaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:15570: saṅghe vācye cinoter dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati ādeś ca kaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15583: karma-vyatihāre gamyamāne dhātoḥ ṇac patyayo bhavati strīliṅge vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:15585: cakāro viśeṣaṇa-arthaḥ ṇacaḥ striyām añ (*5,4.14) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15604: abhividhau gamyamāne dhātoḥ bhave inuṇ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15611: bhāve iti vartamane punar bhāva-grahaṇaṃ vāsarūpanirāsa-artham,
GS24jvkasipu:15620: ava ni ity etayoḥ uapadayoḥ graher dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati ākrośe gamyamane /
GS24jvkasipu:15630: pra-śabde upapade graher dhāto ghañ pratyayo bhavati lipsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:15637: pari-śabde upapade graheḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15646: ni-śabde upapade vṛ ity etasmād dhātoḥ dhānya-viśeṣe 'bhidheye ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15653: uc-chabde upapade śrayaty-ādibhyo ghañ pratayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15663: āṅi upapade rauteḥ plavateś ca vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15669: ave upapade graheḥ dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati vibhāṣā varṣapratibandhe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:15670: praptakālasya varṣasya kutaścin nimittād abhāvo varṣapratibandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15679: pra-śabde upapade graher dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15683: tulā pragṛhyate yena sūtreṇa sa śabda-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15691: pra-śabde upapade graher dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15693: rathādiyuktānām aśvādīnāṃ saṃyamana-arthā rajjū raśmir iha gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15698: praśabde upapade vṛṇoteḥ dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15706: pariśabde upapade bhavateḥ dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati avajñāne gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:15714: bhāve, akartari ca kārake iti prakṛtam anuvartate yāvat kṛtya-lyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15716: akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15733: ṝ-kārāntebhyaḥ u-varṇāntebhyaḥ ca ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15767: upasarge upapade ader dhātoḥ ap prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15773: ni-śabde upapade adeḥ dhātoḥ ṇa-pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15778: vyadha japa ity etayoḥ anupasargayoḥ ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15787: svana-hasoḥ anupasargayor vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15795: sam upa ni vi ity eteṣu upapadeṣu anupasarge 'pi yamer vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15805: ni-śabde upapade gada nada paṭha svana ity etebhyaḥ dhatubhyaḥ vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15814: kvaṇateḥ dhātoḥ nipūrvād anupasargāc ca vīṇāyāṃ vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15825: asmād dhātor nityam ap pratyayo bhavati parimāṇe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:15829: saṃvyavahārāya mūlakādīnāṃ yaḥ parimito muṣṭir badhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:15834: madeḥ dhātoḥ anupasargāt ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15843: pramada sammada ity etau śabdau nipātyete harṣe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:15852: samudor upapadayoḥ ajaer dhātoḥ paśu-viṣaye dhātv-arthe ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15878: sarteḥ dhātoḥ prajane viṣaye ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15883: strīgavīṣu puṃgavānām garbhādhānāya prathamam upasaraṇam ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:15886: ni abhi upa vi ity eteṣu upapadeṣu hvayateḥ dhātoḥ samprasāraṇam ap pratyayaḥ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:15895: āṅi upapade hvayater dhātoḥ samprasāraṇam ap pratyayaś ca bhavati yuddhe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:15902: vṛddhiś ca nipātyate nipānaṃ ced abhidheyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15903: nipibanty asminn iti nipānam udakādhāra ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15905: kūpopasareṣu ya udakādhāras tatra hi pānāya paśava āhūyante /
GS24jvkasipu:15909: anupargasya hvayateḥ samprasāraṇam ap pratyayaś ca bhavati bhāve abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:15918: hanter dhātoḥ anupasarge bhāve ap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15929: ap ca, yaś ca aparaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:15936: mūrtau abhidheyāyāṃ hanteḥ ap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15944: antaḥ pūrvāt hanteḥ ap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15948: anye ṇakāraṃ paṭhanti antarghaṇo deśaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15954: pra-pūrvasya hanteḥ praghaṇaḥ praghāṇaḥ ity etau śabdau nipātyete agāraikadeśe vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:15961: ut-pūrvāt hanteḥ udghanaḥ iti nipātyate 'tyādhānaṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15963: yasmin kāṣṭhe sthāpayitvā anyāni kāṣṭhāni takṣyante tad abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15971: kiṃ tarhi ? pāṇiḥ pādaś ca abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15976: ayas vi dru ity eteṣu upapadeṣu hanteḥ dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake ap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15988: stamba-śabde upapade karaṇe kārake hanteḥ kaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16000: pari-śabde upapade anter dhātoḥ ap pratyayo bahvati karaṇe kārake,
GS24jvkasipu:16006: upa-pūrvāt hanteḥ ap pratyayaḥ upadhā-lopaś ca nipātyate āśraye 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:16014: samudoḥ upapadayoḥ hanteḥ dhātoḥ ap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16023: nighaḥ iti ni-pūrvād hanteḥ ap pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:16034: ḍu it yasya tasmād ḍvito dhātoḥ ktriḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16042: ṭu it yasya, tasmāt ṭvito dhātoḥ athuc pratyayo bhavati bhāvādau /
GS24jvkasipu:16048: bhāve akartari ca kārake iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16057: praccheḥ asamprasāraṇaṃ jñāpakāt praśne ca āsanna-kāle (*3,2.117) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:16065: bhāve akartari ca kārake iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16066: upasarge upapade ghu-sañjñakebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ kiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16074: karmaṇy upapade ghu-sañjñakebhyo dhātubhyaḥ kiḥ pratyayo bhavati adhikaraṇe kārake /
GS24jvkasipu:16081: bhāve akartari ca kārake ti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16082: strīliṅge bhāvādau dhātoḥ ktin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16104: ṝkāralvādibhyaḥ ktin niṣṭhāvad bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:16121: sthādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ strīliṅge bhāve ktin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16127: iti jñāpakāt nātyantāya bādhā bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:16131: mantre viṣaye vṛṣādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ ktin pratyayo bhavati udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16143: sarvatra sarvadhātubhyaḥ sāmānyena vihita eva ktin /
GS24jvkasipu:16154: avateḥ jvara-tvara-srivy-avi-mavām upadhāyāś ca (*6,4.20) iti ūṭḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16168: vraja-yajoḥ dhātvoḥ strī-liṅge bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16177: samajādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ striyāṃ kyap pratyayo bhavati udāttaḥ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:16187: kathaṃ taduktam striyāṃ bhāvādhikāro 'sti tena bhāryā prasidhyati iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:16192: karoter dhātoḥ striyāṃ śaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16199: iṣeḥ dhātoḥ śaḥ pratyayo yagabhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16210: pratyayāntebhyo dhātubhyaḥ stiryām akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16231: ṣidbhyaḥ bhidādibhyaś ca striyām aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16272: ebhyo dhātubhyaḥ yuci prāpte striyām aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16282: ākārāntebhyaḥ upasarge upapade striyam aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16293: āsa śrantha ity etābhyām ca striyām yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16304: na curādiḥ śrantha grantha sandarbhe iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16310: ghaṭṭeḥ bhauvādikasya grahaṇaṃ ghaṭṭa calane iti,
GS24jvkasipu:16320: rogākhyāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ ṇvul pratyayo bahulaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16322: ākhyā-grahaṇaṃ rogasya cet pratyayāntena sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16355: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye dhātoḥ ṇvul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16367: paripraśne ākhyāne ca gamyamāne dhatoḥ iñ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16406: eteṣv artheṣu dhātoḥ ṇvuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16424: ākrośe gamyamāne nañi upapade dhātoḥ aniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16433: bhāve, akartari ca kārake iti nivṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:16434: kṛtya-sañjñakāḥ pratyayāḥ lyuṭ ca bhaulam artheṣu bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16447: bahula-grahaṇād anye 'pi kṛtaḥ yathāprāptam abhidheyaṃ vyabhicaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:16452: napuṃsaka-liṅge bhāve dhatoḥ ktaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16458: napuṃsaka-liṅge bhāve dhātoḥ lyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16465: karmaṇi ca yena saṃsparśāt kartuḥ śarīra-sukham // PS_3,3.116 //
GS24jvkasipu:16467: yena karmaṇā saṃspṛśyamānasya kartuḥ śarīra-sukham utpadyate,
GS24jvkasipu:16468: tasmin karmaṇi upapade dhatoḥ napuṃsaka-liṅge bhāve lyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16489: karaṇe 'dhikaraṇe ca kārake dhātoḥ lyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16497: puṃliṅgayoḥ karaṇa-adhikaranayor abhidheyayoḥ dhātoḥ ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati samudāyena cet sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16501: adhikaraṇe khalv api - etya tasmin kurvanti iti ākaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16511: gocarādayaḥ śabdāḥ gha-prayayāntā nipātyante pūrvasminn eva arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:16529: ave upapade tarateḥ stṛṇāteś ca dhātoḥ karana-adhikaraṇayoḥ sañjñāyām ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16542: halantād dhātoḥ karaṇa-adhikaraṇayoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16554: puṃsi sañjñāyāṃ ghe prāpte ghañ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16566: udaṅka iti nipātyate anudaka-viṣayaś ced dhātv-artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16579: ānāyaḥ iti nipātyate jālaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16585: khanateḥ dhātoḥ karaṇa-adhikaraṇayoḥ ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16599: īṣat dus su ity eteṣu upapadeṣu kṛcchrākṛcchra-artheṣu dhatoḥ khal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16618: bhavateḥ karoteś ca dhātoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kartari karmaṇi ca+upapade,
GS24jvkasipu:16619: cakārād īṣadādiṣu ca khal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16630: kṛcchrākṛcchra-artheṣu īṣadādiṣu upapadeṣu ākārāntebhyo dhatubhyaḥ yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16640: īṣadādisu kṛcchrākṛcchra-artheṣu upapadeṣu gaty-arthebhyo dhātubhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16646: anyebhyo 'pi dhātubhyaḥ gaty-arthebhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye yuc pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16659: vartamāna-samīpe bhūte bhaviṣyati ca vartamānād dhātoḥ vartamānavat pratyayā vā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16675: yena viśeṣaṇena vartamāne pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ prakṛtyopapadopādhinā tathā+eva atra bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16683: yo manyate gacchāmi iti padaṃ vartamāne kāle eva vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:16685: na ca vākyagamyaḥ kālaḥ padasaṃskāravelāyām upayujyate iti tādṛśaṃ vākyārtha-pratipattāraṃ prati prakaraṇam idaṃ nārabhyate /
