GS24jvkasipu:16695: tatra bhaviṣyati kāle āśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ vā bhūtavat pratyayā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:16711: kṣipravacane upapade āśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16712: bhūtavac ca ity asya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16719: na iti vaktavye lṛḍ-grahaṇaṃ luṭo 'pi viṣaye yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:16724: tasminn upapade dhātor liṅ pratyayo bhavati bhūtavac ca ity asya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16733: anadyatanavat pratyaya-vidhir na bhavati kriyāprabandhe sāmīpye ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:16753: bhaviṣyati kāle maryādā-vacane satyavarasmin pravibhāge 'nadyatanavat pratyaya-vidhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16780: kālamaryādāvibhāge satyavarsmin pravibhāge bhaviṣyati kāle 'nadyatanavat pratyayavidhirna bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16813: bhaviṣyati maryādā-vacane kālavibhāge ca anahorātrāṇām iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16814: kālamaryādāvibhāge sati bhavisyati kāle parasmin pravibhāge vibhāṣā anadyatanavat pratyayavidhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16818: samprati parasminn aprāpta eva vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16820: tasya yat paramāgrahāyaṇyāḥ tatra yuktā adhyeṣyāmahe,
GS24jvkasipu:16850: tatra liṅ-nimitte bhaviṣyati kāle lṛṅ pratyayo bhavati kriyātipattau satyām /
GS24jvkasipu:16852: dakṣiṇena ced āyāsyan na śakaṭaṃ paryabhavisyat /
GS24jvkasipu:16858: liṅgiliṅge buddhavā tadatipattiṃ ca pramāṇāntarād avagamya vaktā vākyaṃ prayuṅkte,
GS24jvkasipu:16860: hetuhetumator āhvānāparyābhavanayoḥ bhaviṣyat kāla-viṣayayoḥ atipattiḥ ito vākyād avagamyate //
GS24jvkasipu:16863: liṅ-nimitte lṛṅ kriya-atipattau iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16864: pūrvena bhaviṣyati vihitaḥ samprati bhūte vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16865: bhūte ca kāle liṅ-nimitte kriya-atipattau satyāṃ lṛṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16877: bhūte liṅ-nimitte lṛṅ kriya-atipattau iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16884: tatra bhūte liṅ-nimitte kriya-atipattau lṛṅ vā bhavati ity etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:16886: - kathaṃ nāma tatra bhavān vṛṣalam ayājayiṣyat /
GS24jvkasipu:16891: garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyām api-jātvoḥ upapadayoḥ dhātoḥ laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16892: vartamane laṭ uktaḥ kāla-sāmānye na prāpnoti iti vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16893: kālaviśeṣa-vihitāṃś ca api pratyayān ayaṃ paratvād asmin viṣaye vādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:16898: liṅ-nimittābhāvād iha kriya-atipattau lṛṅ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:16902: kathami upapade garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyaṃ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16911: kathaṃ nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yāyajāṃ cakāra /
GS24jvkasipu:16912: atra liṅ-nimittam asti iti bhūta-vivakṣāyāṃ kriya-atipattau vā lṛṅ /
GS24jvkasipu:16913: bhaviṣyad vivakṣāyāṃ sarvatra nityena+eva lṛṅā bhavitavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:16916: garhāyām ity eva vibhāṣā na svaryate /
GS24jvkasipu:16917: kiṃvṛtte upapade garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ liṅ-lṛṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16920: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:16923: katamo nāma yāṃ tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:16927: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān ayājayiṣyat // [285]
GS24jvkasipu:16933: kiṃvṛtte 'kiṃvṛtte ca+upapade anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ-lṛṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16939: na śraddadhe tatrabhavān nāma vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:16941: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:16943: amarṣe - na marṣayāmi tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:16945: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:16947: bhūta-vivakṣāyāṃ tu kriya-atipattau vā lṛṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16949: na avakalpayāmi tatrabhavān nāma vṛṣalam ayājayiṣyat //
GS24jvkasipu:16955: kiṃkila-asty-artheṣu upapadeṣu anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16957: kiṃ - kila nāma tatrabhavan vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:16963: liṅ-nimittam iha na asti tena lṛṅ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:16967: jātu yadā ity etayoḥ upapadayoḥ anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ gamyamānayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16983: yac ca yatra ity etayoḥ upapadayor anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ gamyamānayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16995: yac ca yatra ity etayoḥ upapadayor dhatoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:16998: yatra tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayed ṛddho vṛddhaḥ san brāhmaṇaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:17008: yaccayatrayoḥ upapadayoḥ citrīkaraṇe gamyamāne dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17017: śeṣe uapapade citrīkaraṇe gamyamāne dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17026: liṅ - nimitābhāvāt iha lṛṅ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:17029: uta api ity etayoḥ samarthayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17031: bāḍham ity asminn arthe samānārthatvam anayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17043: itaḥ prabhṛṭi bhūte 'pi liṅ-nimitte kriya-atipattau nityaṃ lṛṅ /
GS24jvkasipu:17051: tasmin gamyamāne akacciti upapade dhātor liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17056: kaccij jīvati te mātā kaccij jīvati te pitā /
GS24jvkasipu:17057: mārāvida tvāṃ pṛcchāmi kaccij jīvati pārvatī // [287]
GS24jvkasipu:17068: yatra gamyate ca-artho na ca asau prayujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17069: tadīdṛśe sambhāvanopādhike 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17077: kriyātipattau bhūte bhaviṣyati ca nityaṃ lṛṅ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:17080: sambhāvane 'lam iti cet siddha-aprayoge iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:17082: sambhāvana-vacane dhātāv upapade yac chabda-varjite dhātor vibhāṣā liṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17096: hetubhūte hetumati cārthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17100: dakṣiṇena ced yāsyati na śakaṭaṃ paryābhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:17101: tatra vibhāṣāgrahaṇaṃ tāvad anantaram eva anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:17102: liṅ iti vartamāne punar liṅ-grahaṇaṃ kālav-iśeṣa-pratipatty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:17109: icchārtheṣu dhatuṣu upapadeṣu dhatoḥ liṅ-loṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17119: icchārtheṣu dhātuṣu samāna-kartṛkeṣu upapadeṣu dhātoḥ tumun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17132: icchārtheṣu samānakartṛkeṣu dhātuṣu upapadeṣu dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17139: ichārthebhyo dhatubhyo vartamāne kāle vibhāṣā liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17152: vidhyādiṣv artheṣu dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17163: sampraśne - kiṃ nu khalu bho vyākaranam adhīyīya /
GS24jvkasipu:17164: prārthane - bhavati me prārthanā vyākaranam adhīyīya //
GS24jvkasipu:17167: loṭ pratyayo bhavati dhātoḥ vidhyādiṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:17169: vidhau tāvat - kaṭaṃ tāvat bhavān karotu /
GS24jvkasipu:17174: adhīṣṭe - adhīcchāmo bhavantaṃ māṇavakaṃ bhavān adhyāpayatu,
GS24jvkasipu:17176: sampraśne - kiṃ nu khalu bho vyākranam adhyayai /
GS24jvkasipu:17177: prārthane - bhavati me prārthanā vyākaraṇam adhyayai,
GS24jvkasipu:17184: eteṣv artheṣu dhātoḥ kṛtya-sañjñakāḥ pratyayāḥ bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:17189: loṭ khalv api - karotu kaṭaṃ bhavān iha preṣitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:17192: kimarthaṃ praiṣādiṣu kṛtyā vidhīyante na sāmānyena,
GS24jvkasipu:17193: bhāva-karmaṇor vihitā eva te praiṣādiṣv anyatra ca bhaviṣyanti ?
GS24jvkasipu:17197: stry-adhikārāt pareṇa vāsarūpa-vidhir nāvaṣyaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17204: praiṣādiṣu gamyamāneṣu ūrdhva-mauhūrtike 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17207: upari muhūrtasya bhavatā khalu kaṭaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:17217: sam-śabde upapade praiṣādiṣu gamyamāneṣu ūrdhva-mauhūrtike 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ loṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17219: ūrdhvaṃ muhūrtād bhavān kaṭaṃ kaortu sma,
GS24jvkasipu:17226: sma-śabde upapade 'dhīṣṭe gamyamāne dhātoḥ loṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17232: kālādiṣu upapadesu dhātoḥ tumun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17241: uktam idam, stry-adhikārāt paratra vāsarūpa-vidhir anityaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:17245: yacchabde upapade kālādiṣu dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17253: arhe kartari vācye gamyamāne vā dhātoḥ kṛtya-tṛcaḥ pratyayā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:17270: avaśyaṃ bhāvaviśiṣṭe ādhamarṇyaviśiṣṭe ca kartari vācye dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17273: ādhamarṇye khalv api - śatam dāyī sahasraṃ dāyī /
GS24jvkasipu:17278: kṛtya-sañjākāś ca pratyayā āvaśyaka-ādhamarṇyayor upādhibhūtayoḥ dhātor bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17286: yāvatā sāmāgyena vihitā asminn api viṣaye bhavisyanti ?
GS24jvkasipu:17303: sāmānya-vihitānāṃ punar vacanam liṅā bādhā mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:17309: aśīrviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ-loṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17317: āśiṣi viṣaye dhātoḥ ktic-ktau pratyayau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:17323: ktaḥ khalv api - devā enaṃ deyāsuḥ devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17330: māṅi upapade dhātoḥ luṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17341: sma-śabda-uttare māṅi upapade dhātoḥ laṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17347: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyām kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:17353: tasmin sati ayathākāloktā api pratyayāḥ sādhavo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17359: tatra bhūtaḥ kālaḥ bhaviṣyatkālena abhisambadhyamānaḥ sādhur bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17362: pratyayādhikāre punaḥ pratyaya-grahaṇam adhātv-adhikāra-vihitā api pratyayāḥ taddhitā dhātu-sambandhe sati kālabhede sādhavo yathā syuḥ iti
GS24jvkasipu:17366: āsīt bhavitā iti sambandhādtīte bhaviṣyati ca sādhur bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:17367: kriyāsam-abhihāre loṭ loṭo hi-svau vā ca ta-dhvamoḥ // PS_3,4.2 //
GS24jvkasipu:17372: samabhihāra-viśiṣṭa-kriyāvacanād dhātoḥ loṭ pratyayo bhavati sarveṣu kāleṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:17373: sarvalakārāṇām apavādaḥ tasya ca loṭo hi sva ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17378: loṭ ity eva, loḍ-dharmāṇau hisvau bhavataḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17381: lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayaṃ lunāti,
GS24jvkasipu:17384: lunīhi lunīhi ity eva tvaṃ lunāsi,
GS24jvkasipu:17387: atha vā, lunīta lunīta+ity eva yūyaṃ lunītha /
GS24jvkasipu:17388: lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ahaṃ lunāmi,
GS24jvkasipu:17391: bhūte - lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayam alāvīt,
GS24jvkasipu:17394: bhaviṣyati - lunīhi lunihi ity eva ayaṃ laviṣyati,
GS24jvkasipu:17404: atha vā, adhīdhvam adhīdhvam ity eva yūyam adhīdhve /
GS24jvkasipu:17411: yaṅ-pratyayaḥ punar asminn eva arthe vidhīyamānaḥ svayam eva śaktatvān na apekṣate dvirvacanam // [293]
GS24jvkasipu:17415: samuccīyamāna-kriyāvacanād dhātor anyatarasyāṃ loṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17421: sthālyapidhānam aṭa ity eva ayam aṭati,
GS24jvkasipu:17432: sthālyupidhānam aṭata ity eva yūyam aṭatha /
GS24jvkasipu:17436: sthālyupidhānam aṭa ity eva aham aṭāmi,
GS24jvkasipu:17442: sthālyupidhānam aṭati ity eva ayam aṭati,
GS24jvkasipu:17454: sthālyupidhānam aṭāmi ity eva aham aṭāmi,
GS24jvkasipu:17459: niruktam adhīṣva ity eva ayam adhīte,
GS24jvkasipu:17463: vyākaraṇam adhīdhvam ity eva yūyam adhīdhve /
GS24jvkasipu:17466: niruktam adhīṣva ity eva aham adhīye,
GS24jvkasipu:17477: niruktam adhīṣe ity eva tvam adhīṣe,
GS24jvkasipu:17482: niruktam adhīye ity eva aham adhīye,
GS24jvkasipu:17488: yasmād dhātoḥ loḍ vihitaḥ sa eva dhātur anuprayoktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17491: tathā ca+eva+udāhṛtam lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayaṃ lunīti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17497: dvitīye loḍvidhāne samuccaye sāmānya-vacanasya dhātor anuprayogaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17500: dhānāḥ khāda ity eva ayam abhyavaharati /
GS24jvkasipu:17502: lāghavaṃ ca laukike śabda-vyavahāre na adriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17506: sthālyupidhānam aṭa ity eva ayam aṭati ity atra api kāraka-bhedāt kriyābhede sati sāmānya-vacanatā sambhavaty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:17510: chandasi viṣaye dhātu-sambandhe sarveṣu luṅ-laṅ-liṭaḥ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17515: laṅ - agnim adya hotāram avṛṇītāyaṃ yajamānaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17524: tatra chandasi viṣaye 'nyatarasyāṃ leṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17535: yadi me bhavān idaṃ kuryād aham api bhavate idaṃ dāsyāmi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17538: upasaṃvāde āśaṅkāyāṃ ca gamyamānāyāṃ chandasi viṣaye leṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17540: madagrā eva vo grahā gṛhyāntai iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17551: tatra chandasi viṣaye dhātoḥ sayādayaḥ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17555: na ca ayam anyasminn arthe tumun ādiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17577: prayai rohiṣyai avyathiṣyai ity ete śabdā nipātyante chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:17587: dṛśe vikhye ity etau chandasi viṣaye nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:17595: śaknotau dhātāv upapade chandasi viṣaye tumarthe ṇamul kamul ity etau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17606: īśvara-śabda upapade chandasi viṣaye tumarthe dhatoḥ tosun-kasun-pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17617: tasmin kṛtya-arthe chandasi viṣaye tavai ken kenya tvan ity ete pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17632: tumarthe chandasi iti sayādi-sūtre 'pi tavai vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:17645: bhāvo lakṣyate yena tasminn arthe vartamānebhyaḥ sthādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye tumarthe tosun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17658: sṛpi-tṛdor dhātvoḥ bhāva-lakṣaṇe 'rthe vartamānayoḥ chandasi viṣaye tum-arthe kasun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17664: alam khalu ity etayoḥ pratiṣedha-vācinor upapadayoḥ dhātoḥ ktvā pratyayo bhavati prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:17676: māṅo dhātoḥ vyatīhāre vartamānād udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ktvā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17683: meṅaḥ kṛtātvasya ayaṃ nirdeśaḥ kṛto jñāpana-arthaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:17690: pareṇa pūrvasya yoge gamyamāne avareṇa ca parasya dhātoḥ ktvā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17691: pareṇa tāvat - aprāpya nadīṃ parvataḥ sthitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17693: avarayoge - atikramya tu parvataṃ nadī sthitā /
GS24jvkasipu:17697: samānaḥ kartā yayoḥ dhātv-arthayos tatra pūrvakāle dhātv-arthe vartamānād dhātoḥ ktvā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17707: āsyaṃ vyādāya svapiti cakṣuḥ saṃmīlya hasti ity upasaṃkhyānam apūrvakālatvāt //
GS24jvkasipu:17713: ābhīkṣṇya-viśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17715: dvirvacana-sahitau ktvāṇamulāv ābhīkṣṇyaṃ dyotayataḥ, na kevalau /
GS24jvkasipu:17716: ābhīkṣṇye dve bhavataḥ ity upasaṅkhyānād dvirvacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:17723: yacchabde upapade dhātoḥ ktvā-ṇamulau pratyayau na bhavato 'nākāṅkṣe vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:17725: tacced vākyaṃ na paraṃ kiñcid ākāṅkṣate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17731: yad ayaṃ bhuktvā vrajati adhīte eva tataḥ param // [298]
GS24jvkasipu:17736: agre prathama pūrva ity eteṣu upapadeṣu samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle dhātoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayu vibhāṣā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17743: vibhāṣāgrahaṇam etābhyāṃ mukte laḍādayo 'pi yathā syuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17746: ktvāṇamulau yatra saha vidhīyete tatra vāsarūpavidhir na asti ity etad anena jñāpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:17750: amaiva yat tulya-vidhānam upapadaṃ tat samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:17754: karmaṇy-upapade kṛjo dhātoḥ khamuñ pratyayo bhavati ākrośe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:17761: samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle kṛñaḥ iti ca anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:17763: svādvartheṣu upapadeṣu kṛño ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17769: asvādvīṃ svādvīṃ kṛtvā bhuṅkte svāduṅ-kāraṃ bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:17772: tumartha-adhikārāc ca sarva ete bhāve pratyayāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17773: yady evam, svāduṅkāraṃ bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti ṇamulā kartur anabhihitatvāt kartari kasmāt tṛtīyā na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:17775: na ca asmin prakaraṇe śaktiśaktimatorbhedo vivakṣyte,
GS24jvkasipu:17781: anyathādiṣu upapadesu kṛño ṇamul pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17784: nirarthakatvān na prayogam arhati iti evam eva prayujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17785: anyathā bhuṅkte iti yavānarthastāvān eva anyathākāraṃ bhugkte iti gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17795: yathātatha-śabdayor upapadayoḥ kṛño ṇamul pratyayo bhavati asūyāprativacane gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:17808: karmaṇy-upapade sākalya-viśiṣte 'rthe dṛśividoḥ dhātvoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17810: yāḥ yāḥ kanyāḥ paśyati tāstāḥ varyati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17812: yaṃ yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ jānāti labhate vicārayati vā tān sarvān bhojayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17817: yāvac-chabda upapade vindater jīvateś ca ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17825: carmodarayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ pūryateḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17828: varṣa-pramāṇa ūlopaś ca asya anyatrasyām // PS_3,4.32 //
GS24jvkasipu:17832: ūlopaś ca asya pūrayter anyatarasyāṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17833: samudāyena ced varṣasya pramāṇam iyattā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17846: asmāṇṇyantād dhātoḥ cel-artheṣu karmasu upapadeṣu ṇamul pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17854: nimūla-samūla-śabdayoḥ karmavācinor upapadayoḥ kaṣeḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17858: itaḥ prabhṛti kaṣādīn yān vakṣyati tatra kaṣādiṣu yathā-vidhy-anuprayogaḥ (*3,4.46) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:17862: śuṣkādiṣu karmavāciṣu upapadeṣu piṣer dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17872: samūla akṛta jīva ity eteṣu śabdeṣu karmasu upapadeṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ han kṛñ graha ity etebhyo dhātubhyo ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17879: karaṇe upapade hanter dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17893: snehana-vācini karaṇe upapade piṣer dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17902: hasta-vācini karaṇe upapade vartayateḥ gṛhṇāteś ca ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17915: sva-vācini karaṇe upapade puṣer dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17926: adhikaraṇa-vācini upapade badhnāteḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17934: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye badhnāteḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17942: jīva-puruṣayoḥ kartṛ-vācinor upapadayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ naśi-vahoḥ dhātvoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17946: puruṣaḥ preṣyo bhūtvā vahati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17953: ūrdhva-śabde kartṛ-vācini upapade śuṣiṣuroḥ dhātvoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17976: yasmād dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati sa eva anuprayoktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17977: nanu dhātu-sambandhe pratyaya-vidhānād anuprayogaḥ siddha eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:17983: asmād dhator upapūrvāt tṛtīyānte upapade ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17991: sarvasminn eva atra ṇamul-prakaraṇe kriyābhede sati vāsarūpa-vidhinā ktvāpi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17997: tadarthānāṃ dhātūnām anuprayoga-dhātunā samāna-karmakāṇāṃ tṛtīyānte upapade ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18024: samāsattau gamyamānāyāṃ tṛtīyā-saptamyoḥ upapadayoḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18036: pramāṇe gamyamane tṛtīyā-saptamyoḥ upapadayoḥ dhātor ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18044: parīpsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām apādāne upapade dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18047: evaṃ nāma tvarate yadavaśyaṃkartavyam api na apekṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:18056: dvitīyānta upapade parīpsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18061: evaṃ nāma tvarate yadāyudha-grahaṇam api na adriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18062: loṣtādikaṃ yat kiṃcid āsannaṃ tad gṛhṇāti //
GS24jvkasipu:18066: agruve svāṅga-vācini dvitīyānta upapade dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18071: yasmin aṅge chinne 'pi prāṇī na mriyate tadaghruvam /
GS24jvkasipu:18076: parikliśyamāne svāṅga-vācini dvitīyānte upapade dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18087: dvitīyānte upapade viśyādibhyo dhātubhyo ṇamul pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18089: viśyādibhiḥ kriyābhir anavayavena padārthānāṃ sambandho vyāptiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18102: pati - geha-anuprapātam āste gehaṃ geham anuprapātam āste,
GS24jvkasipu:18114: kim arthaṃ punar āsevāyāṃ ṇamul ucyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:18125: kriyāntare dhātvarthe vartamānābhyām asyati-tṛṣibhyāṃ dvitīyānteṣu kāla-vāciṣu upapadeṣu ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18132: atyasanena tarṣaṇena ca gavāṃ pānakriyā vyavadhīyate vicchidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18133: adya pāyayitvā dvyahamatikramya punaḥ pāyayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18146: nāma-śabde dvitīyānte upapade ādiśer graheś ca dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18151: avyaye upapade ayathabhipreta-ākhyāne gamyamāne karoteḥ ktvā-ṇamulau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18167: yāvatā sarvasminn eva atra prakaraṇe vāsarūpeṇa ktvā bhavati ity uktam ?
GS24jvkasipu:18176: tiryak-śabde upapade kṛñaḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:18192: tas-pratyayo yataḥ sva-aṅgāt tad evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18193: tas-pratyaye svāṅga-vācini upapade karoteḥ bhavateś ca dhātvoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18218: nā-artho dhā-arthaś ca pratyayo yasmāt sa evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18219: nādhārthapratyaye śabde cvy-arthe upapade kṛbhvoḥ dhātvoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18220: anānā nānā kṛtvā gataḥ nānākṛtya gataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:18254: tūṣṇīṃ-śabde upapade bhavateḥ dhātoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18261: anvak-śabde upapade bhavater dhātoḥ ānulomye ktvāṇamulau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18272: śaka-ādiṣu upapadeṣu asty-artheṣu vā dhātumātrāt tumun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18289: paryāpti-vacaneṣu alamartheṣu upapadeṣu dhātostumun pratyao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18302: tatra yeṣu artha-nirdeśo nāsti tatra+idam upatiṣṭhate,
GS24jvkasipu:18315: iti bhāva-karmaṇoḥ prāptayoḥ kartā ca vācyaḥ pakṣe ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18330: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akramakebhyaḥ // PS_3,4.69 //
GS24jvkasipu:18335: cakārāt kartari ca akarmakebhyo dhātubhyo bhāve bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:18344: tayor eva bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtya-sañjñākāḥ kta-khal-arthāś ca pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18359: bhāvo cākramakebhyaḥ ity anuvṛtteḥ sakarmakebhyo bhāve na bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:18362: ādikarmaṇi yaḥ kto vihitaḥ sa kartari bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18365: tasminn ādikarmaṇi bhūtatvena vivakṣite yaḥ kto vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:18375: gaty-arthabhyo dhātubhyo 'karmakebhya śliṣādibhyaś ca yaḥ ktaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:18419: āgatāya tasmai dātuṃ gāṃ hanti iti goghnaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:18424: asaty api ca gohanane tasya yogyatayā goghnaḥ ity abhidhīyate // [309]
GS24jvkasipu:18430: bhiyaṣṣuk grasvaś ca ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18448: uṇādayaḥ śabdāḥ tābhyām apādāna-sampradānābhyām anyatra kārake bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18449: kṛttvāt kartary eva prāptāḥ karmādiṣu kathyante /
GS24jvkasipu:18461: dhrauvyā-gati-pratyavasāna-arthebhyaḥ yaḥ kto vihitaḥ so 'dhikaraṇe bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18486: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ lasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:18488: daśa lakārā anubandha-viśiṣṭā vihitā artha-viśeṣe kāla-viśeṣe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:18489: teṣāṃ viśeṣakarān anubandhān utsṛjya yat sāmānyaṃ tad gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18503: atha lakāramātrasya grahaṇam kasmān na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18525: ṭito lakārasya sthāne yāny ātmanepadāni teṣām ṭeḥ ekāra-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18527: iha kasmān na bhavati pacamānaḥ, yajamānaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:18532: ṭito lakārasya yaḥ thās tasya seśabda ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18539: liḍ-ādeśayoḥ ta-jhayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam eś irec ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18547: liḍ-ādeśānāṃ parasmaipada-sañjñākānāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tibādīnāṃ ṇalādayo nava ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18558: vida jñāne, asmād dhātoḥ pareṣāṃ laḍādeśānāṃ parasmaipadānāṃ ṇalādayo nava vikalpena ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18566: bruvaḥ pañcānām ādita āho bruvaḥ // PS_3,4.84 //
GS24jvkasipu:18570: bruvaḥ parasya laṭaḥ parasmaipadānāṃ pañcānāma adibhūtānāṃ pañcaiva ṇalādaya ādeśā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:18571: tatsanniyogena ca bruva āhaśabda ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18612: loḍ-ādeśasya seḥ hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18622: la-ādeśaḥ chandasi viṣaye hi-śabdo vā apid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18636: loṭ sambadhinaḥ ekārasya am ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18641: sakāra-vakārābhyām uttarasya loṭ-sambandhina ekārasya yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ca am ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18687: āta ai (*3,4.95) ity etad viṣayaṃ varjayitvā eta ai bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18693: yatra kva ca te mano dakṣaṃ dadhasa uttaram /
GS24jvkasipu:18710: leṭaḥ iti vā iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:18711: leṭ-sambhandhina uttamapuruṣasya sakārasya vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18735: ṅillakāra-sambandhināṃ caturṇām yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tām-ādayaḥ adeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18751: yāsuṭ parasmaipadesu udātto ṅic ca // PS_3,4.103 //
GS24jvkasipu:18762: sthanivadbhāvād eva liṅādeśasya ṅittve siddhe yāsuṭo ṅid-vacanaṃ jñāpana-artham,
GS24jvkasipu:18786: jhasya liṅ-ādeśasya ran ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18793: liṅādeśasya iaḥ ata ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18812: tena bhinna-viṣayatvāt suṭā bādhanaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18843: sica ākārāntāc ca parasya jheḥ jus-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18862: ākārāntād uttarasya laṅādeśasya jheḥ jus ādeśo bhavati śākaṭāyanasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:18867: atra laṅ eva akārāntād anantaro ṅit sambhavati na anyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:18869: evaṃ tarthi laṅ eva yo laṅ vihitaḥ tasya yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:18875: ity ayam api jher jus loṭo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18884: dviṣaḥ parasya laṅ-ādeśasya jher jusādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18890: tiṅaḥ śitaś ca prayayāḥ sārvadhātuka-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18901: tiṅaḥ śitaś ca varjayitvā anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣo dhātu-saṃśabdanena vihitaḥ ārdhadhātuka-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18919: nanu ca ekasañjña-adhikārād anyatra samāveśo bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:18925: āśiṣi viṣaye yo liṅ sa ārdhadhātuka-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18944: ktinaḥ sārvadhātukatvād aster bhūbhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18953: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ // [317]
GS24jvkasipu:18958: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ āapañvamādhyāya-parisamāpteḥ ṅy-āp-prātipadikād ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:18965: yady api ca pratyaya-paratvena pāriśeṣyād iyam eva prakṛtir labhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:18969: na prātipadika-grahaṇe liṅga-viśiṣṭasya api grahaṇaṃ bhavati ity eva siddham ?
GS24jvkasipu:18971: svarūpavidhi-viṣaye paribhāṣeyaṃ prātipadika-svarūpa-grahaṇe sati liṅga-viśiṣta-grahaṇaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18988: saṅkhyākarmādayaś ca svādīnām arthāḥ śāstrāntareṇa vihitās tena saha asya+ekavākyatā /
GS24jvkasipu:19032: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ striyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:19034: iti sarvādhikāre 'pi prātipadika-mātram atra prakaraṇe sambadhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:19038: sāmānya-viśeṣāḥ strītvādayo gotvādaya iva bahuprakārā vyaktayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19042: prakṛtyartha-viśeṣaṇaṃ ca ity ubhayathā api prayujyate,
GS24jvkasipu:19043: striyām abhidheyāyāṃ striyāṃ vā yat prātipadikaṃ vartate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19052: ajādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ akārāntāc ca prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṭāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19066: ajādi-grahaṇaṃ tu kvacij jāti-lakṣaṇe ṅīṣi prāpte,
GS24jvkasipu:19071: halantānāṃ tavaprāpta eva kasmiṃścid āb vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19072: śūdrā ca amahatpūrvā jātiḥ iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19074: śūdra-śabdaṣ ṭāpam utpādayati jātiś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19082: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadanta-vidhir na iti kathaṃ tadanta-vidhiḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:19083: etad eva jñāpakaṃ bhavati asmin prakaraṇe tadanta-vidhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19124: ṛ-kārāntebhyo na-kārāntebhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati ṅa-kāraḥ sāmānyagrahaṇa-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19131: ug iti yatra sambhavati yathākathaṃcit tadugic-chābda-rūpaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:19146: vannantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19153: ity eva ṅīpi siddhe tat-sanniyogena repha-vidhāna-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:19160: pādantāt prātipadikād anyatarasyāṃ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19169: ṛci vācyāyāṃ pādantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṭāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19177: ṣaṭ-sañjñākebhyaḥ svasrādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ strī-pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19178: yo yataḥ prāpnoti sa sarvaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19190: ṣaṭsañjñānāmante lupte ṭābutpattiḥ kasmān na syat /
GS24jvkasipu:19191: pratyāhārāc cāpā siddhaṃ doṣastvittve tasmān na+ubhau //
GS24jvkasipu:19194: mannantāt prātipadikāt ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19196: iti ṅīp prāpto manaḥ iti sūtreṇa pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19199: aninasmaṅgrahaṇānyarthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:19205: annantād bahuvrīheḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19216: ḍāp pratyayo bhavati ubhābhyāṃ mannantāt prātipadikāt anantāc ca bahuvrīher anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:19231: ity asya api vikaopo yathā yāt /
GS24jvkasipu:19238: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo 'nupasarjanāt ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:19253: jñāpitaṃ ca+etad asty atra prakaraṇe tadantavidhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19263: ṭid-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19278: niranubandhako ḍha-śabdaḥ striyāṃ na asti iti niranubandhaka-paribhāṣā na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:19284: dāṇḍā, mauṣṭā ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19288: iti punar año grahaṇaṃ jātilakṣaṇaṃ ṅīṣaṃ bādhitum /
GS24jvkasipu:19317: yañantāc ca prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19321: iha mā bhūt, dvīpād anusamudraṃ yañ (*4,3.10) dvaipyā /
GS24jvkasipu:19326: prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena yañantāt striyāṃ ṣphaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19337: tam api bādhitvā prācāṃ ṣpha eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:19343: sarvatra lohitādibhyaḥ kataparyantebhyaḥ yañantebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṣphaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19344: kataśabdaḥ svatantraṃ yat prātipadikaṃ tadavadhitvena parigṛhyate kapi-śabdāt paraḥ kapi kata iti ,
GS24jvkasipu:19348: kaṇvāt tu śakalaḥ pūrvaḥ katād uttara iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19354: tatra tatpuruṣa-vṛttyā saṃgṛhīto madhyapātī śakala-śabdo yañantaḥ pratyayadvayam api pratipadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19359: kauravya māṇḍūka ity etābhyāṃ striyāṃ ṣphaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19361: ḍhak ca mṇḍūkāt (*4,1.119) ity aṇi ca /
GS24jvkasipu:19375: prathame vayasi yat prātipadikaṃ śrutyā vartate tataḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19395: dvigu-sañjñakāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19403: aparimāṇa-antāt dvigoḥ bista-ācitakambaly-āntāc ca taddhitaluki sati ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19406: aparimāṇa-antāt tāvat - pañcabhir aśvaiḥ krītā pañcāśvā /
GS24jvkasipu:19425: kāṇḍa-śabda-antāt dvigos taddhitaluki sati kṣetre vācye ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19428: iti vihitasya taddhitasya pramāṇe lo dvigor nityam iti luki kṛte,
GS24jvkasipu:19431: kāṇḍa-śabdasya aparimāṇavācitvāt pūrveṇa+eva pratiṣedhe siddhe kṣetre niyama-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:19439: tadantād dvigoḥ taddhitaluki sati anyatarasyāṃ na ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19440: dvau puruṣau pramāṇam asyāḥ parikhāyāḥ dvipuruṣā, dvipuruṣī /
GS24jvkasipu:19442: aparimāṇāntatvān nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte vikalpārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:19451: ūdhas-śabdāntād bahuvrīheḥ striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19452: ūdhaso 'naṅ (*5,4.131) iti samāsānte kṛte ano bahuvrīheḥ (*4,1.12)
GS24jvkasipu:19459: ity asya api ṅīpo 'yam uttaratra anuvṛtter bādhaka iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19466: saṅkhyādeḥ avyayādeś ca bahuvrīher ūdhas-śabdāntād ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19473: trividhodhnī ity atra api yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:19479: saṅkhyādeḥ bahuvrīheḥ dāma-śabdāntāt hāyana-śabdāntāt ca striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19492: ṇatvam api tricaturbhyām hāyanasya iti vayasya+iva smaryate // [325]
GS24jvkasipu:19513: annantād bahuvrīher upadhā-lopinaḥ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye chandasi ca nityaṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19525: chandasi viṣaye striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19546: jasviṣayādanyatra sañjñāyāṃ chandasi ca rātri-śabdāt ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19561: antarvat-pativator nuk bhavati ṅīp ca pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:19575: garbhiṇyāṃ jīvapatyāṃ ca vā chandasi tu nug-vidhiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19583: ṅīp pratyayas tu nakārāntatvād eva siddhaḥ yajñasaṃyoge /
GS24jvkasipu:19588: grāmasya patiriyaṃ brāhmaṇī kathaṃ vṛṣalasya patnī ?
GS24jvkasipu:19593: pati-śabda-antasya prātipadikasya sapūrvasya anupasarjanasya striyāṃ vibhāṣā nakāra-ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19610: samānādiṣv iti vaktavye samānasya sabhāva-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:19624: yayā hi pūtāḥ kratavaḥ pūtakratuḥ sā bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:19652: varṇa-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt anudāttāntāt takāropadhād vā ṅīp pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19683: varṇa-vācinaḥ prātipadikād anudāttāntāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19694: ṣidbhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo gaurādibhyaś ca striyām ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19818: iti ṣittvād eva siddhe jñāpana-arthaṃ vacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:19823: jānapada-ādibhya ekādaśabhyaḥ prātipadikebhya ekādaśasu vṛttyādiṣv artheṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19872: śoṇa-śabdāt prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19877: guṇavacanāt prātipadikād ukārāntāt striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19889: ādheyaś ca akriyājaś ca so 'sattvaprakṛtir guṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19892: bahu ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19930: bahv-ādibhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye nityaṃ striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19936: chandasi viṣaye striyāṃ bhuvo nityaṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19948: puṃyogād dhetor yat prātipadikaṃ striyāṃ vartate puṃsa ākhyābhūtaṃ tasmād ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19968: indrādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ striyām ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:19995: vinā puṃyogena svārtha eva ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20003: karaṇaṃ pūrvam asminn iti karaṇapūrvaṃ pratipadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:20004: krīta-śabdāntāt prātipadikāt karaṇa-pūrvāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20010: sā hī tasya dhanakrītī prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:20013: gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prāk subutpatteḥ iti bahulaṃ taducyate,
GS24jvkasipu:20018: karaṇapūrvāt prātipadikāt ktāntād alpākhyāyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:20043: yasya astu kathañcit pāṇir gṛhyate pāṇigṛhītā sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20057: asvāṅgapūrvapadād antodāttāt ktāntād bahuvrīheḥ striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20073: pravṛddhā ca asau vilūnā ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20077: bahuvrīheḥ ktāntād antodāttāt iti sarvaṃ nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:20079: svāṅgaṃ yad upasarjanam asaṃyogopadhaṃ tad antāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20094: atatsthaṃ tatra dṛṣṭaṃ cet tena cettattathāyutam //
GS24jvkasipu:20098: bahvaj-lakṣaṇe saṃyogopadha-lakṣaṇe ca pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:20100: nāsikā-ādyantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20125: kroḍādyantāt bahvajantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20145: saha nañ vidyamāna evaṃ pūrvāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20154: nakha-mukhāntāt prātipadikāt sañjñāyām viṣaye striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20171: svāṅgāc ca+upasarjanāt ity evam ādividhi-pratiṣedha-viṣayaḥ sarvo 'py apekṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20172: yatra ṅīṣ vihitas tatra tad apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20187: bahantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20192: sakhī aśiśvī ity etau śabdau ṅīṣantau bhāṣāyāṃ nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:20194: na asyāḥ śiśur asti iti aśiśvī /
GS24jvkasipu:20200: jātivāci yat prātipadikaṃ na ca striyām eva niyatam astrīviṣayam ayakāropadhaṃ ca tasmāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20201: ākṛti-grahaṇā jātir liṅgānāṃ ca na sarvabhāk /
GS24jvkasipu:20222: pāka-ādy-uttarapadāt jātivācinaḥ prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20223: strī-viṣayatvād eteṣāṃ pūrveṇa aprāptaḥ pratyayo bidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20231: puṣpa-phala-mūla-uttarapadāt tu yato neṣyate tadajādiṣu paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:20237: ikārāntāt prātipadikāt manuṣyajāti-vācinaḥ striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20245: jāteḥ iti vartamāne punar jāti-grahaṇaṃ yopadhād api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:20254: ukārāntāt manusyajāti-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20271: bāhu-śabdāntāt prātipadikāt sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye striyāṃ ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20284: ūru-uttarapadāt prātipadikāt aupamye gamyamāne striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20292: saṃhita śapha lakṣaṇa vāma ity evam ādeḥ prātipadikād ūru-uttarapadāt striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20303: kadru-śabdāt kamaṇḍalu-śabdāc ca chandasi ciṣaye striyāṃ ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20315: kadru-kamaṇḍalu-śabdābhyāṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20323: śārṅgaravādibhyo 'ñantebhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṅīn pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20359: atra yathāyogaṃ ṅībādiṣu prāpteṣu ṅīn vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:20362: yaṅantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ cāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20371: ṣāt paro yo yañ tadantāc cāp vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20380: tasmād yañi kṛte ṅīpi prāpte vacanam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:20381: āvaṭyāc ca striyāṃ cāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20388: āpañcamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ yānita ūrdhvam anukramisyāmaḥ taddhitasañjñāste veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20398: yuvan-śabdāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ tiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20402: aṇ-iñor anārṣayor guru-upottamayoḥ ṣyaṅ gotre // PS_4,1.78 //
GS24jvkasipu:20404: gotre yāv aṇiñau vihitāv anārṣau tadantayoḥ prātipadikayor gurūpottamayoḥ striyāṃ ṣyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20405: nirdiṣyamānasya ādeśā bhavanti ity aṇiñor eva vijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:20412: guru upottamaṃ yasya tad gurūpottamaṃ prātipadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:20428: gurūpottamādikaṃ sarvam asti iti na staṇiñau /
GS24jvkasipu:20442: tato gotre vihitayor aṇiñoḥ striyāṃ ṣyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20452: krauḍi ity evam ādibhyaś ca striyāṃ ṣyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20478: daivayajñi śaucivṛkṣi sātyamugri kāṇṭheviddhi ity eteṣām anyatarasyāṃ ṣyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20479: iñantā ete, gotra-grahaṇaṃ ca na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:20495: trayam apy adhikriyate samarthānām iti ca,
GS24jvkasipu:20496: prathamād iti ca, vā iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:20506: teṣu sāmarthye sati prathama-nirdiṣṭād eva vikalpena pratyayo bhavati iti veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:20518: vā iti kim ? vākyam api yathā syāt upagor apatyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20519: yady evaṃ samāsa-vṛttiḥ taddhita-vṛttyā bādhyeta upagvapatyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20528: aṇ pratyayas tatra bhavati iti veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:20530: cidhirvā iti triṣv api darśaneṣv apavādaviṣayaṃ parigṛtya aṇ pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:20535: aśvapatyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ prāgdīvyatīyeṣv artheṣu aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20557: patyuttarapadāt ca prātipadikāt prāgdīvyatīyeṣv artheṣu ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20601: sarvato 'ktinn-arthād ity eke iti ṅīṣaṃ kṛtvā strībhyo ḍhak kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20606: utsādibhyaḥ prāgdīvyatīyeṣu artheṣu añ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20640: sacchabdo matubanta āgatanuṅko gṛhyate sattvantu iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20651: chandaś ca+iha vṛttaṃ gṛhyate, na vedaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:20657: prāgbhavanasaṃśabdanād ye 'rthās teṣu strī-śabdāt puṃs-śabdāc ca yathākramaṃ nañsnañau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20666: striyāḥ puṃvat iti jñāpakād vatyarthe na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20667: yoga-apekṣaṃ ca jñāpakam iti strīvad ity api siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:20673: dvigor yaḥ sambandhī nimittatvena taddhitaḥ prāgdīvyatīyo 'patya-pratyayaṃ varjayitvā tasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20685: atha vā dvigor eva ayaṃ lug vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20689: upacāreṇa tu lakṣaṇayā dvigu-nimitta-bhūtaḥ pratyaya eva dviguḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:20691: dvigu-nimittako 'pi tarhi guṇakalpanayā kasmān na dvigur ucyate pājcakapālam iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:20693: itaras tu dvigutvasya+eva nimittam ity asti viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20694: yady evam iha kathaṃ pañcakapālyāṃ saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:20700: tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayor ekena vigrahaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20704: pañcagargam ayam iti vā ity anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:20710: ity ādinā yeṣāṃ gotrapratyayānāṃ lug uktaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:20718: aci iti kim ? gargebhya āgatam gargarūpyam /
GS24jvkasipu:20722: gotrasya bahuṣu lopino bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayor aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:20725: vaida-śabdāt ataḥ iñ kṛte tasya ca iñaḥ ṇya-kṣatriya-ārṣa-ñito yūni lug-aṇ-iñoḥ (*2,4.58)
GS24jvkasipu:20728: baidasya baidayor vā apatyaṃ bahavo māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20732: prāg dīvyataḥ iti vartate, aci ca /
GS24jvkasipu:20733: prāgdīvyatīye ajādau pratyaye vivakṣite buddhisthe 'nutpanna eva yuva-pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20734: tasman nivṛtte sati yo yataḥ prāpnoti sa tato bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20739: tasya chāatrāḥ iti vivakṣite 'rthe buddhisthe yuva-pratyaysya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20754: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā, pheś cha ca (*4,1.149)
GS24jvkasipu:20782: pūrvasūtreṇa nitye luki prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20783: phakphiñor yuva-pratyayayoḥ prāgdīvyatīye 'jādau pratyaye vivakṣite 'nyatarasyāṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20800: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt apatyam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20810: utsargaḥ śeṣa eva asau vṛddhāny asya prayojanam //
GS24jvkasipu:20816: tasman vivakṣite bhedena pratyapatyaṃ pratyayotpatti-prasṅge niyamaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:20829: sarvasmin vyavahitajanite 'pi gotrāpatye garga-śabdād yañ eva bhavati iti pratyayo niyamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20830: athavā gotrāpatye vivakṣite eka eva śabdaḥ prathamā prakṛtiḥ pratyayam utpādayati iti prakṛtir niyamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20836: yūny apatye vivakṣite gotrād eva pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:20850: striyā gotraprayayena abhidhānaṃ na prāpnoti gora-sañjñāyāḥ yuva-sañjñayā bādhitatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:20854: yūni yad uktaṃ tat striyāṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20864: śubhaṃyāḥ, kīlālapāḥ ity ato mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:20869: bāhu ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye iñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20920: bāhvādiprabhṛtiṣu yeṣāṃ darśanaṃ gotrabhāve laukike tato 'nyatra teṣāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20934: tatsaṃniyogena ca tasya akaṅ adeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20945: gotrasañjñake 'patye vācye kuñjādibhyaḥ cphañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20959: param api ñitsvaraṃ tyaktvā citsvara eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20977: naḍ ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ gotrāpatye phak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20981: śalaṅku śalaṅkaṃ ca ity atra paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20986: tat katham ? gotra-viśeṣe kauśike phakaṃ smaranti,
GS24jvkasipu:20988: athavā pailādipāṭha eva jñāpakaḥ iño bhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:21063: na ca gotrādaparo gotrapratyayo bhavati eko gotre (*4,1.93)
GS24jvkasipu:21066: iha tu gotrādhikāre 'pi sāmarthyād yūni pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21070: yañantāt iñantāc ca prātipadikād apatye phak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21079: tadantāt tu yūny eva ayaṃ pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:21080: gotrād yūni pratyayo bhavati iti vacanāt //
GS24jvkasipu:21084: śaradvat śunaka darbha ity etebhyo gotrāpatye phak pratyayo bhavati yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhṛguvatsāgrāyaṇeṣu artheṣu apatya-viśeṣeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:21096: droṇādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo gotrāpatye 'nyatarasyāṃ phak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21101: katham anantaraḥ aśvatthāmā drauṇāyanaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21112: ye punar atra anṛṣi-śabdāḥ putrādayastebhyo 'nantarāpatye eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21123: ṛṣyapatye nairantaryaviṣaye pratiṣedhe vijñāyamāne kauśiko viśvāmitraḥ iti duṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:21277: madhu-śabdād babhru-śabdāc ca gotrāpatye yañ pratyayo bhavati yathāsaṅkhyam brāhmaṇe kauśike vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:21283: tataḥ siddhe yañi kauśike niyama-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:21289: kapi-bodha-śabdābhyām āṅgirase 'patya-viśeṣe gotre yañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21302: vataṇḍa-śabdād āṅgirase 'patyaviśeṣe gotre yañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21305: kim artham idaṃ yāvatā gargādiṣv ayaṃ paṭhyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:21308: anāṅgirase tu ubhayatra pāṭhasāmarthyāt pratyayadvayam api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21313: vataṇḍa-śabdād āṅgirasyāṃ striyāṃ yapratyayasya luk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21325: ye tv atra pratyayāntāḥ paṭhyante tebhyaḥ sāmārthyād yūni pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21398: bharga-śabdād apatye viśeṣe traigarte gotre phañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21412: gaṅgā-śabdaḥ paṭhyate tikādiphiñā śumrādiḍhakā ca samāveśa-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:21489: vṛddhir yasya acām ādis tad vṛddham (*1,1.73) /
GS24jvkasipu:21494: avṛddhāni yāni nadīnāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ ca nāmadheyāni,
GS24jvkasipu:21501: mānuṣībhyaḥ khalv api - śikṣitāyāḥ apatyaṃ śaikṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21518: atryādibhyas tu paratvāḍ ḍhagādibhir eva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:21527: kathaṃ punar nityānāṃ śabdānāmandhakādivaṃśasamāśrayeṇa anvākhyānaṃ yujyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:21528: kecid āhuḥ katham api kākatālīyanyāyena kurvādivaṃśeṣvasaṃkareṇa+eva nakulasahadevādayaḥ śabdāḥ subahavaḥ saṅkalitāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:21535: matṛ-śabdāt saṅkhyā-pūrvāt saṃ-pūrvāt bhadra-pūrvāc ca apatye aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21555: vikarṇ-aśuṅga-chaṅgala-śabdebhyaḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vatsabharadvājātriṣu apatya-viśeṣeṣu aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21568: tannāmikāṇo bādhake dvyaca iti ḍhaki prāpte aṇ pratyayaḥ pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21569: pīlāyāḥ apatye vā aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21597: dvyacaḥ strī-pratyayāntād apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21606: ikārāntāt prātipadikād aniñ-antād apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21618: śubhra ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21624: pāṇḍaveyaḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21686: vikarṇa-śabdāt kuṣītaka-śabdāc ca kāṣyape 'patya-viśeṣe ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21698: kalyāṇī ity evam ādīnāṃ śabdānām apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21725: tatsanniyogena ca vā inaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21750: godhāyāḥ apatye udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ārak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21764: kṣudrābhyo vā apatye dṛak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21774: pitṛṣVasuḥ apatya-pratyaye ḍhaki parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21781: pitṛṣvasur yad uktaṃ tan mātṛṣvasur api bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21826: uttara-sūtre pūrva-pratiṣedhād iha tadantaḥ kevalaś ca dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21827: kula-śabda-antāt prātipadikāt kevalāc ca apatye khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21836: apūrvapadāt kula-śabdāt anyatarasyāṃ yat ḍhakañ ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21874: bhrātṛ-śabdād vyan pratyayo bhavati samudāyena ca+idam itraḥ sapatna ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21880: revatī ity evam ādibhyo 'patye ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21896: gotraṃ yā strī tadabhidhāyinaḥ śabdād apatye ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21914: vṛddhāt sauvīragotrād apatye bahulaṃ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati kutsane gamyamane /
GS24jvkasipu:21925: tṛtīyas tvākaśāpeyo gotrāṭ ṭhag bahulaṃ tataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21932: gotrastriyāḥ ity ārabhya catvāro yogās teṣu prathamaḥ kutsana eva,
GS24jvkasipu:21940: pheḥ iti phiño grahaṇaṃ na phinaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:21942: phiñantāt prātipadikāt sauvīragotrād apatye chaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21951: phiñantād autsargikasya aṇa āgatasya ṇya-kṣatriya-arṣa-ñito yūni lug aṇ-iñoḥ (*2,4.58) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:21954: yamundaś ca suyāmā ca vārṣyāyaṇiḥ phiñaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21955: sauvīreṣu ca kutsāyāṃ dvau yogau śabdavit samaret //
GS24jvkasipu:21960: phāṇṭāhṛtimimataśabdābhyāṃ sauvīra-viṣayābhyām apatye ṇa-phiñau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21963: tena yathāsaṅkhyam iha na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21975: kuru ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21984: kauravyaśabdasya kṣatriya-vacanasya tikādiṣu pāṭhāt phiñ api bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21989: kāriṇas tu rathakāra-śabdād uttarasūtreṇa+eva ṇyaḥ siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21996: chandasa eva ayaṃ pramādāt kavibhiḥ prayuktaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22050: senāntāt prātipadikāt lakṣaṇa-śabdāt kāri-vacanebhyaś ca apatye ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22061: senānta-lakṣaṇa-kāribhyo 'patye iñ pratyayo bhavati udīcāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:22067: vacanasāmarthyād eva pratyaya-samāveśe labdhe ācārya-grahaṇaṃ vaicitry-ārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:22069: tena aṇā ayam iñ bādhyate, na tu ṇyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22073: tika ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye phiñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22145: aṇantād dvyacaḥ prātipadikād apatye phiñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22160: tasmād apatye phiñ pratyayo bhavati udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:22163: kāriśabdād api vṛddhād agotrāt paratvād anena+eva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:22172: vākina ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye phiñ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22174: yadiha vṛddham agotraṃ śabdarūpaṃ tasya āgama-artham eva grahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:22179: udīcām ity adhikārāt pakṣe te 'pi bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:22191: putrāntam agotram iti pūrveṇa+eva pratyayḥ siddhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:22204: avṛddhāc chabdarūpād apatye phin pratyayo bhavati bahulaṃ prācāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:22210: udīcāṃ prācām anyatarasyāṃ bahulam iti sarva ete vikalpa-arthas teṣām ekena+eva sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:22215: manor jātāv añ-ayatau ṣuk ca // PS_4,1.161 //
GS24jvkasipu:22217: manu-śabdād añ yat ity etau pratyau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:22223: tathā ca mānuṣāḥ iti bahuṣu na lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22226: apatye kutsite mūḍhe manor autsargikaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22227: nakārasya ca mūrdhanyas tena sidhyati māṇavaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:22230: pautraprabhṛti yad apatyaṃ tad gotra-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22231: sambandhi-śabdatvād apatya-śabdasya yad apatyaṃ tad apekṣayā pautra-prabhṛter gotra-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22245: tasmin jīvati sati pautraprabhṛty-apatyaṃ yuva-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22246: pautraprabhṛti iti ca na sāmānāadhikaraṇyena apatyaṃ viśeṣayati,
GS24jvkasipu:22248: ṣaṣṭhyā vipariṇamyate pautra-prabhṛter yad apatyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22256: bhratari jyayasi jīvati kanīyān bhrātā yuva-sañjño bhavati pautra-prabhṛter apatyam /
GS24jvkasipu:22258: tayoḥ kanīyān mṛte pitrādau vaṃśye bhrātari jyāyasi jīvati yuva-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22268: vā anyasmin sapiṇḍe sthaviratare jivati // PS_4,1.165 //
GS24jvkasipu:22271: yeṣām ubhayatra daśāhāni kulasyannaṃ na bhujyate ity evam ādikāyāṃ kriyāyām anadhikāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22272: bhrātur anyasmin sapiṇḍe sthaviratare jīvati pautraprabhṛter apatyaṃ jīvadeva yuvasañjñam vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22276: sthānena vayasā ca+utkṛṣṭe yathā syāt pitṛvye pitāmahe bhrātari vayasādhike jivati /
GS24jvkasipu:22283: mṛte mṛto vā gārgya eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:22286: apatyam antarhitaṃ vṛddham iti śāstrāntare paribhāṣaṇād gotraṃ vṛddham ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22287: vṛddhasya yuvasañjñā vā bhavati pūjāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:22289: vṛddhasya iti ṣaṣṭhī-nirdeśo vicitrā sūtrasya kṛtiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22297: kutsāyāṃ gamyamanāyāṃ yūno vā yuvasañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22326: janapadaśabdāv etau kṣatriyābhidhāyinau tābhyām añapavāde vṛddhād iti ñyaṅi prāte punar añ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22335: magadha kaliṅga sūramasa iti etebhyaś ca apatye aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22343: tasya rājani ity eva, āṅgo rājā //
GS24jvkasipu:22348: kosala-ajāda-śabdābhyāṃ ca aptya ñyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22372: kuruśabdāt nādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyo ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22389: sālvāvayavebhyaḥ pratyagratha-kalakūṭa-aśmaka-śabdebhyaś cāpatye iñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22407: ity evam ādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sarvanāmnā pratyavamṛśyante,
GS24jvkasipu:22416: janapadaśabdāt kṣatriyāt ity anena vihitasya año lug ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22428: avanti-kunti-kuru-śabdebhya utpannasya tadrājasya stiryām abhidheyāyāṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22440: akāra-pratyayasya tadrājasya striyām abhidheyāyām lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22450: prācyebhyaḥ bhargādibhyaḥ yaudheyādibhyaś ca utpannasya lugna bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22451: ataś ca (*4,1.177) ity anena striyāṃ luk prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22463: kasya punar akārasya pratyayasya yaudheyādibhyo luk prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:22466: kathaṃ punas tasya bhinnaprakaraṇasthasya anena luk prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:22467: etad eva vijñāpayati pāścamikasya api tadrājasya ataś ca ity anena lug bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22473: tathā ca+uktaṃ yaudheyādi-pratiṣedho jñāpakaḥ parśvādyaṇo luk iti / [362]
GS24jvkasipu:22493: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyām kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:22499: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthād rāgaviśeṣa-vācinaḥ śabdād raktam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitam pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22514: lākṣādibhyo rāgavacanebhyas tṛtīyāsamarthebhyo raktam ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22533: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthād nakṣatraviśeṣa-vācinaḥ śabdād yuktaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22536: kathaṃ punar nakṣatreṇa puṣyādinā kālo yujyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:22537: puṣyādi-samīpasthe candramasi vartamānāḥ puṣyādi-śabdāḥ pratyayamutpādayanti puṣyeṇa yuktaḥ kālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22549: pūrveṇa vihitasya pratyayasya lub bhavati aviśeṣe /
GS24jvkasipu:22562: śravana-śabdād aśvattha-śabdāc ca+utpannasya pratyayasya lub bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22571: nakṣatradvandvāt tṛtīyāsamarthād yukte kāle chaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22580: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthād dṛṣṭaṃ sāma ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22581: yad dṛṣṭaṃ sāma cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22587: kali-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthād dṛṣṭaṃ sāma ity etasminn arthe ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22594: agneḥ svam iti sarvatra ḍhag eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22597: dṛṣṭe sāmani aṇ vā ḍid bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:22599: jāte ca arthe yo 'nyena bādhitaḥ punar aṇ vidhīyate sa vā ḍid bhavati iti vaktavyam / [365]
GS24jvkasipu:22600: prāgdīvyato 'ṇ prāptaḥ kālaṭhañā bādhitaḥ saṃdhivelādy-ṛtu-nakṣatrebhyaḥ iti punar vidhiyate sa vā ḍid bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:22616: dṛṣṭe sāmani jāte ca dviraṇ ḍidvā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22620: vāmadeva-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt dṛṣṭaṃ sāma ity etasminn arthe ḍyat ḍya ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22626: iti naña uttarasya antodāttatve vidhīyamāne 'nyor grahaṇaṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:22627: ananubandhakagrahaṇa-paribhāṣayā ekānubandhakagrahaṇaparibhāṣayā ca anayor nivṛttiḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22629: siddhe yasya+iti lopena kimarthaṃ yayatau ḍitau /
GS24jvkasipu:22633: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt parivṛtaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22634: yo 'sau parivṛtaḥ rathaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22646: pāṇḍukambala-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt parivṛto rathaḥ ity etasminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22656: tābhyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ parivṛto rathaḥ ity etasminn arthe añ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22666: apūrvapatiṃ kumārīṃ patir upapannaḥ kaumāraḥ patiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22668: apūrvapatiḥ kumārī patim upapannā kaumārī bhāryā /
GS24jvkasipu:22671: apūrvatvaṃ yadā tasyāḥ kumāryāṃ bhavati iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:22673: tasya strī kaumārī bhāryā iti siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:22676: tatra iti saptamīsamarthād amatra-vācinaḥ śabdād uddhṛtam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22685: tatra iti saptamī samarthavibhaktiḥ kṣīrāḍ ḍhañ (*4,2.20)
GS24jvkasipu:22689: sthaṇḍila-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt śayitaryabhidheye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22698: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22699: yat saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ cet te bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:22709: śūla-śabdād ukhā-śabdāc ca saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22715: dadhi-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22717: nanu ca saṃskṛta-arthe prāgvahateḥ ṭhakaṃ vakṣyati,
GS24jvkasipu:22720: dadhnā hi tat saṃskṛtaṃ yasya dadhikṛtam eva+utkarṣādhānam,
GS24jvkasipu:22725: udaśvic-chabdāt saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ it yetasminn arthe anyatarasyāṃ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22731: kṣīra-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ ity etasminn arthe ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22736: sā iti prathamāsamarthād asminn iti saptamy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22737: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ paurṇamāsī ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22748: itikaraṇasya sañjñāśabdasya ca tulyam eva phalaṃ prayoga-anusaraṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:22751: na hy ayaṃ loke tathā prasiddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22752: sañjñārthatve tu samprati jñāpite yat tatra tatra+ucyate itikaraṇas tataś ced vivakṣā iti tadupapannaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22760: sā asmin paurṇamāsī iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:22761: āgrahāyaṇī-śabdād aśvattha-śabdāc ca prathamasamarthāt paurṇamāsy-upādhikād asminn iti saptamyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22769: phalguny-ādayaḥ paurṇamāsī-śabdāḥ tebhyo vibhāṣā ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22772: nityam aṇi prāpte pakṣe ṭhag vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22780: sā iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22781: yat prathamāsamarthaṃ devatā cet sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22793: katham āgneyo vai brāhmaṇo devatā iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:22796: iti yāvat sā 'sya devatā ity adhikāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22797: sā iti prakṛte punaḥ samartha-vibhakti nirdeśaḥ sañjñā-nivṛtty-arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:22808: śukra-śabdāt sā 'sya devatā ity asinnn arthe ghan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22814: aponaptṛ apāṃnaptṛ ity etābhyāṃ ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22818: aponapād apāṃnapād iti devatāyā nāmadheye ete /
GS24jvkasipu:22819: tayos tu patyayasanniyogena rūpam idaṃ nipatyate //
GS24jvkasipu:22822: aponaptṛ apāṃnaptṛ ity etābhyāṃ cha-kāraḥ pratyayo bhavati sā asya devatā iti yasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22843: soma-śabdāt ṭyaṇ pratyayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22852: vāyv-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ yat pratyayo bhavat sā 'sya devatā ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22860: dyāvāpṛthivy-ādibbhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:22863: dyauś ca pṛthivī ca dyāvāpṛthivyau devate asya dyāvāpṛthivīyam,
GS24jvkasipu:22865: śunaś ca sīraś ca tau devate asya iti śunāsīrīyam,
GS24jvkasipu:22879: agni-śabdād ḍhak pratyayo bhavati sā+asya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22885: kālaviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ śabdebhyo bhavavat pratyayā bhavanti sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22886: kālāṭ ṭhañ (*4,3.11) iti prakaraṇe bhave pratyayā vidhāsyante te sā 'sya devatā ity asmin arthe tathā+eva+iṣyante,
GS24jvkasipu:22901: mahārāja-śabdāt proṣṭhapada-śabdāc ca ṭhañ prayayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22904: ṭhañ-prakaraṇe tadasmin vartata iti navayajñādibhya upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:22915: pitṛmātṛbhyāṃ bhrātaryabhidheye vyat ḍulac ity etau pratyayu nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:22919: tābhyām eva pitari ḍāmahac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22935: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt samūhaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22937: cittavadadyudāttamagotraṃ yasya ca na anyat pratipadaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:22940: , gotrād vuñ, pratipadaṃ ca kedārād yañca (*4,2.40)
GS24jvkasipu:22958: bhikṣā ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22962: tasya grahaṇa-sāmarthyād pumbadbhāvo na bhavati bhasyāḍhe taddhite (*6,3.35) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22980: gotrādibhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22994: prakṛtyā 'ke rājanyamanuṣyayuvānaḥ iti yalopo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23010: kavacin śabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23016: brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo yan pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23034: grāmādibhyaḥ tal pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23043: anudāttādeḥ śabdād añ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23049: khaṇdikā ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'ñ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23054: kṣudrakāś ca mālavāś ca iti kṣatriya-dvandvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23055: tataḥ pūrveṇa+eva añi siddhe vacanaṃ gotravuñ bādhana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:23059: evaṃ tarhi etaj jñāpayati vuñi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:23061: pratyojanam aupagavakaṃ kāpaṭavakam iti vuñ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23063: kṣudrakamālavāt ity etāvatā yogavibhāgena pūrvaviprateṣedhas tadantavidhiś ca jñāpitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:23064: punar asyaa+eva niyamārtham ucyate senāsañjñāyām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23069: gotrād vuñ na ca tadgotraṃ tadantān na ca sarvataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:23070: jñāpakaṃ syāt tadantatve tathā ca api śalier vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23071: senāyāṃ niyama-arthaṃ ca yathā badhyeta cāñ vuñā //
GS24jvkasipu:23086: tebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ samūhe dharmavat pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:23087: gotracaraṇād vuñ ity ārabhya pratyayā vakṣyante,
GS24jvkasipu:23088: tatra ced amucyate caraṇād dharmāmnāyayoḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:23103: acitta-arthebhyo hasti-dhenu-śabdābhyāṃ ca ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23113: keśa aśva ity etyābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yañ cha ity etau pratyayau bhavato 'nyatarasyāṃ tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23118: pāśadibhyaḥ yaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23136: khala-go-ratha-śabdebhyaḥ yaḥ pratyaya bhavat tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23143: khala-go-ratha-śabdebhyo yathāsaṅkhyam ini tra kaṭyac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23175: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād viṣayaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23176: yo 'sau viṣayaḥ deśaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23193: rājanyādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati viṣayo deśe ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:23218: bhairikyādibhyaḥ aiṣukāryādibhyaś ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vidhal bhaktal ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ viṣayo deśe ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23265: sa iti prathamāsamarthād asya ti ṣaṣṭyārthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23266: yat prathamāsamarthaṃ chandaś cet tadādir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23267: yat tadasya iti nirdiṣṭaṃ pragāthāś cet te bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:23278: pragātha-śabdaḥ kriyānimittakaḥ kvacid eva mantraviśeṣe vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:23279: yatra dve ṛcau pragrathanena tisraḥ kriyante,
GS24jvkasipu:23280: sa pragrathanāt prakarṣagānād vā pragāthaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23290: prayojanavācibhyaḥ yoddhṛvācibhyaś ca śabdebhyaḥ prathamāsamarthebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe saṅgrāme 'bhidheye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:23291: bhadrā prayojanam asya saṅgrāmasya bhadraḥ saṅgrāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23301: tad asyāṃ praharaṇam iti krīḍāyāṃ ṇaḥ // PS_4,2.57 //
GS24jvkasipu:23303: tat iti prathamāsamarthād asyām iti saptamy-arthe ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23304: yat tat iti nirdiṣṭaṃ praharaṇaṃ cet bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23305: yad asyām iti nirdiṣṭaṃ krīḍā tad cet sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23320: ghañantāt kiyāvācinaḥ prathamāsamarthād asyām iti saptamyarthe strīliṅge ñaḥ prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23328: atha samarthavibhaktiḥ pratyayārthaś ca kasmāt punar upādiyate,
GS24jvkasipu:23337: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthāt adhīte veda ity etayoḥ arthayoḥ yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23347: kratuviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ ukthādibhyaś ca sūtrāntāc ca ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23360: na ca tāny adhīyāne pratyaya iṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:23362: sāmalakṣaṇe aukthikye vartamānaḥ uktha-śabdaḥ pratyayam utpādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:23365: aukthikya-śabdāc ca pratyayo na bhavaty eva,
GS24jvkasipu:23445: krama ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ vun pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23456: anubrāhmaṇa-śabdāt iniḥ pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23469: vasanta ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:23495: sūtra-vācinaḥ ka-kāra+upadhād upannasya pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23502: iha mā bhūt, mahāvārttikaṃ sūtram adhīte māhāvārttikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23509: chandāṃsi brāhmaṇāni ca proktapratyayāntāni tadviṣayāṇy eva bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:23512: tena svātantryam upādhyāntarayogo vakyaṃ ca nivartate / [380]
GS24jvkasipu:23538: tad asminn asti iti deśe tannāmni // PS_4,2.67 //
GS24jvkasipu:23545: tat iti rathamāsamarthād asmin iti saptamyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23546: yat prathamāsamartham asti cet tad bhavati yad asmin iti nirdiṣṭaṃ deśaś cet sa tannāmā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23555: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt nirvṛttam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati deśanāmadheye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:23556: deśe tannamni iti caturṣv api yogeṣu sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23559: hetau kartari ca yathāyogaṃ tṛtīyā samartha-vibhaktiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:23562: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthān nivāsaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati deśanāmadheye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:23570: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt adūrabhavaḥ ityetasminnarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23573: cakāraḥ pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇām arthānām iha sannidhāna-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23579: u-varṇāntāt prātipadikāt yathavihitaṃ samarthavibhakti-yuktāt añ pratyayo bhavati tad asminn asti ity evam ādiṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:23589: bahvac aṅgaṃ yasya asau bahvajaṅgao matup,
GS24jvkasipu:23590: tadantāt prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23596: aṅga-grahaṇaṃ bahvaj iti tad viśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:23601: bahvacaḥ prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ kūpeṣv abhidheyesu /
GS24jvkasipu:23608: vipāśaḥ uttare kūle ye kūpāsteṣv abhidheyeṣu añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23614: dakṣiṇato vipāśaḥ kūpeṣu aṇ eva dāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23621: saṅkala ity evam ādibhyaḥ añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23665: deśe tannamni ity asya viśeṣanaṃ sauvīrādayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:23669: sauvīre strīliṅge deśe vācye sālve prāci /
GS24jvkasipu:23670: sauvīre tāvat - dattamitreṇa nirvṛttā nagarī dāttāmitrī /
GS24jvkasipu:23672: prāci khalv api - kakandena nirvṛttā kākandī /
GS24jvkasipu:23678: subāstu ity evam ādibhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23715: ka-kāra-upadhāt ca prātipadikāt an pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23727: tatra yathāsaṅkhyaṃ saptadaśabhyaḥ prātipadikagaṇebhyaḥ saptadaśa pratyayāḥ bhavanti cāturarthikāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24030: tasya ca varaṇādiṣu darśanāl lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24036: deśe tannāmni yaś cāturarthikaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24051: na ca atra lubantaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:24054: varaṇa ity evam ādibhyaḥ utpannasya cāturarthikasya pratyayasya lup bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24081: śarkarā-śabdād utpannasya cāturarthikasya pratyayasya vā lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24083: yāvatā śarkarā-śabdaḥ kumudādiṣu varāhādiṣu ca paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:24084: tatra pāṭhasamarthyāt pratyayasya pakṣe śravaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:24090: gaṇapāṭhāc ca śravaṇam uttarasūtre vihitau ca dvau pratyayau,
GS24jvkasipu:24099: śarkarā-śabdāt ṭhak cha ity etau pratyayau bhavataś cāturarthikau /
GS24jvkasipu:24105: nadyām abhidheyāyāṃ matup pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24119: madhu ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo matup pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24153: kumuda naḍa vetasa ity etebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ḍmatup pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24174: utkara ity evam ādibhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24224: naḍa ity evam ādīnāṃ kugāgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24250: teṣu ghādayo mā bhūvan iti śeṣādhikāraḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24251: kiṃ ca sarveṣu jātādiṣu ghādayo yathā syuḥ anantareṇa+ev ārthādeśena sambandhitvena kṛtārthatā mā jñāyi iti sākalyārthaṃ śeṣa-vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:24257: śeṣe iti lakṣaṇaṃ ca adhikāraś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24267: rāṣṭra avārapāra ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ gha-khau ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24276: teṣāṃ tu jātādayo 'rthāḥ samartha-vibhaktayaś ca purastād vakṣyante //
GS24jvkasipu:24278: grāma-śabdāt ya khañ ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24282: katri ity evam ādibhyo ḍhakañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24302: kula-kukṣi-grīvā-śabdebhyo yathāsaṅkhyaṃ śvan asi alaṅkāra ity eteṣu jatādiṣv artheṣu ḍhakañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24311: nadī ity evam ādibhyo ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24340: dakṣiṇā paścāt puras ity etebhyaḥ tyak prayayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24370: tena rāṅkavaḥ kambalaḥ iti ṣphak na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24371: viśeṣavihitena ca ṣphakā aṇo bādhā mā bhūt ity aṇ-grahaṇam api kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:24374: div prāc apāc udac pratyac ity etebhyo yat pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24380: avyayāt tu kālavācinaḥ paratvāt ṭyuṭyulau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24389: varṇau yā kanthā tasyā vuk pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24399: ninirbhyāṃ ghruvagatyoś ca praveśo niyame tathā //
GS24jvkasipu:24416: āvis śabdāc chandasi tyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24426: aiṣamas hyas śvas ity etebhyo 'nyatarasyāṃ tyap patyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24436: tīra-uttarapadāt rūpya-uttarapadāc ca prātipadikād yathāsaṅkhyam añ ña ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:24442: tīrarūpyāntāt iti noktaṃ bahuc-pratyaya-pūrvād mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24448: dik-pūrvapadāt prātipadikāt asañjñā-viṣayāt ñaḥ patyayo hbavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24463: dik-pūrvapadāt madra-śabdād añ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24471: udīcyagrāmavācinaḥ prātipadikād bahvaco 'ntodāttād añ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24483: prasthottarapadāta paladyādibhyaḥ kakāropadhāt ca prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24498: vāhīka-śabdaḥ kopadho 'pi punaḥ paṭhyate paraṃ chaṃ (*4,2.114) bādhitum /
GS24jvkasipu:24522: gotram iha na pratyaya-artho na ca prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:24525: tadantebhya eva aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24532: gotre ya iñ vihitaḥ tadantāt prātipdikāt aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24541: dvy-acaḥ prātipadikāt prācya-bharata-gotrād iñantād aṇ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24555: deśavācinaḥ kāśiśabdasya tatra grahaṇaṃ caidi-śabdena sāhacaryāt /
GS24jvkasipu:24557: jñāpakād anyatra prācya-grahaṇena bharata-grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti sva-śabdena bharatānām upādānaṃ kṛtam // [393]
GS24jvkasipu:24562: vṛddhāt prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24572: bhavac-chabdād vṛddhāt ṭhak-chasau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:24581: kāśi ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṭhañ ñiṭha ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:24598: kathaṃ bhāṣye udāhṛtaṃ vā nāmadheyasya vṛddhasañjñā veditavyā devadattīyāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:24639: vāhīkagrāma-vācibhyaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ ṭhaññiṭhau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:24649: tadvācibhyo vṛddhebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vibhāṣā ṭhaññiṭhau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24660: u-varṇāntāt deśavācinaḥ prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24665: ṭhaññiṭhayoḥ prakaraṇe ṭhañaḥ kevalasya anuvṛttiḥ na labhyate iti ṭhañ-grahaṇaṃ kṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:24675: vṛddhād eva prācām avṛddhān na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24679: vṛddhāt iti vartate, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24680: dhanva-vācino ya-kāra-upadhāc ca deśa-abhidhāyino vṛddhāt prātipadikāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24688: vṛddhāt ity eva, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24690: prasthapura vaha ity evam antāt deśa-vācinaḥ prātipadikād vṛddhād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24697: purānto ropadhastataḥ uttarasūtraiṇaiva siddham aprāgartham iha grahaṇam //
GS24jvkasipu:24700: vṛddhat ity eva, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24702: ra-upadhāt īkārāntāc ca pragdeśa-vācino vṛddhād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24714: vṛddhāt ity eva, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24716: vṛddhāj janapada-vācinaḥ tadavadhi-vācinaś ca prātipadikāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24722: tadavadher api janapā eva gṛhyate na grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24725: gartottarapadāc chaṃ bādhitvā vuñ eva janapada-avadher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24730: avṛddhād vṛddhāc ca janapadāt tadavadhi-vācinaś ca bahuvanaca-viṣayāt prātipadikād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24754: apigrahaṇaṃ kim yāvatā vṛddhāta pūrveṇa+eva siddham ?
GS24jvkasipu:24755: takrakauṇḍinyanyāyena bādhā mā vijñāyi iti samuccīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:24758: deśe ity eva uttarapada-śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24760: prātipadikāc ca avṛddhād vṛddhāc ca vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24772: dhūmādibhyo deśavacibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24777: tasya yopadhātvād eva vuñi siddhe sāmarthyād adeśārthaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:24778: tathā videha-anartaśabdayoḥ janapada-lakṣaṇe vuñi siddhe 'deśārthaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24782: tasya nāvi manuṣye ca vuñ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24830: nagara-śabdāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ kutsane prāvīṇye ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:24832: kutsane prāvīṇye ca jātādau pratyayārtha iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24835: kena ayaṃ muṣitaḥ panthā gātre pakṣamālidhūsaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24836: iha nagare manuṣyeṇa sambhāvyata etan nāgarakeṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:24839: iha nagare manuṣyeṇa sambhāvyata etan nāgarakeṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:24843: katryādiṣu tu sañjñāśabdena sāhacaryāt sañjñānāgaraṃ paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:24847: araṇya-śabdād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisiko manusye 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:24863: kuru yugandhara ity etābhyāṃ vibhāṣā vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24868: tābhyām avṛddhād api iti nitye vuñi prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24872: manuṣyatatsthayoḥ tu kuru-śabdān nitya eva vuñ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24884: ka-kāra-upadhāt prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24886: anyatra janapadaṃ muktvā pūrveṇa+eva kopadhād aṇi siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:24894: kaccha ity evam ādibhyo deśavācibhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24902: tasya kopadhatvād eva aṇi siddhe grahanam uttarārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:24924: manuṣye manuṣyasthe ca jātādau pratyayārthe kacchādibhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24938: tataḥ pūrveṇa+eva manusya-tatsthayoḥ vuñi siddhe niyamārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:24939: apadātāv eva manusye manaṣyasthe ca sālva-śabdād vuñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24946: gavi yavāgvām ca jātādau pratyayārthe sālva-śabdād buñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24954: garta-uttarapadāt deśa-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24964: gaha ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25045: prāgdeśa-vācinaḥ kaṭādeḥ prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25053: rājñaḥ kakāraś ca antādeśo bhavti chaś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25061: vṛddhād deśa-vācinaḥ aka ika ity evam antāt khakāropadhāc ca prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25079: kanthādy-uttarapadād deśa-vācino vṛddhāt prātipadikāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25099: parvataśabdāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati vā amanuṣye vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:25114: kṛkaṇaparṇa-śabdābhyāṃ bhāradvājadeśa-vācibhyāṃ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25119: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:25129: tyadāditvād vṛddha-sañjñakayor yuṣmad-asmadoḥ che prāpte pratyekaṃ pratyayatrayaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25138: tasmin iti sākṣād vihitaḥ khañ nirdiṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:25140: tasmin khañi aṇi ca yuṣmad-asmador yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yuṣmāka asmāka ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25141: nimittayor ādeśau prati yathāsaṅkhaṃ kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:25154: ekavacana-parayor yuṣmad-asmadoḥ tavaka mamaka ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tasmin khañi aṇi ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25155: nimittayos tu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pūrvavad eva na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25157: iti pratyayalakṣaṇa-pratiṣedhād ekavacana-paratā yuṣmad-asmador na sambhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:25161: ekavacane yuṣmad-asamādī ekasya arthasya vācake tavaka-mamakāv ādeśau pratipadyete iti sūtra-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25166: tasminn aṇi ca ity eva, tvadīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25178: para avara adhama uttama ity evaṃ pūrvāc ca ardhāt yat pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25187: para-avara-śabdāv adig-grahaṇāv api staḥ paraṃ sukham,
GS24jvkasipu:25189: tatra kṛta-arthatvād dik-śabdapakṣe pareṇa ṭhañyatau syātām /
GS24jvkasipu:25190: asmāt pūrva-grahaṇād yat pratyayo bhavati parārdhyam,
GS24jvkasipu:25194: dik-pūrvapadād ardhāntāt prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25205: grāma-ekadeśa-vācino janapada-ekadeśavācinaś ca prātipadikād dik-pūrvapadād ardhāntād añ-ṭhañau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:25207: ime khalv asmākaṃ grāmasya janapadasya vā paurvārdhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:25223: a-kāraḥ pratyayo bhavati madhya-śabdāt sāmpratike jātādau pratyaya-arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:25243: kāla-viśeṣa-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25249: yathākathañcid guṇa-vṛttyā api kāle vartamānāt pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25256: śarac-chabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śrāddhe 'bhidheye śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25266: roge ātape ca abhidheye śarac-chabdāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo vā bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25276: niśā-pradoṣa-śabdābhyāṃ ca vibhāṣā ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25277: kālāṭ ṭhañ (*4,3.11) iti nitye ṭhañi prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25293: sandhivela-ādibhyaḥ ṛtubhyo nakṣatrebhyaś ca kāla-vṛttibhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25320: varṣa-śabdāṭ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ ṛtvaṇo 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25325: varṣa-śabdāt chandasi viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25332: vasanta-śabdāc chandasi viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25338: hemanta-śabdāc chandasi viṣaye ṭhaj pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25342: sarvatra aṇ ca talopaś ca // PS_4,3.22 //
GS24jvkasipu:25350: nanu ca chandasi iti na anuvartiṣyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:25351: saivān anuvṛttiḥ śabdena akhyāyate pratyatnādhikyena pūrvasūtre 'pi sambandha-artham / [404]
GS24jvkasipu:25352: haimantikam iti bhāṣāyām api ṭhañaṃ smaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:25353: atha aṇ ca iti cakāraḥ kim arthaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:25356: ṛtvaṇi hi takāralopo na asti haimanti paṅktī paṅktiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25364: sāyaṃ ciraṃ prāhṇe prage ity etebhyaḥ avyayebhyaś ca kālavācibhyaḥ ṭyu-ṭyulau pratyayau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:25374: yastu syaterantakarmaṇo ghañi sāya-śabdas tasya+idaṃ makārāntatvaṃ pratyaya-sanniyogena nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25393: kālāṭ ṭhañ (*4,3.11) iti ṭhañi prāpte vacanaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:25401: yadā tu na saptamī samartha-vibhaktiḥ pūrvāhṇaḥ soḍhaḥ asya iti tadā pūrvāhṇatanaḥ iti bhavitavyam // [405]
GS24jvkasipu:25405: teṣām ataḥ prabhṛti arthāḥ samartha-vibhaktayaḥ ca nirdiśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:25406: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt jātaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25421: prāvṛṭ-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāj jātaḥ ity etasminn arthe ṭhap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25427: śarac-chabdāt saptamī-samarthāj jātaḥ ity etasminn arthe vuñ pratyayo bhavati ṛtvaṇaḥ apavādaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:25438: pūrvāhṇa-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ vun pratyayo bhavati tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25)
GS24jvkasipu:25452: asañjñāyāṃ tu yathāprāptaṃ ṭhañādayaḥ eva bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:25457: pratyaya. saṃniyogena ca pathaḥ pantha ity ayam ādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25461: amāvāsyā-śabdād vun pratyayo bhavati vā tatra jātaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25469: amāvāsyā-śabdāt akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25)
GS24jvkasipu:25471: pūrveṇa vunnaṇoḥ prāptayoḥ ayaṃ tṛtīyaḥ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25476: sindhu-śabdād apakara-śabdāc ca kan pratyayo bhavati tatra jāta (*4,3.25)
GS24jvkasipu:25485: sindhv-apakara-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇañau pratyayau bhavataḥ tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25)
GS24jvkasipu:25492: śraviṣṭhā-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ nakṣatrebhyaḥ āgatasya jātārthe lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25518: sthānāntāt prātipadikāt gośāla-śabdāt kharaśāla-śabdāt ca jāta-arthe pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25525: vatsaśālādibhyaḥ parasya jāta-arthe pratyayasya lug vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25535: nakṣatrebhyaḥ uttarasya jāta-arthe pratyayasya bahulaṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25541: saptamī-samārthāt kṛtādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25542: srudhne kṛto vā labdho vā krīto vā kuśalo vā sraughanaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25545: nanu ca yad yatra kṛtaṃ jātam api tatra bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25546: yac ca yatra krītaṃ labdham api tatra+eva bhavati kimarthaṃ bhedena+upādānaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:25553: saptamī-samarthāt ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt prāyabhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye yathā-vihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25563: upajānv-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ saptamī-samarthebhyaḥ prāyabhava ity etasmin viṣaye ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25571: saptamī-samarthād ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt sambhūte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25572: avaklṛptiḥ pramāṇānatirekaś ca sambhavaty arthaḥ iha gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:25580: kośa-śabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sambhūte ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25583: rūḍhir eṣā, tena krimau na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25587: tatra ity eva kāla-viśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ saptamī-samārthebhyaḥ sādhv-ādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
