GS24jvkasipu:25598: saptamī-samarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt upte 'rthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25611: grīṣma-vasanta-śabdābhyām anyatarasyāṃ vuñ pratyayo bhavati upte 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:25620: saptamī-samārthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt deyam ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25621: yad deyam ṛṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25625: ṛṇe iti kim ? māse deyā bhikṣā //
GS24jvkasipu:25629: kalāpin aśvattha yavabusa ity etebhyaḥ kālavācibhyaḥ saptamī-samarthebhyo deyam ṛṇam ity etasminn arthe vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25631: yasmin kāle mayūśaḥ kalāpino bhavanti sa kalāpī /
GS24jvkasipu:25639: grīṣma avarasama-śabdābhyāṃ vuñ pratyayo bhavati deyam ṛṇam ity etasminnarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:25648: cakārād vuñ ca deyam ṛṇam ity etasminn arthe saṃvatsare deyam ṛṇaṃ sāṃvatsarikam,
GS24jvkasipu:25652: vā iti vaktavye ṭhañ-grahaṇaṃ sandhivelādiṣu saṃvatsarāt phalaparvaṇoḥ iti paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:25653: tatra phale ṛṇatvena vivakṣite 'ṇaṃ bādhitvā ṭhañ eva yathā syāt iti // [410]
GS24jvkasipu:25658: kālavācinaḥ saptamī-samarthāt prātipadikāt vyāharati mṛgaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25666: tad iti prathamā-samarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat prathamā-samarthaṃ soḍhaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25669: tat soḍham asya chātrasya naiśaḥ, vaiśikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25674: tatra iti saptamī-samarthāt ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt bhavaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25682: punas tatra-grahaṇaṃ tad asya iti nivṛtty-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:25685: diś ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ yat pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25722: śarīraṃ prāṇikāyaḥ śarīra-avayava-vācinaḥ prātipadikād yat pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25729: dṛtyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25745: grīvā-śabdo dhamanīvacanas tāsāṃ bahutvād bahuvacanaṃ kṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:25748: gambhīra-śabdād ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25757: avyayībhāva-sañjñākāt prātipadikāc ca ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25762: parimukhādīnāṃ ca gaṇapāṭhasya etad eva prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:25788: atapūrvapadāt avyayībhāvāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25830: īyaḥ kāryo 'tha madhyasya maṇmīyau pratyayau tathā //
GS24jvkasipu:25831: madhyo madhyaṃ dinaṇ ca asmāt sthāmno lugajināt tathā //
GS24jvkasipu:25835: grāma-śabdāntād avyayībhāvāt pari anu ity evaṃ pūrvāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25841: jihvāmūla-śabdād aṅguli-śabdāt ca chanḥ pratayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25847: varga-śabdāntāt ca prātipadikāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25854: śabdād anyasmin pratyaya-arthe vargāntāt prātipadikād anyatarasyāṃ yatkhau pratyayau bhavataḥ tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25867: karṇalalāṭa-śabdābhyāṃ kan pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye 'laṅkāre 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:25873: tasya vyākhyāna iti ca vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ // PS_4,3.66 //
GS24jvkasipu:25877: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt vyākhayātavyanāmnaḥ prātipadikād vyākhyāne 'bhidheye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhave ca /
GS24jvkasipu:25878: vākyārthasamīpe cakāraḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ pūrvavākhya-artham eva samuccinoti tatra bhava (*4,3.53) iti / [414]
GS24jvkasipu:25894: bahvaco vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ prātipadikād antodāttād bhavavyākhyānayoḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25910: kratubhyo yajñebhyaś ca vyākhyātavyanamabhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25919: kratubhyaḥ ity eva siddhe yajña-grahaṇam asomayāgebhyo 'pi yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:25926: tebhyaḥ ṛṣi-śabdebhyo bhavavyākhyānayoḥ arthayoḥ ṭhañ pratayo bhavati aṇo 'pavādaḥ adhyāyeṣveva pratyayārthe viśeṣaṇeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:25929: vasiṣṭhasya vyākhyānaḥ tatra bhavo vā vāsiṣṭhiko 'dhyāyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25935: paurāḍāśa-śabdāt puroḍāśa-śabdāc ca bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25938: tasya vyākhyānaḥ tatra bhavo vā pauroḍāśikaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:25941: tasya vyākhyānas tatra bhavo vā puroḍāśikaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:25946: chandaḥ-śabdād bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ yad aṇau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25951: dvyajādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vyākhyātavyanāmabhyo bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25968: ṛgayana-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25996: tataḥ iti pañcamī-samarthād āgataḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26000: tataḥ iti mukhyam apādānaṃ vivakṣitaṃ yat tad iha gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:26007: āyasthanavācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26015: śuṇḍika ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati tataḥ āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26034: tadvācibhyaḥ śabdebhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26046: ṛ-kārāntebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vidyāyonisambandha-vācibhyaḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26058: ca-kārāṭ ṭhañ ca tat āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26062: apatyādhikārād anyatra laukikaṃ gotram apatyamātraṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26063: gotra-pratyayāntāt prātipadikād aṅkavat pratyaya-vidhirb havati tataḥ āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26078: hetubhyo manusyebhyaś ca anyatarasyāṃ rupyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26090: hetubhyo manuṣyebhyaḥ ca mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati tataḥ āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26101: pañcamī-samarthāt ṅyāp-prātipadikāt prabhavati ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26108: vidūra-śabdāt ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tataḥ prabhavati ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26114: evaṃ tarhi - vālavāyo vidūraṃ ca prakṛtyanataram eva vā /
GS24jvkasipu:26115: na vai tatra iti ced brūyāj jitvarīvad upācaret //
GS24jvkasipu:26118: tad iti dvitīyā-samarthād gacchati ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26119: yo 'sau gacchati panthāś cet sa bhavati dūto vā /
GS24jvkasipu:26120: srughnaṃ gacchati sraughnaḥ panthā dūto vā /
GS24jvkasipu:26122: tatstheṣu gacchatsu panthā gacchati ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26129: tad iti dvitīyā-samarthād abhiniṣkrāmati ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat abhiniṣkrāmati dvāraṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26145: taditi dvitīyāsamarthād adhikṛtya kṛte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat tat kṛtaṃ granthaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26159: tad ity eva, adhikṛtya kṛte granthe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:26160: śiśukranda-ādibhyo dvitiyā-samarthebhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati adhikṛtya kṛte granthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26180: saḥ iti prathamā-samarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26181: yat prathamā-samarthaṃ nivāsaḥ cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26189: sa iti prathamā-samarthād asya+iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26190: yat prathamā-samartham abhijanaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26209: parvatavācinaḥ prathamā-samarthād abhijanād asya+iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe chanḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26210: āyudhajīvibhyaḥ āyudhajīvyartham āyudhajīvino 'bhidhātuṃ pratyayo bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26215: ṛkṣodaḥ parvato 'bhijanaḥ eśāṃ brahmaṇānām ārkṣodā brāhmaṇāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26220: śaṇḍika ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati so 'sya abhijanaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26236: sindhv-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ takṣaśilādibhyaś ca yathāsaṅkhyam aṇ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ so 'sya abhijanaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26251: tebhyas tata eva aṇi siddhe manuṣyavuño bādhanārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:26269: tūdyādibhyaś caturbhyaḥ śabdebhyo yathāsaṅkhyaṃ catvāra eva ḍhak chaṇ ḍhañ yak ity ete pratyayā bhavanti so 'sya abhijanaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye
GS24jvkasipu:26279: sa iti prathamā-samarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26280: yat prathamā-samarthaṃ bhaktiś ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26287: deśa-kāla-vyatiriktād acittavācinaḥ prātipadikāṭ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktir ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26299: mahārāja-śabdāt ṭhaj pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26305: vāsudeva-arjuna-śabdābhyāṃ vun pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26309: nanu ca vāsudeva-śabdād gotra-kṣatriya-ākhyebhyaḥ iti vuñ asty eva,
GS24jvkasipu:26310: na ca atra vun-vuñor viśeṣo vidyate,
GS24jvkasipu:26315: iti ca arjuna-śabdasya pūrva-nipātam akurvan jñāpayati abhyarhitaṃ pūrvam nipatati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:26318: gotra-ākhyebhyaḥ kṣatriya-ākhyebhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ bahulaṃ vuñ pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26332: janapadināṃ janapadavat sarvaṃ janapadena samānaśabdānāṃ bahuvacane // PS_4,3.100 //
GS24jvkasipu:26334: janapadino ye bahuvacane janapadena samānaśabdās teṣāṃ janapadavat sarvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26335: pratyayaḥ prakṛtiś ca so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26336: janapadatadavadhyoś ca ity atra prakaraṇe ye pratyayā vihitāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:26343: tadvat aṅgāḥ kṣatriyā bhaktir asya āṅgakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26351: vṛddhi-nimitteṣu ca vuñādiṣu viśeṣo na asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26357: sa bhaktir asya iti prakṛtinirhrāse kṛte, madrakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26364: anyathā hi yatra+eva samānaśabdatā tatra+eva atideśaḥ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:26366: vāṅgo vaṅgau vā bhaktir asya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26368: bahuvacane samānaśabdānām ekavacana-dvivacanayoḥ saty api śabdabhede 'tideśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26369: vāṅgaḥ vāṅgau vā bhaktir asya vāṅgaka // [422]
GS24jvkasipu:26372: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthāt proktam ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26377: anyena kṛtā māthureṇa proktā māthurī vṛttiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26383: tittiryādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ chaṇ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26390: tittiriṇā proktaḥ ślokaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26392: ity atra asya anuvṛtteḥ chando 'dhikāra-vihitānāṃ ca tadviṣayatā iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:26395: kāśyapa-kauśikābhyām ṛṣibhyāṃ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26401: ity atra anuvṛtteḥ chando 'dhikāra-vihitānāṃ ca tatra tadviṣayatā iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26408: kalāpyantevāsināṃ vaiśampāyanāntevāsināṃ ca ye vācakāḥ śabdās tebhyo ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26422: pratyakṣa-kāriṇo gṛhyante na tu vyavahitāḥ śaiṣyaśiṣyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26430: kalāpyanatevāsibhyaḥ tāvat - haridruṇā proktam adhīyate hāridraviṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26453: tṛtīyā-samarthāt prokte ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati yat proktaṃ purāṇa-proktāś ced brāhmaṇa-kalpās te bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:26462: āśmarathaḥ kalpaḥ yājñavalkyādayo 'cirakālā ity ākhyāneṣu vārtā /
GS24jvkasipu:26465: pratipadaṃ brāhmaṇesu yaḥ pratyayas tasya tadviṣayatā vidhīyate ṇineḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26474: śaunaka ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye chandasy abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:26513: kalāpi-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26524: saulabhāni brāhmaṇāni ity evam ādi siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:26527: chaṅgalin-śabdāt ḍhinuk pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26533: pārāśaryaśilālibhyāṃ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26546: karmanda-kṛśāśva-śabdābhyām iniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhikṣu-naṭasūtrayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26555: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthād ekadik ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26561: tena iti prakṛte punaḥ samarthavibhakti-grahaṇaṃ chando 'dhikāranivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:26565: tasiś ca pratyayo bhavati tena+ekadik ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26566: pūrveṇ ghādisu aṇādiṣu ca prāpteṣu ayam aparaḥ pratyayo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26581: tṛtīyā-samarthāt upajñāte ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26590: tṛtīyā-samarthāt kṛte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26591: yat tatkṛtaṃ granthaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26599: vidyāmānām eva jñātam aupajñātam ity ayam anayor viśeṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:26602: tṛtīyā-samarthāt kṛte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati samudāyena cet sañjñā jñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26610: tena, kṛte, sañjñāyām iti ca+etat sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:26611: kulālādibhyaḥ vuñ pratyayo bhavati tena kṛtam ity etasminn arthe sañjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:26635: tena, kṛte, sañjñāyām iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:26636: kṣudrādibhyaḥ añ pratyayo bhavati tena kṛte ity etasmin viṣaye sañjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:26645: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhī-samarthād idam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26667: ratha-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmn viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26678: patanti tena iti patram aśvādikaṃ vāhanam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26679: tatpūrvād ratha-śabdāt añ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26687: tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāt adhvaryu-pariṣac-chabdābhyāṃ ca añ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26697: hala-sīra-śabdābhyāṃ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26703: dvandva-sañjñākāt vun pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:26718: gotra-vācibhyaḥ caraṇa-vācibhyaḥ ca prātipadikebhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye aṇo 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26731: iñantāc ca prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26748: lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyabhūtasya+eva cihnabhūtaṃ svaṃ yathā vidyā bidānām,
GS24jvkasipu:26749: aṅkastu gavādistho 'pi gavādīnāṃ svaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26754: śākala-śabdāt saṅghādiṣu pratyayārtha-viśeṣaneṣu vā aṇ-pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26768: chandoga-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26772: chandogānāṃ dharmo vā āmnāyo vā chandogyam /
GS24jvkasipu:26782: teṣv abhidheyeṣu vuñ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26790: daivatika-ādibhyaḥ chaḥ pratayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26792: tataḥ pūrveṇa vuñi prāpte cha-vidhāna-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:26804: kaupiñjala-hāstipada-śabdābhyam aṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26820: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhī-samarthād vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26824: yasya ca na anyat pratipadaṃ vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:26831: tasya prakaraṇe tasya iti punar vacanaṃ śaiṣika-nivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:26837: prāṇ-yoṣadhi-vṛkṣa-vācibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhī-samarthebhyaḥ avayave yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26847: ita uttare pratyayāḥ prāṇyoṣadhivṛkṣebhyaḥ vikārāvayavayoḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:26849: kathaṃ dvayam apy adhikriyate tasya vikāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:26856: bilva ity evam ādibhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26860: tataḥ kopadhāt eva siddhe mayaḍbādhanārthaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:26877: ka-kāra-upadhāt prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati yathāyogaṃ vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26894: u-varṇāntāt prātipadikāt añ pratayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26901: anudāttādeḥ prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26908: palāśa-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vā añ pratyayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26925: śamī-śabdāṭ ṭlañ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26929: mayaḍ vaā+etayor bhāṣāyām abhakṣya ācchādanayoḥ // PS_4,3.143 //
GS24jvkasipu:26931: prakṛtimātrād vā mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati bhakṣyācchādanavarjitayoḥ vikārāvayavayor arthayor bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye yathāyathaṃ pratyayeṣu prāpteṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:26939: etayoḥ ity anena kiṃ yāvatā vikāra-avayavau prakṛtāv eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:26941: ity evam ādayas tadviṣaye 'pi yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:26948: vṛddhebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ śarādibhyaś ca abhakṣyācchādanayoḥ vikārāvayavayoḥ bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye nityaṃ mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26955: nitya-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā ārambha-sāmarthyād eva nityaṃ bhavisyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:26975: purīṣaṃ na vikāro na ca avayavaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:26980: piṣṭa-śabdān nityaṃ mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati tasya vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26985: piṣṭa-śabdāt kan pratyayo bhavati vikāre sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26990: vrīhi-śabdān mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati puroḍaśe vikāre /
GS24jvkasipu:26996: tila-yava-śabdābhyām asañjñāviṣaye mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27004: dvyacaḥ prātipadikāt chandasi viṣaye mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27012: utvataḥ prātipadikād vardhra-bilva-śabdābhyāṃ ca mayaṭ pratyayao na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27024: tāla-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27042: jātarūpa-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati parimāṇe vikāre /
GS24jvkasipu:27052: prāṇi-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo rajatadibhyaś ca añ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27054: anudāttādeḥ añ vihita eva pariśiṣṭam iha+udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:27061: rajatādiṣu ye 'nudāttādayaḥ paṭyante rajatakaṇḍakaraprabhṛtayastebhyo 'ñi siddhe punarvacanaṃ mayaḍvādhanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:27078: ñid yo vikārāvayavapratyayas tadantāt prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati vikāravayavayoḥ eva /
GS24jvkasipu:27102: ity ata ārabhya krītārthe ye pratyayāḥ parimāṇād vihitāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:27104: parimāṇāt krīta iva pratyayā bhavanti tasya vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27126: umā-śabdād ūrṇā-śadac ca vā vuñ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27131: eṇī-śabdād ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27138: gopayas-śabdābhyāṃ yat pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27145: dru-śabdād yat pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27150: dra-śabdān māne vikāra-viśeṣe vayaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27155: vikārāvayavayor utpannasya phale tadviṣaye vivakṣite lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27159: phalitasya vṛkṣāsya phalam avayavo bhavati vikāraś ca,
GS24jvkasipu:27164: plakṣa-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ phale vikārāvayavatvena vivakṣite aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27180: jambū-śabdāt phale 'bhidheye vā aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27182: atra aṇo vidhāna - samārthyāl lug na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27188: jambvāḥ phale 'bhidheye pratyayasya vā lup bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27215: harītakī ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ phale pratyayasya lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27216: luki prāpte lupo vidhāne yuktavadbhāve strī-pratyayaśravaṇe ca viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27246: kaṃsīya-paraśavya-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yañ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ tasya vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:27251: paraśavya-śabdād anudātta-āditvād eva añi siddhe lug-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:27257: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ [437]
GS24jvkasipu:27265: vakṣyati - tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam (*4,4.2) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27282: tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam // PS_4,4.2 //
GS24jvkasipu:27284: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthād dīvyati khanati jayati jitam ity eteṣv artheṣu ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27293: devadattena jitam iti pratyayo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27300: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthāt saṃskṛtam ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27308: kulattha-śabdāt ka-kāropadhāt śabdāc ca prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo hbavati saṃskṛtam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27315: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt tarati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo hbavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27321: gopuccha-śabdāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tarati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27327: nau-śabdād dvyacaś ca prātipadikāṭ ṭhan pratyayo hbavati tarati ity etasmin arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27341: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāc carati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27348: ākarṣa-śabdād ṣthal pratyayo bhavati carati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27357: parpa ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati carati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27392: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthebhyaḥ vetanādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ jīvati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27418: vasna-krayavikraya-śabdābhyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ ṭhan pratyayo bhavati jīvati ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27434: utsaṅgādibhyas tṛtiyāsamarthebhyo harati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27445: bhastrā ity evam ādibhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamrthebhyaḥ harati tiyetasminnarthe ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27461: vivadha-vīvadha-śabdābhyām tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ vibhāṣā ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27469: vivadha-vīvadha-śabdau samānārthau pathi paryāhāre ca vartete //
GS24jvkasipu:27473: kuṭilikā-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthād aṇ pratyayo hbavati harati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27474: kuṭilikāyā harati mṛgo vyādhaṃ kauṭiliko mṛgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27481: akṣadyūtādibhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamarthebhyo nirvṛtte ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27498: tryantān nityaṃ map pratyayo bhavati tena virvṛtte ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27503: tena tryantaṃ nityaṃ map-pratyayāntam eva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27513: apamitya-yācita-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kak kan ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ nirvṛtte ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27519: tṛtīyāsamarthāt saṃsṛṣṭe ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27533: saṃsṛṣte (*4,3.22) ity anena+utpannasya ṭhako lavaṇa-śabdāl luk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27541: mudga-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati saṃsṛṣṭe ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27548: vyañjana-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamarthebhyaḥ upasikte ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27556: ojas sahas ambhas ity etebhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamarthebhyo vartate ity arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27563: prati anu ity evaṃ pūrvebhyaḥ īpa-loma-kūla-śabdebhyo dvitiyāsamarthebhyo vartate ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27575: parimukha-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vartate ity easminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27581: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthāt prayacchati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27582: yat tad dvitīyāsamarthaṃ garhyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27598: kusīda-daśa-ekādaśaśabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṣṭhan ṣṭhac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ prayacchati garhyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27606: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād ucchati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27613: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād rakṣati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27618: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthābhyāṃ śabda-dardura-śabdābhyāṃ karoti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27624: pakṣyādibhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyo hanti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27625: svarūpasya paryāyāṇāṃ tadviśeṣāṇām ca grahaṇam iha+isyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27640: paripantha-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt tiṣṭhati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27649: mātha-śabda-uttarapadāt prātipaikāt padavī anupada ity etābhyāṃ ca dhāvati ity etasminnarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27658: atha vā ākrandyate ity ākrandaḥ ārtāyanam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27660: ākranda-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād dhāvati ity etasminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27667: padaśabdaḥ uttarapadaṃ yasya tasmāt padottarapada-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād gṛhṇāti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27674: pratikaṇṭha-artha-lalāma-śabdebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ gṛhṇāti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27680: dharma-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāc carati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27687: pratipatha-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād eti ity asminn arthe ṭhan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27693: samavāyā-vācibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ samavaiti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27697: samavaiti āgatya tadekadeśī bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27704: pariṣadaḥ ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati samavāyān samavaiti ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27709: senā-śabdād vā ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati samavāyān samavaiti ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27715: lalāṭa-kukkuṭī-śabdābhyāṃ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthābhyāṃ paśyati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27721: tad anena lalāṭa-darśanena sevakasya svāminaṃ prati anupaśleṣaḥ kāryeṣu anupasthāyitvaṃ lakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27725: deśasya alpatayā hi bhikṣuravikṣiptadṛṣṭiḥ pādavikṣepadeśe cakṣuḥ saṃyamya gacchati sa ucyate kaukkuṭikaḥ iti // [446]
GS24jvkasipu:27728: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād dharmyam ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27737: mahiṣī ity evam ādibhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya dharmyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27754: ṛkārāntāt prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati tasya dharmyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27767: ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt avakraya ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27778: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yattatprathamāsamarthaṃ paṇyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27782: paṇyam iti viśeṣanaṃ taddhitavṛttāv antarbhūtam ataḥ paṇya-śabdo na prayujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:27785: lavaṇa-śabdāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tad asya paṇyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27791: kiśara ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṣṭhan pratyayo tad asya paṇyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27810: śalālu-śabdād anyatarasyāṃ ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati tad asya paṇyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27820: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yattat prathamāsamarthaṃ śilpaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27829: maḍḍuka-jharjhara-śabdābhyām anyatarasyām aṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya śilpam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27838: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27839: yattat prathamāsamarthaṃ praharaṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27851: śakti-yaṣṭi-śabdābhyām īkak pratyayo bhavati tad asya praharaṇam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27858: tad iti prathamāsamarthebhyaḥ asti nāsti diṣṭa ity etebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ matiś cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27864: paraloko 'sti iti yasya matiḥ sa āstikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27869: vacanasāmarthyād vā ākhyātād vākyāc ca pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27873: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yattat prathamāsamarthaṃ śīlaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27878: bhakṣaṇakriyā tadviśeṣaṇaṃ ca śīlaṃ taddhitavṛttāv antarbhavati // [449]
GS24jvkasipu:27881: chatra ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asya śīlam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27887: sa upasarga-pūrvo 'tra gṛhyate āsthā saṃsthā avasthā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27906: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27907: yat tatprathamāsmarthaṃ karma cet tad vṛttam adhyayanaviṣayaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27911: ekamanyat iti vigṛhya taddhitārtha iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27913: adhyayane karma vṛttam ity etat sarvaṃ taddhitavṛttāvantarbhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27914: yasya adhyayanaprayuktasya parīkṣākāle paṭhataḥ skhalitam apapāṭharūpam ekaṃ jātaṃ sa ucyate aikānyikaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27918: bahvac pūrvapadaṃ yasya tasmād bahvacpūrvapadāt prātipadikāt ṭhac pratyayo bhavati tad asya karmādhyayane vṛttam ity etasminn arthe ṭhako 'pavādaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:27923: udātte kartavye yo 'nudāttaṃ karoti sa ucyate anyat tvaṃ karoṣi iti //
GS24jvkasipu:27927: tad iti prathamāsamarthādasya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yat tatprathamāsamarthaṃ hitaṃ cet tad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27938: tat iti prathamāsamarthād asmā iti caturthyartha ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ tac ced dīyate niyuktam /
GS24jvkasipu:27941: agre bhojanam asmai niyuktaṃ dīyate āgrabhojanikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27948: śrāṇā-māṃsa-odana-śabdābhyāṃ ṭiṭhan pratyayo bhavati tad asmai dīyate niyuktam ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27957: na hy atra ṭhañaṣ ṭiṭhano vā viśeṣo 'sti ?
GS24jvkasipu:27964: bhakta-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati anyatrasyām tad asami dīyate niyuktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27967: bhaktam asmai dīyate niyuktam bhāktaḥ, bhaktikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27970: tatra iti saptamīsamarthān niyukta ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27979: agāra-śabdāntāt prātipadikāt ṭhan pratyayo bhavati tatra niyuktaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27987: saptamīsamarthād adeśa-vācinaḥ paratipadikād akāla-vācinaḥ ca adhyāyinyabhidheye ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27988: adhyayanasya yau deśakālau śāstraṇa pratiṣiddhau tāvadeśakāla-śabdena+ucyete,
GS24jvkasipu:28000: kaṭhina-śabdāntāt saptamīsamarthāt prastāra-saṃsthāna-śabdābhyāṃ ca ṭhak pratyayo bhavati vyavaharati ity etasmnn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28008: nikaṭa-śābdāt saptamīsmarthāt vasati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28009: yasya śāstrato nikaṭavāsas tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28010: āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā grāmāt krośe vastavyam iti śāstram /
GS24jvkasipu:28015: āvasatha-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt vasati ity etasminn arthe ṣṭhal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28026: prāg etasmād dhitasaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo yat pratyayasteṣvadhikṛto veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28034: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyo rathayugaprāsaṅgebhyo vahati ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28038: rathasītāhalebhyo yad vidhau iti tad anatavidhy-upasaṅkhyānāt paramarathyaḥ ity api bhavati // [452]
GS24jvkasipu:28042: dhur ity etasmād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe yat ḍhak ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28047: sarvadhurā-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthāt vahati ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28049: strīliṅge nyāyye sarvadhurāt iti prātipadikamātra-apekṣo nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28056: ekadhurā-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28063: śakaṭa-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28068: hala-sīra-śabdābhyāṃ dvitīyāsmarthābhyāṃ vahati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28074: janī-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28082: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthād vidhyati ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28088: nanu asamarthatvād anabhidhānāc ca pratyayo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28089: na hi dhanuṣā padya iti vivakṣito 'rthaḥ pratīyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:28098: dhanagaṇa-śabdābhyāṃ dvitīyāsamarthābhyām labdhā ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28105: anna-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt labdhā ity etasmin arthe ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28109: vaśa-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād gataḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28115: padaśabdāt prathamāsamarthād dṛśyārthopādhikād asminniti saptamyarthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28120: suṣṭhu draṣṭuṃ pratimudrotpādanena sa padyaḥ kardamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28124: mula-śabdāt prathamāsamarthād āvarhi ity evam upādhikādasya+iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28128: yeṣāṃ mūlam āvṛhyate utpāṭyate te mūlyāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:28130: mūlotpāṭanena vinā saṅgrahītuṃ na śakyante ity arthaḥ // [454]
GS24jvkasipu:28135: dhenoḥ sugāgamo yaś ca pratyayaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28137: yā dhenur uttamarṇāya ṛṇapradānād dohanārthaṃ dīyate sā dhenuṣyā /
GS24jvkasipu:28143: gṛhapati-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt saṃyukte ity etasminn arthe ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28149: nāvādhibhyo 'ṣṭabhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'ṣṭasv eva tāryādiṣv artheṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28156: tena vayasā tulye śatrau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28158: nanu ca dharmādanapete iti vakṣyamāṇena+eva siddham ?
GS24jvkasipu:28160: dharmaṃ yad anuvartate tad dharmād anapetam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28167: paṭādīnām utpattikāraṇaṃ mūlaṃ tena tadabhibhūyate śeṣīkriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28170: iti yati prāpte ānāmyam iti nipātanāt ṇyat /
GS24jvkasipu:28175: rathasītāhalebhyo yad vidhau iti tad antavidhir api iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28183: yathā tulā paricchinatti param evaṃ tad api iti //
GS24jvkasipu:28187: dharmādibhyaḥ pañcamīsamarthebhyo 'napetaḥ ity arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28196: chandaḥ-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthān nirmite ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28203: uraḥśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthān nirmite ity etasminn arthe 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28211: hṛdaya-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt priyaḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28223: hṛdaya-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād bandhane ṛṣāvabhidheye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28226: parahṛdayaṃ yena badhyate vaśīkriyate sa vaśīkaraṇamantro hṛdyaḥ ity ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:28229: matādibhyaḥ tribhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ triṣv eva karaṇādiṣv artheṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28241: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt sādhuḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28246: sādhuḥ iha pravīṇo yogyo vā gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:28252: pratijanādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ khañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28271: yatra hitārtha eva sādhvarthastatra vacanāt prākkrītīyā bādhyante //
GS24jvkasipu:28274: bhakta-śabdāt ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28280: pariṣac-chabdād ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28291: kathādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28309: guḍa-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28328: pathy-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28336: sabhā-śabdād yaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28342: sabhā-śabdāḍ ḍhaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye chandasi /
GS24jvkasipu:28349: samāanatīrtha-śabdāt tatra iti saptamīsamarthād vāsi ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28355: samānodara-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt śayitaḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28361: sodara-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt śayitaḥ ity etsminn arthe yaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28363: iti sūtreṇa yakārādau pratyaye vivakṣite prāg eva samānasya sabhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28370: sptamīsamarthāt bhava ity etasminn arthe chandasi viṣaye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28374: namo medhyāya ca vidyutyāya ca namaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28376: bhavādhikāraś ca samudra-abhrād dhaḥ (*4,4.118) iti yāvat // [458]
GS24jvkasipu:28379: pāthaḥ-śabdān nadī-śabdāc ca ḍyaṇ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28382: ca no dadhīta nādyo giro me /
GS24jvkasipu:28386: veśanta-śabdād dhimavaccha-śabdāc ca aṇ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28391: srotaḥ-śabdād vibhāṣā ḍyat dya ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28399: sagarbha-sayūtha-sanuta-śabdebhyo yan pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28408: tugra-śabdād ghan pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28414: agra-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28416: kim artham idaṃ yāvatā sāmānyena yad vihita eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:28418: iti vakṣyati tābhyāṃ bādhā mā bhūt iti punar vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:28421: agra-śabdāt yat gha-cchau ca pratyayā bhavanti tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28429: samudra-śabdāt abhra-śabdāc ca ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28439: barhiḥ-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt dattam ity etasmin arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28444: dūta-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād bhāge karmaṇi ca abhidheye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28452: rakṣaḥ-śabdād yātu-śabdāc ca ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād hananī ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28454: yā vāṃ mitrāvaruṇau rakṣasyā tanū yātavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:28461: revaty-ādibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ praśasye vācye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28470: iti lope kṛte halo yamāṃ yami lopaḥ (*8,4.64) iti lopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:28473: asura-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt svam ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28475: asuryaṃ vā etat pātraṃ yat kulālakṛtaṃ cakravṛttam // [460]
GS24jvkasipu:28478: asura-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt māyāyāṃ svaviśeṣe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28481: tadvān āsām upadhāno mantra iti iṣṭakāsu luk ca matoḥ // PS_4,4.125 //
GS24jvkasipu:28484: matub-antāt prātipadikāt prathamāsamarthād āsām iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28485: yat prathamāsamartham upadhāno mantraś cet sa bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28486: yat tad āsām iti nirdiṣṭam iṣṭakāś cet tā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:28493: varcasvānupadhānamantraḥ āsām iṣṭakānām iti vigṛhya yati vihite mator luki kṛte,
GS24jvkasipu:28501: varcasvān upasthānamantraḥ āsām ity atra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:28503: aṅgulimānupadhāno hastaḥ āsām ity atra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:28505: aṅgulimānupadhāno hasta āsām ity atra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:28507: anekapadasambhave 'pi kenacid eva padena tadvān mantro gṛhyate, na sarveṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:28513: aśvimānupadhāno mantraḥ āsāmi ṣṭakānām iti vigṛhyāṇ vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:28520: tāsv abhidheyāsu mūrdhno matup pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28522: yasmin mantre vayaḥ-śabdo mūrdhan-śabdaś ca vidyate sa vayasvān api bhavati mūrdhanvān api,
GS24jvkasipu:28523: yathā mūrdhā vayaḥ prajāpatiś chandaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28524: tatra vayasvacchabdād iva mūrdhavacchabdād api yati prāpte matup vidhāsyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28528: yatra mūrdhan-śabda eva kevalo na vayaḥ-śabdasn tatra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:28529: mūrdhanvataḥ iti vaktavye mūrdhnaḥ ity uktaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:28534: tasminś chandasi viṣaye yat pratyayo bhavati māsatanvoḥ pratyayārtha-viśeṣaṇayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28535: prathamāsamarthād asty upādhikāt ṣaṣṭhyārthe saptamyarthe ca yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28537: nabhāṃsi vidyante asmin māse abhasyo māsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28542: tanvā khalv api - ojo 'syāṃ vidyate ojasyā tanūḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28545: madhumatā pātreṇa carati māsatanvor anantarārthe vā /
GS24jvkasipu:28546: madhv asminn asti madhv asminn anantaram iti vā madhvyo māsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28573: matvarthe ity eva veśoyaśasī ādau yasya prātipadikasya tasmād veśoyaśāader bhagāntāt prātipadikāt matvarthe yal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28574: lakāraḥ svarārthaḥ veśobhago vidyate yasya sa veśobhagyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28578: veśaś ca asau bhagaś ca śrīprabhṛtir veśobhagaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:28582: veśoyaśāader bhagāntāt prātipadikāt matvarthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28593: pūrvaśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt kṛtam ity etasminn arthe ina ya ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28598: pūrvaiḥ iti bahuvacanān tena pūrvapuruṣāḥ ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:28599: tatkṛtāḥ panthānaḥ praśastā iti pathāṃ praśaṃsā //
GS24jvkasipu:28603: ap-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt saṃskṛtam ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28609: sahasra-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt sammita ity etasminn arthe ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28614: tatra api samityā sammitaḥ eva lakṣayitavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28618: matvarthe ca sahasra-śabdāt ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28626: soma-śabdāt dvitīyāsamarthāt arhati ity etasminn arthe yaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28652: vasu-śabdāt samūhe vācye yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28663: eśa vai saptadaśākṣaraś chandasyaḥ prajāpatiraṃryajño mantre vihitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28665: chandaḥśabdād akṣarasamūhe vartamānāt svārthe yat pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28678: sarvadeva-śabdābhyāṃ tātil pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye svārthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28685: śivādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ kare ity etasminn arthe tātil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28691: bhāve cārthe chandasi viṣaye śivādibhyaḥ tātil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28697: iti śrijayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:28704: prāg etasmāt krīta-saṃśabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ cha-pratyayasteṣv adhikṛto veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28712: tena prāk ṭhañaḥ chanḥ iti noktam //
GS24jvkasipu:28716: u-varṇāntāt prātipadikāt gava-ādibhyaś ca yat pratyayo bhavati prāk-krītiyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:28735: gavādiṣu nābhi nabha ca iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28737: nābhi-śabdo yat-pratyayam utpādayati nabhaṃ cādeśam āpadyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28742: nābhaye hitaṃ nābhyaṃ tailam iti bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:28743: gava-ādiṣu yatā sanniyukto nabhabhāvo 'tra na bhavati / go /
GS24jvkasipu:28752: śunaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ vā ca dīrghatvaṃ tatsaniyogena cāntodāttatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:28754: cakārasya anukta-samuccaya-arthatvāt nas taddhite iti lopo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:28764: kambalāt prākkrītīyeṣv artheṣu yat pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28771: havir-viśeṣa-vācibhyo 'pūpa-ādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ prakkrītīyeṣv artheṣu vibhāṣā yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28776: haviśśabdāt tu gavādiṣu paṭhān nityam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28800: tasmai iti caturthī-samarthād htam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28811: śarīra-avayava-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt yat pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28820: khala-ādibhyo yat pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28829: brāhmaṇebhyo hitam iti vākyam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28836: aja avi ity etābhyāṃ thyan pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28842: ātman viśvajana ity etābhyāṃ bhogottarapadāc ca prātipadikāt khaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28844: ātmann iti nalopo na kṛtaḥ prakṛti-parimāṇa-jñāpana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:28852: ṣaṣṭhī-samāsād bahuvrīheś ca cha eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28886: sarva-puruṣābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṇaḍañau pratyayau bhavataḥ tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28899: māṇavacaraka-śabdābhyāṃ khañ pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28907: vikṛti-vācinaḥ prātipādikāt prakṛtāv abhidheyāyāṃ yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28915: pratyayārthasya ca tadarthatve sati sāmarthyāl labhyā caturthī samarthavibhaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28918: aṅgārebhyo hitāni etāni kāṣṭhāni aṅgārīyāṇi kāṣṭhāni /
GS24jvkasipu:28925: prakṛtyantar anivṛttir atra vivakṣitā na tādarthyam dhānānāṃ saktavaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:28937: na tu kośī tasya prakṛtir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28938: dvayor api prakṛti-vikṛtyor grahaṇe vivakṣitaḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvo labhyate // [469]
GS24jvkasipu:28941: chadir-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tadarthaṃ vikṛteḥ prakṛtau (*5,1.12)
GS24jvkasipu:28948: upadhīyate iti upadhiḥ rathāṅgaṃ aupadheyam api tad eva dāru //
GS24jvkasipu:28951: ṛṣabha upānaḥ ity rathāṅgaṃ aupadheyam api etābhyāṃ ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tadarthaṃ vikṛṭeḥ prakṛtau (*5,1.12)
GS24jvkasipu:28956: carmaṇy api prakṛtitvena vivakṣite pūrvavipratiṣedhād ayam eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28961: carmaṇo yā vikṛtiḥ tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati tadarthaṃ vikṛteḥ prakṛtau (*5,1.12)
GS24jvkasipu:28966: tad asya tad asmin syād iti // PS_5,1.16 //
GS24jvkasipu:28973: saptamy-arthe tu pratyaya ity etāvān viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28974: prathamāsamarthāt ṣaṣṭhyarthe saptamyarthe ca yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28975: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ syāc cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28979: saptamyarthe khalv api - prākāro 'smin deśe syāt prākārīyo deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28983: iṣṭakānāṃ vahutvena tat sambhāvyate prākāra āsāmiṣṭakānāṃ syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28984: deśasya ca guṇena sambhāvyate prāsādo 'smin deśe syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28989: anekasmin pratyayārthe pratyekaṃ samarthavibhaktiḥ sambandhanīyā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28996: parikhāś-abdāt ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tad asya tad asmin syāt (*5,1.16)
GS24jvkasipu:29006: prāg etasmād vatisaṃ-śabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ṭhañ pratyayas teṣv adhikṛto viditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29014: ā etasmād arhasaṃśabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ṭhak pratyayas teṣv adhikṛto veditavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:29033: ūrdhvamānaṃ kilonmānaṃ parimāṇaṃ tu sarvataḥ āyāmastu pramāṇaṃ syāt saṅkhyā bāhyā tu sarvataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:29037: viṣkādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'samāse ṭhak pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:29048: atha kimartham asamāse ity ucyate yāvatā grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:29057: - dantyam, rājadantyam ity evamādi sidhdaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29058: ita uttaraṃ ca saṅkhyāpūrvapadānāṃ tadantavidhir iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29065: dviśūrpeṇa krītam iti tadantavidhi-pratiṣedhāt śūrpād añ anyatrasyām (*5,1.26)
GS24jvkasipu:29083: śata-śabdāt ṭhanyatau pratyayau bhavataḥ aśate 'dhidheye ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:29089: śatam eva vastutaḥ prakṛtyarthān na bhidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29093: vākyena hy atra pratyaya-arthasya tattvaṃ gamyate, na śrutyā /
GS24jvkasipu:29100: prāgvateḥ saṅkhyā-pūrvapadānāṃ tadantagrahaṇam aluki ity anayā iṣṭyā samāsād api prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:29104: saṅkhyāyā aty-antāyā aśad-antāyāś ca kan pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:29112: arthavatastiśabdasya grahaṇāḍ ḍateḥ paryudāso na bhavati, katikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:29117: vatoḥ parasya ano vā iḍ-āgamo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:29122: viṃśati-triṃśadbhyāṃ ḍvun pratyayo bhavati asañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:29137: kaṃsāṭ ṭiṭhan pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:29150: pratiśabdaś ca asya ādeśo vā vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29155: śūrpa-śabdād anyatarasyām añ pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:29161: śatamānādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:29170: adhyardha-śabdaḥ pūrvo yasmin tasmād adhyardhapūrvāt prātipadikad dvigoś ca parasya ārhīyasya lug bhavati asañjñāyāṃ iti kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:29174: pratyayāntasya viśeṣaṇam asañjñā-grahaṇaṃ na cet pratyayāntaṃ sañjñā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29182: adhyardhapūrvād dvigoś ca kārṣāpaṇa-sahasrāntāt uttarasya ārhīya-pratyayasya vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29197: alukpakṣe saṅkhyāyāḥ saṃvatsara-saṅkhyasya ca ity uttarapadavṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29211: dvitripūrvād dvigor niṣkāntāt ārhīya-pratyayasya vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29221: dvi-tri-pūrvād bistāntād dvigoḥ parasya ārhīya-pratyayasya vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29228: adhyardhapūrvāt prātipadikād dvigoś ca viṃśatika-śabdāntāt ārhīyeṣv artheṣu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29235: adhyardhapūrvad dvigoḥ ity eva adhyardhapūrvāt prātipadikād dvigoś ca khārī-śabdānatāt ārhīyeṣv artheṣu īkan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29249: adhyardhapūrvād dvigoś ca paṇ-apāda-māṣa-śata-śabdāntāt ārhīyeṣv artheṣu yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29256: padbhāvo na bhavati pad yaty-atadarthe (*6,3.53) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29268: śāṇa-śabdād adhyardhapūrvād dvigor ārhīyeṣv artheṣu vā yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29284: dvi-tri-pūrvāc chāṇāntāt prātipadikād ārhīyeṣv artheṣu aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29294: teṣām itaḥ prabhṛti samartha-vibhaktayaḥ pratyayārthāś ca nirdiśyante tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt krītam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29305: tena iti mūlyāt karaṇe tṛtīyā samartha-vibhaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29313: yatra tu prakṛtyarthasya saṅkhyābhedāvagame pramāṇam asti tatra dvivacana-bahuvacana-antād api pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29319: na hy ekena mudgena krayaḥ sambhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:29322: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt nimittam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29323: yat tan nimittaṃ saṃyogaś cet sa bhavati utpāto vā saṃyogaḥ sambandhaḥ prāṇināṃ śubhāśubhasūcakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29324: mahābhūta-pariṇāmaḥ utpātaḥ śatasya nimitta dhanapatinā saṃyogaḥ śatyaḥ, śatikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29326: utpataḥ khalv api - śatasya nimittaṃ utpātaḥ dakṣiṇākṣispandanam śatyam, śatikam /
GS24jvkasipu:29336: gośabdād dvyacaś ca prātipadikāt saṅkhyā-parimāṇa-aśvādivivarjitāt yat pratyayo bhavati tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga-utpātau (*5,1.38)
GS24jvkasipu:29339: goḥ nimittaṃ saṃyogaḥ utpāto vā gavyaḥ / [476]
GS24jvkasipu:29365: cakārād yat ca tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga+utpātau (*5,1.38)
GS24jvkasipu:29367: dvyacaḥ iti nitye yati prāpte vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:29368: putrasya nimittaṃ saṃyogaḥ utpāto vā putrīyam, putryam //
GS24jvkasipu:29371: sarvabhūmi-pṛthivī-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇañau pratyayu bhavataḥ tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga-utpātau (*5,1.38)
GS24jvkasipu:29374: sarvabhūmer nimittaṃ saṃyoga utpāto vā sārvabhaumaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29379: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthābhyāṃ sarvabhūmi-pṛthivī-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ īśvaraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29383: anyathā saṃyogotpātāv iva īśvaro 'pi pratyayārthasya nimittasya viśeṣaṇaṃ saṃbhāvyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:29386: tatra iti saptamīsamarthābhyāṃ sarvabhūmi-pṛthivī-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ viditaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29392: loka-sarvaloka-śabdābhyāṃ tatra iti saptamīsamarthābhyām viditaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29398: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād vāpaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29405: pātra-śabdāt ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati tasya vāpaḥ (*5,1.45)
GS24jvkasipu:29415: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asminn iti saptamyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29416: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ vṛddhyādi cet tad dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29417: dīyate ity ekavacanāntaṃ vṛddhyādibhiḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29418: tatra yad adhamarṇena uttamarṇāya mūladhanātiriktaṃ deyaṃ tad vṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29423: pañca asmin vṛddhir vā āyo vā lābho vā śulko vā upadā vā dīyate pañcakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29428: pañca asmai vṛddhir vā āyo vā lābho vā upadā vā dīyate pajcako devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29433: pūraṇa-vācinaḥ śabdāt ardha-śabdāc ca ṭhan pratyayo bhavati tad asmin vṛddhy-āya. lābhaśulka-upadā dīyate (*5,1.47)
GS24jvkasipu:29454: tad dharati vahavty āvahati bhārād vaṃśādibhyaḥ // PS_5,1.50 //
GS24jvkasipu:29456: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād dharaty-ādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29458: vaṃśādibhyaḥ paro yo bhāra-śabdaḥ tadantāt prātipadikāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29459: vaṃśabhāraṃ harati vahati āvahati vā vāṃśabhārikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29476: sūtrārthadvayam api ca+etad ācāryeṇa śiṣyāḥ pratipāditāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29494: vasna-dravya-śabdābhyām dvitīyāsamarthābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṭhan kan ity aitau pratyayau bhavato haratyādiṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:29500: tad iti dvitiyāsamarthāt sambhavatyādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29504: prasthaṃ sambhavati avaharati pacati vā prāsthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29514: āḍhaka-ācita-pātra-śadebhyo dvitīyāsamarthabhyo 'nyatarasyāṃ saṃbhavādiṣv artheṣu khaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29517: āḍhakaṃ saṃbhavati avaharati pacati vā āḍhakīnā, āḍhakikī /
GS24jvkasipu:29523: āḍhaka-ācita-pātra-antād dvigoḥ saṃbhavatyādiṣv artheṣu ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29526: vidhānasāmarthyād eva anayor luk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29527: ṭhañas tu pakṣe 'nujñātasya adhyardha-pūrva-dvigoḥ iti lug bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:29540: kulija-śabdānatād dvigoḥ saṃbhavatyādiṣv artheṣu lukkhau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29545: dve kulije saṃbhavati avaharati pacati vā dvikulijiki,
GS24jvkasipu:29554: sa iti prathamāsamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat prathamāsamartham aṃśavasnabhṛtayaś cet tā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29558: pañca aṃśo vasno vā bhṛtirvāsya pañcakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29563: tat iti prathamāsamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat prathamāsamarthaṃ parimāṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29574: samarthavibhaktiḥ pratyayārthaś ca pūrvasūtrād eva anuvartiṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:29579: punar vidhāna-sāmarthyād adhyardha-pūrvadvigor luk na bhavati // [480]
GS24jvkasipu:29584: saṅkhyā-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt parimāṇopādhikāt prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29589: saṅgha - pañca parimāṇam asya pañcakaḥ saṅghaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29591: sūtra - aṣṭau adhyāyāḥ parimāṇam asya sūtrasya aṣṭakaṃ pāṇinīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:29594: nanu ca adhyāyasamūhaḥ sūtrasaṅgha eva bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:29602: tasya saṅkhyāparimāṇaṃ pañcāvṛttayaḥ pañcavārāḥ pañca rūpāṇi asya adhyayanasya pañcakam adhyayanam /
GS24jvkasipu:29604: pañcadaśa mantrāḥ parimāṇam asya pañcadaśaḥ stomaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29616: yad iha lakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:29619: dvayor daśatoḥ vinbhāvaḥ śatiś ca pratyayaḥ dvau daśatau praimāṇam asya saṅghasya viṃśatiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29620: trayāṇāṃ daśatāṃ trinbhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29622: caturṇāṃ daśatāṃ catvārinbhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29624: pañcānāṃ daśatāṃ pañcābhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29629: saptānāṃ daśatāṃ saptabhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:29631: aṣṭānāṃ daśatām aśībhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca / [480]
GS24jvkasipu:29633: navānāṃ daśatāṃ navabhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:29635: daśanāṃ daśatāṃ śabhāvaḥ taś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29636: daśa daśataḥ parimāṇam asya saṅghasya śatam /
GS24jvkasipu:29640: tathā hi - paṅktiḥ iti kramasamniveśe 'pi vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:29643: na ca atra avayavārthaḥ kaścid asti /
GS24jvkasipu:29644: yā ca+eṣāṃ viṣayabhedena guṇa-mātre guṇini ca vṛttiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:29647: sahasrādayo 'py evaṃ jātiyakāḥ tadvad eva draṣṭavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29651: pañcat daśat ity etau nipātyete tad asya aprimāṇam ity asmin viṣaye varge 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:29662: saptan śabdāc chandasi viṣaye 'ñ pratyayo bhavati varge 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:29668: triṃśac-catvariṃśac-chabdābhyāṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ḍaṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya parimāṇam ity etasmin viṣaye brāhmaṇe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:29672: triṃśad-adhyāyāḥ parimāṇam eṣāṃ brāhamaṇānāṃ traiśāni brāhmaṇāni /
GS24jvkasipu:29677: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthād arhati ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29685: cheda-ādibhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyo nityam arhati ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29703: śīrṣaccheda-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthān nityam arhati ity asminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29711: daṇḍādibhyo dvitiyāsamarthebhyaḥ arhati ity asminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29731: prātipadikamātrāc chandasi viṣaye tad arhati ity asminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29738: pātra-śabdād ghan pratyayo bhavati cakārād yat ca,
GS24jvkasipu:29754: dakṣiṇaśabdasya alpāctarasya apūrvanipātena lakṣaṇavyabhicāracihnena yathāsaṅkhyābhāvaṃ sūcayati // [483]
GS24jvkasipu:29757: chayatau anuvarttete sthālībila-śabdāc chayatau pratyayau bhavataḥ tad arhati ity asminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29764: yajña-śabdād ṛtvik-śabdāc ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ gha-khañau pratyayau bhavataḥ tad arhati ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29772: ataḥ paraṃ prāgvatīyaḥ ṭhañ eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:29777: pārāyaṇa-adibhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ vartayati ity asminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29783: saṃśaya-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthāt āpannaḥ ity etasminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29787: yojana-śabdāt dvitīyāsamarthād gacchati ity asminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29792: tato 'bhigamanam arhati iti ca krośaśatayojanaśatayor upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:29797: pathin-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād gacchati ity asminn arthe ṣkan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29805: pathaḥ pantha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati ṇaś ca pratyayo nityaṃ gacchati ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29806: panthānaṃ nityaṃ gacchati pāntho bhikṣāṃ yācate /
GS24jvkasipu:29811: uttarapatha-śabdād tṛtīyāsamarthāt āhṛtam ity etasmin viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29836: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ kālāt ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:29842: kālāt ity adhikāraḥ vyuṣṭa-ādibhyo 'ṇ (*5,1.97) iti yāvat // [485]
GS24jvkasipu:29844: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt kāla-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt virvṛttam ity asminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29848: tam adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī // PS_5,1.80 //
GS24jvkasipu:29850: tam iti dvitīyāsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29861: nanu cādhyeṣaṇaṃ bharaṇaṃ ca muhūrtaṃ kriyate tena kathaṃ māso vyāpyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:29863: tatra phalabhūtayā kriyayā māso vyāpyamānas tābhyām eva vyāptaḥ ity ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:29866: māsa-śabdād vayasy abhidheye yatkhañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29868: adhīṣṭādīnāṃ caturṇām adhikāre 'pi sāmarthyād bhūta eva atra abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29874: māsāntād dvigor yap pratyayo bhavati vayasy abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:29880: ṣaṇmāsa-śabdād vayasy abhidheye ṇyat pratyayo bhavati, yap ca /
GS24jvkasipu:29889: ṣaṇmāsa-śabdād vayasy abhidheye ṭhaṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29895: samā-śabdād dvitīyāsmārthād adhīṣṭādiṣu artheṣu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29896: ṭhaño 'pavādaḥ samāmadhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā samīnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29903: samā-śabdāntād dvigoḥ nirvṛttādisu artheṣu pañcasu vā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29907: khena mukte pakṣe ṭhañ api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29914: rātri ahaḥ saṃvatsara ity evam antād dvigoḥ nirvṛttādiṣu artheṣu vā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29915: khena mukte pakṣe ṭhañ api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29930: varṣāntād dvigor nirvṛttādiṣv artheṣu vā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29943: cittavati pratyaya-arthe 'bhidheye varṣa-śabdāntād dvigor nirvṛttādiṣv artheṣu utpannasya pratyayasya nityaṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29952: ṣaṣṭirātra-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt kan pratyayo nipātyate pacyante ity etasminn arthe,
GS24jvkasipu:29959: vatsarāntāt prātipadikāt nivṛttādiṣv artheṣu chandasi viṣaye chanḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29974: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt parijayya,
GS24jvkasipu:29977: sukara ity eteṣv artheṣu ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29993: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29998: aparā vṛttiḥ - tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29999: yat tad asya iti nirdiṣṭaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30017: bhasyāḍhe iti puṃbadbhāvena ṅīpi nivṛtte nas taddhite (*6,4.144)
GS24jvkasipu:30022: aṣṭācatvāriṃśato ḍvuṃś ca ḍiniś ca vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30025: cāturmāsyānāṃ yalopaś ca ḍvuṃś ca ḍiniś ca vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30037: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyo yajñākhyebhyo dakṣiṇā ity etasminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30041: ākhyā-grahaṇam akālād api yajñavācino yathā sayāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30042: itarathā hi kālādhikārād ekāhadvādaśāhaprabhṛtaya eva yajñā gṛhyeran /
GS24jvkasipu:30045: tatra ca dīyate kāryaṃ bhavavat // PS_5,1.96 //
GS24jvkasipu:30047: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikād dīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:30048: kāryam ity etayor arthayor bhavavat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30070: kāryam ity etayor aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30096: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ yathākathāca-hasta-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṇa-yatau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30097: dīyate, kāryam ity etayor arthayoḥ pratyekam abhisambadhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:30115: karma-veṣa-śabdābhyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ yat pratyayo bhavati sampādini ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30121: tasmai iti caturthīsamarthebhyaḥ santāpādibhyaḥ prabhavati ity asmin viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30150: karman-śabdā ukañ pratyayo bhavati tasmai prabhavati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30157: samaya-śabdāt tat iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30158: yat tatprathamāsamarthaṃ prāptaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30165: ṛtu-śabdāt tad iti prathamāsamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prāptam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30172: ṛtu-śabdāc chandasi viṣaye ghas pratyayo bhavati tad asya prāptam ity asmin visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30177: kāla-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati tad asya prāptam ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30186: prakarṣe vartamānāt kālāt prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30193: tad iti prathamasamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣthyarthe ṭhañ prayayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30194: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ prayojanaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30199: viśākhā-ṣaḍhā-śabdābhyām aṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prayojanam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāsaṅkhyam mantha-daṇḍayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30207: anupravacanādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prayojanam ity asmin viṣaye ṭhaño 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30242: samāpana-śabdāt sapūrvapadāt vidyamānapūrvapadāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prayojanam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30255: iha mā bhūt, ekāgāraṃ prayojanam asya bhikṣoḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30257: ṅīb eva bhavati na ñitsvaraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30258: apare punar ikaṭ pratyayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca nipātayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:30273: tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ // PS_5,1.115 //
GS24jvkasipu:30275: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt tulyam ity etasminn arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30276: yat tulyaṃ kriyā cet sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30285: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāc ca iva-arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30288: ṣaṣthīsamarthāt - devadattasya iva devadattavat yajñādattasya gāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30292: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthāt arham ity etasminn arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30298: upasargāt sasādhane dhātvarthe vartamānāt svārthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30303: tasya iti ṣaṣthīsamarthād bhāvaḥ ity etasmninn arthe tavatalau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30312: ā etasmāt tvasaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:30320: karmaṇi ca vidhānārthaṃ guṇavacana-brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmaṇi ca (*5,1.124) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30329: te nañ-pūrvāt tatpuruṣāt na bhavanti caturādīn varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:30339: na asya paṭavaḥ santi iti apaṭuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:30352: pṛthu ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ imanic pratyayo bhavati vā tasya bhāvaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30398: varṇaviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo dṛḍha-ādibhyaś ca ṣyañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30434: guṇavacanedhyo brāhmaṇādibhyaś ca tasya iti ṣaṣthīsamarthebhyaḥ karmaṇyabhidheye ṣyañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30508: stona-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30518: sakhiśabdāt yaḥ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30527: kapi-jñāti-śabdābhyāṃ ḍhak prayayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30530: yathāsaṅkhyam arthayoḥ sarvatra+eva atra prakaraṇe na+iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:30533: patyantāt prātipadikāt purohitādibhyaś ca yak pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30571: prāṇabhṛjjātivācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vayovacanebhya udgātrādibhyaś ca añ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakramaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30591: hāyanāntebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ yuvādibhaś ca aṇ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30626: igantāc ca laghupūrvāt aṇ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30631: laghuḥ pūrvo yasmād ikaḥ tadantān prātipadikād ity ayam artho vivakṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30653: yakāropadhāt gurūpottamād vuñ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30664: dvandva-sañjñakebhyaḥ manojña-ādibhyaś ca vuñ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30694: gotravācinaḥ caranavācinaḥ ca prātipadikāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30703: gārgyatvena kaṭhatvena ca vikatthate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30706: gārgyatvena kaṭhatvena ca parānadhikṣipati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30709: gārgyatvaṃ kaṭhatvaṃ ca prāptaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30729: brahman-śabdād hotrāvācinaḥ tvaḥ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30732: na iti vaktavye tvavacanaṃ talo bādhanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:30737: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ______________________________________________________
GS24jvkasipu:30742: dhānyaviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyo bhavane 'bhidheye khañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30744: bhavanam iti bhavanti jāyante 'sminn iti bhavanam /
GS24jvkasipu:30749: tṛṇānāṃ bhavanaṃ kṣetram ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30755: vrīhi-śāli-śabdābhyāṃ ḍhak pratyayo bhavati bhavane kṣetre abhidheye khaño 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30760: yavādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo yat pratyayo bhavati bhavane kṣetre 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:30767: tila māṣa umā bhaṅgā aṇu ity etebhyaḥ vibhāṣā yat pratyayo bhavati bhavane kṣetre 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:30778: sarvacarman śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt kṛtaḥ ity asminn arthe kha-khañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30779: sarvaśabdaś ca atra pratyayārthena kṛtena sambadhyate, na carmaṇā /
GS24jvkasipu:30781: sarvaś carmaṇā kṛtaḥ ity etasmin vākyārthe vṛttiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30786: yathāmukha-śabdāt sammukha-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād darśanaḥ ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30787: dṛśyate 'smin iti darśanaḥ ādarśādiḥ pratibimbāśraya ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30796: sarva-ādeḥ prātipadikāt pathin aṅga karman patra pātra ity evam antād dvitīyāsamarthād vyāpnoti ity asminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30807: āprapada-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt prāpnoti ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30809: śarīreṇa asambaddhasya api paṭasya pramāṇam ākhyāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:30812: anupada-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ baddhā bhakṣayati neya ity eteṣv artheṣu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30819: pradakṣiṇaprasavyagāmināṃ śārāṇāṃ yasmin paraśāraiḥ padānāmasamāveśaḥ so 'yānayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30824: parovara parampara putrapautra ity etebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ anubhavati ity asmin arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30835: avārapāra atyanta anukāma ity etebhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ gāmī ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30854: garbhadhāraṇena sakalā 'pi samā vyāpyate iti atyantasaṃyoge dvitīyā /
GS24jvkasipu:30858: kecit tu samāyāṃ vijāyate iti vigṛhṇanti,
GS24jvkasipu:30859: garbhamocane tu vijanir vartate ity āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30862: anutpattāv uttarapadasya ca vā yalopo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30870: āvidūrye hi mūrdhanyo vidhīyate avāc ca ālambana-āvidūryayoḥ (*8,3.68) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30871: adya vā śvo vā vijāyate 'dyaśvīnā gauḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30873: kecit tu vijāyate iti na anuvartayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:30880: goḥ āṅpūrvād ā tasya goḥ pratipādanāt karmakāriṇi khaḥ pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30882: yo gavā bhṛtaḥ karma karoti ā tasya goḥ pratyarpaṇāt //
GS24jvkasipu:30886: anugu-śabdād alaṅgāmī ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30892: adhvan-śabdāt dvitīyāsamarthād alaṅgāmī ity etasminn arthe yat-khau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30900: abhyamitra-śadāt dvitīyāsamarthāt alaṅgāmī ity asminn arthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30910: goṣṭha-śabdād bhūtapūrvopādhikāt svārthe khañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30917: aśva-śabdād ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt ekāhagamaḥ ity etasminn arthe khañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30923: śālīna-kaupīna-śabdau nipātyete yathāsaṅkhyam adhṛṣṭe akārye ca abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:30928: kūpāvatāram arhati iti khañ pratyayaḥ uttarapadalopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30934: vrāta-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt jīvati ity asminn arthe khañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30949: yadā guṇapradhānaḥ sāptapadīna-śabdaḥ sakhibhāve tatkarmaṇi ca vartate tadā sakhya-śabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30950: yadā tu lakṣaṇayā vartate tadā puruṣeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:30955: tasya vikāre khañ pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:30962: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ pīlvādibhyaḥ karṇādibhyaś ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pāka-mūlayor arthayoḥ kuṇap jāhac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30992: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt pakṣa-śabdāt mūle 'bhidheye tiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30999: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt vittaḥ ity etasminn arthe cuñcup caṇap ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31005: vi nañ ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ nā nāñ ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31007: asahārthe pṛthagbhāve vartamānābhyāṃ vinañbhyāṃ savārthe nā-nāñau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31012: viśadāt śālac śaṅkaṭac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31017: paramārthatas tu guṇa-śabdā ete yathākathañcid vyutpādyante /
GS24jvkasipu:31021: sam pra ud ity etebhyaḥ kaṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31063: nāsikāyāḥ sambandhini nate abhidheye ṭiṭac nāṭac bhraṭac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31075: ni-śabdān nāsikāyā nate 'bhidheye biḍac birīsac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31082: inac piṭac cika ci ca // PS_5,2.33 //
GS24jvkasipu:31084: neḥ ity eva, nate nāsikāyāḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:31085: ni-śabdān nāsikāyā nate 'bhidheye inac piṭac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:31086: tatsaṃniyogena ca ni-śabdasya yathāsaṅkhyaṃ cika ci ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31090: tathā ca+uktam - inac-piṭac-kāścikacicikādeśāś ca vaktavyāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31092: klinnasya cil pil ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ laś ca pratyayo 'sya cakṣuṣī ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31103: upa adhi ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam āsannārūḍhayor vartamānābhhyāṃ svārthe tyakan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31107: pratyayasthāt kātpūrvasya iti itvam atra na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31112: karma-śabdāt saptamīsamarthād ghaṭaḥ ity etasminn arthe aṭhac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31115: tad asya sañjātaṃ tārakā-ādibhya itac // PS_5,2.36 //
GS24jvkasipu:31117: tad iti prathamāsamarthebhyas tārakā-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe itac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31119: tārakāḥ sañjātā asya nabhasaḥ tārakitaṃ nabhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31152: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe dvayasac daghnac mātrac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ pramāṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31158: prathamaś ca dvitiyaś ca ūrdhvamāne matau mama /
GS24jvkasipu:31175: tatra api dvigor lug eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:31176: dve diṣṭī syātāṃ vā na vā dvidiṣṭiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31186: pramāṇaparimāṇābhyāṃ saṅkhyāyāś ca api saṃśaye mātrac vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31204: puruṣahastibhyāṃ prathamāsamarthābhyāṃ pramāṇopādhikābhyām asya iti ṣaṣṭhyārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31225: yat-tad-etebhyaḥ prathamāsamarthebhyaḥ parimāṇopādhikebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe vatup pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31233: na tvā vāṃ anyo divyo na pīrthivo a jāto na janisyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31239: kim-idam-bhyām uttarasya vatupo vakārasya ghakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31242: etad eva cādeśavidhānaṃ jñāpakaṃ kimidambhyāṃ vatup-pratyayo bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31243: atha vā yogavibhāgena vatupaṃ vidhāya paścād vo gho vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:31247: saṅkhyāparimāṇe vartamānāt kimaḥ prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ḍatiḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31250: pṛcchyamānatvāt paricchedopādhikāyāṃ saṅkhyāyāṃ vartamānāt kimaḥ pratyayo vijñāyate / [508]
GS24jvkasipu:31251: kā saṅkhyā parimāṇam eṣāṃ brāhmaṇānām kati brāhmaṇāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:31253: atha vā saṅkhyā+eva parimāṇātmikā paricchedasvabhāvā gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:31257: yatra aparicchedakatvena vivakṣyate tatra mā bhūd iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31263: saṅkhyāyā avayave vartamānāyāḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe tayap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31264: avayavāvayavinaḥ sambandhinaḥ iti sāmarthyāt avayavī pratyayārtho vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31271: pūrveṇa vihitasya tayasya dvitribhyāṃ parasya vā ayajādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31277: trayī gatiḥ iti tayanibandhana īkāro na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:31285: ubha-śabdāt parasya tayapo nityam ayajādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31288: ubhaśabdo yati laukikī saṅkhyā tataḥ pūrveṇa+eva vihitasya tayapa ādeśavidhānārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:31290: tato yogavibhāgena tayapaṃ vidhāya tasya nityam ayajādeśo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31293: tad asminn adhikam iti daśāntāḍ ḍaḥ // PS_5,2.45 //
GS24jvkasipu:31295: tat iti prathamāsamarthāt asmin iti saptamyarthe daśāntāt prātipadikāt ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati yat tatprathamāsamartham adhikaṃ cet tad bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:31305: pratyayārthena ca samānajātīye prakṛtyarthe sati pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31306: ekādaśa kārṣāpaṇā adhikā asmin kārṣāpaṇaśate ekādaśaṃ kārṣāpanaśatam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31308: ekādaśa māṣā adhikā asmin kārṣāpaṇaśate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31316: sahasrāṇām vā śatam iti śatasahasram ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31319: yasya saṅkhyā tadādhikye ḍaḥ kartavyo mato mama //
GS24jvkasipu:31322: tad asminn adhikam ity anuvartate, ḍaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:31323: śadantāt prātipadikāt viṃśateś ca ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asminn adhikam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31325: śad-grahane 'nta-grahanaṃ pratyaya-grahaṇe yasmāt sa tadāder adhikārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:31329: iha mā bhūt, gotriṃśadadhikā asmin gośate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31335: iha mā bhūt, goviṃśatir adhikā 'smin gośate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:31338: tad asya ity anuvartate tad asya sañjātam ity ataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31339: tad iti prathamāsamarthāt saṅkhyāvācinaḥ prātipadikāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ guṇasya cen nimāne vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:31341: guṇo yena nimīyate mūlyabhūtena so 'pi sāmarthyād bhāga eva vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31342: yavānāṃ dvau bhāgau nimānam asya udaśvidbhāgasya dvimayamudaśvid yavānām /
GS24jvkasipu:31345: bhāge 'pi tu vidhīyāmānaḥ pratyayaḥ prādhānyena bhāgavantamācaṣṭe /
GS24jvkasipu:31349: dvau bhāgau yavānāṃ traya udaśvitaḥ iti / [510]
GS24jvkasipu:31350: bhūyasaś ca vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31353: bhūyasaḥ iti ca pratyayārthāt prakṛtyarthasya adhikyamātraṃ vivakṣitam /
GS24jvkasipu:31358: dvau bhāgau yavānām adhyardha udaśvitaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31360: nimeye vartamānāyāḥ saṅkhyāyā nimāne pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31361: udaśvito dvau bhāgau nimeyamasya yavabhāgasya dvimayā yavā udaśvitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31368: dviguṇaṃ pacyate tailaṃ kṣīreṇa ity atra mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:31371: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt saṅkhyāvācinaḥ prātipadikāt pūraṇe ity asminn arthe ḍaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31377: yasminn upasañjāte 'nyā saṅkhyā sampadyate sa pratyayārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31383: nakārāntāt saṅkhyāvācinaḥ prātipadikāt asaṃkhyādeḥ parasya ḍaṭo maḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31384: nāntāt iti pañcamī iṭa āgamasambandhe ṣaṣṭhīṃ prakalpayati /
GS24jvkasipu:31393: nāntād asaṅkhyādeḥ parasya ḍaṭaḥ chandasi viṣaye thaḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31403: ṣaṭ kati katipaya catur ity eṣāṃ ḍaṭi puratasthugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31405: tasya asmād eva jñāpakāt ḍaṭ pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31415: bahu pūga gana saṅgha ity eteṣāṃ ḍaṭi parataḥ tithugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31416: pūgasaṅghaśabdayor asaṅkhyātvādidam eva jñāpakaṃ ḍaṭo bhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:31432: dviśabdāt tīyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasya pūraṇe ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31437: triśabdāt tīyaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati tasya pūraṇe ity etad viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31441: halaḥ (*6,4.2.) iti saṃprasāraṇasya dīrghatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31442: aṇaḥ iti tatra anuvartate ḍhralope ity ataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31446: viṃśaty-ādibhyaḥ parasya ḍaṭaḥ tamaḍāgamo bhavaty anyatarasayām /
GS24jvkasipu:31458: evaṃ ca sati ṣaṣṭyādeś ca asaṅkhyādeḥ (*5,2.58)
GS24jvkasipu:31463: śatādibhyaḥ māsārdhamāsasaṃvatsaraśadebhyaś ca parasya ḍaṭo nityaṃ tamaḍāgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31465: tebhyo 'smād eva jñāpakāt ḍaṭ pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31478: ṣaṣṭyādeḥ saṅkhyāśabdād asaṅkhyādeḥ parasya ḍaṭo nityaṃ tamaḍāgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31489: prātipadikān matvarthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati sūkte sāmani ca abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:31504: matvarthe utpannasya chasya luk bhavati adhyāyānuvākayoḥ abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31518: vimuktādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe adhyāyānuvākayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31551: goṣadādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vun pratyayo bhavati matvarthe 'dhyāyānuvākayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31571: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt pathinśabdāt kuśalaḥ ity asminn arthe vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31577: ākarśādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ saptamīsamarthebhyaḥ kuśalaḥ ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31602: tatra ity eva, kan iti ca / [513]
GS24jvkasipu:31603: dhana-hiraṇya-śabdābhyāṃ tatra iti saptamīsamarthābhyāṃ kāme ity asminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31609: tatra ity eva, kan iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:31610: svāṅgavācibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tatra iti saptamīsamarthebhyaḥ prasite ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31621: udaraśabdāt saptamīsamarthāt prasite ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31624: yo bubhukṣayā 'tyantaṃ pīḍyate sa evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31629: kan pratyayaḥ ity eva svaryate, na ṭhak /
GS24jvkasipu:31631: sasya-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt parijātaḥ ity asminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31635: yasya kiñcid api vaiguṇyaṃ na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:31643: aṃśaśabdān nirdeśād eva dvitiyāsamarthād hārī ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31647: tatra ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhāt karmaṇi dvitīyā eva bhavati // [515]
GS24jvkasipu:31650: tantraśabdān nirdeśād eva pañcamīsamarthāt acirāpahṛte ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31657: brāhmaṇaka uṣṇika ity etau śabdau nipātyete kan pratyayāntau sañjñāyām viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31660: yatra ayudhajīvino brāhmaṇāḥ santi tatra brāhmaṇakaḥ iti sañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:31680: anuka abhika abhīka ity ete śabdāḥ kanpratyayāntā nipātyante kamitā ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31687: pārśvaśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthād anvicchati ity asminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31695: ayaḥśūla-daṇḍa-ajināhbyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyām anvicchati ity etasminn arthe ṭhakṭ-hañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31697: tena anvicchati āyaḥśūlikaḥ sāhasikaḥ ity arthaḥ dambho daṇḍājinam,
GS24jvkasipu:31700: tāvatithaṃ grahaṇam iti lug vā // PS_5,2.77 //
GS24jvkasipu:31705: pūraṇapratyayāntāt prātipadikāt grahaṇopādhikāt svārthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31707: dvitīyena rūpeṇa granthaṃ gṛhṇāti dvikaṃ grahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:31713: ṣaṣṭhena rūpeṇa granthaṃ gṛhṇāti ṣaṭko devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31721: sa iti prathamāsamarthāt eṣām iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe kan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31722: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ grāmaṇīś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31731: śṛṅkhala-śabdāt prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe kan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31732: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ bandhanaṃ ced tad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31733: yat tad asya iti nirdeṣṭaṃ karabhaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31738: yadyapi rajjvādikam api tatra asti tathāpi śṛṅkhalam asya asvatantrīkaraṇe bhavati sādhanam iti bandhanam ity ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:31744: uc-chabdāt sasādhanakriyāvacanāt tadvati kan pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31751: kālāt prayojanāc ca yathāyogaṃ samarthavibhaktiyuktāt roge 'bhidheye kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31762: tad asminn annaṃ prāye sañjñāyām // PS_5,2.82 //
GS24jvkasipu:31764: tat iti prathamāsamarthād asmin iti saptamyarthe kan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31765: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ annaṃ cet prāyaviṣayaṃ tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31768: guḍāpūpāḥ prāyeṇa annam asyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ guḍāpūpikā /
GS24jvkasipu:31781: śrotriyan iti nipātyate chando 'dhīte ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31788: bāgrahaṇam anuvartate tāvatithaṃ grahaṇam iti lug vā (*5,2.77) ity ataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31794: śrāddhaśabdād bhuktopādhikād anena ity asminn arthe iniṭhanau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31795: śrāddha-śabdaḥ karmanāmadheyam tat sādhanadravye vartitvā pratyayam utpādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:31799: adya bhukte śrāddhe śvaḥ śrāddhikaḥ iti mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:31803: na ca kriyām antareṇa kartā sambhavati iti yāṃ kāñcit kriyāmadhyāhṛtya pratyayo vidheyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31804: pūrvāt anena ity asminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31805: pūrvaṃ gatam anena pītam bhuktaṃ vā pūrvī,
GS24jvkasipu:31809: vidyamānaṃ pūrvaṃ yasmād iti sapūrvaṃ prātipadikam,
GS24jvkasipu:31811: sapūrvāt pratipadikāt pūrvaśabdāntāt anena ity asminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31814: sup supā iti samāsaṃ kṛtvā taddhita utpādyate /
