GS24jvkasipu:31819: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhir na asti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:31822: anena ity eva iṣṭādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ anena ity asminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31868: paripanthin pariparin ity etau śabdau chandasi viṣaye nipātyete,
GS24jvkasipu:31872: mā tvā paripanthino vidan mā tvā paripariṇo vidan //
GS24jvkasipu:31875: anupadī iti nipātyate anveṣṭā cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31891: kṣetriyac iti nipātyate parakṣetre cikitsyaḥ ity etasmin vākyārthe padavacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:31892: parakṣetrād tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt cikitsyaḥ ity etasminn arthe ghac pratyayaḥ paraśabdalopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31899: atha vā kṣetriyaṃ viṣam yat parakṣetre paraśarīre saṃkramayya cikitsate /
GS24jvkasipu:31900: atha vā kṣetriyāṇi tṛṇāni yāni sasyārthe kṣetre jātāni cikitsyāni nāśayitavyāni /
GS24jvkasipu:31909: indra-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt liṅgam ity etasminn arthe ghac-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31911: indra ātmā, sa cakṣurādinā karaṇena anumīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31927: vāśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyamāno vikalpānāṃ svātantryam darśayati //
GS24jvkasipu:31928: tad asya asty asminn iti matup // PS_5,2.94 //
GS24jvkasipu:31934: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya+iti ṣaṣṭhyārthe 'sminn iti saptamyarthe vā matup pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:31935: yat tat prathamāsamartham asti cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31936: astyarthopādhikaṃ ced tad bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31960: rasādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ matup pratyayo bhavati tad asya asty asmin ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31971: atha vā guṇāt iti atra paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31989: prāṇisthavācinaḥ śabdāt ākārāntāt lac pratyayo bhavaty anyatarasyāṃ matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31998: iha mā bhūt, cikīrṣā 'sya asti cikīrṣāvān,
GS24jvkasipu:32001: cakāraś cūḍālo 'sti ity atra svarito vānudatte padādau (*8,2.6)
GS24jvkasipu:32006: sidhmādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo lac pratyayo bhavaty anyatarasyāṃ matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32011: tasmāt akārāntebhyaḥ iniṭhanau pratyayau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32067: vatsāṃsaśabdābhyām lac pratyayo bhavati yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kāmavati balavati ca arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32070: vṛttiviṣaye vatsāṃsaśabdau svabhāvāt kāmabalayor vartamānau tadvati pratyayam utpādayataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32071: na hy atra vatsārthaḥ aṃsārtho vā vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32076: na ca ayam artho matupi sambhavati iti nityaṃ lajeva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32083: anyatarasyām grahaṇam matup samuccayārthaṃ sarvatra+eva anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:32087: lomādibhyaḥ pāmādibhyaḥ picchādibhyaś ca tribhyo gaṇebhyo yathāsaṅkhyaṃ śa na ilac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti matvarthe, matup ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32127: prajñā śraddhā arcā vṛtti ity etebhyaḥ ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati matubarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32135: tapaḥ-sahasra-śabdābhyāṃ vini ini ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32136: pratyayārthayos tu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sarvatra+eva asmin prakaraṇe nisyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32139: asantatvād adantatvāc ca siddhe pratyaye punar vacanam aṇā vakṣyamāṇena bādhā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32182: dantaśabdād unatopādhikād urac pratyayo bhavati mavarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32183: dantā unnatā asya santi danturaḥ unnata iti kim ? dantavān //
GS24jvkasipu:32186: ūṣa suṣi maṣka madhu ity etebhyo raḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32197: mukham asya asti iti sarvasmin vaktavye mukharaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32215: keśaśabdād vaḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:32216: nanu ca prakṛtam anyatarasyāṃ grahaṇam anuvartata eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:32246: gāṇdī ajaga ity etābhyāṃ vaḥ pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32249: hrasvād api bhavati gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32254: kāṇḍa aṇḍa ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam īrannīracau pratyayau bhavato matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32259: rajaḥ-prabhṛtibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ valac pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32274: danta-śikhā-śabdābhyāṃ balac pratyayo bhavati matvarthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32281: jyotsnādayaḥ śabdāḥ nipātyante matvarthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32282: jyotiṣa upadhālopo naś ca pratyayo nipātyate - jyotsnā candraprabhā /
GS24jvkasipu:32283: tamasa upadhāyā ikāro raś ca - tamisrā rātriḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32284: strītvamatantram anyatra api dṛśyate - tamisraṃ nabhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32289: malaśabdād inajīmasacau pratyayau nipātyete - malinaḥ, malīmasaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:32295: anyatarasyām ity adhikārān matub api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32300: ekākṣarāt kṛto jāteḥ saptamyāṃ ca na tau smṛtau /
GS24jvkasipu:32306: saptamyām - danḍā asyāṃ santi daṇḍavatī śālā iti / [525]
GS24jvkasipu:32307: itikaraṇo viṣayaniyamārthaḥ sarvatra sambadhyate ity uktam,
GS24jvkasipu:32315: vrīhyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ iniṭhanau pratyayau bhavato matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32319: na ca vrīhyādibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pratyayadvayam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32320: kiṃ tarhi ? śikhādibhya inirvācya ikan yavakhadādiṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:32322: śikhā mekhalā sañjñā balākā mālā vīṇā vaḍavā aṣṭakā patākā karman carman haṃsā ity etebhya inir eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32323: yavakhada kumārī nau ity etebhya ikann eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32328: evaṃ tarhi tundādisu vrīhigrahaṇam arthagrahaṇam vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32340: tundādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhya ilac pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32356: ekapūrvād gopūrvāc ca prātipadikān nityaṃ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32361: ata ity eva ekaviṃśatir asya asti iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32375: śatāntāt sahasrāntāt ca prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe tau cet śatasahasraśabdau niṣkāt parau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32378: suvarṇaniṣkaśatam asya asti iti anabhidhānān na bhavati // [526]
GS24jvkasipu:32382: āhatapraśaṃsāviśiṣṭārthe vartamānād rūpaśabdāt yap pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32386: praśastaṃ rūpam asya asti rūpyaḥ purusaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32387: nighātikātāḍanādinā dīnārādiṣu rūpaṃ yad utpadyate tad āhatamn ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32395: māyā medhā sraj ity etebhyaś ca viniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32401: māyāśabdād vrīhyādiṣu pāṭhāt iniṭhanau api bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32405: chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ viniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32442: vātaṃ na sahate iti vā vātūlaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32462: vācśabdāt prathamāsamarthād ālac āṭac ity etau pratyayau bhavato matvarthe bahubhāṣiṇi abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:32467: yo hi samyag bahu bhāṣate vāgmīty eva sa bhavati // [528]
GS24jvkasipu:32471: svaśadād aiśvaryavācino matvarthe āmin pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32472: svam asya asti iti aiśvaryam asya asti iti svāmī /
GS24jvkasipu:32478: arśas ity evam adibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo 'c pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32482: yatra abhinnarūpeṇa śabdena tadvato 'bhidhānaṃ tat sarvam iha draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:32502: tadviṣayebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ prāṇisthārthavācibhyaḥ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32521: vātātisārayor upatāpatvāt pūrveṇa+eva siddhe pratyaye kugartham eva+idaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:32532: pūraṇapratyayāntāt prātipadikāt iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe vayasi dyotye /
GS24jvkasipu:32533: pañcamo 'sya asti māsaḥ saṃvatsaro vā pañcamī uṣṭraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32543: sukha ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ iniḥ pratyayo niyamyate matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32581: varṇaśabdāt iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe samudāyena ced brahmacārī bhaṇyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32583: sa hi vidyāgrahaṇārtham upanīto brahama carati,
GS24jvkasipu:32590: puṣkara ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhya iniḥ pratyayo bhavati samudāyena ced deśo 'bhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32651: mannantāt prātipadikān maśabdāntāc ca iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe,
GS24jvkasipu:32661: kam śam iti makārāntau udkasukhayor vācakau,
GS24jvkasipu:32662: tābhyāṃ ba bha yus ti tu ta yas ity ete sapta pratyayā bhavanti matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32679: tundi bali vaṭi ity etebhyo bhaḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32696: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:32702: prāg etasmād dikṣaṃ śabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo vibhaktisañjñās te veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32707: tasilādīnāṃ vibhaktitve prayojanaṃ tyadādividhayaḥ idamo vibhaktisvaraś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32711: teṣu samarthādhikāraḥ prathamagrahaṇaṃ ca pratiyogyapekṣatvān na+upayujyate iti nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:32720: kimaḥ sarvanāmno bahuśabdāc ca prāgdiśaḥ pratyayāḥ veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32732: sarvanāmatvād eva siddhe kimo grahaṇam dvyādiparyudāsāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32740: idam iś ity ayam ādeśo bhavati prāg-diśīyeṣu pratyayeśu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32745: rephathakārādau prāg-diśīye pratyaye parataḥ idamaḥ eta-itau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32753: etadaḥ prāg-diśīye parataḥ aś ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32758: etado rathoḥ parata eta it ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32765: sarvasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati prāg-diśīye dakārādau pratyaye parato 'nyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:32782: tasya taseḥ kiṃsarvanāmabahubhyaḥ parasya tasilādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32790: pari abhi ity etābhyāṃ tasil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32818: kimaḥ saptamyanatād vā haḥ pratyayo bhavati chandasi visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32822: kutracidasya sā dūre kva brāhmaṇasya cāvakāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:32865: saptamyāḥ ity eva, kāle iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32866: idamaḥ saptamyantāt kāle vartamānāt rhil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32878: idamaḥ saptamyantāt kāle vartamānād dānīṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32882: tadaḥ saptamyantāt kāle vartamānād dā pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:32890: tayor idamaḥ tadaś ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dā-rhilau pratyayau bhavataś chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32900: kiṃsarvanāmabahubhyaḥ saptamyantebhyaḥ anadyatane kālaviśeṣe vartamānebhyaḥ rhil pratyayo bhavaty antarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:32906: sptamyāḥ iti kāle iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:32910: kālaviśeṣaḥ iti sarvam etan nipātanāl labhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32911: samānasya sabhāvo nipātyate dyaś ca pratyayaḥ ahany abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:32913: pūrvapūrvatarayoḥ parabhāvo nipātyate udārī ca pratyayau saṃvatsare 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:32916: idama iśbhāvaḥ samasaṇ pratyayaḥ nipātyate saṃvatsare 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:32937: saptamyāḥ iti kāle iti ca nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:32940: prakāravṛttibhyaḥ kiṃ-sarvanāma-bahubhyaḥ svārthe thāl pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32959: kiṃśabdād dhetau vartamānāt thā pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:32961: hetau tāvat - kathā grāmaṃ na pṛcchasi /
GS24jvkasipu:32962: kena hetunā na pṛcchasi ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32968: tebhyo dikśabdebhyo dig-deśa-kāleṣu vartamānebhyaḥ saptamī. pañcamī-prathamāntebhyaḥ astātiḥ pratyayo bhavati svārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32985: dikṣiṇa-uttarābhyāṃ dig-deśa-kāleṣu vartamānabhyāṃ saptamī-pañcamī-prathamāntābhyāṃ svārthe 'tasuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32987: dakṣiṇā-śabdaḥ kāle na sambhavati iti digdeśavṛttiḥ parigṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32997: para-avara-śabdābhyāṃ vibhāṣā atasuc pratyayo bhavati astāter arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:33012: añcatyantebhyo dikśabdebhya uttarasya astātipratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33024: upari upariṣṭat ity etau śabdau nipātyete astāterarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:33025: ūrdhvasya upabhāvaḥ rilriṣṭātilau ca pratyayau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:33036: aparasyāṃ diśi vasati paścād diśi vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:33039: dikpūrvapadasya aparasya paścabhāvo vaktavya ātiś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33069: uttara-adhara-dakṣiṇa-śabdebhyaḥ enap pratyayo bhavatyanatarasyām astāterarthe adūre ced avadhimānavadher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33125: uttara-śabdād ājāhī pratyayau bhavataḥ astāterarthe dūre ced avadhimānavadher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33139: tat saṃniogena ca+eṣām yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pur adḥ av ity ete ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:33153: astāti-pratyaye parataḥ purvādīnāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ purādaya ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:33166: avarasya astātau parato vibhāṣā av ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33175: saṅkhyāvācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vidhārthe vartamāṇebhyo dhā pratyayo bhavati svārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:33190: adhikaraṇavicāle gamyamāne saṅkhyāyāḥ svārthe dhā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33196: ekaśabdāt parasya dhā-pratyayasya dhyamuñ ādeśaḥ bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:33201: prakaraṇād eva labdhe punar dhā-grahaṇam vidhārthe vihitasya api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:33206: dvi-tryoḥ sambandhino dhā-prayayasya vidhārthe adhikaraṇavicāle ca vihitasya dhamuñ-ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:33215: dvi-tryoḥ sambandhino dhā-pratyayasya edhāc ādeśo bhavaty anyatrasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:33222: yāpye vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe pāśap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33233: tadantāt prātipadikād bhāge vartamānāt svārthe an pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33245: prāg ekādaśabhyaḥ saṅkhyāśabdebhyaḥ pūraṇapratyayāntebhyaḥ bhāge vartamānebhyaḥ svārthe 'n pratyayo bhavati acchandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:33259: ṣaṣṭha-aṣṭamabhyāṃ bhāge abhidheye acchandasi viṣaye ñaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33266: ṣaṣṭha-aṣṭamābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kan-lukau ca bhavato mānapaśvaṅgayor bhāgayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33267: ṣaṣṭhako bhāgo mānaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33268: aṣṭamo bhāgaḥ paśvaṅga cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33279: eka-śadād sahāya-vācinaḥ svārthe ākinic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33289: pūrva bhūtaḥ iti vigṛhya supsupeti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33292: bhūtapūrvatvaviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe caraṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33301: ṣaṣṭhyantāt pratyayavidhānāt saṃprati bhūtapūrvagrahaṇaṃ pratyayārthasya viśeṣaṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:33310: atiśāyanaviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe tamabiṣṭhanau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33319: yadā ca prakarṣavatāṃ punaḥ prakarṣo vivakṣyate tadātiśāyikāntād aparaḥ pratyayo bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:33320: devo vaḥ savitā prārpayatu śreṣṭhatamāya karmaṇe /
GS24jvkasipu:33324: tiṅantāt ca atiśāyane dyotye tamap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33326: ity adhikārāt tiṅo na prāpnoti iti idaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:33334: dvayor arthayor vacanaṃ dvivacanam vibhaktavyo vibhajyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33336: dvyarthe vibhajye ca+upapade prātipadikāt tiṅantāc ca atiśāyane tarabīyasunau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33354: guṇavacanād eva bhavatastau na anyasmād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33369: trantāc chandasi viṣaye ajadī pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33370: pūrveṇa guṇavacanād eva niyame kṛte chandasi prakṛtyantarāṇy abhyanujñāyante,
GS24jvkasipu:33374: bhasyāḍhe taddhite iti puṃvadbhāve kṛte turiṣṭhemeyaḥsu (*3,4.154)
GS24jvkasipu:33378: praśasya śabdasya śra ity ayam ādeśe bhavati ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33380: nanu ca praśasya śabdasya aguṇavacanatvād ajādī na sambhavataḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:33381: evaṃ tarhi ādeśavidhānasāmarthyāt tadviṣayo niyamo na pravartate,
GS24jvkasipu:33389: prakṛtyau kāc iti prakṛtibhāvat śraśabdasya ṭilopayasyetilopau na bhavataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:33392: praśasya śabdasya jya ity ayam ādeśo bhavati ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33401: vṛddha-śabdasya ca jya ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33402: tayoś ca sattvaṃ niyamābhāvena pūrvavaj jñāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33408: priyasthira ity ādinā vṛddhaśabdasya varṣādeśo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33414: antika-bāḍhayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ neda sādha ity etāv ādeśau bhavato 'jādyoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33422: ayam eṣām atiśayena bāḍham adhīte sadhiṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33424: ayam anayor atiśayena bāḍham adhīte sādhīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33428: yuva-alpa-śabdayoḥ kan ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyām ajadyoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33444: vino matupaś ca lug bhavati ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33445: idam eva vacanaṃ jñāpakam ajādis adbhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:33460: praśaṃsāviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe rūpap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33461: svārthikāś ca pratyayāḥ prakṛtyarthaviśeṣasya dyotakā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:33473: ekā ca kriyā iti rupappratyayāntād dvivacanabahuvacane na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33481: īṣadasamāptiviśeṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt kalpap deśya deśīyar ity ete pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:33491: vibhāṣā supo bahuc parastāt tu // PS_5,3.68 //
GS24jvkasipu:33493: īṣadasamāptiviśeṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt subantāt vibhaṣā bahuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33494: sa tu purastād eva bhavati, na parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33506: subantāt prakāraviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe jātīyar pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33516: prāk etasmād iva saṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ kapratyayas teṣu adhikṛto veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33522: tiṅaś ca (*5,3.56) ity anuvṛttam uttarasūtreṇa+eva sambandhanīm // [546]
GS24jvkasipu:33526: avyayānām sarvanāmnāṃ ca prāgivīyeṣv artheṣu akac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33527: sa ca prāk ṭeḥ, na parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33536: supaḥ iti dvayam api iha anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:33538: kvacit prātipadikasya prāk ṭeḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33551: sa ca mittvād antyāt acaḥ paro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33572: ajñātatvopādhike 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt tiṅantāc ca svārthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33573: svena rūpeṇa jñāte padārthe viśeṣarūpeṇa ajñāte pratyayavidhānam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:33574: kasya ayam aśvaḥ iti svasvāmisambandhena ajñāte aśve pratyayaḥ, aśvakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33577: evam anyatra api yathāyogam ajñātatā vijñeyā /
GS24jvkasipu:33588: kutsitasvopādhike 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33610: tasyā gamyamānāyāṃ subantāt tiṅantāc ca yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33620: nītau ca gamyamānāyāṃ tadyuktād anukampāyuktād yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33626: pūrveṇa pratyāsannānukampāsambandhāt anukampyamānād eva pratyayo vihitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33627: saṃprati vyavahitād api yathā syād iti vacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:33633: bahvacaḥ prātipadikāt manuṣyanāmadheyād vā ṭhac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33646: bahvaco manusyanāmno ghan ilac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33657: upaśabda ādiryasya tasmād upādeḥ prātipadikād bahvaco manusyanāmnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33659: cakārād ghanilacau pratyayau bhavataḥ ṭhac ca vā /
GS24jvkasipu:33671: jātiśabdo yo manusyanāmadheyo vyāghra siṃha ity evam ādiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:33672: tasmād anukampāyāṃ nītau ca kan-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33692: asmin prakaraṇe yaḥ ṭhaḥ ajādiś ca pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:33693: tasmin parataḥ prakṛter dvitīyād aca ūrdhvaṃ yac chabdarūpaṃ tasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33710: lopaḥ pūrvapadasya ca ṭhājādāvanajādau ca vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33713: vinā 'pi pratyayena pūrvottarapadayoḥ vibhāṣā lopo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33719: apratyaye tathā+eva+iṣṭa uvarṇāl la ilasya ca //
GS24jvkasipu:33720: dvitīyād aco lope sandhyakṣaradvitīyatve tadāder lopavacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:33731: śevalādīnāṃ manuṣyanāmnāṃ ṭhājādau pratyaye parataḥ tṛtīyād acaḥ ūrdhvasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33739: śevalādīnāṃ tṛtīyādaco lopaḥ sa cākṛtasandhīnām iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:33749: alpatvaviśiṣṭe arthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt yathāvihitaṃ patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33760: hrasvatvaviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33768: hrasvatvahetukā yā sañjñā tasyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ kan-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33778: kuṭī-śamī-śuṇḍābhyo hrasvārthe dyotye raḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33796: kāsū-goṇī-śabdābhyāṃ hrasvasve dyotye ṣṭarac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33806: vatsa ukṣan aśva ṛṣabha ity etebhyaḥ tanutve dyotye ṣṭarac-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33807: yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tasya tanutve pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33820: kiṃ-yat-tado nirdhāraṇe dvayor ekasya ḍatarac // PS_5,3.92 //
GS24jvkasipu:33822: kim yat tat ity etebhyaḥ prātipadikebhya dvayor ekasya nirdhāraṇe ḍataracpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33826: sañjñayā vā samudāyād ekadeśasya pṛthakkaraṇaṃ nirdhāraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:33846: bahunāṃ madhye ekasya nirdhārane gamyamāne jātiparipraśnaviṣayebhyaḥ kimādibhyaḥ vā ḍatamac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33863: kimo 'smin viṣaye ḍataram api icchanti kecit,
GS24jvkasipu:33869: ekaśabdāt prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ḍatarac ḍatamac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ svasmin viṣyae /
GS24jvkasipu:33886: yat punaḥ svayam eva kutsitaṃ tatra kutsite (*5,3.74)
GS24jvkasipu:33894: ivārthe yat prātipadikaṃ vartate tasmāt kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33906: iva ity anuvartate, kan iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33916: sañjñāyāṃ vihitasya kano manusye 'bhidheye lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33923: devapathāder ākṛtigaṇatvāt tasya+eva ayaṃ prapañco veditavyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:33926: jīvikārthaṃ yad apaṇyam tasminn abhidheye kano lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33943: vihitasya kano devapathādibhya uttarasya lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33977: vastiśabdād ivārthe dyotye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33992: śākhā ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ patpratyayo bhavati ivārthe śākheva śakhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34022: tad ity anena prakṛta ivārtho nirdeśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34023: ivārthaviṣayāt samāsād aparasminn ivārthe eva chanḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34034: tatra yo devadattasya dasyūnāṃ ca samāgamaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:34040: samāsaś ca ayam asmād eva jñāpakāt,
GS24jvkasipu:34041: na hy asya aparaṃ sakṣaṇam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:34046: śarkarā ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ivārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34094: pratna pūrva viśva ima ity etebhyaḥ ivārthe thālpratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34100: pūgavācinaḥ prātipadikāt agrāmaṇīpūrvāt svārthe ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34112: vrātavācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ca svārthe ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavaty astriyām /
GS24jvkasipu:34135: tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāt brāhmaṇarājanyavarjitāt svārthe ñyaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34160: vṛkaśadāt āyudhajīvinaḥ svārthe ṭeṇyaṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34170: dāmanyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ trigartaṣaṣṭhebhyaḥ ca āyudhajīvisaṅghavācibhyaḥ svārthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34171: yeṣām āyudhajīvināṃ saṅghānāṃ ṣaḍantavargās teṣām ca trigartaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34172: trigartaḥ ṣaṣṭho yeṣāṃ te trigartaṣaṣṭhāḥ ity ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:34204: parśvādibhyaḥ yaudheyādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ āyudhajīvisaṅghavācibhyaḥ svārthe 'ṇañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34238: abhijidādibhyo 'ṇantebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ svārthe yañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34261: tadrājapradeśāḥ - tadrājasya bahusu ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:34262: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:34264: pādaśatasya saṅkhyāder vīpsāyāṃ vun lopaś ca // PS_5,4.1 //
GS24jvkasipu:34266: pādaśatāntasya saṅkhyādeḥ prātipadikasya vīpsāyāṃ dyotyāyāṃ vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34268: yasya+iti lopena+eva siddhe punar vacanam anaimittikārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:34273: dvau dvau pādau dadāti dvipadikāṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:34274: dve dve śate dadāti dviśatikāṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:34277: svabhāvāc ca vunpratyayāntaṃ striyām eva vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:34292: daṇḍavyavasargayoḥ gamyamānayoḥ pādaśatāntasya prātipadikasya saṅkhyādeḥ vunpratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:34342: sāmivacane upapade ktāntāt kanpratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34350: evaṃ tarhi na+eva ayam anatyantagatau vihitasya kanaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:34354: etad eva jñāpakaṃ bhavati svārthe kan iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34357: etair hi bahutarakaṃ vyāpyate ity evam ādi,
GS24jvkasipu:34363: bṛhatīśabdād ācchādane vartamānāt svārthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34369: aṣaḍakṣa āśitaṅgu alagkarma alampuruṣa ity etebhyaḥ adhyuttarapadāt ca svārthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34374: yo dvābhyam eva kriyate na bahubhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34378: alampuruṣaḥ iti paryādayo glānadyarthe caturthyā iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34393: añcatyantāt prātipadikāt adikṣtriyāṃ vartamānāt svārthe vibhāṣā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34406: jātyantāt prātipadikāt bandhuni vartamānāt svārthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34407: badhyate 'smiñ jātiḥ iti bandhuśabdena dravyam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34416: sthānāntāt prātipadikāt vibhāṣā chaḥ pratyayo bhavati sasthānena cet sthānāntamarthavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34431: dvyor vibhāṣayor nityā vidhayaḥ iti pūrvatra nityavidhayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:34434: kima ekārāntāt tiṅantād avyayebhyaś ca yo vihito ghaḥ sa kimettiṅavyayaghaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:34436: yady api dravyasya svataḥ prakarṣo na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:34437: tathā api kriyāguṇasthaḥ prakarṣo yadā dravye upacaryate tadā 'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34452: kimettiṅavyayaghād adravyaprakarṣe amu pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34467: tadantāt svārthe añ pratyayo bhavati striyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34473: evaṃ tarhy etaj jñāpayati - svārthikāḥ pratyayā prakṛtito liṅgavacanānyativartante 'pi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34476: deva eva devatā ity evam ādi upapannaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:34480: vihitaḥ, tadantāt svārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34486: visārinśabdāt svārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati matsye 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:34492: saṅkhyāśabdebhyaḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane vartamānebhyaḥ svārthe kṛtvasuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34514: akriyamāṇe gaṇanagrahaṇe kriyābhyāvṛttau vartamānebhyaḥ saṅkhyeyavacanebhya eva pratyayaḥ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:34516: iha na syāt, śataṃ vārāṇāṃ bhuṅkte iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:34522: dvi tri catur ity etebhyaḥ saṅkhyāśabdebhyaḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane vartamānebhyaḥ suc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34530: ekaśabdasya sakṛt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati suc ca pratyayaḥ kriyāgaṇena /
GS24jvkasipu:34535: ekaḥ pākaḥ ity atra na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:34539: bahuśabdāt kriyābhyāvṛtigaṇane vartamānāt vibhāṣā dhā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34553: prathamāsamarthāt prakṛtopādhike 'rthe vartamānāt svārthe mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34559: tad iti prathamāsamarthāt prakṛtavacane 'bhidheye mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34568: bahusu prakṛteṣu ucyamānesu samūhavat pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:34575: dvitīye sūtrārthe - modakāḥ prakṛtāḥ asmin yajñe maudakiko yajñaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:34590: devatāśabdāntāt prātipadikāt caturthīsamarthāt tādarthe yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34600: pādārghaśabdābhyāṃ caturthīsamarthābhyāṃ tādarthye abhidheye yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34618: yaviṣṭha ity etebhyaḥ chandasi svārthe yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34665: atithiśabdāt caturthisamarthāt tādarthye abhidheye ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34678: yāva ity evam ādibhyaḥ svārthe kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34702: lohitaśabdāt maṇau vartamānāt svārthe kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34707: anitye varṇe vartamānāt lohitaśabdāt svārthe kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34730: kālaśabdāt anitye vartamānāt rakte ca kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34736: vinaya ity evam ādibhyaḥ svārthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34759: vyāhṛtaḥ prakāśito 'rtho yasyāstasyāṃ vāci vartamānād vācśabdāt svārthe ṭhakpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34768: tadabhidhāyinaḥ karmaśabdāt svārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34770: vācikaṃ śrutvā tathaiva yat karma kriyate tat kārmaṇam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34803: prajña ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ svārthe aṇpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34806: yasya astu prajñā vidyate sā prājñā prajñā-śraddhā-arcā-vṛttibhyo ṇaḥ (*5,2.101) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34810: ity ata eva jñāpakāt pākṣiko vasvādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34855: praśaṃsopādhike 'rthe vartamānān mṛcchabdāt sa sna ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34863: vṛka-jyeṣṭhābhyāṃ praśaṃsopādhike 'rthe vartamānābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam til-tātilau pratyayau bhavataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34869: bahvarthāt alpārthāc ca kārakābhidhāyinaḥ śabdāt śaspratyayo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:34886: yatra maṅgalaṃ gamyate tatra ayaṃ pratyaya isyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34891: saṅkhyāvācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ekavacanāc ca vīpsāyāṃ dyotyāyāṃ śaspratyayo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:34894: ekavacanāt khalv api - kārṣāpaṇaṃ kārṣāpaṇaṃ dadāti karṣāpaṇaśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34898: kārṣāpaṇādayaś ca parimāṇaśabdāḥ vṛttāvekārthā eva bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:34909: pratinā karmapravacanīyena yoge yā pañcamī vihitā tadantāt tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34922: apādāne yā pañcamī tasyāḥ pañcamyāḥ vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:34923: tac ced apādānaṃ hīyaruhoḥ sambandhi na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34935: kathaṃ mantro hīnaḥ svarato varṇato vā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34938: svareṇa varṇena vā hīnaḥ ity arthaḥ // [569]
GS24jvkasipu:34944: atigrahādiviṣaye yā tṛtīyā tadantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:34948: suṣṭhuvṛttavān anyān atikramya vṛttena gṛhyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34949: avyathane - vṛttena na vyathate vṛttato na vyathate /
GS24jvkasipu:34950: cāritreṇa na vyathate cāritrato na vyathate /
GS24jvkasipu:34960: hīyamānena pāpena ca yogo yasya tad vācinaḥ śabdāt parā yā tṛtīyā vibhaktir akartari tadantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34965: kṣepasya ca avivakṣāyāṃ tat tv ākhyāyām idam udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:34972: vyāśraye gamyamāne ṣaṣṭhyantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34983: tad vācinaḥ śabdād yā ṣaṣthī vibhaktiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:34984: tadantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati apanayane gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:34995: kāraṇasya vikārarūpeṇa abhūtasya tadātmanā bhāvaḥ abhūtatadbhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34997: sampadyakartari vartamānāt prātipadikāt abhūtatadbhāve gamyamāne kṛbhvastibhir dhātubhir yoge cviḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35019: aruḥprabhrtīnām antasya lopo bhavati cviś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35043: abhūtatadbhāve kṛbhvastiyoge sampadyakartari iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:35044: asmin viṣaye vibhāṣa sātiḥ prayayo bhavati kārtsnye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:35045: yadi prakrtiḥ kṛtsnāṃ vikārātmatāmāpadyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35057: abhividhau gamyamāne cviviṣaye sātiḥ pratyayo bhavati sampadā yoge,
GS24jvkasipu:35060: sa tu kṛbhvastibhir eva yoge bhavati, na sampadā /
GS24jvkasipu:35068: yatra+ekadeśena api sarvā prakṛtir vikāram āpadyate so 'bhividhiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:35069: yathā+asyāṃ senāyām utpātena sarvaṃ śastram agnisātsampadyate,
GS24jvkasipu:35071: kārtsnyaṃ tu sarvātmanā dravyasya vikārarūpāpattau bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:35081: svāmiviśeṣavācinaḥ prātipadikāt īśitavye 'bhidheye sātiḥ pratyayo bhavati kṛbhvastibhiḥ sampadā ca yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:35096: cakārāt sātiś ca kṛbhvastibhiḥ sampadā ca yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:35098: tad yadā teṣā samarpaṇena tadadhīnaṃ kriyate tadātrā pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35110: devādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ dvitīyāsaptamyantebhyaḥ trā pratyayo bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:35125: yatra dhvanāvakārādayo varṇā viśeṣarūpeṇa na vyajyante so 'vhyaktaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35129: yasya apakarṣe kriyamāṇe suṣṭhu nyūnamardhaṃ dvyackaṃ sampadyate,
GS24jvkasipu:35130: tasmād avyaktānukaraṇād anitiparāḍ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati / [572]
GS24jvkasipu:35132: yasya ca dvirvacane kṛte dvyajavarārdhaṃ tataḥ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35133: ḍāci bahulaṃ dve bhavataḥ iti viṣayasaptamī /
GS24jvkasipu:35134: ḍāci vivakṣite dvirvacanam eva pūrvaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:35160: dvitīya-tṛtīyādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ kṛṣāvabhidheyāyāṃ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:35163: dvitīyaṃ karṣaṇaṃ vilekhanaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35166: anulomakṛṣṭaṃ kṣetraṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ kṛṣati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35168: saha bījena vilehanaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35175: saṅkhyāvācinaḥ śabdasya gunaśabdo 'nte samīpe yatra sambhavati sā saṅkhyā guṇāntā ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35176: tādṛśāt prātipadikāt kṛṣāvabhidheyāyāṃ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:35177: dviguṇaṃ vilekhanaṃ karoti kṣetrasya dviguṇākaroti kṣetram /
GS24jvkasipu:35187: samayaśabdād yāpanāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:35196: sapatra-niṣpatra-śabdābhyām ativyathane ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge sati /
GS24jvkasipu:35199: sapatraṃ śaramasya śarīre praveśayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35208: niṣkulaśabdāt niṣkoṣane vartamānāt kṛño yoge ḍāc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35216: sukha-priya-śabdābhyām ānulomye vartamānābhyāṃ kṛño yoge ḍāc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35222: sukhaṃ priyaṃ vā kurvann apy ānulomye 'vasthita evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35229: duḥkhaśabdāt prātipadikāt prātilomye gamyamāne ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:35238: śūlaśabdāt pākaviṣaye ḍāc pratyayo bhavti kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:35245: satyaśabdāt aśapathe ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:35257: madraśabdāt parivāpaṇe ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:35268: āpādaparisamāpteḥ ye pratyayāḥ vihitās te samāsāntāvayavā ekadeśāḥ bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:35273: na avyayībhāvāt ity eṣa vidhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:35284: tatpuruṣe tulyārtha ity eṣa svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35291: yān śabdān upādāya samāsāntā vidhīyante rāja-ahaḥ-sakhibhyaṣ ṭac (*5,4.91)
GS24jvkasipu:35293: yadā te pūjanāt pūjanavacanāt pare bhavanti tadā samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35302: bahuvrīhau sakthyakṣṇoḥ ity evam ādau pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35309: kṣepe yaḥ kiṃśabdaḥ tataḥ parasya samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35320: nañaḥ pare vakṣyamāṇā ye rājādayas tadantāt tatpuruṣāt samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35329: tadantāt tatpuruṣāt samāsānto vibhāṣā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35334: saṅkhyeye yo bahuvrīhir vartate tasmād abahu-gaṇa-antāt ḍac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35335: saṅkhyayāvyayāsanna iti yo bahuvrīhiḥ tasya+idaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:35359: ṛk pur ap dhur pathin ity evam antānāṃ samāsānām akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati samāsānto 'kṣe na /
GS24jvkasipu:35362: akṣesambandhinī yā dhūḥ tadantasya na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35383: bahvṛkkaṃ sūktam ity atra na bhavati // [576]
GS24jvkasipu:35386: prati anu ava ity evaṃ pūrvāt sāmāntāt lomāntāt ca samāsād ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35394: godāvaryāś ca nadyāś ca saṅkhyāyā uttare yadi //
GS24jvkasipu:35401: bhūmer api saṅkhyāpūrvāyāḥ ac pratyaya iṣyate - dvibhūmaḥ prāsādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35403: daśabhūmakaṃ sutram anyatra api ca dṛśyate - padmanābhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35408: tad etat sarvam iha yogavibhāgaṃ kṛtvā sādhayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:35412: darśanād anyatra yo 'kṣiśabdaḥ tadantāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35428: samāse vyavasthā api nipātanād eva pratipattavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:35430: adṛśyāni avidyamānāni vā catvāri yasya so 'caturaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35459: niḥśreyaskaḥ puruṣaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35463: tato dvigū - dve āyuṣī samāhṛte dvyāyuṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:35467: tato dvandvaḥ - ṛk ca yajuś ca ṛgyajuṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:35484: brahmahastibhyāṃ paro yo varcaḥśabdas tadantāt samāsād ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35492: ava sam andha ity etebhyo yaḥ paraḥ tamasśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35498: śvasaḥ parau yau vasīyas-śreyas-śabdau tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35502: svabhāvāc ca+iha śvaḥśabdaḥ uttarapadārthasya praśaṃsāmāśīr viṣayām ācaśṭe,
GS24jvkasipu:35504: śobhanaṃ śreyas te bhūyāt ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35508: anu ava tapta ity etebhyaḥ paro yo rahasśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsād ac pratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35514: prateḥ paro ya urasśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:35532: dvistāvā tristāvā iti vediś ced abhidheyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35536: yāvatī prakṛtau vediḥ tato dviguṇā vā triguṇā vā kasyāṃcid vikṛtau tatra+idaṃ nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:35544: upasargāt paro yo 'dhvanśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35554: aṅguliśabdāntasya tatpuruṣasya saṅkhyādeḥ avyayādeś ca ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35568: aharādibhyaḥ paro yo rātriśabdaḥ tadantasya tatpuruṣasya ac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:35579: saṅkhyāvyāyadeḥ khalv api - dve rātrī samāhṛte dvirātraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35587: tasmin parabhūte ahan ity etasya ahnaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati etebhya uttarasya /
GS24jvkasipu:35603: saṅkhyādes tatpuruṣasya samāhāre vartamānasya ahaḥśabdasya ahnādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35610: taddhitārtha iti samāse kṛte aṇaḥ āgatasya dvigor lug anapatye (*4,1.88) iti luk //
GS24jvkasipu:35613: uttamaikābhyāṃ ca parasya ahnaḥ ity ayam ādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35615: puṇyagrahaṇam eva na kṛtam vaicitryārtham puṇyāhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35617: kecit tu upottamasya api pratipattyarthaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:35618: tena saṅkhyātaśabdād api parasya na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:35622: rājan ahan sakhi ity evam antāt prātipadikāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35632: laghvakṣarasya pūrvanipāte prāpte rājaśabdasya savarṇadīrghārthaṃ prathamaṃ prayogaṃ kurvann etad jñāpayati yasya akāreṇa savarṇadīrghatvaṃ sambhavati tasya+idaṃ grahaṇam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:35636: sa cet tapuruṣas taddhita-lug-viṣayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35645: ity āgatasya ārhīyasya ṭhako 'dhyardhapūrvād dvigoḥ iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:35669: anas aśman ayas saras ity evam antāt tatpurusāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati jātau sañjñāyān ca viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:35684: grāmakauṭābhyāṃ paro yaḥ takṣanśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35690: na kasya cit pratibaddhaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35694: atiśabdāt paraḥ yaḥ śvanśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35703: upamānavācī yaḥ śvanśabdo 'prāṇiṣu vartate tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35713: uttara mṛga pūrva ity etebhyaḥ paro yaḥ sakthiśabdaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:35715: tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35719: upamānāt khalv api - phalakam iva sakthi phalakasaktham //
GS24jvkasipu:35722: nauśabdāntāt dvigoḥ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35735: ardhaśabdāt paro yo nauśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35743: dvigoḥ, ardhac ca iti dvayam apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:35744: khārīśabdāntāt dvigor ardhāc ca paro yaḥ khārīśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:35751: dvitribhyāṃ paro yo 'ñjaliśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35763: annantāt asantāt ca napuṃsakaliṅgāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:35779: brahmanśabdānatāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsena ced brahmaṇo jānapadatvam ākhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35781: yasya tatpruṣasya janapadaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ tasmād etat pratyayavidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:35789: kumahadbhyāṃ paro yo brahmā tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:35821: śarat ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ṭac pratyayo bhavati avyayībhāve /
GS24jvkasipu:35827: ye 'tra jñayantaḥ paṭhyante teṣāṃ nityārthaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:35856: annantād avyayībhāvāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35865: annantaṃ yad napuṃsakaṃ tadantād avyayībhāvāt anyatarasyāṃ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35872: nadī paurṇamāsī āgrahāyaṇī ity evam antād avyayībhāvāt anyatarasyāṃ ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35881: jñayantād avyayībhāvād anyatarasyām ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35886: giriśabdāntāt avyayībhāvāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati senakasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:35893: svāṅgavācī yaḥ sakthiśabdaḥ akṣiśabdaś ca tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ ṣac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35913: tatra yasmin pakṣe na asty udāttatvaṃ tatra ṅīpi sati udāttanivṛttisvarasya abhāvād anudāttaḥ śrūyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:35918: aṅguliśabdāntād bahuvrīheḥ ṣac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ dāruṇi samāsārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:35923: yasya tu dve aṅgulī pramāṇam dāruṇaḥ tatra taddhitārtha iti samāse iṛte tatpruṣasya aṅguleḥ ity acā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:35928: dvitribhyāṃ paro yo mūrdhanśabdaḥ tadantād bahuvrīheḥ ṣapratyayaḥ bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35937: pūraṇyanatāt pramāṇyantāt ca bhuvrīheḥ ap pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35938: kalyāṇī pañcamī āsāṃ rātrīṇāṃ tāḥ kalyāṇīpañcamā rātrayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35943: yatra anyapadārthe pūraṇī anupraviśati na kevalaṃ vartipadārtha eva,
GS24jvkasipu:35947: kalyāṇī pañcamī asmin pakṣe kalyāṇapañcamīkaḥ pakṣaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35949: mṛgo netā āsāṃ rātrīṇām mṛganetrā rātrayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35963: antar bahis ity etābhyāṃ paro yo lomanśabdaḥ tadantād bahuvrīheḥ ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35966: añ nāsikāyāḥ sañjñāyāṃ nasaṃ ca asthūlāt // PS_5,4.118 //
GS24jvkasipu:35971: na cet sthūlaśabdāt parā nāsikā bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35991: upasargāt paro yo nāsikāśabdaḥ tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ ac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:36002: anyad api ca ṭilopādikaṃ nipātanād eva siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:36014: nañ dus su ity etebhyaḥ parau yau hali-sakthi-śabdau tadantad bahuvrīher anyatarasyām ac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36030: nañ dus su ity etebhyaḥ parau yau prajā-medhā-śabdau tadantād bahuvrīheḥ nityam asic pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36039: evaṃ tarhi nityagrahaṇād anyatra api bhavati iti sūcyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36050: kevalād yo dharmaśabdaḥ tadantād bahuvrīheḥ anic pratyayo bhavati samāsantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36057: evaṃ tarhi kevalāt iti pūrvapadaṃ nirdiśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:36058: kevalāt padād yo dharmaśabdo na padasamudāyāt,
GS24jvkasipu:36062: bahuvrīhau samāse svādibhyaḥ paraṃ jambhā iti kṛtasamāsāntam uttarapadaṃ nipātyate jambhaśabdaḥ abhyavahāryavacī dantaviśeṣavācī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36069: soma iva jambhaḥ asya iti vigrahītavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36074: dakṣiṇermā iti kṛtasmāsāntaḥ nipātyate bahuvrīhau samāse lubdhayoge /
GS24jvkasipu:36077: dakṣiṇam aṅgaṃ vraṇitam asya vyādhena ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36082: karmavyatihāre yo bahuvrīhiḥ tasmād ic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36085: keśesu keśesu gṛhītvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ keśākeśi /
GS24jvkasipu:36087: mṛsalaiś ca musalaiś ca prahṛtya idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ musalāmusali /
GS24jvkasipu:36092: dvidaṇḍyādayaḥ śabdāḥ ic pratyayāntāḥ sādhavo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36093: dvidaṇḍyādibhyaḥ iti tādarthye eṣā caturthī, na pañcamī /
GS24jvkasipu:36094: dvidaṇḍyādyartham ic pratyayo bhavati tathā bhavati yathā dvidaṇḍyādayaḥ siddyanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36102: prohya pādau hastinaṃ vāhayati prodyapādi hastinaṃ vāhayati /
GS24jvkasipu:36128: pra sam ity etābhyām uttarasya jānuśabdasya jñurādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau /
GS24jvkasipu:36133: ūrdhvaśabdād uttarasya jānuśabdasya vibhāṣā jñuḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36138: ūdhasśabdāntasya bahuvrīheḥ anaṅ ādeśo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36139: kuṇḍam iva ūdhaḥ asyāḥ sā kuṇdodhnī /
GS24jvkasipu:36153: dhanuḥśabdāntād bahuvrīher anḍādeśo vā bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:36166: ut pūti su surabhi ity etebhyaḥ parasya gandhaśabdasya ikārādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:36175: tena śobhanaḥ gandhaḥ asya sugandhaḥ āpaṇikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:36178: alpākhyāyāṃ yogandhaśabdaḥ tasya ikārādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:36185: upamānāt paro yo gandhaśabdaḥ tasya ikārādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:36192: upamānāt ihastyādivarjitāt parasya pādaśabdasya lopo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:36211: pādasya lopo bhavati kumbhapadyādiviṣaye yathā kumbhapadyādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36213: samudāyapāṭhasya ca prayojanaṃ viṣayaniyamaḥ - striyām eva,
GS24jvkasipu:36217: yac ca iha upamānapūrvaṃ saṅkhyāpūrvaṃ ca paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:36247: saṅkhyāpūrvasya supūrvasya ca bahuvrīheḥ pādaśabdāntasya lopo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36254: tasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati samāsāntaḥ vayasi gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:36259: śobhanā dantāḥ asya samastāḥ jātāḥ sudan kumāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36265: chandasi ca dantaśadasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati samāsāntaḥ bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:36270: striyām anyapadārthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye dantaśabdasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36277: śyāva aroka ity etābhyāṃ parasya dantaśabdasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā samāsānto bahuvrīhau /
GS24jvkasipu:36287: agrāntāt śabdāt śuddha śubhra vṛṣa varāha ity etebhyaś ca parasya dantaśabdasya vibhāṣā datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse
GS24jvkasipu:36303: kakudaśabdāntasya bahuvrīher lopo bhavati samāsāntaḥ avasthāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:36304: kālādikṛtā vastudharmā vayaḥprabhṛtayaḥ avasthā ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36319: trikakudi bahuvrīhau kakudaśabdasya lopaḥ samāsānto nipātyate parvate 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:36321: kakudākāraṃ parvatasya śṛṅgaṃ kakudam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36328: ut vi ity etābhyāṃ parasya kākudaśabdasya lopo bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:36334: pūrṇāt parasya kākudaśabdasya vibhāṣā lopo bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:36338: suhṛt durhṛt iti nipātyate yathāsaṅkhyaṃ mitra-amitrayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36339: suśabdāt parasya hṛdayaśabdasya hṛdbhāvo nipātyate bahuvrīhau,
GS24jvkasipu:36352: pumān anaḍvān payaḥ nauḥ lakṣmīḥ iti vibhaktyantāḥ paṭhyante,
GS24jvkasipu:36354: tatra+idaṃ prayojanam - ekavacanāntānām eva grahaṇam iha vijñāyeta,
GS24jvkasipu:36374: innantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo bhavati striyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:36375: bahavo daṇdinaḥ asyāṃ śālāyāṃ bahudaṇdikā śālā /
GS24jvkasipu:36386: nadyantāt bahuvrīheḥ ṛkārāntāt ca kap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36387: bahvyaḥ kumārya asmin deśe bahukumārīkaḥ deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36393: yasmād bahuvrīheḥ samāsānto na vihitaḥ sa śeṣaḥ tasmād vibhāṣā kap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36405: yāvatā vihito 'tra sāmānyena samāsāntaḥ ṛṣpūḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36408: anṛco māṇadako jñeyo bahvṛcaś caraṇākhyāyām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36414: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye bahuvrīhau samāse kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36420: īyasantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36432: vandite 'rthe yo bhrātṛśabdo vartate tadantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36440: ṛvarnāntād bahuvrīheḥ chandasi viṣaye kap pratyayo na bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:36447: svāṅge yau nāḍīt-antrī-śabdau tadantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36456: niṣpravāṇiḥ iti nadīlakṣaṇasya kapaḥ pratiṣedho nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36464: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ padaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:36471: prathamasya iti ca tritayam adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36472: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ prāk saṃprasāraṇavidhānāt tatra ekācaḥ prathamasya dve bhavataḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36474: tatra dhātor avayavayasya anabhyāsasya prathamasya+ekāco dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36480: eko 'c yasya so 'yam ekāc ity avayavena vigrahaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36482: abhyantaraś ca samudāye 'vayavo bhavati iti sāckasya+eva dvirvacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36483: evaṃ ca pac ity atra yena+eva acā samudāyaḥ ekāc,
GS24jvkasipu:36485: tatra pṛthag avayavaikāc na dvir ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:36490: iyāya, āra ity atra ekāctvam api vyapadeśibhāvād eva /
GS24jvkasipu:36493: tena sa eva śabdo dvir ucāryate,
GS24jvkasipu:36494: na ca śabdāntaraṃ tasya sthāne vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:36499: ac ādir yasya dhātoḥ tadavayavasya dvitīyasya ekāco dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36505: tasmin kṛte guṇe ca raparatve ca dvirvacane 'ci (*1,2.59)
GS24jvkasipu:36511: tathā hi - kṅinimittayor guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedho vidhīyamānaḥ śayitā ity atra na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:36512: na hi kāryiṇaḥ śīṅo guṇaṃ prati nimittabhāvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36513: atra kecid ajādeḥ iti karmadhārayāt pañcamīm icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36514: ac ca asau ādiś ca ity ajādiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:36515: tasmāt ajāder uttarasya ekāco dve bhavataḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36520: dvitīyasya ekāco 'vayavabhūtānāṃ ndrāṇāṃ tadantarbhāvāt prāptaṃ dvirvacanaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36521: nakāradakārarephā dvitīyaikāco 'vayavabhūtāḥ saṃyogādayo na dvir udyante /
GS24jvkasipu:36531: kecid ajādeḥ ity api pañcamyantaṃ karmadhārayam anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36534: ajāder anantaratvābhāvād dakāro dvir ucyata eva,
GS24jvkasipu:36540: yadā bakaropadha ubjir upadiśyate tadā ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36543: yakāraparasya rephasya pratiṣedho na bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36548: īrṣyates tṛtīyasya dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36552: apare punaḥ tṛtīyasya ekācaḥ iti vyācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:36554: kaṇḍvādīnāṃ tṛtīyasya+eakāco dve bhavata iti vaktvyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36557: vā nāmadhātūnāṃ tṛtīyasya+ekāc dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36560: apara āha - yathā+iṣṭaṃ nāmadhātuṣv iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36568: dve iti prathamantaṃ yad anuvartate tad arthād iha ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36569: tatra pratyāsatter asmin prakaraṇe ye dve vihite tayor yaḥ pūrvo 'vayavaḥ so 'bhyāsasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36580: ye eve vihite te ubhe api samudite abhyastasañjñe bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36585: nenijati ity atra abhyastānām ādiḥ iti samudāye udāttatvaṃ yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:36586: pratyekaṃ paryāyeṇa vā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36592: jakṣa ity ayaṃ dhātuḥ ity ādayaś ca anye ṣaṭ dhātavaḥ abhyastasañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36594: jakṣa bhakṣahasanyoḥ ity ataḥ prabhṛti vevīṅ vetinā tulye iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:36600: dīdhyate, vevyate ity atra abhyastānām ādiḥ ity eṣa svaraḥ prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:36601: dīdhyat iti ca śatari vyatyayena sampādite na abhyastāc chatuḥ (*7,1.78)
GS24jvkasipu:36607: tujer dīrgho 'bhyāsasya na vihitaḥ, dṛśyate ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36615: sa tūtāva dīrghaś ca+eṣāṃ chandasi pratyayaviśeṣe eva dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:36620: liṭi parato 'nabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya+ekāco dvitīyasya vā yathāyogaṃ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36624: vācya ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvaḥ iti vacanād ūrṇoteḥ ijādeḥ iti ām na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36628: sasṛvāṃso viśṛṇvire ima indrāya sunvire anabhyāsasya iti kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:36639: sanantasya yaṅantasya ca anabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya+ekāco dvitīyasya vā yathāyogaṃ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36653: ślau parataḥ anabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya+ekāco dvitiyasya vā yathāyogaṃ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36659: caṅi parato 'nabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya ekāco dvitīyasya vā yathāyogam dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36668: tathā ca sanvallaghuni caṅpare iti sanvadbhāvo vidhīyamāno hrasvasya sthānivadbhāvān na pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36669: yo hy anādiṣṭād acaḥ pūrvaḥ tasya vidhiṃ prati sthānivadbhāvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36670: na ca asmin kāryāṇāṃ krameṇāniṣṭād acaḥ pūrvo 'bhyāso bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36675: dāśvān sāhvān mīḍvān ity ete śadāḥ chandasi bhāṣāyām ca aviśeṣeṇa nipāyane /
GS24jvkasipu:36676: dāśvān iti dāśṛ dāne ity etasya dhātoḥ kvasau advirvacanam aniṭtvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36678: sāhvān iti ṣaha marṣaṇe ity etasya parasmaipadam,
GS24jvkasipu:36682: mīḍvān iti miha secane ity etasya advirvacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:36687: kṛñādīnāṃ ke dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36690: kṛñaḥ klideś ca ghañarthe kavidhānam iti kaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36692: carādīnāṃ dhātūnām api pratyaye parataḥ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36695: halādiśeṣe hi sayāgamasya ādeśasya ca viśeṣo na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:36704: vado manuṣyaḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36706: hanter aci pratyaye parato dve bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:36711: pāṭer ṇiluk cok ca dīrghaś ca abhyāsasya /
GS24jvkasipu:36712: pāṭer aci parato dve bhavato ṇiluk ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36713: abhyāsasya ca ūgāgamo dīrghaś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36717: putra pati ity etasyor uttarapadayos tatpuruṣe samāse ṣyaṅaḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36718: yaṇaḥ sthāne ig bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36728: tadantāt striyām aṇ-iñor annarṣayor gurūpattamayoḥ ṣyaṅ gotre (*4,1.78)
GS24jvkasipu:36729: iti ṣyaṅ, tataś ca api vihite ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:36739: kārīṣagandhyā patir asya grāmasya kārīṣagandhyāpatiḥ ayaṃ grāmaḥ / [599]
GS24jvkasipu:36740: ṣyaṅaḥ iti strīpratyayagrahaṇaṃ na strīpratyaye cānupasarjane iti pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣayā yasmāt sa vihitaḥ tadādeḥ ity eṣa niyamo na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:36751: ṣyaṅante ca yady apy anye yaṇaḥ santi,
GS24jvkasipu:36754: samprasāraṇam iti cādhikriyate vibhāṣā pareḥ (*6,1.44) iti yāvat // [599]
GS24jvkasipu:36758: bandhuśabde uttarapade bahuvrīhau samāse ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36771: ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati vibhāṣayā bahuvrīhāv eva /
GS24jvkasipu:36772: kārīṣagandhyā mātā asya ity evaṃ bahuvrīhau kṛte etasmād eva upasaṅkhyānāt pakṣe matṛśabdasya mātajādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36789: yajādayaḥ - yaja devapūjāsaṃgatikaranadānesu ity ataḥ prabhṛti āgaṇāntāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36790: teṣāṃ vacisv api yajādīnāṃ kiti pratyaye parataḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati / [600]
GS24jvkasipu:36825: bhrasja pāke ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ ṅīti pratyaye parataḥ cakārāt kati ca saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36835: halaḥ (*6,4.2) iti samprasāraṇadīrghe kṛte pvādīnāṃ iti hrasvaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36836: vayi - liṭi parataḥ veño vayiḥ ādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:36845: tatra yathā+eva sthānivadbhāvād vyervidhiḥ evaṃ pratiṣedho 'pi prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:36848: iti yakārasya saṃprasāraṇapratiṣedhād vayervidhau grahaṇaṃ pratiṣedhe cāgrahaṇamanumāsyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:36850: eṣa eva arthaḥ sākṣān nirdeśena vyeḥ spaṣṭīkriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36864: tena sarvatra añṇiti pratyaye samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:36873: tatra ṣtvaṃ prati natvasya siddhatvād jñalādir niṣṭhā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36874: kutve tu kartavye tad asiddham eva iti pravartate kutvam /
GS24jvkasipu:36894: ubhayeṣāṃ vacyādīnāṃ grahyādīnāṃ ca liṭi parato 'bhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36916: vṛścateḥ satyasati vā yoge na asti viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36917: yogārambhe tu sati yadi samprasāraṇam akṛtvā halādiśeṣeṇa repho nivartyate,
GS24jvkasipu:36919: atha rephasya samprasāraṇaṃ kṛtvā uradatvaṃ raparatvaṃ ca kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:36920: tadānī - muradatvasya sthānivadbhāvāt na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam (*6,1.37)
GS24jvkasipu:36921: iti pratiṣedho bhavati ity asti viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36926: kiti hi paratvād dhātoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānād dvirvacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:36928: adhikārād eva+ubhayeṣāṃ grahaṇe siddhe punar ubhayeṣām iti vacanaṃ halādiḥ śeṣam api bādhitvā samprasāraṇam eva yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36944: ṅiti iti kevalam iha anuvartate ity etad durvijñānam // [602]
GS24jvkasipu:36951: vyeñ saṃvaraṇe ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ yaṅi parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36959: vaśerdhātor yaṅi parataḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36967: cāyṛ pūjāniśāmanayoḥ ity etasya dhātoḥ yagi parataḥ kī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36973: sphāyī opyāyī vṛddhau ity asay dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ sphī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36977: sphātībhavati ity etad api ktinnantasya+eva rūpaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:36979: niṣṭhāyām ity etad adhīkrīyate liṅyaṅoś ca (*6,1.29)
GS24jvkasipu:36987: dvayor apy etayoḥ dhātvoḥ styārūpamāpannayoḥ sāmānyena grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:36988: styā ity asya prapūrvasya dhātor niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36999: prastyaḥ ity eva siddhe pūrvagrahaṇam iha api ythā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:37002: tat kathaṃ prapūrvasya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe bahuvrīhiḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:37003: praḥ pūrvo yasya dhātūpasargasamudāyasya sa prapūrvaḥ tadavayavasya styaḥ iti vyadhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyau /
GS24jvkasipu:37004: tatra prasaṃstītaḥ ity atra api prapūrvasamudāyāvayavaḥ styāśabdo bhavati // [603]
GS24jvkasipu:37008: sparśe vartamānasya śyaiṅ gatau ity asya dhātor niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37017: guṇamātre tadvati ca asya śītaśabdasya vṛttir draṣṭavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:37023: prater uttarasya śyāyater niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ samprasaraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37026: dravamūrtisparśābhyām anyatra api yathā syāt iti sūtrārambhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:37030: abhi ava ity evaṃ pūrvasya śyāyater niṣthāyāṃ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37045: samavaśyānam ity atra mā bhūt iti kecid vyacakṣate ,
GS24jvkasipu:37046: nakilāyam abhyavapūrvaḥ samudāyaḥ iti yo 'tra abhyavapūrvaḥ samudāyastadāśrayo viklapaḥ kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:37048: yadi tu na+iṣyate tato yatnānataramāstheyam asmād vihbāṣāvijñānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37054: śrā pāke ity etasya dhātoḥ ṇyantasya aṇyantasya ca pāke 'bhidheye ktapratyaye parataḥ śṛbhāvo nipātyate vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:37059: anyatra na bhavati śrāṇā yavāgūḥ śrapitā yavāgūḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37060: yadā api bāhye prayojake dvitīyo ṇic utpadyate tadā api niṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:37062: śrātir ayam akarmakaḥ karmakartṛviṣayasya pacer arthe vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:37064: tad atra dvayor api śṛtam iti iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37072: opyāyī vṛddhau ity asya dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyāṃ vibhāṣā pī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37086: pyāyaḥ pī (*6,1.28) ity etat caśabdena anukṛṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37087: liṭi yaṅi ca parataḥ pyāyaḥ pī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37089: paratvāt pībhāve kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt dvirvacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:37098: liṭi yaṅi ca śvayater dhātoḥ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37102: tad atra yaṅi samprasāraṇam aprāptaṃ vibhāṣa vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37103: liṭi tu kiti yajāditvāt nityaṃ prāptaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:37104: tatra sarvatravikalpo bhavati ity eṣā ubhayatravibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:37105: yadā ca dhātor na bhavati tadā liṭy abhyāsasya+ubhayeṣām (*6,1.17)
GS24jvkasipu:37111: sanpare caṅpare ca ṇau parataḥ śvayater dhātoḥ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37114: samprasāraṇaṃ samprasāraṇāśrayaṃ ca balīyo bhavati iti vacanād antaraṅgam api vṛddhyādikaṃ samprasāraṇena bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37115: kṛte tu saṃprasāraṇe vṛddhir āvādeśaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:37117: ity etad vacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ ṇau kṛtasthānivadbhāvasya,
GS24jvkasipu:37123: sanpare caṅpare ca nau parato hvaḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37130: samprasāraṇam iti vartamāne punaḥ samprasāraṇam ity uktaṃ vibhāṣā ity asya nivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:37131: hvaḥ samprasāraṇam abhyastasya ity ekayogena siddhe pṛthagyogakaranam anabhyastanimittapratyayavyavadhāne samprasāraṇābhāvajñāpanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:37140: tena abhyastakāraṇasya hvayatiḥ prāg eva dvirvacanāt samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37147: chandasi viṣaye hvayater dhātor bahulaṃ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37150: hveño laṭi ātmanepadottamaikavacane bahulaṃ chandasi iti śapo luki kṛte samprasāraṇamuvaṅādeśaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:37157: cāyater dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ kī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37165: apaspṛdhethām iti spardha saṅgharṣe ity asya laṅi āthāmi dvivarcanaṃ rephasya saṃprasāraṇam akāralopaś ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37168: apara āha - spardheḥ apapūrvasya liṅi āthāmi samprasaraṇam akāralopaś ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37174: arha pūjāyam ity anayor dhātvoliṭyusi samprasāraṇam akāralopaś ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37184: cyuṅ gatau ity asya dhātoḥ liti seśabde abhyāsaya samprasāraṇam aniṭ ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37188: tyaja hānau ity asay dhātoḥ liṭi abhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37192: śrīñ pāke ity etasya dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyāṃ śrābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37200: somād anyatra kvacid ekasminn api śrābhāvo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37202: tasya śrātāḥ iti bahuvacanasya avivakṣitatvād upasaṃgraho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37204: tasya+eva śrīṇāter āṅpūrvasya kvipi niṣṭhāyāṃ ca śīrādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:37211: samprasārane parataḥ pūrvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37215: ekayogalakṣanam api samprasāraṇam ata eva vacanāt prathamaṃ parasya yaṇaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:37217: samprasāraṇam iti vartamāne punaḥ samprasāranagrahaṇaṃ videśasthasya api samprasāraṇasya pratiṣedho yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37220: samprasāraṇagrahaṇasāmarthyāt eva pūrvasya pratiṣedhe vaktavye svarṇadīrghatvam ekādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37223: ṛci parataḥ treḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati uttarapadād ilopaś ca chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:37224: tisra ṛcaḥ yasmin tat tṛcaṃ sūktam /
GS24jvkasipu:37231: rayiśabdasya chandasi viṣaye matau parato bahulaṃ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37238: liṭi parato vayo yakārasya samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37241: vaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ kiti // PS_6,1.39 //
GS24jvkasipu:37243: asya vayo yakārasya kiti liṭi parato vakārādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:37251: veñ tantusantāne ity asya dhātoḥ liti parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37253: kiti yajāditvāt dhātoḥ prāptam akityapi liṭy abhyāsasya+ubhayeṣām (*6,1.17)
GS24jvkasipu:37259: lyapi ca parto veñaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37266: jyā vayohānau ity asya dhātoḥ lyapi parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37272: vyeñ saṃvaraṇe ity etasya dhātoḥ lyapi parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37278: lyapi ca vyaś ca iti anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:37279: parer uttarasya vyeñ ity etasya dhātoḥ lyapi parataḥ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37281: samprasāraṇe kṛte parapūrvatve ca hrasvasya iti tuka prāpnoti, sa halaḥ (*6,4.2)
GS24jvkasipu:37286: ejanto yo dhātur upadeśe tasya akārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:37302: śakāra id yasya so 'yaṃ śit iti,
GS24jvkasipu:37305: tatra yasmin vidhistadādāvalgrahaṇe iti śidādau pratyaye pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37308: tena etad āttvam anaimittikaṃ prāg eva pratyayotpatter bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:37314: ity evam ādi siddham bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37318: vyeñ ity etasya dhātoḥ liṭi parata ākārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37328: sphura sphula calane ity etayor dhātvoḥ ecaḥ sthāne ghañi parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37337: iṅ adhyayane ji jaye ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ ecaḥ sthāne ṇau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37344: ṣidhu hiṃsāsamrādhyoḥ ity asya dhātoḥ apāralaukike 'rthe vartamānasya ecaḥ sthāne ṇau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37350: atra hi sidhyatiḥ pāralaukike jñānaviśeṣe vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:37353: sa ca jñānaviśeṣaḥ utpannaḥ paraloke janmāntare phalam abhyudayalakṣaṇam upasaṃharan paralokaprayojano bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37359: na punaḥ siddhir eva iti na ātvaṃ paryudasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37360: sakṣāt paralokaprayojane ca sidhyarthe kṛtavakāśaṃ vacanam evaṃ viṣayaṃ na avagāhate /
GS24jvkasipu:37362: ṣidha gatyām ity asya bhauvādikasya nivṛttyarthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:37369: dīṅ kṣaye ity eteṣaṃ dhātūnāṃ lyapi viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:37370: cakārād ecaśca viṣaye upadeśe eva prāk pratyayotpatteḥ alo 'nyasya sthāne ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37383: upadeśe eva ātvavidhānād ivarṇāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37393: tayoḥ ubhayoḥ api yakā nirdeśaḥ smaryate /
GS24jvkasipu:37394: līyater dhatoḥ lyapi ca ecaśca viṣaye upadeśe eva alo 'ntyasya sthāne vibhāṣā ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37411: evaṃ ca pralambhanaśālīnīkaranayoś ca ṇau nityamāttvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:37417: khida dainye ity asya dhātoḥ ecaḥ sthāne chandasi viṣaye vibhāṣā ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37424: gurī udyamane ity asya dhātoḥ apapūrasya ṇamuli parataḥ ecaḥ sthāne vibhāṣā ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37429: asyapagoram yudhyante ity atra dvitīyāyāṃ ca (*3,4.56) iti ṇamul //
GS24jvkasipu:37432: ciñ sphura ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ ṇau parataḥ ecaḥ sthāne vibhāṣa ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37439: vī gatiprajanakāntyasanakhādaneṣu ity asya dhātoḥ prajane vartamānasya ṇau parataḥ vibhāṣā ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37452: tatra vartamānasya ñibhī bhaye ity asya dhātoḥ ṇau parataḥ vibhāṣā ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37461: libhiyoḥ īkārapraśleṣanirdeśād īkārāntasya bhiyaḥ ṣuk vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37471: ṣmiṅ īṣaddhasane ity asya dhātoḥ hetubhaye 'rthe ṇau parato nityamakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37478: na hi mukhye bhaye smayater vṛttir asti // [611]
GS24jvkasipu:37482: dṛśir prekṣaṇe ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ jñalādāvakiti pratyaye parataḥ am āgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37498: dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatprataye kāryavijñānād iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:37505: upadeśe 'nudāttasya dhātoḥ ṛkāropadhasya jñalādāvakiti pratyaye parato 'nyatarasyām amāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37517: vṛhū udyamane ity ayam udāttopadeśaḥ ūditvāccāsyeḍ vikalopyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37526: śīrṣan iti śabdāntaraṃ śiraḥśabdena samānārthaṃ chandasi viṣaye nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:37529: śīrṣṇā hi tatra somaṃ krītaṃ haranti /
GS24jvkasipu:37536: sa katham ? taddhite iti hi paraṃ nimittam upādīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:37538: yakārādau taddhite parataḥ śiraḥśabdasya śīrṣannādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37552: śjādau taddhite śirasaḥ śīrṣaśabdaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37558: hāstiśīrṣiśabdāt striyām iño 'ṇ-iñor anārṣayoḥ ṣyaṅādeśe kṛte śīrṣasya śiraḥśabdagrahaṇena grahaṇāt śīrṣannādeśaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:37559: tatra prakṛtibhāve sati hāstiśīrṣaṇyā ity aniṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37566: pāda danta nāsikā māsa hṛdaya niśā asṛj yūṣa doṣa yakṛt śakṛt udaka āsana ity eteṣāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:37567: śabdānāṃ sthāne śasprabhṛtipratyayeṣu parataḥ pad dat nas mās hṛd niś asan yūṣan
GS24jvkasipu:37568: doṣan yakan śakan udan āsan ity ete ādeśāḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37572: dat - yā dato dhāvate tasyai śyāvadan /
GS24jvkasipu:37589: tathā hi bhāṣāyām api padādayaḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante /
GS24jvkasipu:37595: śasprabhṛtiṣu iti prakārārthe prabhṛtiśabda iti śalā doṣaṇī ity atra api doṣannādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37597: māṃsa pṛtanā sānu ity eteṣāṃ sthāne yathāsaṅkhyam māṃs pṛt snu ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37602: na te divo na pṛthivyā adhisnuṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:37605: nāsikāyā nasbhāvo vaktavyaḥ yat tas kṣudra ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37614: dhātor ādeḥ ṣakārasya sthāne sakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37625: ity atra ṣatvavyavasthārtham ṣādayo dhātavaḥ kecid upadiṣṭāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37626: ke punas te ? ye tathā paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:37637: ṭeṣṭhīvyate iti ca abhyāsarūpaṃ dvidhā bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37641: dhātor āder ṇakārasya nakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37649: ity atra ṇatvavidher vyavasthārthaṃ ṇādayo dhātvaḥ kecid upadiṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:37650: ke punas te ? ye tathā paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:37656: dhatoḥ iti prakṛtaṃ yat tad dhātvādeḥ iti punar dhātugrahaṇān nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:37657: tena dhātor adhātośca vakārayakārayoḥ vali parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37675: verapṛktalopāt pūrvaṃ vali lopo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37678: vraścādīnām upadeśasāmarthyāt vali lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37680: vavṛśca ity atra api hi samprasāraṇahalādiḥśeṣayor bahiraṅgatvāt prāpnoti // [614]
GS24jvkasipu:37684: veḥ iti kvibādayo viśeṣān anubandhān utsṛjya sāmānyena gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:37703: tad iha laukikena arthavat karmasādhanaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37705: halantād, ṅyantād ābantāc ca dīrghāt paraṃ su ti si ity etad apṛktaṃ hal lupyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37718: bhṛño laṅi tipi ślau bhṛñāmit ity abhyāsasya ittvam /
GS24jvkasipu:37728: tipā sahacaritasya siśabdasya grahaṇāt sico grahaṇaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:37733: atha kimarthaṃ halantāt sutisināṃ lopo vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:37736: rājā, takṣā ity atra saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvān nalopo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37737: ukhāsrat, parṇadhvat ity atra apadantatvād dattvaṃ ca na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37740: abibhar bhavān ity atra tu rāt sasya (*8,3.24)
GS24jvkasipu:37741: iti niyamāl lopa eva na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37742: saṃyogāntasya lope hi nalopādir na sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:37743: rāttu te na+eva lopaḥ syād dhalas tasmād vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:37746: lopaḥ iti vartate, hal iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:37748: tathā ca pūrvasūtre punar apṛktagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:37749: eṅantāt prātipadikāt hrasvantāc ca paro hal lupyate sa cet sambuddher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37757: ami pūrvaḥ (*6,1.107) iti pūrvatve krte lahmātrasya makārasya lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37758: he katarat ity atra ḍidayam adḍādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:37759: tatra ṭilope sati hrasvābhāvān na asti sambuddhilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37763: śi ity etasya bahulaṃ chandasi viṣaye lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37770: piti kṛti parato hrasvāntasya dhātoḥ tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37782: grāmaṇi brāhmaṇakulam ity atra hrasvasya bahiraṅgasya asiddhatvāt tug na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37785: adhikāro 'yam anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158) iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:37786: prāg etasmat sūtrād ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ saṃhitāyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37794: chakāre parataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye hrasvasya tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37800: cicchiduḥ ity atra tuk abhyāsasya grahaṇena na gṛhyate iti haladiḥśeṣeṇa na nivartyate,
GS24jvkasipu:37804: tuk iti anuvartate, che iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:37806: māṅaś ca pratiṣedhavacanasya chakāre paratastugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37808: iti vikalpe prāpte nityaṃ tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37821: dīrghāt paro yaḥ chakāraḥ tasmin pūrvasya tasya+eva dīrghasya tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37829: padāntād dīrghāt paro yaḥ chakāraḥ tasmin pūrvasya tasya+eva dīrghasya pūrveṇa nityaṃ prāpto vā tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37833: viśvajanādīnāṃ chadasi vā tugāgamo bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37847: aci iti ca ayam adhikāraḥ saṃprasāraṇāc ca (*6,1.108) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:37850: ecaḥ sthāne aci parataḥ ay av āy āv ity ete ādeśāḥ yathāsaṅkhyam bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37860: yo 'yam ecaḥ syāne vantādeśaḥ okārasya av,
GS24jvkasipu:37875: gośabdasya yūtau parataḥ chandasi visaye vāntādeśo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37886: tasya yakārādau pratyaye parato vāntādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37895: iha na syāt gavyam, nāvyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37905: tannimittāvadhāraṇam mā bhūt iti tānimittasya hi dhātoś ca adhātoś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37911: kṣi ji ity etayor dhātvoḥ yati ratyaye parataḥ śakyārthe gamyamāne ekārasya ayādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37919: krīṇāteḥ dhātoḥ tadarthe krayārtheṃ yat tasminn abhidheye yati pratyaye parataḥ ayādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37928: bibheter dhātoḥ rapurvasya ca vī ity etasy yati pratyaye parataḥ chandasi viṣaye ayādeśaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37947: iti prāg etasmāt sūtrāt iti uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmas tatra pūrvasya parasya dvayor api sthāne ekādeśo bhavati ity etad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37949: tatra aci pūrvasya avarṇāt ca parasya sthāne eko guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37953: nobhe saptamīpañcamyau yugapat prakalpike bhavataḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37955: sthānibhedād dhi bhinnādiṣu natvavad dvāvādeśau syātām //
GS24jvkasipu:37961: iti yo 'yam ekādeśo vidhīyate sa pūrvasya antavad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:37963: yathā tasyāntaḥ ādir vā tadantarbhūtaḥ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:37965: brahmabandhūḥ ity atra brahmabandhu iti prātipadikam,
GS24jvkasipu:37967: tayoḥ prātipadikāprātipadikayor yaḥ ekādeśaḥ sa prātipadikasya antavad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:37971: tayoḥ subasupor ekādeśaḥ supaḥ ādivad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:37972: yathā śakyate vaktuṃ subantaṃ padam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37974: tathā hi khaṭvābhiḥ ity atra antavadbhāvābhāvāt ato bhisa ais (*7,1.9)
GS24jvkasipu:37976: hvayateḥ juhāva iti samprasāraṇapūrvatvasya ādivadbhāvāhāvāt āta au ṇalaḥ (*7,1.34)
GS24jvkasipu:37982: ity atra vidhau ādivan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37985: tatra avayavayor ānumānikaṃ sthānitvam iti tadāśrayaṃ kāryaṃ sthānivadbhāvād aprāptam ity antādivadbhāvo vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:37988: ṣatve tuki ca kartavye ekadeśo 'siddho bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:37993: iti ekādeśasya paraṃ pratyādivadbhāvāt apadāder iṇa uttarasya ādeśasya sakārasya ṣatvaṃ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:37997: yo 'smai ity ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt iṇaḥ iti ṣatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37999: preta ity atra+ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,1.71)
GS24jvkasipu:38008: ādguṇasya asiddhatvād hrasvalakṣaṇo nityo 'tra tuk prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:38015: avarnāt paro yo 'c ca pūrvo yo 'varṇaḥ tayoḥ pūrvaparayoḥ avarṇācoḥ sthāne eko guṇa ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38027: lṛkārasya sthāne yo 'ne yo 'ṇ tasya lapratvam iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:38033: tayoḥ pūrvaparayoḥ avarṇaicoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38045: vṛddhir eci iti vartate, āt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:38046: tad etat ejgrahaṇam eter eva viśeṣaṇaṃ ,
GS24jvkasipu:38050: iṇ gatau ity etasmin dhātau eci,
GS24jvkasipu:38051: edha vṛddhau ity etasmin ūṭhi ca pūrvaṃ yad avarṇaṃ tataś ca paro yo 'c,
GS24jvkasipu:38052: tayoḥ pūrvaparyoḥ avarṇācoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38063: om-āṅoś ca (*6,1.95) ity etat tu pararūpaṃ na bādhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:38064: yena na aprāpte yo vidhir ārabhyate sa tasya bādhako bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:38065: purastād apavādā anantarān vidhīn badhante iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:38102: tayoḥ pūrvaparayoḥ āḍacoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38118: avarṇāntād upasargāt ṛkārādau dhātau parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38126: pragatā ṛ cchakā asmād deśāt prarcchako deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38127: yatkriyāyuktāḥ prādayaḥ taṃ prati gatyupasargasañjñakāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38128: ṛti iti kim ? upa itaḥ upetaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38133: upasargagrahaṇād eva dhātugrahaṇe siddhe dhātugrahaṇaṃ śākalanivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:38134: ṛtyakaḥ (*6,1.128) iti hi śākalyasya prakrtibhāvaḥ prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:38137: āt ity eva, upasargāt ṛti dhātau iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:38138: subantāvayave dhātau ṛkārādau parataḥ avarṇāntāt upasargāt pūrvaparayoḥ āpiśaler ācāryasya matena vā vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38143: ṛkāralṛkārayoḥ sāvarṇyavidhiḥ iti ṛti iti lṛkāro 'pi gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38148: otaḥ ami śasi ca parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38155: tena nāprāptāyāṃ vṛddhau ayam ākāro vidhīyamānastāṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:38163: āt ity eva, upasargād dhātau iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:38164: avarṇāntāt upasargāt eṅādau dhātau pūrvaparayoḥ pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38173: tac ca vākyabhedena subdhātau vikalpaṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:38201: avarṇāntāt omi āṅi ca parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38205: āgi khalv api - ā ūḍhā oḍhā /
GS24jvkasipu:38212: adya arśyāt adyarśyāt iti akaḥ savarṇe dīrghatvaṃ bādhate //
GS24jvkasipu:38216: avarṇāt apadāntāt usi pūrvaparayoḥ ādguṇāpavādaḥ pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38229: akārāt apadantāt guṇe parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthane pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38233: pace, yaje ity atra vṛddhir eci iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:38243: tadanukaraṇaṃ parisphuṭavarṇam eva kenacit sādṛśyena tadavyaktam anukaroti,
GS24jvkasipu:38244: tasya yo atśabdaḥ tasmāt itau pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38256: iha mā bhūt, śrat iti śraditi /
GS24jvkasipu:38259: na āmreḍitasya anatyasya tu vā // PS_6,1.99 //
GS24jvkasipu:38261: avyaktānukaraṇasya āmreḍitasya yo atśabdaḥ itau tasya pararūpaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:38267: yadā tu samudāyānukaraṇaṃ tadā bhavaty eva pūrveṇa pararūpam,
GS24jvkasipu:38274: ḍācparaṃ yad amreditaṃ tasmin pūrvasya avyaktānukaranasya acchabdasya yo 'ntyaḥ takāraḥ tasya pūrvasya parasya cādyasya varṇasya nityaṃ pararūpam ekadeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38277: paṭad ity asmāt avyaktānukaraṇāt iti ḍāci vihite ḍāci bahulam iti dvirvacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:38281: akaḥ savarṇe aci parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne dīrgha ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38289: nājjhalau (*1,1.10) ity atra yat ac iti pratyāhāragrahaṇaṃ tatra grahaṇakaśāstrasya anabhinirvṛttatvāt savarṇā na gṛhyanta iti savarnatvamīkāraśakārayor apratiṣiddham /
GS24jvkasipu:38291: ṛti savarṇe parabhūte tatra ṛ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:38293: yadā na ṛ tadā dīrgha eva hotṝkāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38295: lṭti savarṇe parato lṛ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:38299: dīrghapakṣe tu samudāyāntaratamasya lṛvarṇasya dīrghasya abhāvāt ṛkāraḥ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:38305: tasyāṃ prathamāyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ ca vibhaktau aci akaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38312: ato guṇe (*6,1.97) iti yadakāre pararūpaṃ tat akaḥ savarṇe dīrghatvam eva bādhate,
GS24jvkasipu:38314: purastād apavāda anantarān vidhīn bādhante na+uttarāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38319: agnī ity atra pakṣe parasavarṇo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:38324: tasmāt pūrvasavarṇadīrghāt uttarasya śaso 'vayavasya sakārasya puṃsi nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38337: lummanuṣye iti kano lupi kṛte lupi yuktavad vyaktivacane (*1,2.5)
GS24jvkasipu:38360: dīrghāt jasi ici ca parataḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38367: dīrghāt chandasi viṣaye jasi ca ici ca parato vā pūrvasavarnadīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38377: ami paratoṭakaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarupam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38385: kumārīm ity atra hi trimātraḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:38387: ity eva, śamīṃ ca, śamyaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:38392: samprasāraṇāt aci parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38396: samprasaraṇavidhānasāmarthyāt vigṛhītasya śravaṇe prāpte pūrvatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38398: ity eva, mitro no atra varuṇo yajyamānaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38399: parapūrvatvavidhāne satyarthavat samprasāraṇavidhānam iti iṣṭa ity evam ādiṣu pūrvatvabhāve yaṇādeśo bhavatyeva /
GS24jvkasipu:38400: antaraṅge ca aci iṛtārthaṃ vacanam iti bāhye paścāt sannipatite pūrvatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38405: eṅ yaḥ padāntaḥ tasmād ati parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarūpam ekādśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38423: eṅaḥ iti vartate, ati iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:38424: eṅaḥ uttarayoḥ ṅasiṅasoḥ ati parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38433: ṛkārāntād uttarayoḥ ṅsiṅasoḥ ati parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ ukāra ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38436: dvayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭayoḥ sthāne yaḥ sa labhate 'nyataravyapadeśaṃ iti uraṇ raparaḥ (*1,1.51)
GS24jvkasipu:38437: iti raparatvam atra kṛtvā rāt sasya (*8,2.24)
GS24jvkasipu:38441: ṅasiṅasoḥ iti vartate, ut iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:38442: khyatyāt iti khiśabdakhīśabdayoḥ tiśabdatīśabdayoś ca kṛtayaṇādeśayor idaṃ grahaṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:38443: tābhyāṃ parasya ṅasiṅasoḥ ata ukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38448: khīśabdasya+udāharaṇam - saha khena vartate iti sakhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:38466: akārād aplutād uttarasya ro rephasya ukārānubandhaviśiṣṭasya akāre 'plute parata ukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38478: tasya api taparatvād atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38484: atra plutasya asiddhatvāt utvaṃ prāpnoti iti aplutād aplute iti ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:38487: haśi ca parataḥ ata uttarasya rorukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38497: antar iti avyayam adhikaranabhūtaṃ madhyam ācaṣṭe /
GS24jvkasipu:38500: avakārayakārapare ati parataḥ eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38515: kecid idaṃ sūtraṃ na antaḥpādam avyapare iti paṭhanti,
GS24jvkasipu:38516: te saṃhitāyām iha yad ucyate tasya sarvasya pratiṣedhaṃ varṇayanti // [627]
GS24jvkasipu:38519: avyāt avadyāt avakramuḥ avrata ayam avantu avasyu ity eteṣu vakāra-yakārapare 'py ati parataḥ antaḥpādam eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38529: uraḥśabdaḥ eṅantaḥ yajuṣi viṣaye ati rakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38533: te idam udāharanti uro antarikṣaṃ sajūḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38538: āpo juṣāṇo vṛṣṇo varṣiṣṭhe ity ete śabdāḥ ambe ambāle ity etau ca yāvambike śabdāt pūrvau yajuṣi paṭhitau te ati parataḥ prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:38548: aṅgaśabde ya eṅ tadādau cākāre yaḥ pūrvaḥ sa yajusi viṣaye ati prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38555: anudātte ca ati kavargadhakārapare parato yajusi viṣaye eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38566: avapathāḥśabde 'nudātte akārādau parato yajuṣi viṣaye eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38575: sarvatra chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca ati parato goḥ eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:38577: chandasi - apaśavo vā anye goaśvebhyaḥ paśavo goaśvān //
GS24jvkasipu:38581: aci ity etat tv anuvartata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:38582: aci parataḥ goḥ sphoṭāyanasya ācāryasya matena avaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38594: tena gavākṣaḥ ity atra nityam avaṅ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:38597: indraśabdasthe aci parato gornityam avaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38602: plutāś ca pragṛhyāś ca aci prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:38610: aci ity anuvartamāne punar ajgrahaṇam ādeśanimittasya aciḥ parigrahārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:38612: jānu u asya rujati jānvasya rujati /
GS24jvkasipu:38613: pragṛhyād ukārāt parasya akārasya savarṇadīrghatvaṃ pratyanimittatvād atra prakṛtibhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38615: plutapragṛhyāṇāṃ nityam ayam eva prakṛtibhāvo yathā syād,
GS24jvkasipu:38620: āṅo 'ci parataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ chandasi viṣaye 'nunāsikādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:38624: kecid āṅo 'nunāsikaś chandasi bahulam ity adhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38630: iko 'savarne aci parataḥ śākalyasya ācāryasya matena prakṛtyā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:38631: hrasvaś ca tasya ikaḥ sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38643: ārambhasāmarthyād eva hi yaṇādeśena saha vikalpaḥ siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38654: śākalyasya hrasvaś ca ity etad anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:38655: ṛkāre parataḥ śāklyasya ācāryasya matena akaḥ prakṛtyā bhavanti hrasvaś ca tasyakaḥ sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38673: apluta iti ucyamāne pluta eva pratiṣidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38675: pragṛhyāśraye prakṛtibhāve plutasya śravaṇaṃ na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:38679: ī3kāraḥ pluto 'ci parataḥ cākravarmaṇasya ācāryasya matena plutavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38685: tadupasthite nivṛttyartham anupasthite prāptyartham ity ubhayatravibhāṣā iyam /
