GS24jvkasipu:38686: īkārād anyatra apy ayam aplutavadbhāva iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38712: etattadau yāvakakārau nañsamāse na vartate tayor yaḥ suśabdaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:38715: tasya saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye hali parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38727: tanmadhyapatitastadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti rūpabhede 'pi sākackāvetattadāv eva bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38731: uttarapadārthapradhānatvānnañsamāsasya etattador eva atra sambaddhaḥ suśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38736: sya ity etasya chandasi hali parataḥ bahulaṃ sorlopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38737: uta sya vājī kṣipaṇiṃ turaṇyati grīvāyāṃ baddho api kakṣa āsani /
GS24jvkasipu:38738: eṣa sya te pavata indra somaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38743: saḥ ity etasya aci parataḥ sulopo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:38750: pādagrahaṇena atra ślokapādasya api grahaṇaṃ kecid icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:38752: saiṣa dāśarathī rāmaḥ saiṣa rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38753: saiṣa karṇo mahātyāgī saiṣā bhīmo mahābalaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:38756: adhikāro 'yam pāraskaraprabhṛtīnāṃ ca sañjñāyām (*6,1.175) iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:38757: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmastatra suṭ iti ,
GS24jvkasipu:38758: kāt pūrvaḥ iti ca+etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:38765: saṃskriyate iti saṃyogādilakṣaṇau iḍguṇau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38769: svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti vacanān na asti vyavadhānam saṃcaskaratuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:38777: aḍvyavāye, abhyāsavyavāye api suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38783: pūrvam dhātur upasargeṇa yujyate iti tatra dhātūpasargayoḥ karyam antaraṅgam iti pūrvaṃ suṭ kriyate paścād aṅabhyāsau ?
GS24jvkasipu:38785: tataḥ sakārād uttarāvaḍabhyāsau aniṣṭe deśe syātām /
GS24jvkasipu:38786: etasmiṃs tu satyata eva vacanāt kṛtayor aḍabhyāsayoḥ tadvyavāye api suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ kriyate iti siddham iṣṭaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:38789: sam pari upa ity etebhyaḥ bhuṣaṇārthe karotau parataḥ suṭ kāt pūrvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38793: atra saṃpuṃkānāṃ satvam iti samo makārasya sakāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:38808: tasmiṃś cārthe karotau samparyupebhyaḥ kāt pūrvaḥ suḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38815: sato guṇāntarādhānamādhikyāya vṛddhasya vā tādavasthyāya samīhā pratiyatnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38819: eteṣv artheṣu gamyamānesu karotau dhātau parataḥ upāt suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38830: upād uttarasmin kiratau dhātau lavanaviṣaye sut kat pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38840: upāt prateś ca uttarasmin kiratau suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati hiṃsayāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:38843: tathā te vṛṣala vikṣepo bhūyāt yathā hiṃsāmanubadhnāti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38849: apāt uttarasmin kiratau catuṣpācchakuniṣu yadālekhanaṃ tasmin visaye sut kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38857: iha mā bhūt, apakirati śvā odanapiṇḍamāśitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38861: kustumburūṇi iti suṭ nipātyate jātiś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38870: aparāsparā iti suṭ nipātyate kriyāsātatye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:38875: apare ca pare ca sakṛdeva gacchanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38886: tasya ca ṣatvaṃ sevite asevite pramāne ca viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:38888: gāvaḥ padyante yasmin deśe sa gobhiḥ sevito deśo goṣpadaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38890: asevite goṣpadaśabdo na sambhavati ity agoṣpadaśabdārthaṃ nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:38894: yatra tu sevitaprasaṅgo 'sti tatra+eva syād agoṣpadam iti,
GS24jvkasipu:38895: yatra tvatyantāsambhava eva tatra na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:38898: yāni hi mahāntyaraṇāni yeṣu gavām atyantāsambhavas tāny evam ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:38917: carerāṅi cāgurau iti yatpratyaye kṛte nipātanāt suṭ /
GS24jvkasipu:38934: apaskaraḥ iti nipātyate rathāṅgaṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38941: viṣkiraḥ iti kirateḥ vipūrvasya ig-upadha-jñā-prī-kiraḥ kaḥ (*3,1.135)
GS24jvkasipu:38942: iti kapratyaye vihite suṭ nipātyate śukuniś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38945: viṣkiro vā śakunau iti va grahaṇād eva suḍvikalpe siddhe vikiragrahaṇam iha tasya api śakuner anyatra prayogo ma bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:38948: candraśabde uttarapade hrasvāt paraḥ suḍāgamo bhavati mantravisaye /
GS24jvkasipu:38954: uttarapadaṃ samāsa eva bhavati iti prasiddham,
GS24jvkasipu:38960: kaśa gatiśāsanayoḥ ity etasya dhātoḥ pratipūrvasya pacādyaci kṛte suṭ nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:38962: grāmamadya pravekṣyāmi bhava me tvaṃ pratiṣkaśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38968: atra yady api kaśer eva kaśāśabdaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:38969: tathā api kaśer iti dhātor upādānaṃ tadupasargasya prateḥ pratipattyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:38973: praskaṇva hariścandra iti suṭ nipātyate ṛṣī ced abhidheyau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38981: maskara maskarin ity etau yathāsaṅkhyaṃ veṇau parivrājake ca nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:38990: kecit punar atra māṅi upapade karoteḥ karaṇe 'cpratyayam api nipātayantik māṅś ca hrasvatvam suṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:38991: mā kriyate yena pratiṣidhyate sa maskaro veṇuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38992: veṇugrahaṇaṃ ca pradarśanārtham anyatra api bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:38994: parivrājake api māṅi upapade karotestācchīlye inirnipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:38997: sa hy evam āha - mā kuruta karmāṇi śāntirvaḥ śreyasī iti //
GS24jvkasipu:39000: kāstīra ajastunda ity etau śabdau nipātyete nagare 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:39010: kāraskara iti suṭ nipātyate vrkṣaś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39011: kāraṃ karoti iti divāvibhāniśāprabhābhāskarānta iti ṭapratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39018: pāraskaraprabhṛtīni ca śabdarūpāṇi nipātyante sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:39029: sañjñāgrahaṇād upādhiparigrahe siddhe gaṇe coradevatāgrahaṇaṃ prapañcārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:39031: tumpatau dhātau praśabdāt paraḥ suṭ bhavati gavi kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:39039: yad uktaṃ prāyasya citicittayoḥ suḍaskāro vā iti tat saṅgṛhītaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:39043: yatra anyaḥ svaraḥ udāttaḥ svarito vā vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:39044: tatra anudāttaṃ padam ekaṃ varjayitvā bhavati ity etad upasthitaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39052: dhātor antyam acaṃ varjayitvā pariśiṣṭam anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39077: yo hi yasmin sati śiṣyate sa tasya bādhako bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39078: tathā hi - gopāyati ity atra dhātusvarāpavādaḥ pratyayasvaraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:39079: tena+eva dhātusvareṇa pratyayāntasya dhātoḥ satiśiṣṭatvād bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39080: kārṣṇottarāsaṅgaputraḥ ity atra ca samāsasvarāpavādo bahuvrihisvaraḥ satiśiṣṭena samāsāntodāttatvena vādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39081: vikaraṇasvaras tu satiśiṣṭo 'pi sārvadhātukasvaraṃ na bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:39082: lunītaḥ iti tasa eva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39086: vibhaktinimittasvarāc ca nañsvaro balīyān iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39091: devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklām iti vākye hi pratipadaṃ svaraḥpṛthag bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39092: parimāṇārthaṃ ca+idaṃ padagrahaṇam padādhikārasya nivṛttiṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:39093: tena prāg eva padavyapadeśāt svaravidhisamakālem eva śiṣṭasya anudāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39094: tathā ca kuvalyā vikāraḥ kauvalam ity atra anudāttādilakṣaṇo 'ñ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39095: tathā garbhiṇīśabdaś ca anudāttādilakṣaṇasya año bādhanarthaṃ bhikṣādiṣu paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39099: karṣater dhātor ākāravataś ca ghañantasyānta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39109: taudādikasya ghañantasya karṣaḥ ity ādyudāttaḥ eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:39112: uccha ity evam ādīnām anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39115: jalpaḥ ete ghañantāḥ iti ñitsvaraḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39120: yujer ghañantasya nipātanād aguṇatvaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣaye ca nipātanam idam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39121: kālaviśeṣe rathādyupakaraṇe ca yugaśabdasya prayogaḥ anyatra hi yogaḥ eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39128: halaś ca (*3,3.121) iti ghañantā ete karaṇo 'ntodāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39145: kecit tu bhāvagarhāyām ity atra api anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39152: yasminn anudātte parataḥ udātto lupyate tasya anudāttasyādirudātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39171: tasya yati titsvaritam iti svarite udātto lupyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:39176: antaḥ iti hi prakṛtatvād antasya syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:39201: citi pratyaye prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya anta udātta iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39212: param api ñitsvaraṃ bādhitvā 'ntodāttatvam eva yathā syād iti //
GS24jvkasipu:39229: iti vidhānāt jas eva labhyate iti jasgrahaṇam upasamastārtham eke icchanti atitistrau ity atra svaro mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:39234: catasrādeśe ādyudāttanipātanād yaṇādeśasya ca pūrvavidhau sthānivattvād ayaṃ svaro na bhavati catasraḥ paśya iti //
GS24jvkasipu:39238: tatra sau ya ekāc tasmat parā tṛtīyādir vibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39255: saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇād iha na bhavati tvayā, tvayi iti //
GS24jvkasipu:39262: nityasamāsād anyatrānityasamāse yad uttarapadam antodāttam ekācca tasmāt parā tṛtīyādir vibhaktir anyatarasyām udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39282: śvorjā ity atra+eva ayaṃ vidhiḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:39289: yas tu vigrahābhāvena nityasamāsas tatra bhavaty eva vikalpaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:39296: añceḥ parā asarvanāmasthānavibhaktir udāttā bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:39299: tṛtīyādiḥ iti vartamānen śaso 'pi parigrahārtham asarvanāmasthānagrahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:39304: ūṭḥ idam padādi ap pum rai div ity etebhyo 'sarvanāmasthānavibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39312: antodāttāt ity adhikārād anvādeśe na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:39315: ity evam ādayo niśparyantā iha gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:39343: ity asya apavādo vibhaktir eva+udāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39346: idam eva dīrghagrahaṇam aṣṭana āttvavikalpaṃ jñāpayati,
GS24jvkasipu:39349: svaraḥ paratvādanātvapakṣe ṣaṭsvareṇa bādhiṣyate iti kim dīrghagrahaṇena // [641]
GS24jvkasipu:39353: anum yaḥ śatṛpratyayas tadantāt parā nadī ajādir vibhaktir asarvanāmasthānam udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39364: atra apy upadeśāt iti lasārvadhātukād anudāttatve ekādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:39367: tasya pūrvatra asiddhatvam na+iṣyate iti śatrantam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39383: udāttasthāne yo yaṇ halapūrvas tasmāt parā nadī ajādir yā asarvanāmavidbhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39404: ūṅo dhātoś ca ya udāttayaṇ halapūrvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:39405: tasmāt parā tṛtīyādir vibhaktir na+udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39411: tena saha ya ekādeśaḥ so 'py udāttaḥ iti udāttayaṇvakāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:39412: tasmād udāttatve pratiṣiddhe udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:39417: kvibandtasya kṛduttarapadaprakṛtisvareṇa antodāttasya oḥ supi (*6,4.83) yaṇādeśaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:39421: hrasvāntād antodāttān nuṭaś ca paro matub udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39431: atra ca svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat ity eṣā paribhāṣā na aśrīyate nuḍgrahaṇāt,
GS24jvkasipu:39432: tena marutvān ity atra na bhavati / [642]
GS24jvkasipu:39443: tadantād antodāttād anyatarasyāṃ nām udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39461: ṅyantāt chandasi viṣaye nāmudātto bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:39471: tri catur ity etābhyāṃ ca parā halādir vibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39486: ṣaṭtricaturbhyo yā jñālādir vibhaktiḥ tadante pade upottamaṃ udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39499: ṣaṭ-tri-caturbhyo yā jhalādir vibhaktis tadante pade upottamam udāttaṃ bhavati vibhāṣā bhaṣāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:39506: go śvan, sāvavarṇaḥ sau prathamaikavacane yadavarṇāntam,
GS24jvkasipu:39507: rāḍ aṅ kruṅ kṛd ity etebhyo yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39518: sāvavarṇaḥ - sau prathamaikavacane yad avarṇāntaṃ tasya grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:39527: yatra asya nalopo na asti tatra pratiṣedho yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:39532: nalopaviṣaye tu bhavaty eva vibhakter udāttatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:39543: divaḥ parā jhalādir vibhaktiḥ na+udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39551: nṛ ity etasmāt parā jhalādir vibhaktiḥ anyatarasyāṃ na+udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39567: tāser anudātteto ṅito 'kārāntopadeśāc ca śabdāt paraṃ lasārvadhātukam anudāttaṃ ca bhavati hnuṅ iṅ ity etābhyāṃ paraṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:39582: yady atra muk akāramātrasya syāt tadā lasārvadhātukam adupadeśād anantaram iti siddho nighātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39584: tathā api lasārvadhātukānudāttatve kartavye bahiraṅgatvāt asiddhaḥ iti siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:39588: ṅidayaṃ śnuḥ pūrvasya kāryaṃ prati na tu parasya /
GS24jvkasipu:39614: sica ādyudāttatve 'niṭaḥ pitaḥ pakṣe udāttatvaṃ vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39622: lasārvadhātukagrahaṇaṃ yad anuvartate tad aci aniṭi iti sambandhād iha saptamyantam upajāyate svapādir āvṛtkaraṇāt /
GS24jvkasipu:39623: svapādīnāṃ hiṃseś ca ajādavaniṭi lasārvadhātuke parato 'nyatarasyām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39637: abhyastānām ajādāvaniti lasārvadhātuke parataḥ ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39648: ādiḥ iti vartamāne punar ādigrahaṇaṃ nityārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:39651: avidyamānodātte ca lasārvadhātuke parato 'bhyastānām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39668: pratyayalakṣaṇe 'py ayaṃ svara iṣyate sarvastomaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39674: bhī hrī bhṛ hu mada jana dhana daridrā jāgṛ ity eteṣāṃ abhyastānāṃ lasārvadhātuke piti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39680: madeḥ bahulaṃ chandasi iti vikaraṇasya śluḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39682: jana janane ity asya pañcame lakāre rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:39683: dhana dhānye ity asya pañcame lakāre dadhanat /
GS24jvkasipu:39708: ajantā ye upadeśe dhātavaḥ teṣāṃ kartṛyaki anyatarasyām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39713: yadā ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati tadā lasarvadhātukanighāte kṛte yaka eva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39725: seṭi thali iṭ vā udātto bhavati anto vā ādir vā anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:39728: tadā liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39731: liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam ity ayam eva svaro bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:39734: ñiti niti ca nityam ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39744: cañcāḥ ity atra yañi kani ca lupte na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:39758: tayoḥ sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39766: pathipriyaḥ ity atra pūrvapadaprakṛtisvareṇa antodāttaḥ pathiśabdaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:39775: ekavarjam iti vacanād yaugapadyaṃ na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:39799: vṛṣaḥ ity evam ādīnām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39807: gayaḥ ity atra gāyater nipātanād etvam /
GS24jvkasipu:39852: iti yaḥ kan, tasya lummanuṣye (*5,3.98) iti lup /
GS24jvkasipu:39853: yady evaṃ kim artham idam ucyate pratyayalakṣaṇena siddham ādyudāttatvam ?
GS24jvkasipu:39854: etad eva jñāpayati kvacid iha svaravidhau pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39862: niṣṭhāntaṃ dvyac sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ādyudāttaṃ bhavati sa ced ādirākāro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39878: śuṣka dhṛṣṭa ity etāv ādyudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39902: juṣṭa arpita iti śabdarūpe chandasi viṣaye vibhāṣā ādyudātte bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39909: juṣṭa arpita ity ete śabdarūpe mantraviṣaye nityam ādyudātte bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39913: kecid atra juṣṭa ity etad eva anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39916: tasmin sākaṃ triśatā na śaṅkavo 'rpitāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:39920: tayor ṅasi parataḥ ādiḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39927: ṅe ity etasmiṃś ca parato yuṣmadasmadoḥ ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39935: yat pratyayāntasya dvyaca ādir udātto bhavati na cen nauśabdāt paro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39947: īḍa vanda vṛ śaṃsa duha ity eteṣāṃ yo ṇyat tadantasya ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39953: dvyanubandhakatvāt ṇyato yad grahaṇena grahaṇaṃ na asti iti tit svaritam (*6,1.185)
GS24jvkasipu:39955: vāryam iti vṛṅ sambhaktau ity asya ayaṃ ṇyat /
GS24jvkasipu:39956: kyabvidhau hi vṛña eva grahaṇam iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:39959: veṇu indhāna ity etayoḥ vibhāṣā ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39962: veṇuśabdo 'yam ajivṛrībhyo nicca iti ṇupratyayānto nitvān nityam ādyudāttaḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39964: atha śānajantas tadā lasārvadhatuka-anudāttatve kṛte udāttanivṛttisvareṇa madhyodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39965: tad evam indhāne sarvathā aprāptam udāttatvaṃ pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39966: veṇur iva veṇuḥ ity upamānaṃ yadā sañjñā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:39971: tyāga rāga hāsa kuha śvaṭha kratha ity eteṣāṃ vibhāṣā ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39985: triprabhṛtīnām antyam uttamam tasya samīpe yat tad upottamam /
GS24jvkasipu:39996: na māṅyoge (*6,4.74) ity aṭi pratiṣiddhe hi ca (*8,1.34)
GS24jvkasipu:39997: iti nighāte 'dupadeśāt iti lasārvadhātukānudāttatve iṛte caṅa eva svare prāpte pakṣe dhātvakāra udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40002: matoḥ pūrvaḥ ākāra udātto bhavati tac cen matvantaṃ strīliṅge sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40026: na+evaṃ śakyam iha api syāt, rājavatī /
GS24jvkasipu:40027: svaravidhau nalopasya asiddhatvān na ayam avatīśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40031: īvatīśabdāntasya anta udāto bhavati striyāṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:40038: tasmin parataḥ pūrvasya anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40059: svaravidhau vyañjanamavidyamānavat iti halanteṣv apy antodāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40061: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya prathamāḥ pādaḥ // [652]
GS24jvkasipu:40065: pūrvapadagrahaṇaṃ atra pūrvapadasthe svare udātte svarite vā vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:40066: bahuvrīhau samāse pūrvapadasya yaḥ svaraḥ sa prakṛtyā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:40069: samāsāntodāttatve hi sati anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158)
GS24jvkasipu:40070: iti so 'nudāttaḥ syāt iti samāsāntodāttatvāpavādo 'yam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40076: yūpaśabdaḥ uṇādiṣu kusuyubhyaś ca iti papratyayāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40077: tatra ca dīrghaḥ iti niditi ca vartate tena ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40090: tena sarvānudātte pūrvapade vidhir eva na asti iti samāsāntodāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40094: tatpuruṣe samāse tulyārthaṃ tṛtīyāntaṃ saptamyantam upamānavāci avyayaṃ dvitīyāntaṃ kṛtyāntaṃ ca yat pūrvapadaṃ tat prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40110: śaṅkupūrvāl lāteḥ ghañarthe kavidhānam iti vā kapratyayāntaḥ śaṅkulāśabdo 'ntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40111: kiriśabdo 'pi kirateḥ kṝgṝśṝpṝkuṭi bhidicchidibhyaś ca iti ikārapratyayaḥ kidauṇādikaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:40128: kumudaśabdo 'pi kau modate iti mūlavibhujāditvāt kapratyayāntaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:40132: pacāditvād acpratyayāntaḥ tasya nyagrodhasya ca kevalasya (*7,3.5)
GS24jvkasipu:40133: iti nipātanād hakārasya dhakāro madhyodāttatvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:40168: varṇaṃ varṇavāci pūrvapadaṃ varnavāciṣv eva+uttarapadeṣū etaśabdavarjiteṣu paratas tatpuruṣe samase prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40174: lohitaśabdo 'pi ruheraśca lo vā iti itanprayayāntaḥ ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40183: pramāṇavācini tatpuruṣe samāse gādha lavaṇa ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40192: tatra śamerban iti banpratyayāntatvāc chambaśabda ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40195: aśvaśabdo aśūpruṣilaṭikaṇikhativiśibhyaḥ kvan iti kvanpratyayāntaḥ ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40196: pramāṇam iyattāparicchedamātram iha draṣṭavyaṃ na punarāyāma eva /
GS24jvkasipu:40203: tatpuruṣe samāse dāyādaśabde uttarapade dāyādyavāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40209: kṝpṝvṛjimandinidhāñbhyaḥ kyuḥ iti bahulavacanāt kevalād api dhāñaḥ kyuḥ pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:40213: yady evaṃ pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti samāsapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:40215: tasyas tu saptamī vidhīyamānā bādhikā mā vijñāyi iti punar abhyanujñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40221: tatpuruṣe samāse cirakṛcchrayor uttarapadayoḥ pratibandhivāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40228: gamanaṃ ca yacciraṃ ca iti viśeṣaṇasamāso 'yam,
GS24jvkasipu:40230: gamanaṃ hi kāraṇavikalatayā virakālabhāvi kṛcchrayogi vā pratibandhi jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40236: tadvācini tatpuruṣe samāse padaśabde uttarapade pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40248: nivātaśabde uttarapade vātatrāṇavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40254: niruddho vāto 'smin iti vā nivātam iti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40255: tatra kuḍyādihetuke nivāte kuḍyādayo vartamānāḥ samānādhikaraṇena nivātaśabdena saha samasyante /
GS24jvkasipu:40257: kuḍyaśabdo 'pi kavater yat ḍakkicca iti yatpratyayānta ādyudātta ity eke /
GS24jvkasipu:40266: anārtavavācini śāradaśabde uttarapade uttarapade tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40272: rajjuśadaḥ sṛjerasum ca iti upratyayāntaḥ ādilopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:40273: dhānye nit iti ca tatra vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:40275: dṛṣatśabdaḥ dṛṇāteḥ ṣuk hrasvaś ca iti adipratyayānto 'ntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40279: śaradi ṛtuviśeṣe bhavaṃ yat tad iha śāradam //
GS24jvkasipu:40282: adhvaryu kaṣāya ity etayoḥ jātivācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40289: tataḥ kaṭhena proktam iti vaiśampāyana-antevāsibhyaś ca (*4,3.104)
GS24jvkasipu:40290: iti ṇiniḥ, tasya kaṭha-carakāl luk (*4,3.107) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:40293: iti prakṛtibhāve prāpte nāntasya ṭilope sabrahmacāripīṭhasarpikalāpikauthumitaitilijājalila. aṅgaliśilāliśikhaṇḍisūkarasadmasuparvaṇām upasaṅkhyānam iti ṭilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40300: dauvārikaśabdo 'pi dvāri niyuktaḥ iti ṭhaki satyantodāttaḥ eva /
GS24jvkasipu:40306: sadṛśa pratirūpa ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ sādṛśyavācini tatpruṣe samāse pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40310: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsārthaṃ ca sadṛśagrahaṇam iha tadaluki ṣaṣṭhyāḥ prayojayati,
GS24jvkasipu:40313: atra dāsīvṛṣalīśabdayor antodāttatvād udāttayaṇo hal pūrvat (*6,1.174)
GS24jvkasipu:40323: dvigāv uttarapade pramaṇavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40326: saptaśamāḥ pramāṇam asya iti mātracaḥ utpannasya pramāṇe laḥ dvigor nityam iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:40327: prācyaś ca asau saptaśamaś ca prācyasaptaśamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40335: vāṇijaśabde uttarapade tatpuruṣe samāse gantavyavāci paṇyavāci ca pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40344: tatra kardamādīnāṃ ca iti pakṣe ādyudātto bhavati, dvitīyo vā /
GS24jvkasipu:40354: mātrā upajñā upakrama chāyā eteṣu uttarapadeṣu napuṃsakavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40358: tatra bhikṣāyās tulyapramāṇam iti asvapadavigrahaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40361: samudraśabdo 'pi phiṣi pāṭalāpālaṅkāmbāsāgarārthānām ity antodātta eva /
GS24jvkasipu:40366: tatra paṇino 'ptyam ity aṇantaḥ pāṇinaśabdaḥ pratyayasvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40385: upajñopakramāntasya tatpuruṣasya napuṃsakaliṅgatā upajñopakramaṃ tadādyācikhyāsāyām (*2,3.21) iti / [657]
GS24jvkasipu:40389: tatra ca dhānye nit iti vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:40391: dhanuḥ śabdo 'pi nabviṣayasya anisantasya ity ādyudātta eva /
GS24jvkasipu:40399: sukha priya ity etayor uttarapadyor hitavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40408: tad dhi hitaṃ yad āyatyaṃ prītiṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:40415: prītau gamayamānāyāṃ sukha priya ity etayoḥ uttapadayoḥ tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40427: svāmiśabde uttarapade tatpuruṣe samāse svavāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40436: patiśabde uttarapade aiśvaryavācini tatpuruṣe pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40441: gehe kaḥ (*3,1.144) iti prakṛtisvareṇa antodātto gṛhaśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40442: saha inena vartate iti bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā pūrvapadam (*6,2.1)
GS24jvkasipu:40452: patiśabde uttarapade aiśvaryavācini tatpuruṣe samāse bhū vāk cit didhiṣū ity etāni pūrvapadāni prakṛtisvarāṇi na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40461: patiśabde uttarapade aiśvaryavācini tatpuruṣa samāse bhuvanaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ vā prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40465: rañjeḥ kyun iti vartamāne bhusūdhūbhrāsjibhyaś chandasi iti kyunpratyayānto bhuvanaśabdaḥ ādyudātto vyutpāditaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40473: āśaṅka ābādha nediyas ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu sambhāvanavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40491: pūrvaśade uttarapade bhūtapūrvavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40501: atra pramaścāsau pūrvaś ca iti samāso,
GS24jvkasipu:40503: tathā hi sati udāharaṇam eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:40506: savidha sanīḍa samaryāda saveśa sadeśa ity eteṣu sāmīpyavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40523: savidhādīnāṃ saha vidhayā ity evam ādikā vyutpattir eva kevalam /
GS24jvkasipu:40533: vispaṣṭādini pūrvapadāni gunavāneṣu uttarapadeṣu prakṛtisvarāṇi bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40540: vispaṣṭaṃ kaṭukam iti vigṛhya supsupā iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40542: kaṭukādibhiś ca śabdair gunavad dravyam abhidhīyate ity asāmānādhikaranyam ato na asti karmadhārayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40550: ye ca atra apare paṭhyante tatra sampannaśabdasthāthādisvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40554: cuperaccopadhāyāḥ ity atra hi ciditi vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:40574: śra jya avama kan ity eteṣu pāpaśabdavati ca+uttarapade karmadhārye samāse bhāvavāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40586: śrajyakanām ādeśānāṃ grahaṇam iti sāmarthyāttadvaduttarapadaṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40596: kumāraśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ karmadhāraye samāse prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40601: atra kecit lakṣaṇapratipadokayoḥ pratipadoktasya+eva grahaṇam it paribhāṣayā kumāraḥ śramaṇādibhiḥ (*2,1.70)
GS24jvkasipu:40602: ity atra+eva samāse svaram etam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40609: tasminn uttarapade karmadhāraye kumārasya ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40611: uadāttaḥ ity etad atra sāmarthyād veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:40612: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvara eva hy ayam āder upadiśyate // [660]
GS24jvkasipu:40615: pūgā gaṇāḥ, tadvācini uttarapade karmadhāraye samāse kumārasya anyatarasyām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40631: tasya tadrājasya bahuṣu tena+eva striyām (*2,4.62) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:40632: atra yadā ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati tadā kumāraś ca (*6,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:40634: ye tu tatra pratipadoktasya grahaṇam icchanti teṣāṃ samāsāntodāttatvam eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:40639: kapāla bhagāla śarāva ity eteṣu ca dvigau samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40644: pramāṇe laḥ dvigor nityam iti mātraco lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40648: pañca māsān bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā iti taddhitārthe dvigor yap (*5,1.82) /
GS24jvkasipu:40663: iti taddhitārthe ete samāsāḥ dvigor lug anapatye (*4,1.88)
GS24jvkasipu:40671: pañcāratnyo daśāratnyaḥ iti ca yaṇguṇayoḥ bahiraṅgalakṣaṇayor asiddhatvāt sthānivadbhāvād vā dvigusvara igantalakṣaṇaḥ pravartate //
GS24jvkasipu:40674: bahuśabdaḥ pūrvapadam igantādiṣu uttarapadeṣu dvigau samāse 'nyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40687: tasya prakṛtisvare kṛte yatra yaṇādeśaḥ tatra udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:40691: diṣṭi vitasti ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ dvigau samāse pūrvapadam anyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40700: saptamyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ siddha śuṣka pakva bandha ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu rakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati sā cet saptamī kālān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40706: phiṣi tu sāṃkāśyakāmpilyanasikyadārvāghāṭānām antaḥ pūrvaṃ vā iti paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:40724: saptamīsvaraḥ kṛtsvareṇa bādhitaḥ punar ayaṃ vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:40727: pari prati upa apa ity ete pūrvapadabhūtā varjyamānavācini aharavayavavācini rātryavayavavācini ca+uttarapade prakṛtisvarā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40742: nipātā ādyudāttā upasargāś ca abhivarjam iti ādyudāttāni pūrvapadāni /
GS24jvkasipu:40743: tatpuruṣe bahuvrīhau ca siddhatvāt avyayaībhāvārtho 'yam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40745: iti tayor eva varjyamānam uttarapadaṃ, netarayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40746: ahorātrāvayavā api varjyamānā eva tayor bhavanti iti na pṛthagudāhriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40753: rājanyavācināṃ bahuvacanāntānāṃ yo dvandvo 'ndhakavṛṣṇiṣu vartate tatra pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40763: dvīpe bhavāḥ iti dvīpād anusamudraṃ yañ (*4,3.10) /
GS24jvkasipu:40794: iti tasya taddhitasyādhyetari vihitasya luk kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40806: kārtakaujapādayo ye dvandvāḥ teṣu pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40822: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā iti aṇo dvyacaḥ (*4,1.156)
GS24jvkasipu:40823: iti vihitasya phiñaḥ pailādibhyaś ca (*2,4.59) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:40828: tena pailaśyāparṇeyau ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40832: iti utpannasya yañaḥ yañañoś ca iti luk,
GS24jvkasipu:40837: tadapatye yūni ya iñ tasya ṇyakṣatriyārṣañito yūni lugaṇiñoḥ (*2,4.58) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:40840: atra api bahuvacanam avivakṣitam iti śaitikākṣapañcāleyau ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40853: teṣāṃ śaṇakaśabād utpannasya iñaḥ bahvaca iñaḥ prācyabharateṣu (*2,4.66)
GS24jvkasipu:40865: kunteḥ surāṣṭrasya ca apatyeṣu bahuṣu tannivāse vā janapade dvandvo 'yam /
GS24jvkasipu:40872: atra api apatyeṣu bahuṣu iñaḥ bahvaca iñaḥ prācyabharateṣu (*2,4.66)
GS24jvkasipu:40886: iti prakṛtibhāve prāpte na antasya ṭilope sabrahmacāripīṭhasarpi ity ādinopasaṅkhyānena ṭilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40901: tasya prayojanaṃ pakṣe samāsāntodāttatvam eva yathā syād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:40920: mahān ity etat pūrvapadaṃ vrīhi aparāhṇa gṛṣṭi iṣvāsa jābāla bhāra bhārata hailihila laurava pravṛddha ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40932: tasya ratipadokto yaḥ samāsaḥ sanmahatparamotkṛṣṭāḥ pūjyamānaiḥ (*2,1.61)
GS24jvkasipu:40937: ity ayam api śreṇyādisamāse vidhiḥ iti pravṛddhaśabdaḥ iha paṭhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:40940: kṣullaka ity etat pūrvapadaṃ mahāṃś ca vaiśvadeve uttarapade prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40946: uṣṭraśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ sādivāmyor uttarapadayoḥ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40953: gośabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ sāda sādi sārathi ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40960: kurugārhapata riktaguru asūtajaratī aślīladṛḍharūpā-pārevaḍavā taitilakadrū paṇyakambala ity ete samāsāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:40961: teṣāṃ dāsībhārādīnāṃ ca pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40977: aślīladṛḍharūpā iti hi saṃsthānamātreṇa śobhanā niḥśrīkā lāvaṇyavirahitā ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40982: titilino 'patyaṃ chātro vā taitilaḥ ity aṇantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40987: pratipadokte hi kṛtyānāṃ samāse dvitīyā dṛtyā ity eṣa vihitaḥ svaritaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40996: śṝsvṛsnihitrapyasivasi ity atra dhānye nit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:41009: caturthyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ tadarthe uttarapade tadabhidheyārthaṃ yat tadvācinyuttarapade prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41014: kusuyubhyaś ca ity atra nit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:41027: arthaśabde uttarapade caturthyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41036: na tvarthaśabdavācyaṃ sāmānyaṃ ity atadarthārtho 'yam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41041: śvaśrūsuram ity atra saty api tādarthye na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41057: karmadhārye samāse ktānte uttarapade 'niṣṭhāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41070: ahīnavācini samāse ktānte uttarapade dvitīyāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41089: karmavācini ktānte uttarapade tṛtīyāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41095: āṅi śrihanibhyāṃ hrasvaś ca iti ahirantodātto vyutpāditaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41099: nāsya khamastīti bahuvrīhau nakulanakheti nakhaśabdo nipātitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41109: karmavācini ktānte uttarapade gatiranantaraḥ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41116: vyavahitasya gater ayaṃ svaro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41118: kārakapūrvasya tu sati śiṣṭatvāt thāthādisvara eva bhavati dūrādāgataḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41119: anantaragrahaṇasāmarthyād eva kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api ity etan na aśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41125: takārādau ca tuśabdavarjite niti kṛti parato gatir anantaraḥ prakṛtisvaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41139: tavai ca antaś ca yugapat // PS_6,2.51 //
GS24jvkasipu:41141: tavaipratyayasya anta udātto bhavati gatiś ca anantaraḥ prakṛtisvaraḥ iti etad ubhayaṃ yugapad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41150: aniganto gatiḥ prakṛtisvaro bhavati añcatau vapratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41154: ity ayam ekādeśaḥ udāttaḥ svarito vā / [668]
GS24jvkasipu:41161: coraniganto 'ñcatau vapratyayaḥ ity eva svaro bhavati vapratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:41166: ni adhi ity etau cāñcatau vapratyaye parataḥ prakṛtisvarau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41175: īṣat ity etat pūrvapadam anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41181: īṣadbhedaḥ ity evam ādau kṛtsvara eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41184: hiraṇyaparimāṇavāci pūrvapadaṃ dhanaśabde uttarapade 'nyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41189: bahuvrīhāv api paratvād vikalpa eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41199: prathamaśabdaḥ pūrvapadam aciropasampattau gamyamānāyām anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41205: samprati vyākaraṇam adhyetuṃ pravṛttaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41209: vaiyākaraṇānāmādyo mukhyo vā yaḥ sa nityo 'ntodāttaḥ eva // [669]
GS24jvkasipu:41212: kataraśabdaḥ katamaśadaś ca pūrvapadam karmadhāraye samāse 'nyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41217: karmadhārayagrahaṇam uttarārtham iha tu pratipadoktatvād eva siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:41220: āryaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ brahmaṇakumārayoḥ karmadhāraye samāse 'nyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41235: rājā ca pūrvapadaṃ brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ karmadhāraye samāse anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41248: ṣaṣṭhyanto rājaśabdaḥ pūrvapadam pratyenasi uttarapade 'nyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41255: ktānte uttarapade nityārthe samāse pūrvapadam anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41262: satata iti yadā bhāve ktaḥ tadā thāthādisvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41279: rājaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ śilivācini uttarapade praśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41294: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ tatra pūrvapadasya ādir udātto bhavati ity evaṃ tadveditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41302: udāttaḥ iti prakṛtyā bhagālam (*6,2.137) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:41305: saptamyantaṃ hārivāci ca pūrvapadaṃ dharmyevācini haraṇaśabdād anyasminn uttarapade ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41306: hāri iti deyaṃ yaḥ svīkaroti so 'bhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41309: tasmād anapetaṃ tena vā prāpyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41330: tasya bījaniṣekād uttarakālaṃ śarīrapūṣṭyarthaṃ yad dīyate haraṇam iti tad ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41331: paro 'pi kṛtsvaro hārisvareṇa bādhyate vipratiṣedhena ity etad aharaṇe ity anena jñāpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:41332: tena vāḍavahāryam iti hārisvaraḥ siddho bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41335: yuktavācini ca samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41346: adhyakṣaśabde uttarapade vibhāṣā pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41353: pāpaśadaḥ śilpivācini utarapade vibhāṣā ādyudātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41359: iti pāpaśabdasya pratipadoktaḥ samānādhikaraṇasamāsaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhīsamase na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41363: gotravācini antevāsivācini ca+uttarapade mānavabrāhmanayoś ca kṣepavācini samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41365: yo jaṅghādānaṃ dadānyaham iti vātsyaḥ sampadyate sa jaṅghāvātsyaḥ iti kṣipyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41375: kumāryādilābhakāmā ye dākṣādibhiḥ proktāni śāstrāṇy adhīyate tacchiṣyatāṃ vā pratipadyante ta evaṃ kṣipyante /
GS24jvkasipu:41384: atra yasya anyat samāsalakṣaṇaṃ na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:41385: supsupā ity eva tatra samāsaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41392: maireyaśabde uttarapade tadaṅgavācini pūrvapadāny ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41413: samaśanaṃ samāśaḥ iti kriyāmātram ucyate, na dravyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41420: gavādiṣu upamānavāciṣu uttarapadeṣu pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41427: dhānyaṃ gaur iva iti vigṛhya vyāghrāder ākṛtigaṇatvād upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41434: akapratyayānte uttarapade jīvikārthavācini samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41439: dantalekhanādibhir yeṣāṃ jīvikā ta evam ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:41448: prāgdeśavartināṃ yā krīḍā tadvācini samāse akapratyayānte uttarapade pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41464: aṇante uttarapade niyuktavācini samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41470: sa ca kasmiṃścit kartavye tatparo na bhavati iti niyuktaḥ ity anena sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:41476: śilpivācini samāse aṇante uttarapade pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41489: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye aṇante uttarapade akṛñaḥ pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41496: go tanti yava ity etāni pūrvapadāni pālaśabde adyudāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41512: upamānavāci pūrvapadaṃ śabdārthaṃprakṛtau eva ṇinante uttarapade ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41517: upamānagrahanam asya pūrvasa ca yogasya viṣayavibhāgārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:41521: prakṛtir eva yatra+upasarganirapekṣā śabdārthā bhavati tatra+eva yathā syād,
GS24jvkasipu:41526: śabdārthaprakṛtau tv anupamānamupamānaṃ ca ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41539: ity asya+eva+udāharanārthaṃ pathyante purvottarapadaniyamārthā iti kecit /
GS24jvkasipu:41554: ekaḥ śitiḥ pādo 'sya iti tripado bahuvrīhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41556: tasya nimittisvarabalīyastvād antodāttatvaṃ prāptam ity ādyudāttatvaṃ vidhīyate / [674]
GS24jvkasipu:41561: etaj jñāpayati śityantasya+uttarapade dvigusvaro na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41562: tena dviśitipād ity atra tiśabda udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41563: nimittisvarabalīyastvasya apy ekaśitipātsvaravacanam eva jñāpakaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41564: pātresamitādayaś ca yuktārohyādayas tatas te 'py ādyudāttā bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:41568: kāśa tuṣa bhrāṣṭra vaṭa ity etāni ca je uttarapade ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41577: je uttarapade bahvacaḥ pūrvapadasya antyāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41586: grāmaśabde uttarapade pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati na ced nivasadvāci bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41595: dākṣyādayo nivasanti yasmin grāme sa teṣām iti vyapadiśyate //
GS24jvkasipu:41616: yāny atra nivāsanām adheyāni teṣu nivasadvācīni api pūrvapadāni ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41632: yadā śālāntas tatpuruṣo napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati tadā api tatpuruṣe śālāyāṃ napuṃsake (*6,2.123)
GS24jvkasipu:41633: ity etasmāt pūrvavipratiṣedhena pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41638: prasthaśabde uttarapade karkyādivarjitam avṛddhaṃ pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41662: prasthe uttarapade mālādīnam ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41680: nagaraśabde uttarapade mahannavaśabdavarjitaṃ pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:41690: arme ca avarṇam dvyac tryac // PS_6,2.90 //
GS24jvkasipu:41692: armaśabde uttarapade dvyac tryac pūrvapadam avarṇāntam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41705: bhūta adhika sañjīva madra aśman kajjala ity etāni pūrvapadāni armaśabde uttarapade nādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41720: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmas tatra pūrvapadasya antaḥ udātto bhavati ity evaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41728: sarvaśabdaḥ pūrvapadam guṇakārtsnye vartamānam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41734: āśrayavyāptyā paramatvaṃ śvetatvasya iti guṇakārtsnye vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:41740: guṇāttareṇa samāsastaralopaś ca vaktavyaḥ ity evam atra samāsastaralopaś ca //
GS24jvkasipu:41743: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye giri nikāya ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41754: kumāryām uttarapade vayasi gamyamāne pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41757: kumārīśabdaḥ puṃsā sahāsaṃprayogamātraṃ pravṛttinimittam upādāya prayukto vṛddhādibhir vayo viśeṣavacanaiḥ samānādhikaraṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41765: tadvācini samāse udakaśabde uttarapade pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41768: svare kṛte ekādeśaḥ svarito vānudātte padādau (*8,2.6)
GS24jvkasipu:41774: dvigau uttarapade kratuvācini samāse pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41786: sabhāśabde uttarapade napuṃsakaliṅge samāse pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41795: sabhāyāṃ pratipadoktaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ gṛhyate iti samaṇīyasabham,
GS24jvkasipu:41799: puraśabde uttarapade prācām deśe pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41808: ariṣta gauḍa ity evaṃ pūrve samāse puraśabde uttarapade pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41817: hāstina phalaka mārdeya ity etāni pūrvapadāni puraśabde uttarapade na antodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41827: kusūla kūpa kumbha śālā ity etāni pūrvapadāni bilaśabde uttarapade antodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41837: dikśabdāḥ pūrvapadāni antodāttani bhavanti grāmajanapadākhyānavāciṣu uttarapadeṣu,
GS24jvkasipu:41871: tadvaty uttarapade sarvaśabdo dikśabdāś ca antodāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41875: susarvārdhadikśabdebhyo janapadasya+iti tadantavidhinā janapadalakṣaṇo vuñ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41884: bahuvrīhau samāse viśvaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41899: udara aśva iṣu ity eteṣu uttarapadesu bahuvrīhau samāse sañjñāyāṃviṣaye pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41908: kṣepe gamyamāne udarādiṣu uttarapadeṣu bahuvrīhau samāse sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41919: bahuvrīhau samāse bandhuny uttarapade nadyantaṃ pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41929: bahuvrīhau samāse niṣṭhāntam upasargapūrvaṃ pūrvapadam anatarasyām anatodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41934: yadi mukhaśabdaḥ svāṅgavācī tadā pakṣe mukhaṃ svāṅgam (*6,2.167)
GS24jvkasipu:41945: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāma uttarapadasya ādir udātto bhavati ity evaṃ tadveditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41951: ādiḥ iti prakṛtyā bhagālam (*6,2.127) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:41953: bahuvrīhau samāse varṇavācino lakṣaṇavācinaś ca karṇaśabda uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41959: paśūnāṃ vibhāgajñāpanārthaṃ dātraśaṅkupratirūpakaṃ karṇādiṣu cihnaṃ yat kriyate tad iha lakṣaṇaṃ gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:41960: tena sthūlakarṇaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41968: sañjñāyām aupamye ca yo bahuvrīhir vartate tatra karṇaśabda uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41975: kaṇṭha pṛṣṭha grīvā jaṅghā ity etāni uttarapadāni bahuvrīhau samāse sañjñaupamyayor ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41996: śṛṅgaśabdaḥ uttārapadam avasthāyāṃ sañjñau pamyayoś ca bahuvrīhau ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42006: naña uttare jaramaramitramṛtā bahuvrīhau samāse ādyudāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42018: soḥ uttaraṃ manantam asantaṃ ca bahuvrīhau samāse ādyudāttaṃ bhavati lomoṣasī varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:42033: aninasmaṅgrahaṇānyarthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti ity anarthakayor api manasor iha grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:42036: kapi tu paratvāt kapi pūrvam ity etad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42041: kratvādayaḥ soruttare bahuvrīhau samāse ādyudāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42053: yad ādyudāttaṃ dvyac uttarapadaṃ babuvrīhau samāse soruttaraṃ tad ādyudāttam eva bhavati chandasi visaya /
GS24jvkasipu:42065: vīra vīrya ity etau ca śabdau śoruttarau bahuvrīhau samāse chandasi viṣaye ādyudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42069: iti ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati ity etad eva vīryagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:42070: tatra hi sati pūrveṇa+eva siddhaṃ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:42073: kūla tīra tūla mūla śālā akṣa sama ity etāni uttarapadāni avayībhāvasamāse ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42101: kaṃsa mantha śūrpa pāyya kāṇḍa ity etāni uttarapadāni dvigau samāse ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42116: śālāśabdānte tatpuruṣe samāse napuṃsakaliṅge uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42128: tatpuruṣe samāse napuṃsakaliṅge kanthāśabdaḥ uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42139: kanthānte tatpuruṣe samāse napuṃsakaliṅge cihaṇādīnām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42154: ādiḥ iti vartamāne punar ādigrahaṇaṃ pūrvapadādyudāttārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:42157: cela kheṭa katuka kāṇḍa ity etāni uttarapadāni tatpuruse samāse garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyām ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42167: tatra putraḥ celam iva iti vigṛhya vyāghrāder ākṛtigaṇatvād upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42172: cīramuttarapadam upamānavāci tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42180: palala sūpa śāka ity etāny uttarapadāni miśravācini tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttani bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42194: kūla sūda sthala karṣa ity etāni uttarapadāni tatpuruṣe samāse sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ādyudāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42209: karmadhārayavarjite tatpuruṣe samāse rājyam ity etad uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42219: vagya ity evam ādīni uttarapadāni akarmadhāraye tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudattāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42227: digādiṣu tu varga pūga gaṇa pakṣa ity evam ādayo ye paṭhitāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:42228: te eva yatpratyayāntā vargyādayaḥ iha pratipattavyā //
GS24jvkasipu:42231: putraśabdaḥ puṃśabdebhya uttaras tatpuruṣe ādyudatto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42247: ācāryādyākhyebhyaḥ paraḥ putraśabdo nadyudātto bhavati ākhyāgrahaṇāt svarūpasya paryāyāṇāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ ca grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42269: cūrṇādīni uttarapadāni aprāṇivācinaḥ ṣaṣṭhyantāt parāṇi tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42290: tatra+upagrahaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhyantam eva pūrvācāryopacāreṇa gṛhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:42293: ṣaṭ purvoktāni kāṇḍādīni uttarapadāni aprāṇiṣaṣṭhyā ādyudāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42319: kuṇḍam ity etat uttarapadaṃ vanavāci tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42334: śiteḥ uttarapadaṃ nityaṃ yad abahvaj bhasacchabdavarjitaṃ bahuvrīhau samāse tat prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42344: tatra avasthāyā anyatra śitikakuda iti bahvajuttarapadaṃ bhavati iti tena na nityābahvac /
GS24jvkasipu:42357: gateḥ kārakāt upapadāt ca kṛdantam uttarapadaṃ tatpuruṣe samāse prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42374: prapacatitamām ity atra tarabādyantena samāse kṛte paścādām /
GS24jvkasipu:42375: tatra sati śiṣṭatvād āma eva svaro bhavati ity eke /
GS24jvkasipu:42380: vanaspatyādiṣu samāseṣu ubhe pūrvottarapade yugapat prakṛtisvare bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42386: tadbṛhatoḥ karapatyoś coradevatayoḥ suṭ talopaś ca iti suṭ takāralopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:42391: kecit tu śārṅgaravādisu paṭhanti teṣām ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42395: na pāti na pālayati vā napāt kvibantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42401: narā evaṃ śaṃsanti iti vā narāśaṃsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42408: śuna itva śepaḥ asya iti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42431: devatāvācināṃ yo dvandvas tatra yugapadubhe pūrvottarapade prakṛtisvare bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42438: tena ādyudāttaḥ bṛhaspatiśabde vanaspatyāditvāt dvāv udāttau,
GS24jvkasipu:42439: tena indrābṛhaspatī ity atra traya udāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42446: uttarapade 'nudāttādau pṛthivī rudra pūṣamanthivarjite devatādvandve na+ubhe yugapat prakṛtisvare bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42450: uttarapadagrahaṇam anudāttādau ity uttarapadaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:42461: manthin - śukrāmanthinau mantho 'sya asti iti manthī /
GS24jvkasipu:42463: pṛthivyādiṣu tu ubhe yugapat prakṛtisvare bhavata eva //
GS24jvkasipu:42467: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmas tatra samāsasya+uttarapadasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:42473: tha atha ghañ kta ac ap itra ka ity evam antānām uttarapadānāṃ gatikārakopapadāt pareṣām antaḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42476: hanikuṣinīramikāśibhyaḥ kthan iti ave bhṛñaḥ iti ca kthanpratyayāntāv etau /
GS24jvkasipu:42479: upasarge vaseḥ iti athanpratyayaḥ ghañ - prabhedaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42508: su ity etasmād upamānāc ca paraṃ ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42516: iti prāpte upamānā dapi tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48)
GS24jvkasipu:42522: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye gatikārakopapadād ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati ācitādīn varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:42526: sambhūtaḥ iti pratyarthāt bhavateḥ karmaṇi ktaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42528: ity atra hi karmaṇi ity anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:42545: saṃhitāśabdo yadā goranyasya sañjñā tadā antodatto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42546: yadā tu goḥ sañjñā tadā antodātta eva //
GS24jvkasipu:42549: pravṛddhādīnāṃ ca ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42558: yānādibhyo 'nyatra api teṣām antodāttatvam bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:42563: punarniṣkṛto rathaḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati // [688]
GS24jvkasipu:42566: sañjñāyām iti vartate, ktaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:42567: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye āśiṣi gamyamānāyāṃ kārakād uttarayoḥ dattaśrutayor eva ktāntayor anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42582: akārakād api dattaśrutayor anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42588: kārakād dattaśrutayor āśisyeva ity evam atra niyama iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42589: tena āhato nadati devadattaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42596: itthaṃbhūtena kṛtam ity etasminn arthe yaḥ samaso vartate tatra ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42606: bhāve tu yadā pralapitādayas tadā thāthādisvareṇa+eva siddham antodāttatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:42609: anapratyayāntam uttarapadaṃ bhāvavacanaṃ karmavacanaṃ ca kārakāt paramantodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42615: karmaṇi ca yena saṃsparśāt kartuḥ śarīrasukham (*3,3.116)
GS24jvkasipu:42632: mannantaṃ ktinnantaṃ vyākhyāna śayana sthāna ity etāni yājakādayaḥ krītaśabdaś ca+uttarapadam anatodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42650: iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsārthāḥ paṭhyante ta eva+iha gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:42661: saptamyantāt paraṃ puṇyam ity etad uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42665: tatpuruṣe tulyārtha iti pūrvapadakṛtisvaratvaṃ prāptam ity antodāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42666: uṇādīnāṃ tu vyutpattipakṣe kṛtsvareṇa ādyudāttaḥ puṇyaśabdaḥ syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42671: ūnārthāny uttarapadāni kalahaśabdaś ca tṛtīyāntāt parāṇyanatodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42679: atra kecid arthe iti svarūpagrahaṇam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42681: ūnaśabdena+eva tvarthanirdeśarthena tadarthānāṃ grahaṇam iti pratipadoktatvād eva tṛtīyāsamāsaparigrahe siddhe tṛtīyāgrahaṇaṃ vispaṣṭārtham
GS24jvkasipu:42685: miśra ity etad uttarapadam anupasargaṃ tṛtīyāntāt param antodāttaṃ bhavati asandhau gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:42693: iha anupasargagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam anyatra miśragahaṇe sopasargagrahaṇasya /
GS24jvkasipu:42694: tena miśraślakṣṇaiḥ iti sopasargeṇa api miśraśabdena tṛtīyāsamāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42698: sandhiḥ iti hi paṇabandhena aikārthyam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42699: kecit punar āhuḥ gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣā pratyāsattiḥ sandhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42700: atra rājño brāhmaṇaiḥ saha deśapratyāsattāv api satyāṃ mūrtivibhāgo gṛhyate iti brāhmaṇamiśro rajā iti pratyudāhriyate / [690]
GS24jvkasipu:42704: sampādi arha hita alam ity evam arthā ye taddhitāḥ tadantāni uttarapadāni naño guṇapratiṣedhe vartamānāt parāṇi antodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42720: tatpratiṣedho yatra+ucyate samāse tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ karnaveṣṭakābhyāṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:42731: ya yat ity etau yau taddhitāv atadarthe vartate tadantasya+uttarapadasya naño guṇapratiṣedhaviṣayādanta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42744: niranubandhakaikānubandhakayor yayator grahaṇād iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:42750: ac ka ity evam antam aśaktau gamyamānāyām uttarapadaṃ nañaḥ paramantodattaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42760: ākrośe ca gamyamāne nañaḥ uttaramackāntam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42767: akrośe gamyamāne nañaḥ param uttarapadaṃ sañjñāyāṃ vartamānam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42773: kṛtya uka iṣṇuc ity evam antāś cārvādayaś ca nañaḥ uttare 'ntodāttāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42781: ity asya dvyanubandhakasya api grahaṇam ikārāder vidhānasāmarthyād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42812: tṛnnanta anna tīkṣṇa śuci ity eteṣu naña uttareṣu vibhāṣā antaḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42820: bahuvrīhau samāse idam etad tad ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya prathamaśabdasya pūraṇapratyayāntasya ca kriyāgaṇane vartamānasya anataḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:42821: idaṃ prathamaṃ gamanaṃ bhojanaṃ vā yasya sa idaṃprathamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42843: uttarapadasya kāryitvāt kapi pūrvam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42849: saṅkhyāyāḥ paraḥ stanaśabdo bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42858: chandasi viṣaye bahuvrīhau samāse saṅkhyāyāḥ paraḥ stanaśabdo vibhāsā 'ntodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42859: dvistanāṃ karoti dyāvāpṛthivyordohāya catuḥstanāṃ karoti paśūnāṃ dohāyāṣṭastanāṃ karoti chandasāṃ dohāya //
GS24jvkasipu:42862: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye bahuvrīhau samāse mitra ajina ityetayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ antaḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42876: tadvācinaḥ pramanataraṃ bahuvrīhau samāse antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42887: mukham uttarapadaṃ svāṅgavāci bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42895: avyaya dikśabda go mahat sthūla muṣṭi pṛthu vatsa ity etebhyaḥ paraṃ mukhaṃ svāṅgavāci bahuvrīhau samāse na antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42910: niṣṭhāntāt upamānavācinaś ca mukhaṃ svāṅgam uttarapadam anyatarasyām bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42914: yadā+etad uttarapadāntodāttatvaṃ na bhavati tadā niṣṭhopasargapūrvam anyatarasyām (*6,2.110)
GS24jvkasipu:42916: tadabhāvapakṣe 'pi pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena gatisvaraḥ iti trīṇyudāharaṇāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42923: jātivācinaḥ ācchādanavarjitāt kālavācinaḥ sukhādibhyaś ca paraṃ ktāntaṃ kṛtamitapratipannān varjayitvā bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:42944: etesu bahuvrīhiṣu niṣṭhāntasya pūrvanipāto na bhavaty eva asmād eva jñāpakāt /
GS24jvkasipu:42949: jātaśabde uttarapade vā anta udātto bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42963: nañsubhyāṃ param uttarapadaṃ bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42971: samāsāntāś ca avayavā bhavanti iti anṛcaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:42972: bahvṛcaḥ ity atra kṛte samāsānte 'ntodāttatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:42975: nañsubhyā kapi parataḥ pūrvam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42984: hrasvo 'nto yasya tad idaṃ hrasvāntam uttarapadaṃ samāso vā,
GS24jvkasipu:42985: tatra antyāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati kapi parato nañsuhyāṃ paraṃ bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:42991: pūrvam iti vartamane punaḥ pūrvagrahaṇaṃ pravṛttibhedena niyamapratipattyartham,
GS24jvkasipu:42995: sujñakaḥ ity atra kabantasya+eva antodāttatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:42998: utarapadārthabahutve yo bahuśabdo vartate tasmāt naña iva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43000: ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43004: ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43009: ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43014: ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43023: buṇādayo 'vayavavācino bahor uttare bahuvrīhau nāntodāttāḥ bhavanti bahuguṇā rajjuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43034: upasargāt svāṅgaṃ dhruvaṃ parśuvarjitam antodāttaṃ bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:43040: satataṃ yasya pragataṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ bahvati sa prapṛṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43051: samāsamātre vanam ity etad uttarapadam upasargāt paramantodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43064: antaḥśabdaś ca uttarapadam upasargād antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43070: ni vi ity etābhyām uttaro 'ntaḥśabdo na anatodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43078: parer uttaram abhitobhavivacanaṃ maṇḍalaṃ ca antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43087: yac ca+evaṃ svabhāvaṃ kūlādi tad abhitobhāvigrahaṇena gṛhyate // [696]
GS24jvkasipu:43108: niṣkrāntaḥ kālakāt iti kanpratyayāntena kālaśabdena prādisamāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43134: iti siddhe vacanam abahuvrīhyartham adhruvārtham asvāṅgārthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:43142: tatra api hi pari-praty-upa-apā varjyamāna. ahorātra-avyaveṣu (*6,2.33) ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:43146: sphiga pūta vīṇā añjas adhvan kukṣi ity etāny uttarapadāni sīranāmāni ca nāmaśabdaś ca apād uttarāṇy antodāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:43153: iti yadā samāsānto na asti tadā anena antodāttatvaṃ bhavati / [697]
GS24jvkasipu:43154: tasmin hi saty acpratyayasya cittvād eva siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:43155: anityaś ca samāsāntaḥ ity etad eva jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:43164: sphigapūtakukṣīṇāṃ grahaṇam abahuvrīhyartham adhruvārtham asvāṅgārthaṃ ca //
GS24jvkasipu:43172: adhyārūḍho vā dantaḥ iti samānādhikaraṇa uttarapadalopī samassaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43173: dantasya+upari yo 'nyoḥ danto jāyate sa ucyate adhidantaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43178: anor uttaram apradhānavāci kanīyaḥ ca antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43196: ateḥ paramakṛdantaṃ padaśabdaś ca antodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43226: rājaśabdaḥ samāsāntasya anityatvād yadā ṭaj na asti tadā prayojayati /
GS24jvkasipu:43227: tasmin hi sati cittvād eva antodāttatvaṃ siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:43229: pratigatāḥ aṃśavaḥ asya pratyaṃśuḥ ayam uṣṭraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43243: upād uttaraṃ dvyac ajinaṃ ca antodāttaṃ bhavati tatpuruṣe samāse gaurādīn varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:43269: suśabdāt paramuttarapadaṃ tatpuruṣe samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati avakṣepaṇe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:43271: iha khalu idānīṃ susthaṇḍile susphigābhyāṃ supratyavasitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43280: utpucchaśabde tatpuruṣe vibhāṣā anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43284: tadā thāthādisūtreṇa nityam antodāttatve prāpte vikalpo 'yam iti seyam ubhayatra vibhāṣa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43285: tatpuruṣe ity eva udastaṃ puccham asya utpucchaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43288: dvi tri ity etābhyām uttaresu pād dat mūrdhan ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu yo bahuvrīhiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:43298: mūrdhan iti tvakṛtasamāsanto nānta eva mūrdhanśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43299: tasya etat prayojanam asatyapi samāsānte 'ntodāttatvaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:43302: yadā 'pi samāsāntaḥ kriyate tadā api bahuvrīheḥ kāryitvāt tadekadeśatvāc ca samāsāntasya antodāttatvaṃ pakṣe bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:43313: saḥ akrāntāt paro vibhāṣā antodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43323: chandasi visaye parādiḥ udātto bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:43330: parādiś ca prāntaś ca pūrvāntaś ca api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43331: pūrvādayaś ca dṛśyante vyatyayo bahulaṃ smṛtaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43333: parāntaś ca -- antodāttaprakaraṇe tricakrādīnāṃ chandasy upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:43338: divodāsāya samagāya te ity evam ādi sarvaṃ saṅgṛhītaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:43339: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // [700]
GS24jvkasipu:43343: aluk iti ca, uttarapade iti ca etad adhikṛtam veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43344: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo 'luk uttarapade ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43352: anyārtham idam uttarapadagrahaṇam iha apy aluko nivṛtiṃ karoti ity evam arthaṃ lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣā na aśrayitavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:43357: tebhyaḥ parasyāḥ pañcamyāḥ uttarapade aluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43364: samāse kṛte prātipadikatvāt supo luki prāpte pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43365: dvivacanabahuvacanāntānāṃ tu stokādīnām anabhidhānāt samāsa eva na bhavati stokābhyāṃ muktaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:43367: tena atra na kadācid aikapadyam aikasvaryaṃ ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43371: tasya vyutpattir asatā satā vā avayavārthena kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:43374: ojas sahas ambhas tamas ity etebhya uttarasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ aluk bhavati uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:43386: manasaḥ uttarasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ sañjñāyām alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43394: ājñāyinyuttārapade manasaḥ uttarasya tṛtīyāyāḥ alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43399: ātmanaḥ uttarasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ pūraṇapratyayānte utārapade 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43406: bahuvrīhir ayam ātmā caturtho 'sya asau ātmacaturthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43411: yayā sañjñayā vaiyākaraṇā eva vyaharanti tasyām ātmanaḥ uttarasyāś caturthyā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43418: parasya ca yā caturthī tasya vaiyākaraṇākhyāyām alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43423: halantād adantāc ca+uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ sañjñāyām alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43426: gaviṣṭhiraḥ ity atra tu gaviyudhibhyāṃ sthiraḥ (*8,3.95)
GS24jvkasipu:43441: hṛd div ity etebhyām uttarasya ṅer alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43446: prācāṃ deśe yatkāranāma tatra halādav uttarapade haladantād uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43468: madhyād uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ gurāv uttarapade 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43475: mūrdha-mastaka-varjitāt svāṅgād uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ akāme uttarapade 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43492: tasminn uttarapade haladanttad uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ vibhāṣā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43498: svaṅgād dhi bahuvrihau pūrveṇa nityam aluk prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:43499: tatpuruṣe tu svaṅgād asvāṅgāc ca na-in-siddha-badhnātisu ca (*6,3.19)
GS24jvkasipu:43505: tatpuruṣe samāse kṛdante uttarapade saptamyāḥ bahulam alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43513: prāvṛṭ śarat kāla div ity eteṣāṃ je uttarapade saptamyāḥ aluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43522: varṣa kṣara śara vara ity etebhya uttarasyaḥ saptamyāḥ je uttarapade vibhāṣā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43531: tanapratyaye ca parataḥ kālanāmnaḥ uttarasyāḥ saptamyā vibhāṣā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43544: uttarapadādhikāre pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhir na+iṣyate hṛdayasya hṛllekha iti lekhagrahaṇāl liṅgāt /
GS24jvkasipu:43550: śaya vāsa vāsin ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣv akālavācinaḥ uttarasyāḥ saptamyā vibhāṣā aluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43563: apsu bhavaḥ iti digāditvād yat pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43567: innante uttarapade siddhaśabde badhnātau ca parataḥ saptamyāḥ alug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43576: ghañante hi bandhe ca vibhāṣā (*6,3.13) ity uktam // [704]
GS24jvkasipu:43579: sthe ca+uttarapade bhāṣāyām saptamyā aluk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43589: ākrośe gamyamāne uttarapade ṣaṣṭhyā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43594: ṣaṣthīprakarane vāgdikpaśyadbhyo yuktidaṇḍahareṣu yathāsaṅkhyam alug vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43604: devānāmpriya ity atra ca ṣaṣṭhyā alug vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43614: putraśabde uttarapade ākrośe gamyamāne 'nyatarasyāṃ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43622: ṛkārāntebhyo vidyasambandhavacibhyo yonisambandhavācibhyaś ca+uttarasyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43638: svasṛ pati ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ ṛkārāntebhyaḥ vidyāyonisambandhavācibhyaḥ vibhāṣā 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43645: yadā tu aluk tadā mātuḥ piturbhyam anyatarasyām (*8,3.85)
GS24jvkasipu:43653: ṛkārāntānāṃ vidyāyonisambhandhavācināṃ yo dvandvas tatra+uttarapade pūrvapadasya ānaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43662: putre ity atra anuvartate, ṛtaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:43663: tena putraśabde 'py uttarapade ṛkārāntasya anaṅādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43668: devatāvācināṃ yo dvandvaḥ tatra+uttarapade pūrvapadasya ānaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43672: dvandve iti vartamāne punar dvandvagrahaṇaṃ prasiddhasahācaryārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:43673: atyantasahacarite lokavijñāte dvandvam ity etat nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43674: tatra ye loke prasiddhasāhacaryā vede ca ye sahavāpanirdiṣṭās teṣām iha grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43676: śivavaiśravaṇau ity evam ādau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43682: soma varuṇa ity etayoḥ devatādvandve agneḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43688: kṛtavṛddhāv uttarapade devatādvandve agneḥ ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43703: div ity etasya dyāvā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati devatādvandve uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:43708: pṛthivyām uttarapade devatādvandve divo divas ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:43714: kathaṃ dyāvā cid asmai pṛthivī namete iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:43718: uṣasaḥ uṣāsā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati devatādvandve uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:43723: mātarapitarau ity udīcāmācāryāṇāṃ matenāraṅādeśaḥ mātṛśabdasya nipatyate mātarapitarau /
GS24jvkasipu:43736: striyāḥ puṃvad-bhāṣītapuṃskādanūṅ samānādhikaraṇe striyām apūraṇī-priyādiṣu // PS_6,3.34 //
GS24jvkasipu:43738: bhāṣitaḥ pumān yena samānāyāmākṛtāvekasmin pravṛttinimitte sa bhāṣitapuṃskaḥ śabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43740: bhāsitaḥ pumān yasminn arthe pravṛttinimite sa bhāṣitapuṃskaśabdena+ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:43741: tasya pratipādako yaḥ śabdaḥ so 'pi bhāsitapuṃskaḥ ūṅo 'bhāvaḥ anūṅ,
GS24jvkasipu:43742: bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ yasmin strīśabde sa bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ strīśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43745: tasya bhāsitapuṃskāadanūṅaḥ strīśabdasya puṃśabdasyeva rūpaṃ bhavati samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade strīliṅge pūraṇīpriyādivarjite /
GS24jvkasipu:43766: kalyāṇī pañcamī yāsāṃ tāḥ kalyāṇīpañcamā rātrayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43769: iha mā bhūt, kalyāṇīpañcamīkaḥ pakṣaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43771: ity atra api pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam eva ity appratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43789: dṛḍhabhaktiḥ ity evam ādiṣu strīpūrvapadasya avivakṣitvāt siddham iti samādheyam //
GS24jvkasipu:43793: ity ataḥ prabhṛti saṅkhyāyāḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane kṛtvasuc (*5,4.17)
GS24jvkasipu:43794: iti prāgetasmād ye pratyayāḥ tesu bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ striyāḥ puṃvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43821: katham āgnāyī devatā asya āgneyaḥ sthālīpākaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:43828: kyaṅi parato mānini ca stiryā bhāṣitapuṃskād anūṅ puṃvat bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43834: iha tu darśanīyāmātmānaṃ manyate darśanīyamāninī iti pūrveṇa+eva siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:43854: sañjñāyāḥ pūraṇyāś ca striyāḥ puṃvadbhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43874: vṛddher nimittaṃ yasmin sa vṛddhinimittaḥ taddhitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:43875: sa yadi rakte 'rthe vikāre ca na vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:43895: lohasya vikāro lauhīm lauhī īṣā yasya rathasya sa lauheṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43899: svāṅgād uttaro ya īkāraḥ tadantāyāḥ striyāḥ na puṃvad bhavati amānini parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43914: jāteś ca striyāḥ na puṃvad bhavati amānini parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43928: karmadharaye samāse jātīya deśīya ity etayoś ca pratyayayoḥ bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ striyāḥ puṃvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43967: strītvena vinā pūrvapadārtho 'tra jatiḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43980: tatra tadrājapratyayasya striyamataśca iti luki kṛte iḍabiḍvṛndārikā iti vigṛhya samāsaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43986: gha rūpa kopa celaṭ brūva gotra mata hata ity eteṣū parato bhāṣitapuṃskat paro yo ṅīpratyayas tadantasya anekāco hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43997: brauva iti bravīti iti bruvaḥ pacādyuaci,
GS24jvkasipu:44009: nadyāḥ śeṣasya ghādiṣu parato hrasvo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:44011: aṅī ca yā nadī ṅyantaṃ ca yad ekac /
GS24jvkasipu:44023: ug-itaś ca parasyāḥ nadyāḥ ghādiṣu anyatarasyām hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44031: prakarṣayogāt prāk strītvasyā vivakṣitatvād vā siddham // [711]
GS24jvkasipu:44034: samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade jātīye ca pratyaye parato mahataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44042: lakṣaṇoktatvād eva atra na bhaviṣyati iti ced bahuvrīhāv api na syād mahābāhuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44044: amahān mahān sampanno mahadbhūtaścandramāḥ ity atra gauṇatvān mahadarthasya na bhavatyātvam /
GS24jvkasipu:44045: mahadātve ghāsakaraviśiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānaṃ puṃvadvacanaṃ ca asamānādhikaraṇārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:44059: dvi aṣṭan ity etayoḥ ākārādeśo bhavati saṅkhyāyām uttarapade abahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44080: tri ity etasya trayas ity ayam ādeśo bhavati saṅkhyāyām abahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44092: catvāriṃśatprabhṛtau saṃkhyāyām uttarapade 'bahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ sarveṣām dvi aṣṭan tri ity eteṣāṃ yad uktaṃ tadvibhāṣa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44104: hṛdayasya hṛt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati lekha yat aṇ lāsa ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44115: śoka syañ roga ity eteṣu parataḥ hṛdayasya vā hṛdādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44128: pādasya pada ity ayam ādeśo bhavati āji āti ga upahata ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:44132: pāde ca ity auṇādikaḥ iṇ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44133: tatra ajer vībhavo na bhavati ata eva nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44137: tasya sthāne padādeśaḥ upadeśe eva antodātto nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:44141: padaga ity eteṣu kṛtsvareṇa samāsasya+eva antodāttatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:44144: yatpratyaye parataḥ pādasya pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty atadarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:44160: hima kāṣin hati ity eteṣu pādaśabdasya pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44166: ṛkṣambandhinaḥ pādaśabdasya śe parataḥ pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44168: pādaṃ pādaṃ śaṃsati iti saṅkhyaikavacanāc ca vīpsāyām (*5,4.43)
GS24jvkasipu:44174: ghoṣa miśra śabda ity eteṣu ca+uttarapadeṣu pādasya vā pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44183: udakaśabdasya sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati uttarapade parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44195: peṣaṃ vāsa vāhana dhi ity eteṣu ca+uttarapadesu udakasya uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44206: tasminn ekahalādau pūrayitavyavāciny anyatarasyām udakasya uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44216: mantha odana saktu bindu vajra bhāra hāra vīvadha gāha ity eteṣu uttarapadesu udakasya uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:44237: igantasya aṅyantasya uttarapade hrasvaḥ bhavati gālavasya ācaryasya matena anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:44278: ṅyantasya abantasya ca sañjñāchandasoḥ bahulaṃ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44301: tvapratyaye parato ṅyāpoḥ bahulaṃ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44308: iṣṭakeṣīkāmālānāṃ cita tūla bhārin ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44326: anavyayasya ity etad eva jñāpakam iha khidantagrahaṇasya //
GS24jvkasipu:44329: arus dviṣat ity etayor ajanatānāṃ ca khidanta uttarapade mumāgamo bhavati anavyayasya /
GS24jvkasipu:44343: ijantasya ekācaḥ khidante uttarapade amāgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:44344: ampratyayavac ca dvitīyaikavacanavac ca sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44351: ampratyayavac ca ity atideśāt ātvapūrvasavarṇaguṇeyaṅuvaṅādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:44357: śriyam ātmānaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ manyate ity upakramya śrimanyam iti bhavitavyam iti bhāṣye vyavasthitam ?
GS24jvkasipu:44359: atra viṣaye parityaktasvaliṅgaḥ śrīśabdo brāhmaṇakule vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:44370: kāraśabda uttarapade satya agada ity etayor mumāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44398: sūtograrājabhojamervityetebhya uttarasya duhitṛśabdasya putraḍādeśo vā vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44407: anyatra api hi dṛśyate śailaputrī iti // [717]
GS24jvkasipu:44410: śyena tila ity etayoḥ pātaśabde uttarapade ñapratyaye pare mumāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44416: rātreḥ kṛdanta uttarapade vibhāṣā mumāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44435: tasmāl luptanakārān nañaḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati ajādav uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:44440: pūrvānte hi ṅamo hrasvād aci ṅmuṇ nityam (*8,3.32)
GS24jvkasipu:44444: nabhrāṭ napāt navedāḥ nāsatyāḥ namuci nakula nakha napuṃsaka nakṣatra nakra nāka ity eteṣu nañ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44457: nakha - na asya kham asti iti nakham /
GS24jvkasipu:44458: napuṃsaka - na strī na pumān napuṃsakam /
GS24jvkasipu:44460: nakṣatra - na kṣarate kṣīyate iti vā najñātram /
GS24jvkasipu:44472: pūrvānto 'yam āduk kriyate padāntalakṣaṇo 'tra anunāsiko vikalpena yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:44485: sahaśabdasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:44493: udāttānudāttavato hi sahaśabdasya antaryataḥ svaritaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44500: granthānte adhike ca vartamānasya sahaśabdasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44505: saṅgrahāntam iti antavacane ity avyayībhāvaḥ samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44506: tatra avyayībhāve cākāle iti kālavāciny uttarapade samāso na prāpnoti ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44512: dvayoḥ sahayuktayor apradhāno yaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44513: upākhyāyate pratyakṣata upalabhyate yaḥ sa upākhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44515: tasmin dvitīye 'nupākhye sahasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44519: agnyādayaḥ sākṣād anupalabhyamānāḥ kapotādibhir anumīyamānāḥ anupākhyā bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:44522: avyayībhāve ca samāse akālavācini uttarapade sahasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44530: yasya sarve 'vayavā upasarjanībhūtāḥ sa sarvopasarjano bahuvrīhir gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44531: tadavayavasya sahaśabdasya vā sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44539: priyasahakṛtvā iti iha bahuvrīhau yad uttarapadaṃ tat paraḥ sahaśabdo na bhavati iti sabhāvo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:44542: prakṛtyā sahaśabdo bhavati āśiṣi viṣaye agovatsahaleṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:44553: samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye mūrdhan prabhṛti udakam ity etāni uttarapadāni varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:44568: sajātīyaḥ ity evam ādayaḥ siddhāḥ bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:44571: jyotis janapada rātri nābhi nāman gotra rūpa sthāna varṇa vayas vacana bandhu ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44585: caraṇe gamyamāne brahmacāriṇi uttarapade samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44588: tadadhyayanārthaṃ yad vrataṃ tad api brahma,
GS24jvkasipu:44590: samānaḥ tasya+eva brahmaṇeḥ samānatvad ity ayam artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44594: tīrthaśabda uttarapade yatpratyaye parataḥ samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44600: udaraśabde uttarapade yatpratyayānte samānasya vibhāṣā sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44602: samānodare śayita o ca+udāttaḥ (*4,4.108) iti yat //
GS24jvkasipu:44605: dṛk dṛśa vatu ity eteṣu parataḥ samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44609: ity atra samānānyayośceti vaktavyam iti kañkvinau pratyayau kriyete /
GS24jvkasipu:44616: idaṃ kim ity etayor īś kī ity etau yathāsaṅkhyam ādeśau bhavato dṛgdṛśavatuṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:44639: viṣvag-devayoś ca ṭer adry añcatau vapratyaye // PS_6,3.92 //
GS24jvkasipu:44641: viṣvak deva ity etayoḥ sarvanāmnaś ca ṭeḥ adri ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcatau vapratyayānte uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:44646: tatra yaṇādeśe kṛte udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:44654: ayaskāraḥ ity atra ataḥ kṛkamikaṃsakumbhapātra iti satvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44656: viśvāī ca ghṛtācī ca ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44657: kadrīcī ity atra tu bhavaty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:44660: sam ity etasya sami ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcatau vapratyayante uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:44664: tiras ity etasya tiri ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcāu vapratyayānte uttarapade 'lope,
GS24jvkasipu:44672: saha ity etasya saghriḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcatau vapratyānte uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:44679: chandasi viṣaye māda stha ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ sahasya sadha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44684: dvi antar ity etābhyāṃ upasargāc ca uttarasya ap ity etasya īkārādeśo bhavati / [721]
GS24jvkasipu:44697: anor uttarasya apaḥ ūkārādeśo bhavati deśābhidhāne /
GS24jvkasipu:44704: aṣaṣthīsthasya atṛtīyāsthasya ca anyaśabdasya dugāgamo bhavati āśis āśā āsthā āsthita utsuka ūti kāraka rāga cha ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44725: arthaśade uttarapade anyasya vibhāṣā dugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44729: ku ity etasya kta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati tatpuruṣe samāse ajādāv uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:44742: ratha vada ity etayoś ca+uttarapadayoḥ koḥ kat ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44747: dṛṇaśabde uttarapade jātāv abhidheyāyāṃ koḥ kat ity ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44753: pathin akṣa ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ koḥ kā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44758: īṣadarthe vartamānasya koḥ kā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44761: ajādāv api paratvāt kādeśa eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44766: puruṣaśabde uttarapade vibhāṣā koḥ kā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44769: īṣadarthe tu pūrvavipratiṣedhena nityaṃ kā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44773: uṣṇaśabde uttarapade koḥ kavam ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:44778: pathiśabde uttarapade chandasi viṣaye koḥ kavam kā ity etāv ādeśau bhavato vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:44784: yeṣu lopāgamavarnavikārāḥ śāstreṇa na vihitāḥ dṛśyante ca,
GS24jvkasipu:44801: ūrdhvakhaśabdayoḥ ulū khala ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44811: dikśabdebhya uttarasya tīrasya tārabhāvo vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44816: vāco vāde ḍatvaṃ ca labhāvaś ca+uttarapadasya+iñi pratyaye bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44822: dhāsu vā ṣaṣa utvaṃ bhavaty uttarapadādeśca ṣṭutvam /
GS24jvkasipu:44825: iha mā bhūt, ṣaṭ dadhāti dhayati vā ṣaḍdhā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44827: kucchreṇa dāśyate nāśyate dabhyate ca yaḥ sa dūḍāśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44839: varṇāgamo varṇaviparyayaś ca dvau cāparau varṇavikāranāśau /
GS24jvkasipu:44841: saṅkhyā-vi-sāya-pūrvasya ahnasya ahann anyatarasyāṃ ṅau // PS_6,3.110 //
GS24jvkasipu:44843: saṅkhyā vi sāya ity evaṃpūrvasya ahnaśabdasya sthāne ahan ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyāṃ ṅau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44854: ekadeśisamāsaḥ pūrvādibhyo 'nyasya api bhavati ity etad eva visāyapūrvasya ahnasya grahaṇaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:44855: tena madhyamahnaḥ madhyāhnaḥ ity api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44876: sahi vahi ity etayoḥ avarṇasya okāra ādeśo bhavati ḍhralope /
GS24jvkasipu:44893: sādhyai sāḍhvā sāḍhā iti nigame nipātyanate /
GS24jvkasipu:44903: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ saṃhitāyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44905: vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām /
GS24jvkasipu:44911: karṇaśabde uttarapade lakṣaṇavācino dīrgho bhavati viṣṭa aṣṭan pañcan maṇi bhinna chinna chidra sruva svastika ity etān varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:44917: yat paśūnāṃ svāmiviśeṣasambandhajñāpanārthaṃ dātrākārādi kriyate tad iha lakṣaṇaṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44932: nahi vṛti vṛṣi vyadhi ruci sahi tani ity eteṣu kvipratyayānteṣu uttarapadeṣu pūrvapadasya dīrgho bhavati saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:44952: vana giri ity etayor uttarapadayor yathāsaṅkhyaṃ koṭaradīnām kiṃśulukādīnāṃ ca dīrgho bhavati sajñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:44990: matau parato bahvaco 'jirādivarjitasya dīrgho bhavati sañjñāyām viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:45009: śarādīnāṃ ca matau dīrgho bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:45026: igantasya pūrvapadasya pīluvarjitasya vahe uttarapade dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45037: upasargasya ghañante uttarapade amanuṣye 'bhidheye bahulaṃ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45058: igantasya upasargasya kāśaśabde uttarapade dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45067: dā ity etasya yaḥ takārādir ādeśaḥ tasmin parataḥ igantasya+upasargasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45072: ity antasya yady api takāraḥ kriyate tathāpi cartvasyāśrayāt siddhatvam iti takārādir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45080: aṣṭan ity etasya uttarapade sañjñāyāṃ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45093: aṣṭau pādau asyāḥ iti bahuvrīhau pādasya lope kṛte pādo 'nyatarasyām (*4,1.8) iti ṅīp /
GS24jvkasipu:45094: gavi ca yukte bhāṣāyāmāṣṭano dīrgho bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45104: viśvaśabdasya vasu rāṭ ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ dirgha ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45107: rāṭ iti vikāranirdeśo yatra asya etad rūpaṃ tatra+eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:45113: naraśabda uttarapade sañjñāyām viṣaye viśvasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45119: mitre ca+uttarapade ṛṣāvabhidheye viśvasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45125: manraviṣaye soma aśva indriya viśvadevya ity eteṣāṃ matuppratyaye parataḥ dīrtho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45133: oṣadhiśabdasya vibhaktāv aprathamāyāṃ parataḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45142: ṛci viṣaye tu nu gha makṣu taṅ ku tra uruṣya ity eṣāṃ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45157: igantaraya suñi parato mantraviṣaye dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45166: vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām /
GS24jvkasipu:45175: nipātasya ca ṛgviṣaye dīrgḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45228: akṛta eva dīrghatve hrasvabhāvapakṣe kṛtārthena api dīrgheṇa pakṣāntare paratvād hrasvo bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45230: sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tadbādhitam eva iti //
GS24jvkasipu:45231: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ // [731]
GS24jvkasipu:45236: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ aṅgasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45252: aṅgādhikāraḥ kṛto 'nyārtho nāmi dīrghatvādyapi vyavasthāpayati iti tadartham arthavadgrahaṇaparibhāṣā nāśrayitavyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45253: aṅgasya iti sambandhasāmānye eṣā ṣaṣṭhī yathāyogaṃ viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:45256: tato 'kārāntād aṅgāt bhisa ais ity evam ādy api samyak sampannaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:45259: aṅgāvayavād dhalo yad uttaraṃ samprasāraṇam tadantasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45269: tṛtīyā iti vā nipātanād atra dīrghābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45274: nām iti etat ṣaṣṭhībahuvacanam āgatanuṭkaṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45284: nāmi dīrgha āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghe na nuṭ bhavet /
GS24jvkasipu:45288: tisṛ catasṛ ity etayoḥ nāmi dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45291: idam eva nāmi iti dīrghapratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam aci ra ṛtaḥ (*7,2.100)
GS24jvkasipu:45292: ity etasmāt pūrvavipratiṣedhena nuḍāgamo bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:45295: chandasi vaṣaye tisṛ-catasroḥ nāmi parataḥ ubhayathā dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:45303: nṛ ity etasya nāmi pare ubhayathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45305: tvaṃ nṛṇāṃ nṛpate kecid atra chandasi iti na anuvartayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:45309: nāntasya aṅgasya upadhāyāḥ nāmi parato dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45318: sarvanāmasthāne ca parato 'sambuddhau nopadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45329: ṣapūrvasya acaḥ nopadhāyāḥ nigamaviṣaye sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ asambuddhau vā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45338: sakārāntasya saṃyogasya yo nakāraḥ mahataś ca tasya+upadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ asambuddhau /
GS24jvkasipu:45352: svasṛ naptṛ neṣṭṛ tvaṣtṛ kṣattṛ hotṛ potṛ paśāstṛ ity eteṣāṃ cāṅgānām upadhāyā dīrgho bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parato 'sambuddhau /
GS24jvkasipu:45355: tatra samāsānto vidhiranityaḥ iti samāsānto na kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45356: nityam api ca numamakṛtva dīrghatvam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45381: evam bhūtānām anyeṣāṃ sañjñāśabdānāṃ dīrgho mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45388: in han pūṣan aryaman ity evam antānām aṅgānāṃ śau parata upadhāyā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45396: inhanpūṣāryamṇām upadhāyaḥ śāv eva dīrgho bhavati na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:45402: dīrghavidhirya ihenprabhṛtīnāṃ taṃ viniyamya suṭīti suvidvān /
GS24jvkasipu:45403: śau niyamaṃ punar eva vidadhyāt bhrūṇahanīti tathāsya na duṣyet //
GS24jvkasipu:45404: śāsmi nivartya suṭītyaviśeṣe śau niyamaṃ kuru vāpyasamīkṣya /
GS24jvkasipu:45405: dīrghavidherupadhāniyamānme hanta yi dīrghavidhau ca na doṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45407: yasya hi śau niyamaḥ suṭi naitattena na tatra bhavedviniyamyam //
GS24jvkasipu:45409: iti dīrghatvaṃ yat tad api niyamena bādhyate vṛtrahaṇi,
GS24jvkasipu:45415: śau eva sarvanāmasthāne dīrgho bhavati na anyatra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45417: yas tu na upadhālakṣaṇaḥ sa bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:45420: atha va anuvartamāne 'pi sarvanāmasthānagrahaṇe sāmarthyādayam aviśeṣeṇa niyamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45422: na ca tasya anyat sarvanāmasthānam asti ity aviśeṣeṇa niyamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45423: tatra tu napuṃsakasya ity etan na aśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45424: tena anapuṃsakasya api dīrgho na bhavati /
