GS24jvkasipu:45425: sarvanāmasthānasañjñāvidhāne tu napuṃsakasya vyāpāro 'sti iti tatra niyamaḥ kriyamaṇo napuṃsakasya syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:45428: sāv asambuddhau parataḥ inhanpūṣaryamṇām upadhāyā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45438: atu as ity evam antasya adhātor upadhāyāḥ sāvasambuddhau parataḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45444: yadi hi paratvān nityatvāc ca num syat,
GS24jvkasipu:45453: aninasmaṅgrahaṇānyarthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45461: anunāsikāntasya aṅgasya upadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati kvipratyaye parato jhalādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:45480: ajantānām aṅgānaṃ hanigamyoś ca sani jhalādau pare dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45488: iha mā bhūt sañjigaṃsate vatso mātra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45489: svargaṃ lokaṃ samajigāṃsat iti chandasi yadaniṅādeśasya api dīrghatvaṃ dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:45492: atha vā iha ajgrahaṇaṃ na kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45493: sani dīrgho bhavati ity etāvadeva sūtraṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45494: tatrācā gṛhyamāṇasya viśeṣaṇe sati siddham ajantasya dīrghatvam ?
GS24jvkasipu:45495: tat kriyate pravṛttibhedena gamer api viśeṣaṇārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:45498: tato na vaktavyam idaṃ gameriṅādeśasya iti //
GS24jvkasipu:45501: tanoter aṅgasya sani jhalādau vibhāṣā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45505: sanīvantardha ity atra tanoter upasaṅkhyānād iḍāgamo bhavati vikalpena //
GS24jvkasipu:45508: krama upadhāyā vibhāṣā dirgho bhavati ktvā pratyaye jhalādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45511: prakramya, upakramya iti bahiraṅgo 'pi lyabādeśo 'ntaraṅgānapi vidhīn bādhate iti pūrvam eva dīrghatvaṃ na pravartate //
GS24jvkasipu:45515: vakārasya ca sthāne yathāsaṅkhyam ś ūṭḥ ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:45516: anunāsikādau pratyayai parataḥ kvau jhalādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:45522: siverauṇādike na pratyaye laghūpadhaguṇāt pūrvamūṭḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45523: tatra kṛte 'ntaraṅgatvād yaṇādeśo nānāśrayatvāt ca na vārṇādāṅgaṃ balīyaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45529: asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgamantaraṅge iti nājānantarye iti pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45538: kecid atra kṅiti iti na anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45540: dyubhiḥ iti ūṭhi kṛte ? diva ut (*6,1.131)
GS24jvkasipu:45542: chaśāṃ ṣaḥ ity atra chagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45546: vāha ūṭḥ (*6,4.139) ity ayam api ṭhideva //
GS24jvkasipu:45549: jvara tvara srivi ava mava ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ vakārasya upadhāyāś ca sthāne ūṭḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati kvau parato 'nunāsike jhalādau ca kṅiti
GS24jvkasipu:45568: rephāduttarayoḥ chvorlopo bhavati kvau parato jhalādau kṅiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45581: rāllope sutukkasya chasya abhāvāt kevalo gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45595: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ tad asiddhavat bhavati ity evaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45599: tac ced atra yatra bhavati tadā bhāt śāstrīyaṃ vidhīyate tadāśrayam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45600: vyāśrayaṃ tu nāsiddhavad bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45603: edhi, śādhi ity atra etvaśābhāvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ jhallakṣaṇaṃ dhitvaṃ na prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:45605: āgahi, jahi ity atra anunāsika lope jabhāve ca ato heḥ (*6,4.105)
GS24jvkasipu:45611: iti vṛddhau kartavyāyāṃ nalopo nāsiddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45616: vasusaṃprasāraṇam āllope yaṇādeśe uvaṅādeśe ca kartavye nāsiddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45618: vasantasya vibhaktau saṃprasāraṇam iti samānāśrayatvaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:45623: tasyāṃ pravartamānāyāṃ vasusaṃprasāraṇādīnāmābhācchāstrīyāṇām eva asiddhatvād antaraṅgabahiraṅgayoḥ yugapat samupasthāpanaṃ na asti iti paribhāṣa na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:45641: supi ca (*7,3.102) iti paratvāt kṛte 'pi dīrghatve sthānivadbhavāt nalopaḥ syād eva /
GS24jvkasipu:45642: viśnānām, praśnānām ity atra lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya+eva ity evaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:45645: aniditām aṅgānāṃ halantānām upadhāyāḥ nakārasya lopo bhavati kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45660: aniditāṃ nalope laṅgikampyor upatāpaśarīravikārayor upasaṅkhyānaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45680: daṃśa sañja ṣvañja ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ śapi parata upadhāyā nakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45686: rañjeś ca śapi parataḥ upadhāyāḥ nakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45691: bhāvakaranavācini ghañi parato rañjeḥ upadhāyā nakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45701: ikprakaraṇāt na dhātulopaḥ iti pratiṣedho na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:45709: avoda edha odma praśratha himaśratha ity ete nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:45710: avoda iti underavapūrvasya ghañi nalopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45711: edha iti indher ghañi nalopo guṇaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45714: odma iti underauṇādike manpratyaye nalopo guṇaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45715: praśratha iti prapūrvasya śrantherghañi nalopo vṛddhyabhavaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45716: himaśratha iti himapūrvasya śrantheḥ ghañyeva nipātanam //
GS24jvkasipu:45719: añceḥ pūjāyām arthe nakārasya lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45731: ktvāprayaye parataḥ skanda syanda ity etayor nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45736: tatra yadā iḍāgamaḥ tadā na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18)
GS24jvkasipu:45740: jāntānām aṅgānāṃ naśeś ca ktvāpratyaye parataḥ vibhāṣā nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45747: bhañjeś ca ciṇi parato vibhāṣā nakāralopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45753: śāsa upadhāyā ikārādeśo bhavati aṅi parato halādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:45759: ittve kṛte śāsivasighasīnāṃ ca (*8,3.60) iti ṣatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:45763: kvau ca śāsa ittvaṃ bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45766: yasmāt śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ śāsu anuśiṣṭau iti,
GS24jvkasipu:45768: āṅaḥ śāsu icchāyām iti asya na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45771: kvippratyaye tu tasya api bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45777: śāso hau parataḥ śā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45781: tataḥ śāsaḥ iti sthāneyogā ṣaṣṭhī bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45784: iti pittvaṃ hiśabdasya tadā apy ādeśo bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:45785: śādhi ity ādyudāttam api chandasi dṛśyate //
GS24jvkasipu:45788: hanterdhātoḥ jaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati hau parata /
GS24jvkasipu:45792: anudāttopadeśānām aṅgānāṃ vanateḥ tanotyādīnāṃ ca anunāsikalopo bhavati jhalādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45843: lyapi parataḥ anudāttopadeśavanatitanotyādīnām anunāsikalopaḥ vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45857: ktici parato 'nudāttopadeśādīnām anunāsikalopaḥ dīrghaś ca na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45878: viṭi vani ca pratyaye parataḥ anunāsikāntasya aṅgasya ākāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45889: iti ṣatvam goṣā indo nṛṣā asi ity atra /
GS24jvkasipu:45894: anunāsikasya iti vartamāne punar anunāsikagrahaṇam anunāsikāmātraparigrahārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:45899: jana sana khana ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ sani jhalādau kṅiti jhalādau pratyaye parataḥ ākāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45916: atra jhalādau kṅiti sanoter vipratiṣedhād ātvam anunāsikalopaṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:45918: iti halgrahaṇam jñāpakam asminnasiddhaprakaraṇe vipratiṣedho bhavati iti // [742]
GS24jvkasipu:45921: yakārādau kṅiti pratyaye parato janasanakhanām ākāra ādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:45932: tanoteḥ yaki parato vibhāṣā ākāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45936: sanaḥ ktici lopaś ca asya anyatarasyām // PS_6,4.45 //
GS24jvkasipu:45938: sanoter aṅgasya ktici pratyaye parata ākāra ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:45942: yesambaddhaṃ hi vibhāṣāgrahaṇam iti nivṛttam ity āśaṅkyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:45946: na lyapi (*6,4.69) iti prāg etasmād yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ārdhahdātuke ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45953: pratyayalopalakṣaṇapratiṣedhārthaṃ syāt ity etan na jñāpakaṃ śapo lopābhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:45981: syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu bhāvakarmaṇor upadeśe 'jjhanagrahadṛśāṃ vā ciṇvadiṭ ca (*6,4.62) /
GS24jvkasipu:45985: hriyeta yagantasya ajantatvāc ciṇvadbhāve sati vṛddhiḥ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:45987: ato lopo yalopaś ca ṇilopaś ca prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:45988: āllopa ītvam etvam ca ciṇvadbhavaś ca sīyuṭi //
GS24jvkasipu:45991: bhrasjo rephasya upadhāyāś ca ram anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45992: ropadhayoḥ iti sthānaṣaṣṭhīnirdeśāt upadhā rephaś ca nivartete /
GS24jvkasipu:45999: bhṛṣṭaḥ, bhṛṣṭavān ity atra pūrvavipratiṣedhena samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46023: hala uttarasya yaśabdasya ārdhadhātuke lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46029: ity etan na bhavati, ato lopaḥ (*6,4.48)
GS24jvkasipu:46037: kyasya hala uttarasya vibhāṣā lopo bhavati ārdhadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:46041: samidham iva ātmānam ācarati iti vā kyackyaṅau yathāyogam kartavyau //
GS24jvkasipu:46068: seḍgrahaṇasāmarthyād iha pūrveṇa api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46072: atha punaḥ ekācaḥ iti tatra anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:46073: tadā nityam atra bhavitavyam eva iḍāgamena iti seḍgrahaṇam anarthakam ?
GS24jvkasipu:46076: akṛte hi tatra ṇilope sati kāritam ity atra ekāca upadeśe 'nudāttāt (*7,2.10)
GS24jvkasipu:46080: janitā iti mantraviṣaye iḍādau ṇilopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46085: yajñakarmaṇi śamitā iti iḍādau tṛci ṇilopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46092: ām anta ālu āyya itnu iṣṇu ity eteṣu parataḥ ṇeḥ ayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46107: lyapi parato laghupūrvād varṇād uttarasya ṇeḥ ayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46115: hrasvayalopāl lopānām asiddhatvaṃ na bhavati asamānāśrayatvāt,
GS24jvkasipu:46122: āpa uttarasya ṇerlyapi parato vibhāṣā ayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46129: yu plu ity etayor lyapi parataḥ chandasi viṣaye dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46136: kṣiyaś ca dīrgho bhavati lyapi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46141: tābhyām anyatra yā niṣṭhā tasyāṃ kṣiyo dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46146: prakṣīṇam idam devadattasya iti kto 'dhikaraṇe ca dhrauvya-gati. pratyavasānārthebhyaḥ (*3,4.76)
GS24jvkasipu:46150: kṣitam iti bhāve dīrghābhāvāt kṣiyo dīrghāt (*8,2.46)
GS24jvkasipu:46154: ākrośe gamyamāne dainye ca kṣiyo niṣṭhāyām aṇyadarthe vā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46160: sya-sic-sīyuṭ-tāsiṣu bhāva-karmaṇor upadeśe 'j-jhana-graha-dṛśāṃ vā ciṇvad-iṭ ca // PS_6,4.62 //
GS24jvkasipu:46162: sva sic sīyuṭ tāsi ity eteṣu bhāvakarmaviṣayeṣu parata upadeśe ajantānām aṅgānāṃ han graḥ dṛś ity eteṣāṃ ca ciṇvat kāryaṃ bhavati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:46168: ciṇvadvṛddhir yuk ca hanteś ca ghatvaṃ dīrghaś ca+ukto yo mitāṃ vā ciṇīti /
GS24jvkasipu:46169: iṭ ca asiddhas tena me lupyate ṇirnityaś ca ayaṃ valnimitto vighātī // [746]
GS24jvkasipu:46220: kāriṣyate iti guṇe kṛte raparatve ca na prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:46237: dīṅo yuḍāgamo bhavati ajādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46240: dīṅaḥ iti pañcamīnirdeśād ajāder yuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46242: iti yaṇādeśe kartavye tasya siddhatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46247: iṭy ajādāv ārdhadhātuke kṅiti ca ākārāntasya aṅgasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46262: rāter lāteś ca laṅi iṭi rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:46267: īkāraḥ ādeśo bhavati ākārantasya aṅgasya yati parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46275: mā sthā gā pā jahāti sā ity eteṣāṃ halādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46296: jahāter iha nirdeśāt jihāter grahaṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46304: etad eva halgrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam asmin prakaraṇe vipratiṣedhena asiddhatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46322: ghvādibhyaḥ anyasya saṃyogāder ākārāntasya vā ekārādeśo bhavati liṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46331: lyapi pratyaye parataḥ ghumāsthāgāpājahātisāṃ yaduktaṃ tanna /
GS24jvkasipu:46342: mayater ikārādeśo vā bhavati lyapi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46346: luṅ laṅ lṛṅ ity eteṣu parato 'ṅgasya aḍāgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:46372: auhyata iti laṅi kṛte lāvasthāyām aḍāgamād antaraṅgatvāl lādeśaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:46373: tatra kṛte vikaraṇo nityatvād aḍāgamaṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:46375: kṛte hi vikaraṇāntasya aṅgasya tena bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:46376: akṛte tu dhātumātrasya śabdāntarasya prāpnuvan vidhiranityo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46378: vikaraṇe kṛte samprasāraṇam aḍāgamān nityatvād eva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:46379: samprasāraṇe ca kṛte 'jādyaṅgaṃ jātam iti āḍajādīnām ity āḍāgamaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:46383: yatra hi vihitaḥ tato 'nyatra api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46389: āvaḥ iti vṛño luṅi mantre ghasahvara iti lerluki kṛte ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46394: māṅyoge luṅlaṅlṛṅkṣu yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46405: chandasi viṣaye māṅyoge 'pi bahulam aḍāṭau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:46410: māṅyoge 'pi bhavataḥ - mā vaḥ kṣetre parabījānyavāpsuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46415: ire ity etasya chadasi viṣaye bahulaṃ re ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46418: dhāño rebhāvasya asiddhatvād āto lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46421: atra reśabdasya seṭoṃ dhātūnāmiṭi kṛte punā rebhāvaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:46425: śnupratyayāntasya aṅgasya dhātoḥ ivarṇa-uvarṇāntasya bhru ity etasya iyaṅ uvaṅ ity etāv ādeśau bhavato 'jādau pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46451: iyaṅuvaṅprakaraṇe tanvādīnāṃ chandasi bahulam upasaṅkhyānaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:46462: abhyāsasya ivarṇovarṇāntasya avasarṇe 'ci parataḥ iyaṅ uvaṅ ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46474: strī ity etasya ajādau pratyaye parataḥ iyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46480: ami śasi parataḥ striyāṃ vā iyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46492: madhye 'pavadāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti guṇavṛddhibhyāṃ paratvādayaṃ bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46499: dhātor avayavaḥ saṃyogaḥ pūrvo yasmād ivarṇāna bhavati asāvasaṃyogapūrvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:46500: tadantasya aṅgasya anekāco 'ci parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46507: eḥ iti kim ? asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇam ivarṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:46509: luluvatuḥ, luluvuḥ ity etat tu oḥ supi (*6,4.83)
GS24jvkasipu:46517: iha api syād unnyau, unnyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46523: dhātv avayavaḥ saṃyogaḥ pūrvo yasmād uvarṇān na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:46524: tadantasya aṅgasya anekācaḥ ajādau supi parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46543: varṣābhū ity etasya ajādau supi parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46554: bhū sudhī ity etayor yaṇādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46561: chandasi viṣaye bhū sudhi ity etayoḥ ubhayathā dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46568: hu ity etasya aṅgasya śnupratyayāntasya anekācaḥ asaṃyogapūrvasya ajādau sārvadhātuke parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46577: idam eva huśnugrahaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ bhāṣāyām api yaṅlugasti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46580: naca yaṅlugantādayat pratyudāharaṇam uvarṇāntam anekāc asaṃyogapūrvaṃ sārvadhātuke vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46587: bhuvo vugāgamo bhavati luṅi liṭi ca ajādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46593: goho 'ṅgasya upadhāyā ūkārādeśo bhavati ajādau pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46603: yatra asya+etad rūpaṃ tatra+eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:46607: nigūhya gataḥ ity ūtvasya asiddhatvād lyapi laghupūrvād iti ṇerayādeśaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:46608: vyāśrayatvād eva asiddhatvam atra na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:46615: doṣaḥ upadhāyā ūkāraḥ ādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46622: cittavikarārthe doṣa upadhāyā vā ūkārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46629: mito dhātavaḥ ghaṭādayo mitaḥ ity evam ādayo ye pratipāditāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:46630: teṣām upadhāyā hrasvo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46640: saṅkrāmayati ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46643: ciṇpare ṇamulpare ca ṇau parataḥ mitām aṅgānām upadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati anyatarasyāṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:46653: śamayantaṃ prayuṅkte iti dvitīye ṇici hrasvavikalpo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:46654: ṇilopasya sthānivadbhāvād dīrghavidhau tvajādeśo na sthānivat /
GS24jvkasipu:46664: tayor dirghavidhau ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati iti asthānivadbhāvāt dīrghaḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46672: khacpare ṇau parato hrasvo bhavati aṅgasya upadhāyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46678: hlādo 'ṅgasya upadhāyāḥ hrasvo bhavati niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46688: chāder aṅgasya advyupasargasya ghapratyaye parataḥ upadhāyāḥ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46691: ṇilopasya asiddhatvaṃ sthānivadbhāvo vāvacanasāmarthyād atra na bhavati iti hrasvabhāvinī upadhā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46696: uttarā hi saṅkhyā pūrvasaṅkhyākṛtaṃ vyapadeśam nivartayati,
GS24jvkasipu:46700: is man tran kvi ity eteṣu parataḥ chādeḥ upadhāyāḥ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46708: gama hana jana khā ghasa ity eteṣām aṅgānām upadhāyā lopo bhavaty ajādau pratyaye kṅiti anaṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46727: tani pati ity etayoḥ chandasi viṣaye upadhāyā lopo bhavati ajādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46734: ghasi bhasa ity etayoḥ chandasi upadhāyā lopo bhavati lahādau ajādau ca kgiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46735: sagdhiś ca me sapītiś ca me /
GS24jvkasipu:46737: sagdhiḥ iti adeḥ ktini bahulaṃ chandasi iti ghaslādeśe upadhāyāḥ lope ca kṛte jhalo jhali (*8,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:46741: tataḥ samānā gdhiḥ sagdhiḥ iti samāse kṛte samānasya sabhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46742: babdhām iti bhaser loṭi tāmi ślau dvirvacane kṛte upadhālopasalopadhatvajaśtvāni kartavyāni /
GS24jvkasipu:46743: dvirvacanāt paratvān nityatvāc ca upadhālopaḥ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:46750: hu ity etasmād jhalantebhyas ca+uttarasya halādeḥ heḥ sthāne dhirādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46760: bhintāt tvam iti paratvāt tātaṅi kṛte sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhena yad badhitaṃ tad bādhitam eva iti punaḥ dhibhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46761: bhindhaki, chindhaki ity atra paratvād dhibhāve kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānād akac kriyate // [754]
GS24jvkasipu:46764: śru śṛṇu pṝ kṛ vṛ ity etebhya uttarasya heḥ dhirādeśo havati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:46770: śṛṇudhi ity atra dhibhāvavidhānasāmārthyād utaś ca pratyayāt iti herluk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46797: ahāritamām ity atra talopasya asiddhatvāt taraptamapor na lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46798: ciṇo luk ity etad viṣayabhedād bhidyate //
GS24jvkasipu:46801: akārāntād aṅgād uttarasya heḥ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46813: ukāro yo 'saṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantāt pratyayād uttarasya herluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46825: utaś ca pratyayādityatra chandasi vā iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:46829: lopaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ ṃvoḥ // PS_6,4.107 //
GS24jvkasipu:46831: yo 'yam ukāro 'saṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantasya pratyayasya anyatarasyāṃ lopo bhavati vakāram akārādau pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46843: karoteḥ uttarasya ukārapratyayasya vakāramakārādau pratyaye parataḥ nityaṃ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46852: yakārādauca pratyaye parataḥ karoteḥ uttarasya ukārapratyayasya nityaṃ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46856: ukārapratyayāntasya karoteḥ akārasya sthāne ukāraḥ ādeśo bhavati sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46867: śnasya asteś ca akārasya lopo bhavati sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46876: śnasoḥ iti ākārasya pararūpatvaṃ śakandhvādisu draṣṭavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:46879: śnā ity etasya abhyastānāṃ ca aṅgānām ākārasya lopo bhavati sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46897: śnāntānām aṅgānām abhyastānāṃ ca ghuvarjitānām ātaḥ īkārādeśo bhavati halādau sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46918: daridrāteḥ halādau sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ ikarādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46925: siddhaś ca pratyayavidhau bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:46929: na daridrāyake lopo daridrāṇe ca neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46933: daridrasya iti nirdeśe chāndasaṃ hrasvatvam draṣtavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:46936: bhī ity etasya aṅgasya anyatarasyām ikārādeśo bhavati halādau kṅiti sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46946: jahāteś ca ikārādeśo bhavati anyatarasyāṃ halādau kṅiti sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46956: jahāter ākāraś ca antādeśo bhavati ikāraś ca anyatarasyāṃ hau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46960: lopo bhavati jahāteḥ yakārādau kṅiti sārvadhātuke parataḥ / [756]
GS24jvkasipu:46964: ghusañjñākānām aṅgānām asteś ca ekārādeśo bhavati hau parataḥ abhyāsalopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:46973: liṭi parata ādeśaḥ ādir yasya aṅgasya na asti tasya ekahalmadhye asahāyayor halor madhye yo 'kāras tasya ekārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47007: rūpābhede cādeśādir na aśrīyate iti śasidadyoḥ pratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:47011: demuḥ ity evam ādīnām api prakṛtijaścarādīnām etvaṃ na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:47022: aneśam iti naśeḥ luṅi puṣāditvād aṅ /
GS24jvkasipu:47023: menakā iti maneḥ āśiṣi ca (*3,1.150) iti vun /
GS24jvkasipu:47037: thali ca seṭi parato 'nādeśādeḥ aṅgasya ekahalmadhyagatasya ataḥ sthāne ekāra ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47052: tṝ phala bhaja trapa ity eteṣām aṅgānām ata ekārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47053: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:47073: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:47081: ataḥ ity etad iha+upasthitaṃ taparatvakṛtamapāsya kālaviśeṣam asambhavād avarṇamātraṃ pratipādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:47084: ekahalmadhye vā yaḥ sa sthānī bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:47087: jṝ bhramu trasa ity eteṣām aṅgānām ataḥ sthāne vā ekāra ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47088: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:47109: phaṇādīnāṃ saptānāṃ dhātūnām avarṇasya sthāne vā ekāra ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47110: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:47150: śasa dada ity etayoḥ vakārādīnāṃ ca dhātūnāṃ guṇa ity evam abhinirvṛttasya ca yo 'kāraḥ tasya sthāne ekārādeśo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47164: guṇaśabdābhinirvṛttasya arśabdasya okārasya ca ayam akāraḥ iti etvaṃ pratiṣidhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:47167: arvan ity etasya aṅgasya tṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47169: sa ca naña uttaro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47182: maghavan ity etasya aṅgasya bahulaṃ tṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47202: bhasya ity ayam adhikāraḥ ā adhyāyaparisamāapteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47203: yad ita ūrdhvam anukamiṣyāmaḥ bhasya ity evaṃ tadvedivyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47212: tadantasya aṅgasya bhasya pat ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47213: sa ca nirdiśyamānasyādeśā bhavanti iti pācchabdasya+eva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47232: ākāralope kartavye vasusaṃprasāraṇasya vyāśrayatvād asiddhatvam na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47236: vāhaḥ ity evam antasya bhasya ūṭḥ ity etat samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47246: samprasāraṇe eva kṛte guṇe ca vṛddhir eci (*6,1.88)
GS24jvkasipu:47247: iti vṛddhau satyām siddhaṃ rūpaṃ bhavati praṣṭhauhaḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:47251: bhavatyeṣā paribhāṣā asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47252: tasyāṃ hi satyāṃ bahiraṅgasya samprasāraṇasya asiddhatvāt antaraṅgo guṇo na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:47255: śvan yuvan maghavan ity eteṣām aṅgānām ataddhite pratyaye parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47283: an ity evam antasya bhasya akāralopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47295: ṣakārapūrvo yaḥ an hanaḥ dhṛtarājñaś ca tasya akāralopo bhavati aṇi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47302: an iti prakṛtibhāvena allopaṭilopau ubhāvapi na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47306: ṅau parataḥ śīśabde ca ano vibhāṣā akāralopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47312: vakāra-makārāntāt saṃyogād uttarasya anaḥ akārasya lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47356: halaḥ śnaḥ śānac ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati // [762]
GS24jvkasipu:47359: mantreṣu āgi parataḥ ātmanaḥ āderlopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47369: bhasya viṃśateḥ tiśabdasy aṅiti pratyaye lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47377: ṭisañjñakasya ḍiti pratyaye parataḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47384: ḍiti abhasya api anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyat ṭilopo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:47387: nakārāntasya bhasya ṭeḥ lopo bhavati taddhite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47395: atra ye innantāḥ teṣām in aṇy anapatye (*6,4.164)
GS24jvkasipu:47397: ye tu anantāḥ teṣām an (*6,4.167) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47405: śaiśikeṣv artheṣu vṛddhatvād atra chaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:47432: śāśvataḥ ity evam ādiṣu na dṛśyate ṭilopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:47435: ahan ity etasya ṭakhor eva parataḥ ṭilopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47437: dve ahanī adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dvyahīnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47442: iha mā bhūt, ahnā nirvṛttam āhnikam /
GS24jvkasipu:47444: ahnaḥ eva ṭakhoḥ ity evaṃ niyamo na bhavisyati,
GS24jvkasipu:47449: uvarṇāntasya bhasya guṇo bhavati taddhite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47458: orot iti vaktavye guṇagrahaṇaṃ sañjñāpūrvako vidhir anityo yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:47462: ḍhe parataḥ uvarṇāntasya bhasya akarvāḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47471: ivarṇāntasya avarṇātasya ca bhasya ikāre pare taddhite ca lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47475: savarnadīrghatve hi sati atisakher āgacchati ity atra ekādeśasya antavattvād askhi iti ghisañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:47491: auṅaḥ śībhāve kṛte yasya+iti ca iti,
GS24jvkasipu:47503: sūrya tisya agastya matsya ity eteṣāṃ yakārasya upadhāyāḥ bhasya lopo bhavati īti paratastaddhite ca /
GS24jvkasipu:47505: aṇi yo yasya+iti lopaḥ tasya asiddhatvaṃ na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:47507: īkāre tu yastasyā - siddhatvād upadhāyakāro bhasyāṇantasya sūryasya sambandhī iti lupyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47519: iha mā bhūt, matsyasya+idaṃ māṃsaṃ mātsyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47525: iha mā bhūt, sauryam caruṃ nirvapet /
GS24jvkasipu:47531: antikaśabdasya tasipratyaye parataḥ kakāradeḥ śabdasya lopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:47535: tamapratyaye antikaśabdasya takārādeḥ kakārādeś ca lopo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47547: hala uttarasya taddhitayakārasya upadhāyāḥ īti parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47555: āpatyayakārasya halaḥ uttarasya taddhite anākārādau lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47570: kya cvi ity etayoś ca parataḥ āpatyayakārasya hala uttarasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47588: tebhyaḥ uttarasya chasya bhasya taddhite parato lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47603: anyathā hi saṃniyogaśiṣṭānām anyatarāpāye ubhayor api abhāvaḥ iti kugapi nivarteta /
GS24jvkasipu:47608: iṣṭhan imanic īyasun ity eteṣu parataḥ tṛśabdasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47616: lug ity etad atra na anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:47631: ṇāviṣṭhavat prātipadikasya kāryaṃ bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47653: sthūla-dūra-yuva-hrasva-kṣiprakṣudrāṇāṃ yaṇādiparaṃ pūrvasya ca guṇaḥ // PS_6,4.156 //
GS24jvkasipu:47655: sthūla dūra yuva hrasva kṣipra kṣudra ity eteṣāṃ yaṇādiparaṃ lupyate iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:47676: hrasīyān ity atra pūrvasya yaṇāderlopo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:47680: priya sthira sphira uru bahula guru vṛddha tṛpra dīrgha vṛndāraka ity eteṣāṃ pra
GS24jvkasipu:47681: stha spha var baṃhi gar varṣi trap drādhi vṛnda ity ete yathāsaṅkhyam ādeśā bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:47709: tena anyeṣāmimanij na bhavati iti nodāhriyate // [768]
GS24jvkasipu:47710: bahor lopo bhū ca bahoḥ // PS_6,4.158 //
GS24jvkasipu:47713: tasya ca bahoḥ sthāne bhū ity ayam ādeśo bhavati / [767]
GS24jvkasipu:47718: anyathā hi pratyayānām eva bhūbhāvaḥ syāt // [768]
GS24jvkasipu:47730: lopasya yiṭā vyavahitatvāt āt ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47731: lope hi sati akṛdyakāra iti dīrghatvena jyāyān iti sidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:47734: raśabda ādeśo bhavati ṛkārasya halāder laghoḥ iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47753: pṛthuṃ mṛduṃ bhṛśaṃ ca+eva kṛśaṃ ca dṛḍham eva ca /
GS24jvkasipu:47754: paripūrvaṃ vṛḍhaṃ ca+eva ṣaḍetān ravidhau smaret //
GS24jvkasipu:47761: ṛju ity etasya ṛtaḥ sthāne vibhāṣā repha ādeśo bhavati iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:47766: ekāc yad bhasañjñākaṃ tad iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47774: ake pratyaye parato rājanya manuṣya yuvan ity ete prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:47792: aṇi iti kim ? daṇḍināṃ samūho dāṇḍam /
GS24jvkasipu:47799: gāthin vidathin keśin gaṇin paṇin ity ete ca aṇi prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:47808: saṃyogādiś ca in aṇi prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47814: annantamaṇi prakṛtyā bhavati apatye cānapatye ca /
GS24jvkasipu:47821: yakārādau ca taddhite abhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ an prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47829: ātman adhvan ity etau khe parataḥ prakṛtyā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47840: mapūrvaḥ an avarmaṇo 'ṇi parato 'patye 'rthe na prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47854: brāhmaḥ ity etad apatyādhikāre 'pi sāmarthyād apatyād anyatrāṇi ṭilopārthaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47860: apatye ātāvaṇi brahmaṇaṣ ṭilopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47875: etaj jñāpayati tācchīlike ṇe 'ṇkṛtāni bhavanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47876: tena caurī, tāpasī iti ṇāntād api īkāraḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47881: aukṣam iti anapatye 'ṇi ṭilopo nipātyate aukṣaṃ padam /
GS24jvkasipu:47887: dāṇdināyana hāstināyana ātharvaṇika jaihmāśineya vāsināyani bhrauṇahatya dhaivatya sārava aikṣvāka maitreya hiraṇmaya ity etāni nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:47888: daṇḍin hastin ity etau naḍādiṣu paṭhayete,
GS24jvkasipu:47890: keṣāṃcit tu hastin iti naḍādiṣu na paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:47891: teṣām ata eva nipātanāt phagapi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47895: atharvaṇā prokto grantho 'pi upacārāt atharvan iti ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:47905: bhrūṇahan, dhīvan ity etayoḥ ṣyañi parataḥ takārādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47909: iti yat tatvaṃ tad dhātupratyaya eva iti bhrauṇaghnaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:47912: sārava iti sarayū ity etasya aṇi parato yūśabdasya va ity ādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47925: tato ḍhañi kṛte yāderiyādeśāpavādo yuśabdalopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47927: atha kimarthaṃ mitrayuśabdo bidādiṣv eva na paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:47928: tatrāñi kṛte yādeḥ iti iyādeśenaiva siddham,
GS24jvkasipu:47929: evaṃ ca yulopārthaṃ nipātanaṃ kartavyaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47930: yaskādiṣu ca bahuṣu lugarthaḥ pāṭho na kartavyo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47934: mitrayūṇāṃ saṅghaḥ ity atra gotracaraṇād vuñaṃ bādhitvā maitreyakaḥ saṅghaḥ ity atra saṅgha-aṅka-lakṣaṇeṣv añ. yañ-iñām aṇ (*4,3.127)
GS24jvkasipu:47936: hiraṇmayam iti hiraṇyasya mayaṭi yādilopo nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:47940: ṛtvya vāstvya vāstva mādhvī hiraṇyaya ity etāni nipātyante chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:47941: ṛtu vāstu ity etayoḥ yati yaṇadeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47948: hiraṇyaśabdād vihitasya mayaṭo maśabdasya lopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47950: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:47954: yu vu ity etayoḥ utsṛṣṭaviśeṣaṇayoḥ anunāsikayaṇoḥ pratyayayor grahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:47955: tayoḥ sthāne yathāsaṅkhyam ana aka ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47969: evam ādīnāṃ hi yaṇo 'nunāsikatvaṃ na pratijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:47971: iha yuvor iti nirdeśād dvandvaikavadbhāvapakṣe anityam āgamaśāsanam iti num na kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47972: napuṃsakaliṅgatā vā liṅgamaśiṣyaṃ lokāśrayatvāl liṅgasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47974: yuvoś ced dvitvanirdeśo dvitve yaṇ tu prasajyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47975: atha ced ekavadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ puṃvad bhavedayam //
GS24jvkasipu:47977: aśiṣyatvād dhi liṅgasya puṃstvaṃ veha samāśritam //
GS24jvkasipu:47980: āyan ey īn īy iy ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pha ḍha kha cha gha ity eteṣā pratyayādīnām /
GS24jvkasipu:48008: śaṅkhaḥ, ṣaṇḍhaḥ ity evam ādīnāṃ hi uṇādayo bahulam iti bahulavacanād ādeśā na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48009: ṛter īyaṅ (*3,1.29) iti vāvacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ dhātupratyayānāmādeśābhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:48011: ity evam ādiṣu tu itsañjñayā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48012: taddhiteṣu hi khakāraghakārayor ādeśavacanam avakāśavaditi itsañjñāṃ bādhituṃ na+utsahate /
GS24jvkasipu:48019: pratyayāvayavasya jhasya anta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48023: adya śvo vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ saha śayāntai /
GS24jvkasipu:48029: asminn apy antādeśe kṛte pratyayādyudāttvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48030: tathā ca jhacaḥ citkaraṇam arthavac bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48033: abhyastā daṅgād uttarasya jhakārasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48049: tasya anakārāntāt aṅgāt uttarasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48061: nityatvād atra vikaraṇe kṛte jho 'ntādeśena bhavitavyam ity adādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48063: iha mā bhūt, adya śvo vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ śayāntai //
GS24jvkasipu:48066: śīṅo 'ṅgād uttarasya jhādeśasya ataḥ ruḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48071: sa yadi jhakārasya+eva syād adādeśo na syād ity ata eva ayam ādeśasya āgamo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48077: vetter aṅgād uttarasya jhādeśasya ato vibhāṣā ruḍhāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48099: ity etad api bahulavacanād eva atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48102: akārāntād aṅgād uttarasya bhisaḥ ais ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48106: jarāmatikrāntaiḥ iti vigṛhya samāse kṛte hrasvatve ca bhisa aisādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48108: sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti paribhāṣā iyam anityā,
GS24jvkasipu:48116: etvam bhisi paratvāc ced ata ais kva bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48117: kṛte 'py etve bhautapūrvyādais tu nityas tathā sati //
GS24jvkasipu:48118: ataḥ ityadhikāro jasaḥ śī iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:48128: idam adas ity etayoḥ akakārayoḥ bhisa ais na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48133: akoḥ ity etad eva pratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam tanmadhyapatitastadgrahanena gṛhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48135: viparīto 'pi niyamaḥ sambhāvyeta idamadasor eva kāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48143: akārāntād aṅgād uttareṣām ṭāṅasiṅasām ina āt sya ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti yathāsaṅkhyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48157: yathā tu bhāṣye tathā na+etad iṣyate iti lakṣyate // [776]
GS24jvkasipu:48161: akārāntād aṅgād uttarasya ṅe ity etasya yaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48166: sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti paribhāṣeyam anityā,
GS24jvkasipu:48170: akārāntāt sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya ṅeḥ smai ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48178: tatra antaraṅgatvād ekādeśāt pūrvaṃ smaibhāvaḥ kriyate paścād ekādeśaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48181: ṅasi ṅi ity etayor akārāntāt sarvanāmnaḥ uttarayoḥ smāt smin ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48200: pūrvādibhyo navabhyaḥ sarvanāmnaḥ uttarayoḥ ṅasiṅyoḥ smāt smin ity etāv ādeśau vā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48223: akārāntāt sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya jasaḥ śī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48232: ābantād aṅgād uttarasya auṅaḥ śī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48239: aukāro 'yaṃ śīvidhau ṅidgṛhīto ṅiccāsmākaṃ na asti ko 'yaṃ prakāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48240: sāmānyārthas tasya ca asañjane 'smin ṅitkāryaṃ te śyāṃ prasaktam sa doṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:48241: ṅittve vidyād varṇanirdeśamātraṃ varṇe yat syāt tac ca vidyāt tadādau /
GS24jvkasipu:48242: varṇaścāyam tena ṅittve 'py adoṣo nirdeśo 'yaṃ pūrvasūtreṇa vā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:48245: napuṃsakād aṅgād uttarasya auṅaḥ śī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48256: napuṃsakād aṅgād uttarayoḥ jaśśasoḥ śi ity ayam ādeśo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48263: jasā sahacaritasya śaso grahaṇād iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:48269: tasmād uttarayoḥ jaśśasoḥ auś ity ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48275: etad eva kṛtātvasya grahaṇaṃ jñāpakam aṣṭana ā vibhaktau (*7,2.84)
GS24jvkasipu:48281: iti, tasmin prāpte ca aprāpte ca iti sa na bādhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:48287: priyāṣṭanaḥ ity atrātvasya abhāvād auśtvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48299: yatra tu upasarjanaṃ ṣaṭ tato na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:48304: su am ity etayoḥ napuṃsakād uttarayoḥ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48311: tadbrāhmaṇakulam ity atra lukā tyadādyatvaṃ bādhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:48316: yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittaṃ vihanyate na tadanityaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48319: akārāntān napuṃsakād uttarayoḥ svamoḥ am ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48327: ḍatarādibhyaḥ parayoḥ svamoḥ adḍ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48339: katarat tiṣṭhati ity atra pūrvasavarnadīrgho mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:48340: iha tu katarat paśya iti sthanivadbhāvād ami pūrvaṃtvena api sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48341: evaṃ tarhi takārādeśa eva kasmān na vidhīyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:48342: he katarat iti sambuddher lopo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:48344: aḍḍittvāḍ ḍatarādīnāṃ na lopo na api dīrghatā //
GS24jvkasipu:48347: itaraśabdād uttarayoḥ svamoḥ chandasi viṣaye adḍādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48353: ato 'm (*7,1.24) ity asmād anantaram itarāc chandasi iti vaktavyam ?
GS24jvkasipu:48354: netarācchandasi iti vacanaṃ yogavibhagartham ekatarād dhi sarvatra chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ pratiṣedha iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48359: yuṣmad asmad ity etābhyām uttarasya ṅasaḥ aś ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48369: ṅe ity etasya prathamayoś ca vibhaktyoḥ prathādvitīyayoḥ yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarayoḥ am ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48393: yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya bhyasaḥ bhyam ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48396: bhyamādeśe kṛte śeṣelope ca bahuvacane jhalyet (*7,3.103)
GS24jvkasipu:48398: tat aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttāvavidhirniṣṭhitasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48405: pañcamyāḥ bhyasaḥ yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati yuṣmad gacchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48409: pañcamyā ekavacanasya yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48415: tasya yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya ākam ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48421: ādeśe kṛte hi śeṣelope yuṣmadasmador akārāntatvāt suṭ prāptnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:48424: akami tu sati hrasvakaraṇe tadvidhānasāmarthyād eva savarṇadīrghatvaṃ na prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:48425: tatsāmarthyam etvaṃ prati bhaviṣyati iti akārakaraṇametvanivṛttyartham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48429: ākārāntād aṅgād uttarasya ṇalaḥ aukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48437: dvirvacanam ity anena krameṇa kāryāṇi kriyante /
GS24jvkasipu:48438: ekādeśād anavakāśatvād autvaṃ dvirvacanād api paratvād ekādeśaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48441: tu hi ity etayoḥ āśiṣi viṣaye tātaṅ ādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:48447: ṅittvāc cāsya sthānivadbhāvāt yat pittvaṃ prāpnoti tannivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:48450: iti brūtād bhavān iti īṭ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48454: tātaṅi ṅitvaṃ saṅkramakṛt syādantyavidhiś cet tacca tathā na /
GS24jvkasipu:48455: heradhikāre heradhikāro lopavidhau tu jñāpakam āha //
GS24jvkasipu:48456: tātaṅo ṅittvasāmarthyān na ayam antyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48460: vida jñāne ity etasmād dhātor uttarasya śatuḥ vasurādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48462: sthānivadbhāvādugitkārye siddhe vasoḥ ukārakaraṇaṃ vasoḥ samprasāraṇam (*6,4.131)
GS24jvkasipu:48464: ekānubandhakagrahaṇe na dvyanubandhakasya ity etad api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48470: samāse 'nañpūrve ktvā ity etasya lyap ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48482: anañ iti nañā anyadanañ nañsadṛśam avyayaṃ parigṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48483: tena nañ anavyayaṃ canañ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48484: snātvākālakādiṣu mayūravyaṃsakādiṣu nipātanāl lyabādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48487: sa ca yena vidhis tadantasya ity anena tadantavidhinā,
GS24jvkasipu:48488: na tu kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48490: gatikārakapūrvasy eva tu grahaṇe sati nañpūrvasya prasaṅga eva na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:48491: nañ na gatir na kārakam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48492: pradhāya, prasthāya ity ādiṣu hiprabhṛtīn antaraṅgan api vidhīn bahiraṅgo lyab bādhate eva iti jñāpitam etat //
GS24jvkasipu:48495: samāse anañpūrve ktvā ity etasya ktvā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:48508: chandasi viṣaye supāṃ sthāne su luk pūrvasavarṇa ā āt śe yā ḍā ḍyā yāc āl ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48521: yasmin sunvanti tasmin sāmidhenīḥ iti prāpte / [782]
GS24jvkasipu:48534: yuyādeśo vayādeśaś ca chandasatvān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48553: īkāraḥ - dṛtiṃ na śuṣkaṃ sarasī śayānam /
GS24jvkasipu:48571: makārasya api hi makāravacanam anusvāranivṛttyarthaṃ syāt // [783]
GS24jvkasipu:48574: ātmanepadeṣu yastakāraḥ tasya chandasi viṣaye lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48588: chandasi viṣaye dhvamo dhvāt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48593: yajadhvam ity etasya enam ity etasmin parato makāralopo nipātyate vakārasya ca yakāraḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48598: taśabdasya loṇmadhyamapuruṣabahuvacanasya sthāne tāt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48610: chandasi viṣaye tasya sthāne tap tanap tana thana ity ete ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48625: chandasi viṣaye mas ity ayaṃ śabdaḥ ikārānto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48637: ktvā ity etasya yagāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48641: ity asya antantaram idaṃ kasmān na+ucyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:48645: iṣṭvīnam ity ayaṃ śabdo nipātyate chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48653: snātvī ity evam ādayaḥ śabdā nipātyante chandasi visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48661: avarṇāntāt aṅgād uttarasya jaseḥ asuk āgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:48664: ye pūrvāso ya uparāsaḥ ity atra paratvād asuki punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt śibhāvaḥ prāptaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:48665: sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tad bādhitam eva iti na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48669: aśva kṣīra vṛṣa lavaṇa ity eteṣām aṅgānām ātmaprītiviṣaye kyaci parato 'sugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48690: avarṇāt sarvanāmna uttarasya āmaḥ suḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48702: iti , tasya hi paratvāt āḍyāṭsyāṭo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48706: sānubandhakau iti vā tau na gṛhyete /
GS24jvkasipu:48708: iha tu sarvanāmnaḥ iti pañcamīnirdeśāt tasmād ity uttarasya (*1,1.67)
GS24jvkasipu:48712: tri ity etasya āmi pare traya ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48718: hrasvāntāt nadyantāt ābantāc ca+uttarasya āmaḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48758: śrī grāmaṇī ity etayoḥ chandasi viṣaye āmo nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48764: sūtagrāmaṇīnām iti yadā sūtāś ca te grāmaṇyaś ca sūtagrāmaṇyo bhavanti tadartham idaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:48765: yadā tu sūtaś ca grāmaṇīś ca sūtagrāmaṇi,
GS24jvkasipu:48766: sūtagrāmaṇi ca sūtagrāmaṇi ca sūtagrāmaṇi ca iti sūtagrāmaṇīnām iti,
GS24jvkasipu:48770: go ity etasmāt ṛkpādānte vartamānād uttarasya āmaḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48771: vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām /
GS24jvkasipu:48774: sarve vidhayaśchandasi vikalpyante iti pādānte 'pi kvacin na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48775: hantāraṃ śatrūṇāṃ kṛdhi virājaṃ gopatiṃ gavām //
GS24jvkasipu:48789: ayaṃ dhātūpadeśāvasthāyām eva nugāmamo bhavati kuṇḍā,
GS24jvkasipu:48795: dhātugrahaṇam ca+iha kriyate dhātūpadeśakāla eva numāgamo yathā syāt ity evam artham /
GS24jvkasipu:48796: tāsisicoriditkāryaṃ na asti ity uccāraṇārtho niranunāsika ikāraḥ paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48797: amaṃsta ity evam ādau hi hanaḥ sic (*1,2.24)
GS24jvkasipu:48799: mantā ity atra api asiddhavad-atra-ā bhāt (*6,4.22)
GS24jvkasipu:48800: iti ṭilopasya asiddhatvān nalopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48803: iritāṃ samudāyasyetsañjñā iti iditvaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:48809: śe pratyaye parato mucādīnam numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48825: tṛpha tṛmpha tṛptau dṛpha ḍrmpha utkleśe,
GS24jvkasipu:48828: śubha śumbha śobhārthe ity atra ye sānuṣaṅgāḥ tṛmphādayaḥ teṣām aniditāṃ hala upadhāyāḥ kṅiti (*6,4.24)
GS24jvkasipu:48843: masji naśi ity etayor aṅgayoḥ jhalādau pratyaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48852: masjer antyāt pūrva numam icchanti anuṣaṅgādilopārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:48857: radhi jabhi ity etayoḥ ajādau pratyaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48872: iḍādau aliṭi pratyaye pare radher numāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48882: iti kittvaṃ na asti iti nalopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48888: atha iṭi liṭi ity evaṃ niyamaḥ kasmān na kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:48889: liṭy eva iṭi na anyatra iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:48891: iṭy eva liṭi na anyatra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48892: tathā hi sati rarandha ity atra na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:48893: radhitā ity atra ca syād eva //
GS24jvkasipu:48896: rabheraṅgasya śabliḍvarjite 'jādau pratyaye parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48907: labheś ca ajādau pratyaye śabliḍvarjite numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48919: āṅaḥ uttarasya labheḥ yakārādiprayayaviṣaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48922: prāk pratyayotpatteḥ numi kṛte vihitamadupadhatvam iti ṛhalor ṇyat (*3,1.124)
GS24jvkasipu:48929: atha vā ālabhyaḥ ity atra numi kṛte 'nuṣaṅgalopaḥ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:48932: upād uttarasya labheḥ praśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ yakārādipratyayaviṣaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48941: upasargād uttarasya labheḥ khalghañoḥ parataḥ numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48948: upasargādeva labheḥ khalghañoḥ parato numāgamo bhavati, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:48953: su dur ity etābhyāṃ kevalābhyām anyopasargarahitābhyām upasṛṣṭasya labheḥ khalghañoḥ parataḥ numāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48961: sudurbhām iti tṛtīyāṃ matvā kevalagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48963: atisulabham ity atra karmapravacanīyatvād eteḥ kevala eva suśabda upasargaḥ iti bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48965: tadā num bhavati eva atisulambhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48969: ciṇ ṇamul ity etayoḥ vibhāṣā labher num bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48980: ugitāmaṅgānāṃ dhātuvarjitānām añcateśca sarvanāmasthāne parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48994: añcater eva dhātor anyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:49001: atra hi dhātutvād añcatigrahaṇān na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:49004: yujer asamāse sarvanāmasthāne parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49008: yujeḥ iti ikāranirdeśāt yuja samādhau ity asya grahaṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49012: napuṃsakasya jhalantasya ca sarvanāmasthāne parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49028: ugito jhalantasya napuṃsakasya paratvād anena+eva num bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49039: igantasya napuṃsakasya aṅgasya ajādau vibhaktau numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49051: he trapo ity atra num mā bhūt, iti,
GS24jvkasipu:49055: iti pratyayalakṣaṇe pratiṣiddhe vibhaktir eva na asti ?
GS24jvkasipu:49056: etad eva ajgrahaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedho 'tra na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49060: iko 'ci vyañjane mā bhūdastu lopaḥ svaraḥ katham /
GS24jvkasipu:49061: svaro vai śrūyamāṇe 'pi lupte kiṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:49063: nuḍ vācya uttarārthaṃ tu iha kiñcit trapo iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49066: tṛtīyādiṣu vibhaktiṣv ajādiṣu bhāṣitapuṃskam igantaṃ napuṃsakaṃ gālavasyācāryasya matena puṃvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49068: tadvad atra api na bhavataḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49108: samānāyāmākṛtau yad bhāṣītpuṃskaṃ tulye pravṛttinimatte tasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49109: iha tu vṛkṣākṛtiḥ pravṛttinimittaṃ puṃsi śabdasya,
GS24jvkasipu:49111: tad etad evaṃ kathaṃ bhavati bhāsitapuṃskam iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:49112: bhāṣitaḥ pumān yasminn arthe pravṛttinimitte sa bhāsitapuṃskaśabdena ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:49113: uadyogād abhidheyam api yad napuṃsakaṃ tad api bhāṣitapuṃsakam /
GS24jvkasipu:49114: tasya pratipādakaṃ yac chabdarūpaṃ tad api bhāṣitapuṃskam iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:49122: asthi dadhi sakthi akṣi ity eteṣā napuṃsakānāṃ tṛtīyādiṣu ajādiṣu vibhaktiṣu parato 'naṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49133: teṣām anaṅādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvād anudāttaḥ syāt iti udāttavacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:49134: tatra bhasañjñāyām allope kṛte udāttanivṛttisvareṇa vibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49135: etair asthyādibhir napuṃsakair anapuṃsakasya api aṅgasya tadantagrahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49159: dvivacane parataḥ chandasi viṣaye asthyādīnām īkārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49163: akṣī ity atra num paratvādīkāreṇa badhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49164: tena kṛte sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tad bādhitam eva iti punar num na kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:49167: abhyastād aṅgād uttarasya śatuḥ num na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49172: śaturanantara īkāro na vihitaḥ iti vyavahitasya api numaḥ pratiṣedho vijñāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:49175: abhyastād aṅgād uttaro yaḥ śatṛpratyayas tadantasya napuṃsakasya vā numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49182: avarṇāntād aṅgād uttarasya śatuḥ vā numāgamo bhavati śīnadyoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49194: atra antaraṅgatvād ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt avarṇāntā daṅgād uttarasya śatuḥ iti na yujyate vaktum,
GS24jvkasipu:49195: ubhayata āśraye nāntadivat ity antādivadbhāvo 'pi nāsti,
GS24jvkasipu:49197: ghnatī ity evam ādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:49199: śaturavayave śatṛśabdo vartate avarṇāntād aṅgād uttaro yaḥ śatravayavaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49202: avarṇāntād aṅgād uttare ye śīnadyau tayoḥ parataḥ śatrantasya num bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49203: tatra yena nāvyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti takāreṇa eva vyavadhānam āśrayiṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49210: śap śyan ity etayoḥ śatuḥ śīnadyoḥ parato nityaṃ numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49217: nityagrahaṇam vā ity asya adhikārasya nivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:49218: ihārambhasāmarthyān nityam uttaratra vikalpa eva aśaṅkyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:49224: atra kecit āt ity adhikārād āmamoḥ kṛtayoḥ numaṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:49227: apare tu saty api sāmānyaviśeṣatve āmamoḥ numaś ca samāveśam icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:49232: dṛk svavas svatavas ity eteṣāṃ sau parato numāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:49241: div ity etasya sau parataḥ aut ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49248: pathin mathin ṛbhukṣin ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ sau parataḥ ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49253: bhāvyam anena savarṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti śuddho hy ayam ucvāryate //
GS24jvkasipu:49256: pathyādīnām ikārasya sthāne akārādeśo bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49265: āt iti vartāmāne punar advacanaṃ ṣapūrvārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:49266: ṛbhukṣaṇam ity atra vā ṣapūrvasya nigame (*6,4.9)
GS24jvkasipu:49270: pathimathoḥ thakārasya sthāne nthaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49285: sarvanāmasthāne ity anuvartamānam api virodhād iha na sambadhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:49288: puṃsa ity etasya sarvanāmasthāne parato 'suṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49290: iha paramapumān iti prāg eva vibhaktyutpatteḥ samāsāntodāttatvam,
GS24jvkasipu:49291: utpannāyāṃ vibhaktau asuñ ity aniṣṭaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:49304: aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttāvavidhirniṣṭhitasya iti sambuddhijasorgune kṛte ṇittvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49305: atha vā gotaḥ iti sambadhalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī,
GS24jvkasipu:49307: yac ca tadarthasyaikatvādiṣu sarvanāmasthānaṃ tad goḥ sarvanāmasthānam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49311: dyośabdād api yat sarvanāmasthānaṃ vidyate tadartham /
GS24jvkasipu:49313: gotaḥ ity etad eva taparakaraṇanirdeśāt okārāntopalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49318: ṇitkāryaṃ tatra vā bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49325: asambuddhau yaḥ sakhiśabdaḥ tasmāt paraṃ sarvanāmasthānaṃ ṇit bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49331: sakhiśabdasya sau parataḥ anaṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49332: sa cet suśabdaḥ sambuddhiḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49337: ṛkārāntānām aṅgānām uśanas purudaṃsas anehas ity eteṣām ca asambuddhau sau parataḥ anaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49352: uśanasaḥ sambuddhau api pakṣe anaṅ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49357: tathā coktam - sambodhane tūśanastrirūpaṃ sāntaṃ tathā nāntamathāpyadantam /
GS24jvkasipu:49358: mādhyandinirvaṣṭi guṇaṃ tvigante napuṃsake vyāghrapadām variṣṭhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:49363: kroṣṭuśabdaḥ tunpratyayāntaḥ sañjñāśabdaḥ sarvanāmasthāne 'sambuddhau parataḥ tṛjvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49364: tṛjantasya yad rūpaṃ tadasya bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49366: prayāsatteś ca kruśer eva ṛjantasya ya rūpaṃ tadatidiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49367: tac ca kroṣtṛ ity etad antodāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:49381: teṣāṃ pañcabhiḥ kroṣṭrībhiḥ krītaiḥ pañcakroṣṭṛbhī rathaiḥ iti strīśabdasya luki kṛte na sidhyati,
GS24jvkasipu:49392: tṛtīyādiṣu vibhaktiṣu ajādiṣu kroṣṭurvibhāṣā tṛjvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49407: catur anaḍuḥ iy etayoḥ sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ ām āgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49438: cikīrṣati ity atra api yathā syāt iti dhātugrahaṇaṃ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:49446: oṣthyaḥ pūrvo yasmād ṝkārāt asau oṣṭhyapūrvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:49452: dantyoṣṭhyapūrvo 'py oṣṭhyapūrvo bhavati ity atra api bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49455: oṣṭhyo hy atra pratyāsatter aṅgāvayava eva gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:49456: tena ṝ gatau ity asya sampūrvasya samīrṇam iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49466: chandasi viṣaye ṝkārāntasya dhātor aṅgasya bahulam ukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49476: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya prathamḥ pādaḥ // ______________________________________________________//
GS24jvkasipu:49480: parasmaipadapare sici parataḥ igantasya aṅgasya vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49487: antaraṅgam api guṇam eṣāṃ vṛddhirvacanād bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:49488: nyanuvīt, nyadhuvīt ity atra kuṭāditvāt ṅittve sati pratiṣiddhāyāṃ vṛddhau uvaṅādeśaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49493: rephalakārau yāvataḥ antau samīpau tadantasya aṅgasya ata eva sthāne vṛddhiḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49507: atra yau rephalakārau aṅgasya antau na tāvataḥ samīpau //
GS24jvkasipu:49510: vadavrajoḥ halantānāṃ ca aṅgānām acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati sici parasmaipade parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49518: atra yogavibhāge sati halantagrahaṇam antareṇa api sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:49519: katham ? vadivrajyoḥ ity atra prathamayoge ataḥ iti sthānī anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:49520: tato yat acaḥ iti sūtraṃ tatra aṅgena ajviśeṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:49521: aṅgasya acaḥ sici parataḥ vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49525: anyathā hi yena na avyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt ity ekena varṇena vyavadhāne syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:49527: udavoḍhām, udavoḍham ity atra vaheḥ sici ḍhatvasalopādīnām pūrvatra asiddham (*8,2.1)
GS24jvkasipu:49528: ity asiddhatvāt pūrvaṃ halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:49530: tatra kṛte punar vṛddhir na bhavati, kṛtatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49536: iḍhādau sici halanatasya aṅgasya vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49542: nanu ca etad apy antaraṅgatvāt guṇāvādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ halantaṃ bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:49544: antaraṅgam api guṇam vacanārambhasāmarthyāt sici vṛddhir bādhate ity uktam // [798]
GS24jvkasipu:49548: kṣaṇa śvasa jāgṛ ṇi śvi ity eteṣām,
GS24jvkasipu:49549: editāṃ ca iḍādau sici parasmaipade parato vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49562: hmyantakṣaṇaśvasām editām ca ato halāder laghoḥ (*7,2.7)
GS24jvkasipu:49564: jāgṛṇiśvīnāṃ tu sici vṛddhiḥ prāptā, sā ca neṭi (*7,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:49566: na ca antaraṅgatvād atra pūrvaṃ guṇo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49568: yadi pūrvaṃ guṇaḥ syād iha ṇiśvigrahaṇam anarthakaṃ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:49569: guṇāyādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ yakārantatvād eva pratiṣedhasya siddhatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49570: tasmād idam eva śvigrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam na sidyantaraṅgam asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49573: iti jāgarter guṇo vṛddher apavādo vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:49575: iti vṛddhiṃ bādhate tathā sici vṛddhim api bādhiṣyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:49578: iti ya vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti sā pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49580: yathā jāgarayati ity atra ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,1.113)
GS24jvkasipu:49582: tathā ciṇṇaloḥ pratiṣedho 'rthavān bhavati iti śakyam iha jāgṛgrahaṇam akartum ?
GS24jvkasipu:49586: ūrṇoter iḍādau sici parasmaipadapare parato yibhāṣā vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49591: ṅittvapakṣe tu guṇavṛddhyor abhāve uvaṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49595: halāder aṅgasya laghor akārasya iḍādau sici parasmaipadapare parato vibhāṣā vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49601: ity atra ataḥ ity asminnasati sthāninirdeśārthamacaḥ ity etad anuvartayitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49602: tatra ajlakṣaṇā vṛddhir iglakṣaṇā na bhavati iti kṅiti ca (*7,2.118)
GS24jvkasipu:49609: atha+iha kasmān na bhavati acakāsīt iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:49610: yena nāvyavadhānam tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti halā vyavadhānam āśritam,
GS24jvkasipu:49611: na punaracāpi vyavadhānam iti vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49612: atha punar ekena varṇena vyavadhānam aśrīyate na punar anekena iti kalpane śakyamakartuṃ laghoḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:49613: atakṣīt ity atra anekena vyavadhānam iti na bhavisyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:49618: vaśādau kṛti pratyaye parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49634: tena ñamantāḍḍaḥ ity evam ādāv api hi pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49642: ti tu tra ta tha si su sara ka sa ity eteṣu kṛtsu iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49677: hasitam ity eva hi tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49716: upadeśe ya ekāc dhātur anudāttaś ca tasmād iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49720: ta eva vispaṣṭārtham aniṭkārikāsu pravibhaktāḥ pradarśyante / [800]
GS24jvkasipu:49721: aniṭsvarānto bhavati iti dṛśyatāmimāṃstu seṭaḥ pravadanti tadvidaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49722: adantamṝdantamṛtāṃ ca vṛṅvṛñau śviḍīṅivarṇeṣv atha śīṅśriñāvapi //
GS24jvkasipu:49723: guṇasthamūdantamutāṃ ca rusnuvau kṣuvaṃ tathorṇotimatho yuṇukṣṇavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49724: iti svarāntā nipuṇaṃ samuccitāstato halantān api sannibodhata //
GS24jvkasipu:49738: utāṃ ca ursnuvau kṣuvaṃ tathorṇotimatho yuṇukṣṇavaḥ - ravitā /
GS24jvkasipu:49742: vācya ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvo yaṅprasiddhiḥ prayojanam ity atideśād ekāctvam ūrṇoter asti iti udātta upadiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49746: iti svarāntā nipuṇaṃ samuccitās tato halantān api sannibodhata /
GS24jvkasipu:49747: śakistu kānteṣvaniḍeka iṣyate ghasiśca sāntesu vasiḥ prasāraṇī /
GS24jvkasipu:49752: vasa nivāse ity asya yajāditvāt saṃprasāraṇaṃ vihitam,
GS24jvkasipu:49753: na tu vasa ācchādane ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:49754: sabhistu bhānteṣv atha maithune yabhistatastṛtīyo labhireva netare //
GS24jvkasipu:49758: yamiryamanteṣvaniḍeka iṣyate ramisca yaśca śyani paṭhyate maniḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49759: namiścaturtho hanireva pañcamo gamiśca ṣaṣṭhaḥ pratiṣedhavācinām //
GS24jvkasipu:49769: ime 'niṭo 'ṣṭāviha muktasaṃśayā gaṇeṣu hāntāḥ pravibhajya kīrtitāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:49786: diśiṃ dṛśiṃ daṃśimatho mṛśiṃ spṛśiṃ riśiṃ ruśiṃ krośatimaṣṭamaṃ viśim /
GS24jvkasipu:49787: liśaṃ ca śāntānaniṭaḥ purāṇagāḥ paṭhanti pāṭheṣu daśaiva netarān //
GS24jvkasipu:49793: ṛdupadhānām udāttopadeśānāṃ mṛjidṛśī varjayitvā anudāttasya cardupadhasya anyatarasyām (*6,1.59)
GS24jvkasipu:49801: ime tu dhāntā daśa ye 'niṭo matāstataḥ paraṃ sidhyatir eva netare //
GS24jvkasipu:49813: budhyatisidhyatyoḥ śyanā nirdeśāt nyāyyavikaraṇayor buddhisidhyor iḍ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:49818: śiṣiṃ piṣiṃ śuṣyatipuṣyatī tviṣiṃ viṣiṃ śliṣiṃ tuṣyatiduṣyatī dviṣim /
GS24jvkasipu:49833: kṛṣestaudādikasya bhauvādikasya ca kṛṣikarṣatī iti nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49834: tapiṃ tipiṃ cāpimatho vapiṃ svapiṃ lipiṃ lupiṃ tṛpyatidṛpyatī sṛpim /
GS24jvkasipu:49835: svareṇa vīcena śapiṃ chupiṃ kṣipiṃ pratīhi pāntān paṭhitāṃstrayodaśa //
GS24jvkasipu:49852: adiṃ hadiṃ skandibhidicchidikṣudīn śadiṃ sadiṃ svidyatipad yatī khidim /
GS24jvkasipu:49853: tudiṃ nudiṃ vidyati vinta ity api pratīhi dāntān daśa pañca cāniṭaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:49863: svidyati iti śyanā nirdeśo ñiṣvidā ity asya grahaṇaṃ mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49870: vidyati vinta ity api śyanā śnamā ca nirdeśo 'nyavikaraṇanivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49874: paciṃ vaciṃ viciricirañjipṛcchatīn nijiṃ siciṃ mucibhajibhañjibhṛjjātīn /
GS24jvkasipu:49875: tyajiṃ yajiṃ yujirujisañjimajjatīn bhujiṃ svajiṃ sṛjimṛjī viddhyaniṭsvarān //
GS24jvkasipu:49906: tathā ca tantrāntare nijivijiṣvañjivarjam ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:49916: śri ity etasya ugantānāṃ ca kiti pratyaye parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49938: sautratvāc ca nirdeśasya śryukaḥ kiti ity atra cartvasya asiddhatvamanāśritya rorutvaṃ na kṛtam visarjanīyaś ca kṛtaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49940: ity atra sthā ā ity ākārapraśleṣeṇa sthāsnoḥ siddhatvān na kiṃcid etat /
GS24jvkasipu:49942: tīrṇa ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49943: itve hi kṛte raparatve cana syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49945: iṭ sani vā (*7,2.41) iti vikalpe vihite yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15)
GS24jvkasipu:49948: yady evam itve hi kṛte na ayam ṝkarānto bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:49962: graha guha ity etayoḥ ugantānāṃ ca sani pratyaye parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49968: iti vikalpavidhānāt śrayatir atra na anukṛsyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49973: kṛ sṛ bhṛ vṛ stu dru sru śru ity eteṣāṃ liṭi pratyaye iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49991: vṛño hi thali vavartha iti nipātanād vyavasthā /
GS24jvkasipu:49993: ity asmād api niyamāt ya iṭ prāpnoti so 'pi neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50021: niṣṭhāyām ity adhikāraḥ ārdhadhātukasya+iḍ-valādeḥ (*7,2.35) iti yāvat // [804]
GS24jvkasipu:50024: yasya dhātoḥ vibhāṣā kvacid iḍ uktaḥ tasya niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50032: tanipatidaridrāṇām upasaṅkhyānam iti pater vibhāṣiteṭkasya api dvitīyāśritātītapatita (*2,1.24)
GS24jvkasipu:50036: āditaś ca dhator niṣthāyam iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50047: āditaś ca vibhāṣā bhāvādikarmaṇoḥ ity evaṃ paṭhitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:50051: jñāpayati - yad upādher vibhāṣā tad upādheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50053: ity atra viderlābhārthasya vibhāṣā iti jñānārthasya pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50058: bhave ādikarmaṇi ca ādito dhātoḥ vibhāṣā niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50073: kṣubdha svānta dhvānta lagan mliṣṭa viribdha phāṇṭa bāḍha ity ete nipātyante yathāsaṅkhyaṃ mantha manaḥ tamaḥ sakta avispaṣṭa svaraḥ anāyāsa bhṛśa ity eteṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:50078: kṣubdhā girinadī ity evam ādyupamānāt bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:50091: itvam apy ekārasya nipātanād eva viribdham iti svaraś cet /
GS24jvkasipu:50094: anye tu viribhitam anyat iti paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:50099: yadaśṛtamapiṣṭaṃ ca kaṣāyamudakasamparkamātrāt vibhaktarasamīṣaduṣṇaṃ tat phāṇṭam /
GS24jvkasipu:50103: bāhṛ prayatne ity asya dhātor etan nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:50108: tatra dhṛṣa śasa ity etayoḥ niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50116: dhṛṣiśasyoḥ vaiyātye eva iḍ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50124: dṛḍha iti nipātyate sthūle balavati cārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:50132: tatra apy etad eva sarvaṃ nalopavarjam,
GS24jvkasipu:50135: ḍhalope hi sati tasya pūrvatra asiddhatvāt draḍhimā,
GS24jvkasipu:50137: draḍhayati ity atra ra ṛto halāderlaghoḥ (*6,2.161)
GS24jvkasipu:50139: iha ca paridraḍhyya gata iti lyapi laghupūrvāt (*6,4.56)
GS24jvkasipu:50141: iha ca paridṛḍhasyāpatyaṃ pāridṛḍhī kanyā iti gurūpottamalakṣaṇaḥ ṣyaṅ ca prasajyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:50146: parivṛḍha iti nipātyate prabhuś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50150: vṛhiśca yadi prakṛtiyantaram asti tasya api tad eva sarvam /
GS24jvkasipu:50155: parivṛḍhamācaṣṭe iti vigṛhya vṛḍhaśabdād eva ṇijutypadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50156: saṃgrāmayater eva sopasargāṇ ṇijutpattir iṣyate na anyasmāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50159: parivraḍhayya ity atra pariśabdasya ktvāpratyayāntena samāse sati lyabādeśaḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50165: kṛcchra gahana ity etayor arthayoḥ kaṣer dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50170: tatkāraṇam apy agnyādikaṃ kṛcchram ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50177: ghuṣer dhātor aviśabdane 'rthe niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50186: viśabdanapratiṣedhaś ca jñāpakaścurādiṇij viśabdanārthasya anityaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50187: tena ayam api prayogaḥ upapanno bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50192: sam ni vi ity etebhya uttarasya ardeḥ niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50201: abhiśabād uttarasya ardeḥ āvidūrye 'rthe niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50210: etasmād eva nipātanāt na nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt (*5,1.121)
GS24jvkasipu:50211: ity uttarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratiṣedho na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50214: ṇyantasya vṛtter niṣṭhāyām adhyayanārthe vṛttam iti iḍabhāvaḥ ṇiluk ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50221: tena nirvṛttam iti hi prakṛṭer eva karmaṇi ktapratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50222: tadvad iha api ṇyarthavṛtter eva ca vṛteḥ vṛtto guṇo devadattena iti bhaviṣyati iti nipātanam anarthakam ?
GS24jvkasipu:50223: tat kriyate yadāpi ṇicaiva ṇyartho 'bhidhīyate tadāvartitam ity adhyayane mā bhūt iti kecit /
GS24jvkasipu:50224: apare tu vartito guṇo devadattena ity api icchanti // [807]
GS24jvkasipu:50228: dam śam pūrī das spaś chad jñap ity eteṣāṃ ṇyantānāṃ dhātūnāṃ vā aniṭtvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50237: jñaptes tu bharajñapisanām iti vikalpavidhānāt yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15)
GS24jvkasipu:50238: iti nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte vikalpārthaṃ nipātanam //
GS24jvkasipu:50242: ruṣi ama tvara saṅghuṣa āsvana ity eteṣāṃ niṣṭhāyāṃ vā iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50250: āditaś ca (*7,2.16) iti pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:50257: sampūrvasya ghuṣer aviśaddane 'pi paratvād ayam eva vikalpo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50262: āṅpūrvasya svaner mano 'bhidhāne 'pi paratvādayaṃ vikalpaḥ kṣubdhasvānta iti nipātanaṃ bādhate //
GS24jvkasipu:50265: lomasu vartamānasya hṛṣer niṣṭhāyāṃ vā iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50275: tayor ubhayor iha grahaṇam ity ubhayatra vibhāṣā iyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50276: lomāni mūrdhajāni aṅgajāni ca sāmānyena gṛhyante,
GS24jvkasipu:50277: yathā lomanakhaṃ spṛṣṭvā śaucaṃ kartavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50278: tadviṣaye ca harṣe vartamāno lomasu vartate ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50292: apapūrvasya cāyteḥ niṣṭhāyām aniṭtvaṃ cibhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50300: hvarateḥ dhātor niṣṭhāyaṃ chandasi hru ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50307: hru ity etasya ādeśasya abhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50311: hvaritaḥ iti hvarater niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo guṇaś ca nipātyate chandasi viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:50317: grasita skabhita stabhita uttabhita catta vikasta viśastṛ śaṃstṛ śāstṛ tarutṛ tarūtṛ
GS24jvkasipu:50318: varutṛ varūtṛ varūtrīḥ ujjvaliti kṣariti kṣamiti vamiti amiti ity etāni chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:50319: tatra grasita skabhita stabhita uttabhita iti grasu skambhu stambhu ity eteṣām udittvān niṣṭhāyām iṭpratiṣedhe prāpte iḍāgamo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50328: uttabhita iti utpūrvasya nipātasāmarthyād anyopasargapūrvaḥ stabhitaśabdo na bhavati / [809]
GS24jvkasipu:50329: catta, vikasta iti cateḥ kaseś ca vipūrvasya niṣṭhāyām iḍabhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50330: cattā varṣeṇa vidyut catitā iti bhāṣāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:50336: viśastṛ śaṃstṛ śāstṛ iti śaser vipūrvasya śaṃseḥ śāseś ca tṛci iḍabhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50343: tarutṛ tarūtṛ varutṛ varūtṛ varūtrīḥ iti tarateḥ vṛṅvṛñoś ca tṛci uṭ ūṭ ity etāv āgamau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:50352: idam api hi bhavati - ahorātrāṇi vai varūtrayaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50356: tata eva ṅīpi sati siddho varūtrīśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50357: ujjvaliti kṣariti kṣamiti vamiti amiti iti ca jvalater utpūrvasya kṣara kṣama vama ity eteṣāṃ ca tipi śapaḥ ikārādeśo nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:50369: itikaraṇaṃ pradarśanārtham tena kvacit īkāro bhāvati,
GS24jvkasipu:50370: ravimabhyamīti varuṇaḥ ity api hi vede paṭhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:50385: ity etasmin niyamārthe vajñāyamāne pratipattigauravam bhavati iti ārdhadhātukagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50390: iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇaṃ pratiṣedhanivṛttyartham // [810]
GS24jvkasipu:50395: na cet snukramī ātmanepadasya nimittaṃ bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50399: tena ayam saty ātmanepade pratiṣedho bhavati na asati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50415: sarvatra+eva atra snaitiḥ kramiś ca ātmanepadasya nimittam /
GS24jvkasipu:50420: iha tu prasnavitevācarati iti prasnavitrīyate iti kyaṅatam ātmanepadasya nimittam, na snautiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50421: krames tu kartaryātmanepadaviṣayādasatyātmanepade kṛti pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50429: snauteḥ sani kiti ca pratyaye śryukaḥ kiti (*7,2.11)
GS24jvkasipu:50437: grahaḥ uttarasya iṭaḥ aliṭi dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50450: tasmād uttarasya ṝkārāntebhyaś ca iṭo vā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50461: vṛtaḥ uttarasya iṭo liṅi dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50468: parasmaipadapare sici vṝta uttarasya iṭo dīrghaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50493: iti iṭpratiṣedhe prāpte pakṣe iḍāgamo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50496: cikīrṣati, jihīrṣati ity atra+upadeśādhikārāt lākṣaṇikatvāc ca iḍāgamo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50499: vṝto liṅi sici ca ātmanepadapare vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50517: ṛdantād dhātoḥ saṃyogādeḥ uttarayoḥ liṅsicorātmanepadeṣu vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50534: abhāktatvāc ca suṭa iḍāgamo na bhavati // [812]
GS24jvkasipu:50537: svarati sūti sūyati dhūñ ity etebhyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50538: ūdidbhyaśca+uttarasya valāder ārdhadhātukasya vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50543: ūdhidbhyaḥ khalv api - gāhū - vigāḍhā, vigāhitā /
GS24jvkasipu:50545: vā iti vartamane punar vāgrahaṇaṃ liṅsicor nivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:50546: sūtisūyatyor vikaraṇanirdeśaḥ ṣū preraṇe ity asya nivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50547: dhūñ iti sānubandhakasya nirdeso dhū vidhūnane ity asay nivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50548: savitā, dhuvitā ity eva nityam etayor bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50559: radha hiṃsāsaṃsiddhyoḥ ity evam ādibhyo 'ṣṭābhya uttarasya valāder ārdhadhātukasya vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50570: krādiniyamāl liṭi radhādibhyaḥ paratvād vikalpaṃ kecid icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:50572: pūrvavidheriṇniṣedhavidhānasāmarthyāt balīyastvaṃ pratiṣedhaniyamasya iti nityamiṭā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50577: nir ity evaṃ pūrvāt kuṣa uttarasya valāder ārdhadhātukasya vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50585: nisaḥ iti vaktavye niraḥ iti nirdeśena rephāntam upasargāntaram asti iti jñāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50586: tasya hi nilayanam iti upasargasya ayatau (*8,2.19)
GS24jvkasipu:50588: niso hi rutvasya asiddhatvāl latvaṃ na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:50602: takārādāv ārdhadhātuke iṣu saha lubha ruṣa ity etebhyo vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50604: iṣu icchāyām ity asya ayaṃ vikalpa iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50605: yas tu iṣa gatau iti daivādikaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50609: yo 'pi iṣa ābhīkṣṇye iti kṛyādau paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:50611: tadartham eva tīṣasaha iti sūtre kecit uditamiṣaṃ paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:50620: ṛdhu bhrasja dambhu śri svṛ yu ūrṇu bhara jñapi san ity eteṣāṃ ca sani vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50638: bhara iti bhṛñ ity etasya bhauvādikasya grahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:50658: kliśū vibādhane ity asya ktvāyāṃ vikalpaḥ siddha eva niṣṭhāyāṃ tu yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15)
GS24jvkasipu:50660: kliśa upatāpe ity etasya tu ktvāyāṃ niṣṭhāyāṃ ca nityam iḍāgamaḥ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:50664: pūṅaś ca ktvāniṣṭhayor vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50673: vasateḥ kṣudheś ca ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iḍāgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50681: vastes tu udāttatvād eva bhavitavyam iṭā /
GS24jvkasipu:50685: añceḥ pūjāyām arthe ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50688: udito vā (*7,2.56) iti ktvāpratyaye vikalpaḥ prāptaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50697: lubho vimohane 'rthe vartamānāt ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50714: jṝ vraści ity etayoḥ ktvāpratyaye iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50723: udito dhātoḥ ktvāpratyaye parato vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50729: sakārādāvasici ārdhadhātuke kṛta cṛta chṛda tṛda nṛta ity etebhyo dhātubhyo vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50764: gamer dhātoḥ sakārāder ārdhadhātukasya parasmaipadesu iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50781: ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya gameḥ ayam iḍāgamo neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50788: padaśeṣakārasya punar idaṃ darśanam - gamyupalakṣaṇārthaṃ parasmaipadagrahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:50789: parasmaipadeṣu yo gamir upalakṣitas tasmāt sakārāder ārdhadhātukasya iḍ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50794: vṛtādibhyaś caturbhyaḥ uttarasya sakārāder ārdhadhātukasya parasmaipadeṣu iḍagamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50808: vṛdgrahaṇaṃ hi tatra dyutādiparisamāptyartham kriyate - kṛpū sāmarthye vṛt iti,
GS24jvkasipu:50809: tad eva yadi vṛtādisamāptyartham api vijñāyate na kiñcidaniṣṭaṃ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:50810: tat kriyate syanderūdillakṣaṇam antaraṅgam api vikalpaṃ pratiṣedho yathā bādheta iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50811: caturgrahaṇe hi sati tātparyeṇa syandiḥ saṃnidhāpito bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50817: atra api ātmanepadena samānapadasthebhyo vṛtādibhya iḍāgama iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50819: kṛtyapi hi parasmaipadaluki ca pratiṣedho bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50824: kṛpa uttarasya tāseḥ sakārādeś ca ardhadhātukasya parasmaipadeṣu iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50834: kḷper apy ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iḍāgamaḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50836: kṛtyapi hi parsamipadaluki ca pratiṣedho bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50839: acas tāsvat thaly aniṭo nityam // PS_7,2.61 //
GS24jvkasipu:50871: upadeśe yo dhāturakāravān tāsau nityāniṭ tasmāt tāsāviva thali iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50889: ṛkārāntād ghātoḥ bhāradvājasya acāryasya matena tāsāviva nityāniṭasthali iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50901: tathā hi sati vidhyartham etat syāt // [817]
GS24jvkasipu:50904: babhūtha ātatantha jagṛbhma vavartha ity etāni nipātyante nigamaviṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:50914: krādisūtrād eva asya pratiṣedho siddhe niyamārthaṃ vacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:50919: sṛji dṛśi ity etayoḥ thali vibhāṣā iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50924: atti arti vyayati ity eteṣāṃ thali iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50935: pratiṣedhavidhāne ca artigrahaṇam iti nityo 'yaṃ vidhiḥ iḍgrahaṇam antareṇa api śakyate vijñātum //
GS24jvkasipu:50945: dhātvabhyāsayoḥ ekādeśe kṛte etvābhyāsalopayoś ca kṛtayoḥ kṛtadvirvacanā ete ekāco bhavanti āt - yayivān /
GS24jvkasipu:50949: ekājād ghasām eva vasāviḍāgamo bhavati na anayeṣām /
GS24jvkasipu:50954: krādiniyamāt pratiṣedhābhāvāc ca ya iṭ prasaktaḥ sa niyamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50956: dvirvacane hi kṛte iṭi hi sati āto lopena bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50957: daridrātes tu kāsyanekājgrahaṇaṃ culumpādyartham ityāmā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50959: athāpyām na kriyate tathāpi ca daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaś ca pratyayavidhau iti prāg eva pratyayotpatter ākāre lupte iḍāgamasya nimittaṃ vihataṃ iti na iḍāgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50961: ghaser api yadi grahaṇam iha na kriyate tadā dvirvacanāt paratvād ghasibhasorhali ca (*6,4.100)
GS24jvkasipu:50962: iti upadhālope kṛte dvirvacanam eva na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:50964: iha tu ghasigrahaṇād upadhālopam api paratvāt iḍāgamo bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:50972: gama hana vida viśa ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ vasau vibhāṣā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50979: viśinā sāhacaryād iha videstaudādikasya lābhārthasya grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:50980: jñānārthasya tu nityaṃ vividvān ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50985: sanoteḥ sanater vā dhātoḥ saniṃsasanivāṃsam iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50988: saniṅpūrvāt anyatra senivāṃsam ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50993: ṛkārāntānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hanteś ca sye iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50997: svarater veṭtvāt ṛddhanoḥ sye ity etad bhavati vipratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:51009: stu su dhūñ ity etebhyaḥ sici parasamipade parata iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51018: yama rama nama ity eṣām aṅgānām ākārāntānāṃ ca sagāgamo bhavati parasmaipade sici,
GS24jvkasipu:51028: yamādīnāṃ halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ prāptā sā neṭi pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51034: smiṅ pūṅ ṛ añjū aśū ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ sani iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51042: aśeḥ ūdito grahaṇāt aśnoter nityam iḍāgamo 'sty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:51058: rudādibhyaḥ uttarasya valādeḥ sārvadhātukasya iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51069: īśa uttarasya se ity etasya sārvadhātukasya iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51074: īḍa jana ity etābhyām uttarasya dhve ity etasya,
GS24jvkasipu:51075: sye ity etasya ca sarvadhātukasya iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51084: janī prādurbhāve ity asya chāndasatvāt śyano luk upadhālopābhāvaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:51085: jana janane ity asya api śluvikaraṇasya grahaṇam atra+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51090: dhveśabde īśer api iḍāgama iṣyate īśidhve īśidhvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51091: tadarthaṃ kecit īḍijanoḥ sdhve ca iti sūtraṃ paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:51092: tatra sakārādeḥ seśabdasya sūtra eva+upādānāc caśabdo bhinnakramaḥ īśeranukarṣaṇārtho vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51093: īśīḍijanāṃ sedhvayoḥ ity ekam eva sūtraṃ na paṭhitam ?
GS24jvkasipu:51094: vicitrā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ paṇineḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51095: dhve iti kṛtaṭer etvasya grahaṇāt laṅi dhvami na bhavitavyamiṭā /
GS24jvkasipu:51100: sārvadhātuke yo liṅ tasya anantyasya sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51112: akārāntāt aṅgād uttarasya yā ity etasya sārvadhātukasya iy ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51124: pacet ity atra api hi tarhi ato dīrgho yañi (*7,3.101)
GS24jvkasipu:51127: sa yathaiva dīrghasya bādhakaḥ evam ato lopasya api bādhakaḥ syāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:51128: syād etad evaṃ yadi dīrghaḥ sārvadhātuke vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51130: tadā yena nāprāptinyāyena dīrghasyaiva bādhakaḥ syān na punar ato lopasya /
GS24jvkasipu:51132: yaḥ iti vā ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśe yalopasya asiddhatvamanāśritya ādguṇaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:51134: kecit atra ato yāsiyaḥ iti sūtraṃ pathanti /
GS24jvkasipu:51139: ākārasya ṅidavayavasya ākārāntād aṅgād uttarasya sārvadhātukasya iy ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51148: ity atra na ṅitīva ṅidvat ity evam aṅgīkriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:51149: api tu ṅita iva ṅidvat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51150: pūrvasūtra eva uccukuṭiṣati iti prasiddhaye tathāṅgīkaraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:51151: yadi gāṅkuṭādisūtre ṅita iva ṅidvad bhavati ity evam aṅgīkriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:51169: akāramātrabhakto 'yaṃ muk adupadeśagrahaṇena gṛhyate iti adupadeśād iti lasārvadhātukānudattatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51177: tena upadeśād ūrdhaṃ saty api kālabhede bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:51208: rai ity etasya halādau vibhaktau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51219: yuṣmad asmad ity etayoḥ anādeśe vibhaktau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51226: hali ity adhikārād apy atra na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51231: dvitīyāyāṃ ca parataḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51241: prathamāyāś ca dvivacane parato bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye yuṣmadasmadoḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51254: ajādau vibhaktau anādeśe yuṣmadasmadoḥ yakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51264: ity atra yadi hali iti anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:51274: yatra ākāro yakāraś ca na vihitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51275: pañcamyāś ca caturthyāś ca ṣaṣṭhīprathamayor api /
GS24jvkasipu:51276: yāny advivacanāny atra teṣu lopo vidhīyate // [823]
GS24jvkasipu:51294: śeṣe lope kṛte striyāṃ ṭāp kasmān na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51299: kecit tu śeṣe lopaṃ ṭilopam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:51302: tena maparyantād yo 'nyaḥ sa śeṣaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51303: tatra ayaṃ lopaḥ iti ṭilopo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:51307: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo maparyantasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:51313: yuvakām, āvakām iti sākackasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:51318: tathā ca sati tvamayor akārasya yo 'ci (*7,2.89)
GS24jvkasipu:51319: iti yakāre kṛte aniṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51320: māntasya ity eva siddhe asmin yat parigrahaṇaṃ kṛtam,
GS24jvkasipu:51323: kadā ? yadā ṇyantayoḥ kvipi māntatvaṃ vidyate yuṣmadasmadoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51324: sthānivattvaṃ ca ṇeratra kvau lutatvān na vidyate //
GS24jvkasipu:51327: dvivacane ye yuṣmadasmadī dvyarthābhidhānaviṣaye tayoḥ maparyantasya sthāne yuva āva ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51335: samāsārthasya anyasaṅkhatvāt ekavacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51336: tadā api dvyarthayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ yuvāvau bhavataḥ ,
GS24jvkasipu:51338: ity evam ādinā ādeśāntareṇa na bādhyete /
GS24jvkasipu:51359: tvāhādīnāṃ tu viṣaye paratvāt te eva bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:51378: yuṣmadasmadoḥ maparyantasya jasi parato yūya vaya ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51386: aṅgādhikāre tasya ca taduttarapadasya ca iti //
GS24jvkasipu:51389: yuṣmadasmador maparyantasya sau pare tva aha ity etau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51398: yuṣmadasmadoḥ maparyantasya tubhya mahya ity etāv ādeśua bhavato ṅayi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51407: yuṣmadasmadoḥ maparyantasya tava mama ity etāv ādeśau bhavato ṅasi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51417: ekavacane ye yuṣmadasmadī ekārthāmidhānaviṣaye tayor maparyantasya sthāne tva ma ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51427: samāsārthasya tv anyasaṅkhyatvāt dvivacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51430: ity evamādīnāṃ viṣaye pūrvavipratiṣedhena te eveṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:51445: pratyaye uttarapade ca parata ekavacane vartamānayoḥ yusmadasmador maparyantasya tva ma ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51464: vibhaktau ity adhikārāt pūrvayogo vibhaktāv eva /
GS24jvkasipu:51465: tato 'nyatra api pratyaye uttarapade ca yathā syāt ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51473: etad eva tarhi ādeśavacanaṃ jñāpakam antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgo 'pi luk bādhate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51474: tena gomān priyo 'sya gomatpriyaḥ ity evam ādau numādi lukā bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51476: ity evam ādayo 'pi pratyayottarpadayor ādeśā na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:51484: atha kimarthm eṣāṃ tvāhādīnāṃ bādhanārtham etan na vijñāyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:51489: tri catur ity etayoḥ striyāṃ vartamānayoḥ tisṛ catasṛ ity etāv ādeśau bhavato vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51498: striyām iti ca+etat tricaturor eva viśeṣaṇaṃ na aṅgasya /
GS24jvkasipu:51502: priyāḥ tisro brāhmaṇyo 'sya brāhmaṇasya priyatisā brāhmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51521: priyāṇi trīṇi vā asyāḥ brāhmaṇyāḥ sā priyatriḥ / [826]
GS24jvkasipu:51529: catastraḥ paśya ity atra caturaḥ śasi (*6,1.137)
GS24jvkasipu:51531: catasṛṇām ity atra tu ṣaṭtricaturbhyo halādiḥ (*6,1.179)
GS24jvkasipu:51536: tisṛ catasṛ ity etayoḥ ṛtaḥ sthāne rephādeśo bhavati ajādau vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51553: anyathā hi tadapavādaḥ tricaturor eva ayam ādeśo vijñāyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:51556: jarā ity etasya jaras ity ayam ādeśo bhavati anyatrasyām ajādau vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51565: iha atijarasaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ paśya iti lug na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51569: jarasbhāvaḥ iti trīṇi kāryāṇi yugapat prāpnuvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:51574: iti evam eva bhavati atijarasaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ paśya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51575: prathamaikavacane tṛtīyābahuvacane ca atijaraṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ tiṣṭhati,
GS24jvkasipu:51576: atijaraiḥ iti ca bhavitavyam iti gonardīyamatena /
GS24jvkasipu:51579: anye tu anityatvāt asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ atijarasaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ tiṣṭhati,
GS24jvkasipu:51580: atijarasaiḥ ity evaṃ bhavitavyam iti manyante // [827]
GS24jvkasipu:51583: tyad ity evam ādīnām akārādeśo bhavati vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51595: sañjñopasarjanībhūtāḥ tyadādayaḥ pāṭhādeva paryudastāḥ iti iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51603: kim ity etasya kaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51606: tena akāra eva kimo na vidhīyate kimo 't (*5,3.12) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:51609: takārādau hakārādau ca vibhaktau parataḥ kim ity etasya ku ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51616: ati tiy etasyāṃ vibhaktau parataḥ kim ity etasya kva ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51620: kimo ḍvat iti pratyayāntaraṃ na vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:51624: tyadādīnāṃ takāra-dakārayoḥ anantyayoḥ sakārādeśo bhavati sau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51633: adasaḥ sau parataḥ sakārasya aukārādeśo bhavati sośca lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51635: autvapratiṣedhaḥ sākackād vā vaktavyaḥ sādutvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:51636: yadā ca autvapratiṣedhaḥ tadā sakārād uttarasya utvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51644: hrasvāl lupyeta sambuddhir na halaḥ prakṛtaṃ hi tat //
