GS24jvkasipu:51645: āpa etvaṃ bhavet tasmin na jhalītyanuvartanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51655: idamo dakārasya sthāne makārādeśo bhavati vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51660: idamo makārasya yakārādeśo bhavati sau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51662: uttarasūtre puṃsi iti vacanāt striyāmayaṃ yakāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:51665: idamaḥ idarūpasya puṃsi sau parataḥ ay ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51671: idamaḥ akakārasya idrūpasya sthāne ana ity ayam ādeśo bhavati āpi vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51676: āpi iti pratyāhāraḥ tṛtīyaikavacanāt prabhṛti supaḥ pakāreṇa // [829]
GS24jvkasipu:51679: halādau vibhaktau parataḥ idamo 'kakārasya idrūpasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51685: nānarthake 'lontyavidhiḥ iti sarvasya ayam idrūpasya lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51696: dhātoś ca kāryam ucyamānaṃ dhātupratyaya eva veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:51701: ajantasya aṅgasya ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51716: aṅgopadhāyā akārasya sthāne ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51730: taddhite ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye parato 'ṅgasya acām ādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51737: tvāṣṭraḥ, jāgataḥ ity atra acāmāder vṛddhir antyopadhālakṣaṇāṃ vṛddhiṃ bādhate //
GS24jvkasipu:51740: kiti ca taddhite parato 'ṅgasyācām ādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51744: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:51748: devikā śiṃśapā dityavāṭ dīrghasatra śreyas ity etaṣām aṅgānām acāmādeḥ acaḥ sthane vṛddhiprasaṅge ākāro bhavati ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:51758: śiṃśapā - śiṃśapāyāḥ vikāraḥ camasaḥ śāṃśapaḥ camasaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51769: vṛddhiviṣaye 'cāmādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vahīnarasya ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51774: kekaya mitrayu pralaya ity eteṣāṃ yakārādeḥ iya ity ayam ādeśo bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:51783: loke ca ṛṣiśabdo gotram ity abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51785: na y-vābhyāṃ padāntābhyāṃ pūrvau tu tābhyām aic // PS_7,3.3 //
GS24jvkasipu:51787: yakāra-vakārābhyām uttarasya acāmādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51788: tābhyāṃ tu yakāra-vakārābhyāṃ pūrvam aijāgamau bhavataḥ ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:51799: yaṣṭiḥ praharaṇam asya yāṣṭīkaḥ yataḥ chātrāḥ yātāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51804: vṛddher abhāvāt pratiṣedho 'pi na asti ity aprasaṅgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51807: yatra tu uttarapadasambandhī yaṇ na bhavati tatra na+iṣyate pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51808: dve aśītī bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dvyāśītikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:51811: dvāra ity evam ādīnāṃ yvābhyām uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51826: śobhano 'dhyāyaḥ ity etasyāṃ vyutpattau tu pūrveṇa+eva siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:51829: evam apy atra+eva svaśabdasya+eva pāṭhāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:51830: tadādāv api hi vṛddhiriyaṃ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:51854: nyagrodhaśabdasya kevalasya yakārād uttarasya acāmādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51855: tasmāc ca pūrvam aikāra āgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51859: nyagrodhayati iti nyagrodhaḥ iti vyutpattipakṣe niyamārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:51874: svāgata ity evam ādīnāṃ yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51895: śvādeḥ aṅgasya iñi parato yad uktaṃ tana bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51899: tatra ca tadādividhir bhavati iti etad eva vacanaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:51903: tadantasya ca anyatra api taddhite pratiṣedha iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51907: śvādeḥ aṅgasya padaśabdāntasya anyatarasyāṃ yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51914: mad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ uttarapadasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:51921: yatra pañcamīnirdeśo na asti je proṣṭhapadānām (*7,3.18)
GS24jvkasipu:51927: iti uttarapadādhikāre yā vṛddhiḥ ity evaṃ vijñāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:51929: avayavavācinaḥ uttarasya ṛtuvācinaḥ uttarapadasya ca acāmādeḥ acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:51943: tatra ṛtor vṛddhimadvidhau avayavāt iti tadantavidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51950: su sarva ardha ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya janapadavācinaḥ uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:51961: digvācinaḥ uttarasya janapadavācino madravarjitasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:51979: prācāṃ deśe grāmanagarāṇāṃ diśa uttareṣām acāmāder aco vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:51990: grāmatvād eva nagarāṇām api grahaṇe siddhe bhedena yad ubhayor upādānaṃ tat sambandhabhedapratipattyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:51992: pāṭaliputrādiḥ punar uttarapadam eva nagaram āha /
GS24jvkasipu:51993: tatra grāmavācinām aṅgānām avayavasya dikśabdād uttarasya nagaravācinām uttarapadānām avayavasya ca vṛddhir bhavati ity evam abhisambandhaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51994: itaratra tu diśa uttareṣām nagarāṇām ity eva /
GS24jvkasipu:51995: pūrvaiṣukāmaśamaḥ ity evam ādiṣu kṛtāyām uttarapadavṛddhau ekādeśo bhavati iti jñāpi ta nendrasya parasya (*7,3.22)
GS24jvkasipu:51999: saṅkhyāyā uttarapadasya saṃvatsaraśabdasya saṅkhyāyāś ca acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:52002: dvau saṃvatsarābadhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dvisāṃvatsarikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52003: saṅkhyāyāḥ - dve ṣaṣṭī adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dviṣāṣṭikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52005: dviṣaṣṭhyādiśabdo varṣeṣu saṃkhyeyeṣu vartamānaḥ kālādhikāravihitaṃ pratyayam utpādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:52007: ity eva siddhe saṃvatsaragrahaṇam parimāṇagrahaṇe kālaparimāṇasya agrahaṇārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:52010: dvivarṣā, trivarṣā māṇavikā iti aparimāṇabistācita iti paryudāso na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52013: saṅkhyāyā uttarasya varṣaśabdasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:52016: sa cet taddhito bhaviṣyatyarthe na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52017: dve varṣe adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto vā dvivārṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52024: adhīṣṭabhṛtayor abhaviṣyati iti pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52027: dve varṣe adhīṣṭo bhṛto vā karma kariṣyati iti dvivārṣiko manuṣyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:52030: parimāṇāntasya aṅgasya saṅkhyāyāḥ paraṃ yad uttarapadaṃ tasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:52033: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye śāṇe ca+uttarapade na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52037: ity atra suvarṇaśatamānayor upasaṅkhyānam iti luko vikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52044: pañca kalāpāḥ parimāṇamasya iti vihṛhya tad asya pariṃāṇam (*5,1.57)
GS24jvkasipu:52056: tatra yaḥ taddhito vihitaḥ tasmin ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:52058: kiti ca parataḥ proṣthapadānām uttarasya acāmādeḥ acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52065: je iti kim ? yadā proṣthapado megho dharaṇīmabhivarṣati,
GS24jvkasipu:52067: proṣthapadānām iti bahuvacananirdeśāt paryāyo 'pi gṛhyate bhadrapādaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:52070: hṛd bhaga sindhu ity evam anto 'ṅge pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca acāmāder aco vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:52091: anuśatika ity evam ādīnāṃ cāṅgānāṃ pūrvapadasya ca+uttarapadasya ca cāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:52106: ata eva vacanādasya samudāyasya prātipadikatvaṃ vibhakteś ca aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:52116: janapadasamudāyo janapadagrahaṇena na gṛhyate iti vuñ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52123: sarvabhūmeḥ nimittaṃ saṃyogaḥ utpāto vā sārvabhaumaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52167: devatādvandve ca pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:52179: indraśabdasya parasya yad uktam tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52186: iti lopaḥ, aparasya pūrveṇa saha ekādeśaḥ ity aprāptir eva vṛddheḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:52188: bahiraṅgam api pūrvottarapadayoḥ pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati paścād ekādeśaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52189: tena pūrvaiṣukāmaśamaḥ ity ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52192: dirghād uttarasya varuṇasya yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52203: prācāṃ deśe nagarānte 'ṅge pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:52213: jaṅgala dhenu valaja ity evam antasya aṅgasya pūrvapadasya acāmāder aco vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52214: vibhāṣitam uttaram uttarapadasya vibhāṣā bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:52223: ardhāt parimāṇasya pūrvasya tu vā // PS_7,3.26 //
GS24jvkasipu:52225: ardhaśabdāt parasya parimāṇavācinaḥ uttarasya acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52226: pūrvasya tu vā bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:52237: ardhāt parasya parimāṇākārasya vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52238: pūrvasya tu vā bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:52248: iha mā bhūt, ardhakhāryāṃ bhavā ardhakhārī /
GS24jvkasipu:52249: kiṃ ca syāt ? ardhakhārī bhāryā yasya ardhakhārībhāryaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:52253: sa vṛddhinimittaṃ na bhavati iti puṃvadbhāvo na pratiṣidhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:52254: yathā vaiyākaraṇī bhāryā asya vaiyākaraṇabhāryaḥ iti // [838]
GS24jvkasipu:52257: pravāhaṇasya ḍhe parataḥ uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52265: ḍhakprayayāntasya pravāhaṇaśabdasya taddhiteṣu parataḥ uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52271: bāhyataddhitanimittā vṛddhiḥ ḍhāśrayeṇa vikalpena bādhitum aśakyā iti sūtrārambhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:52274: nañaḥ uttareṣāṃ śuci īśvara kṣetrajña kuśala nipuṇa ity eteṣām acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52285: atra kecid āhuḥ iyaṃ pūrvapadasya vṛddhir aprāptaiva vibhāṣā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52286: na nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt ity uttaro bhāvapratyayaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52287: tatra śucyādibhyaḥ eva pratyaye kṛte paścānnañsamāse sati vṛddhiranaṅgasyāpi vacanāt bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52289: bhāvavacanādanyopi hi taddhito vṛddhinimittamapatyādiṣu artheṣu nañsamāsād eva vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52296: yathātatha yathāpura ity etayoḥ nañaḥ uttarayoḥ paryāyeṇa acamāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:52302: ayathātatha aythāpura iti brāhmaṇādiṣu nañsamāsau etau draṣṭavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:52306: bhāsye tu yathādarśita ayathātathābhāvaḥ iti tathā supsupeti samāso lakṣyate // [839]
GS24jvkasipu:52321: dhāto kāryam ucyamānaṃ dhātoḥ pratyaye vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52326: ākārāntasya aṅgasya ciṇi kṛti ñṇiti yugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52341: udātopadeśasya māntasya aṅgasya ācamivarjitasya ciṇi kṛti ca ñṇiti yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52357: aḍa udyame, yama uparame iti nipātanād anugantavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:52359: śamī, damī, tamī ity atra yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:52370: āmaḥ iti caurādikasya ṇici vṛddhau satyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52371: tatra hi mittvaṃ na asti na anye mito 'hetau iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52372: sūryaviśrāmā bhūmiḥ ity evam ādikaṃ prayogamanyāyyam eva manyante /
GS24jvkasipu:52377: jani vadhi ity etayoḥ ciṇi kṛti ca ñṇiti yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52386: bhakṣakaścenna vidyeta vadhako 'pi na vidyate iti hi prayogo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52394: arti hrī vlī rī knūyī kṣmāyī ity eteṣām aṅgānām ākārāntānāṃ ca pugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52404: ṛ gatau iti dvayor api dhātvor grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:52407: pukaḥ pūrvāntakaraṇam adīdapat ity atra upadhāhrasvo yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:52410: śā dhā sā hvā vyā ve pā ity eteṣam aṅgānāṃ yugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52418: pāgrahaṇe pai ovai śoṣaṇe ity asya api iha grahaṇam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:52419: pā rakṣaṇe ity asya lugvikaraṇatvān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52432: etasmin prakaraṇe lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣā na asti ity upadiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52434: jāpayati ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52437: vā ity etasya vidhūnane 'rthe vartamānasya jugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52443: vāteḥ puk mā bhūt ity evam artham /
GS24jvkasipu:52444: pai ovai śoṣaṇe ity etasya etad rūpm // [841]
GS24jvkasipu:52447: lī lā ity etayor aṅgayoḥ anyatarasyāṃ nuk luk iy etāv āgamau bhavato ṇau parataḥ snehavipātane 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:52454: na tu kṛtātvasya vibhāṣā līyateḥ (*6,1.51) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52463: bhī ity etasya hetubhaye 'rthe ṣugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52466: atra api bhī ī iti īkārapraśleṣaḥ kṛtātvasya pugnivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52467: muṇḍo bhāpayate ity evaṃ hi tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52474: sphāy ity etasya aṅgasya vakārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52478: śadeḥ aṅgasya agatau arthe vartamānasya takārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52484: ruheḥ aṅgasya anyatarasyāṃ pakārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52487: pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasya ata id āpy asupaḥ // PS_7,3.44 //
GS24jvkasipu:52489: pratyayasthāt kakārāt pūrvasya akārasya ikārādeśo bhavati āpi parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:52490: sa ced āp supaḥ paro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52499: kakāramātraṃ pratyayo na asti iti sāmarthyāt pratyayasthasya grahaṇam śakyate vijñātum /
GS24jvkasipu:52513: yady evam, kārikā ity atra api na prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:52516: ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhavati iti vyavadhānam eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:52517: vacanād vyavadhānamīdṛśaṃ yat sthānivadbhāvakṛtam ekena varṇena tadāśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52518: rathakaṭyādiṣu tu śrutikṛtam anekena varṇena vyavadhānam iti itvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52520: bahavaḥ parivrājakā asyāṃ mathurāyām bahuparivrājakā mathurā /
GS24jvkasipu:52521: subantād ayaṃ bahuparivrājakaśabdāt paraḥ āp iti pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52524: paryudāse hi sati samudāyād asubantāt parataḥ āp iti itvam atra syād eva /
GS24jvkasipu:52525: avidyamānaḥ sup yasmin so 'yam asup iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:52527: tathā hi sati bahucarmikā ity atra api na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:52531: kevalamāmaka iti niyamāt sañjñāchandasoḥ īkāro na asty atra,
GS24jvkasipu:52543: yā sā ity etayoḥ ikārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52590: udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena yakārapūrvāyāḥ kakārapūrvāyāś ca ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:52601: ātaḥ ity anena hy ataḥ iti sthānī viśiṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52604: yakapūrvāyāḥ iti strīliṅganirdeśaḥ ātaḥ strīpratyayasya pratipattyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:52609: dhātvantayoḥ yakārakakārayor asya pratiṣedhasya pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52616: eṣām ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāras tasya itvaṃ na bhavati udīcāmācaryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:52630: tatra hi sati yadi sākackābhyāṃ nañsamāsaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:52632: ubhayathāpi samāsād ya vibhaktir utpadyate tasyāṃ satyāṃ tyadātyatve sati ṭāpā bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:52633: so 'ntarvartinyā vibhaktyā subantāt paraḥ iti itvasya prāptir eva na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:52639: ity eva siddhe yad iha grahaṇaṃ tadupasarjanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:52643: atra upasarjanahrasvatve kṛte punar bahuvrihau kṛte bhāṣitapuṃskād yaḥ ṭāp utpadyate tasya ke 'ṇaḥ (*7,4.13)
GS24jvkasipu:52645: na asau abhāsitapuṃskād vihitasya ataḥ sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52646: nañpūrvāṇām api ity apiśabdād anyapūrvāṇāṃ kevalānāṃ ca vidhir ayam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52652: atra nañpūrvāṇām iti vacanam anuvāda eva mandabuddhipratipattyarthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:52655: abhāṣitapuṃskād vihitasya ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāraḥ tasya udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ikārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52660: bahuvrīhau yadā kapi hrasvaḥ kriyate tadā bhavitavyam anena vidhinā /
GS24jvkasipu:52661: atra api abhāṣitapuṃskād vihitasya ataḥ sthāne bhavatyakāraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52662: yadā tu avidyamānā khaṭvā asyāḥ akhaṭvā,
GS24jvkasipu:52663: alpā akhaṭvā akhaṭvikā iti tadā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52668: abhāṣitapuṃskāt ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāraḥ tasya ācāryāṇām ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52677: tasya pratyayaṭhasya ikaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52685: saṅghātagrahaṇe tu pratyaye 'tra api saṅghātagrahaṇam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:52686: tatra kaṇeṣṭhaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ ity evam ādīnām uṇādīnām uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1)
GS24jvkasipu:52688: mathitaṃ paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ ity atra tu yasya+iti ca (*6,4.148)
GS24jvkasipu:52691: sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52696: is us ity evam antānām ugantānāṃ tāntānāṃ cāṅgānām uttarasya ṭhasya kaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52707: isusoḥ pratipadoktayor grahaṇād iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52714: cakārajakārayoḥ kavargādeśo bhavati ghiti ṇyati ca pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52723: nyaṅku ity evam ādīnāṃ kavargādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52725: madguḥ - mimasjibhya uḥ iti masjeḥ upratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52726: bhṛguḥ - prathimadibhrasjāṃ samprasāraṇaṃ salopaś ca iti upratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52727: dūrepākaḥ, phalepākaḥ - dūre pacyate svayam eva,
GS24jvkasipu:52733: kṣaṇepākaḥ ity api hi kecit paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:52737: takram vakram iti pañcater vañcateś ca sphāyitañcivañci ity ādinā sūtreṇa rak /
GS24jvkasipu:52748: vīrud ity atra nyakpūrvasya ruheḥ pacādyaci,
GS24jvkasipu:52754: hanteḥ hakārasya kavargādeśo bhavati ñiti ṇiti pratyaye parataḥ nakāre ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52763: haḥ iti kim ? alo 'ntyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:52772: yady api sarvair eva ñṇinnairhantihakāro viśiṣyate tathāpi yena nāvyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti ñṇiti dhātvavayavena vyavahite 'pi sati bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52782: abhyāsanimitte pratyaye hanter aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasmād eva+etat kutvam /
GS24jvkasipu:52787: hinoter hakarasya abhyāsād uttarasya kavargādeśo bhavati acaṅi /
GS24jvkasipu:52794: katham ? caṅyabhyāsanimitte ṇau hinotir aṅgaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52795: tatra abhyāsanimitte pratyaye heraṅgasya iti vijñāyamane prāptir eva na asti ?
GS24jvkasipu:52798: heracaṅi iti caṅo 'nyatra herṇya dhikasya api kutvaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52802: sani liṭi ca pratyaye jeḥ aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasmād uttarasya kavargāadeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52806: jināteḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte yady api jirbhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52807: tathāpi lākṣaṇikatvāt tasya grahaṇaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52812: cinoteḥ aṅgasya sanliṭor abhyāsād uttarasya vibhāṣā kavargādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52818: kavargādeḥ dhātoḥ cajoḥ kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52826: aji vraji ity etayoś ca kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52832: iti vībhāvasya vidhānāt ṇyati na asti udāharaṇam //
GS24jvkasipu:52835: bhuja nyubaj ity etau śabdau nipātyete pāṇau upatāpe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52840: nyubjitāḥ śerate 'sminn iti nyubjaḥ upatāpaḥ, rogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52846: prayāja anuyāja ity etau nipātyete yajñāṅge /
GS24jvkasipu:52852: anyatra apy evaṃ prakāre kutvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52855: ṛtuyājaiścaranti ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52858: vañceḥ aṅgasya gatau vartamānasya kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52865: ucer dhātoḥ ke pratyaye okaḥ iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52871: adhikaraṇādau tu kārakāntare ghañarthe kavidhānam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52872: kim arthaṃ punar ayaṃ ghañyeva na vyutpadyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:52876: jalaukasaḥ ity evam ādāv apy asuni pratyaye uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1)
GS24jvkasipu:52880: ṇye parataḥ āvaśyake 'rthe kavargo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52889: yaja yāca ruca pravaca ṛca ity eteṣāṃ ṇye parataḥ kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52895: ṛdupadhād api ṛcer ata eva nipātanāt ṇyat bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52900: prapūrvasya+eva vacer aśabdasañjñāyāṃ kutvapratiṣedho yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:52910: vaco 'śabdasañjñāyāṃ ṇyati parataḥ kutvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52917: prayojya niyojya ity etau śabdau śakyārthe nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:52932: ghusañjñakānāṃ leṭi parato vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52937: āḍāgame sati lope 'pi dadāt iti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52940: dadāt ity eva nitye prāpte lopaḥ ārabhya māṇo bādhate eva etad rūpam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:52943: okārāntasya aṅgasya śyani parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52961: lug vā duha-diha-liha-guhām ātmanepade dantye // PS_7,3.73 //
GS24jvkasipu:52963: duha diha liha guha ity eteṣām aṅgānām ātmanepade dantyādau parataḥ kṣasya vā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52979: anyatra tu antyasya+eva lope kṛte jhalo jhali (*8,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:52984: yadi sa na gṛhyeta tataḥ taugrahaṇam eva atra kṛtaṃ syāt // [850]
GS24jvkasipu:52987: śamādīnām aṣṭānāṃ dīrgho bhavati śyani parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53001: ṣthivu klami ācam ity eteṣāṃ dīrgho bhavati śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53011: kramaḥ parasmaipadapare śiti parato dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53016: saṅkrāma iti herluki kṛte na lumatāṅgasya (*1,1.66)
GS24jvkasipu:53019: lumatāśabdena lupte ya daṅgaṃ tasya kārye sa pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53024: iṣu gami yama ity eteṣāṃ śiti parataḥ chakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53029: iha mā bhūt, iṣyati, iṣṇāti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53030: ye tu iṣimuditaṃ na adhīyate te iha ca sūtre aci iti anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:53031: tac ca pradhānam ajgrahaṇam śiti ity anena viśeṣyate iti varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:53033: yasmin vidhis tadādāvalgrahaṇe ity etad api viśeṣṇena+eva isyate,
GS24jvkasipu:53034: tena iṣāṇa ity atra chatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53035: na hy ayam ajeva śit iti //
GS24jvkasipu:53038: pa ghrā dhmā sthā mnā dāṇ dṛśi arti sarti śada sada ity eteṣāṃ piba jighra dhama tiṣtha mana yaccha paśya ṛccha dhau śīya sīda ity ete ādeśā bhavanti śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53051: saḥ aṅgavṛtte punar vṛttāvavidhirniṣṭhitasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53052: atha vā akārānto 'yam ādeśaḥ ādyudātto nipātyate / [851]
GS24jvkasipu:53058: jña jana ity etayoḥ jādeśo bhavati śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53064: pū ity evam ādīnāṃ hrasvo bhavati śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53066: pūñ pavan ity ataḥ prabhṛti plī gatau vṛt iti yāvat kecit icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:53067: vṛtkaraṇam etat lvādīnāṃ pvādīnāṃ ca parisamāptyartham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53068: apare tu lvādīnām eva parisamāptyarthaṃ vṛtkaraṇam etad icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:53073: yeṣām āgaṇāntāḥ pvādayaḥ teṣāṃ jānāti ity atra hrasvaḥ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:53076: janer api hi jādeśe sati ato dīrgho yañi (*7,3.101)
GS24jvkasipu:53080: mīnāter aṅgasya śiti pratyaye parato hrasvo bhavati nigamaviṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:53085: mider aṅgasya iko guṇo bhavati śiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53090: jusi ca pratyaye parataḥ igantasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53095: sunuyuḥ ity atra kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:53099: tatra na aprāpte sārvadhātukāśrayaṅittvanimitte pratiṣedhe jusi guṇaḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ tam eva bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:53101: tatra hi prāpte ca aprāpte ca ārabhyate iti // [852]
GS24jvkasipu:53104: sārvadhātuke ārdhadhātuke ca pratyaye parataḥ igantasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53113: yadi hi pratyaye saṅi iti vā ucyeta,
GS24jvkasipu:53117: jāgu ity etasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati aviciṇṇalṅitsu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53125: vṝddhiviṣaye pratiṣedhaviṣaye ca yathā syāt iti jāgarter ayaṃ guṇaḥ ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53128: yadi hi syāt anarthaka eva guṇaḥ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:53136: vi iti kecid ikāram uccāraṇārthaṃ varṇayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:53137: kvasāv api vakārādau guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53139: ajāgaruḥ, ahaṃ jajāgara ity atra pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:53142: athavā jāgraḥ iti praptirasāvānantaryād viciṇṇalṅitsu pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53149: pugantasya aṅgasya laghūpadhasya ca sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayor guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53157: pratyayāder aṅgāvayavasya ca halorānantarye sati lag hūpadhaguṇo na vyāvartyate iti jñāpitam etat knusanoḥ kitkaraṇena,
GS24jvkasipu:53160: saṃyoge gurusañjñāyāṃ guṇo bhettur na sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:53161: vidhyapekṣaṃ laghoś ca asau kathaṃ kuṇḍir na duṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:53165: knusanor yatkṛtaṃ kittvaṃ jñāpakaṃ syāl laghor gaṇe // [853]
GS24jvkasipu:53166: upadhā ca atra ig eva gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:53167: tato bhinatti iti guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53170: pugantaśca laghūpadhā ca pugantalaghūypadham iti sūtrārthaṃ varṇayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:53171: na abhyastasya aci piti sārvadhātuke // PS_7,3.87 //
GS24jvkasipu:53173: abhyastasañjñakasya aṅgasya laghūpadhasya ajādau piti sārvadhātuke guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53196: bhū sū ity etayoḥ tiṅi sārvadhātuke guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53207: atha bobhavīti iti yaṅluki guṇapratiṣedhaḥ kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:53208: jñāpakāt, yad ayaṃ bobhūtu iti guṇābhāvārthe nipātanaṃ karoti //
GS24jvkasipu:53212: ukārāntasya aṅgasya vṛddhir bhavati luki sati halādau piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:53232: api stuyād rājānam ity atra hi ṅicca pinna bhavati iti pittvapratiṣedhād vṛddher abhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53233: na abhyastasya ity etad iha anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:53238: ūrṇoter vibhāṣā vṛddhir bhavati halādau piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:53246: ūrṇoter dhātoḥ apṛkte hali piti sārvadhātuke guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53250: tena+eva jñāpyate bhavaty eṣā paribhāṣā yasmin vidhis tadādāvalgrahaṇe iti //
GS24jvkasipu:53253: tṛṇaha ity etasyāṅgasya imāgamo bhavati hali piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:53262: śnami kṛte imāgamo yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:53265: vrū ity etasmād uttarasya halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasya īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53274: yaṅaḥ uttarasya halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasya īḍāgamo bhavati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:53277: tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyāṃ ā viveśa /
GS24jvkasipu:53280: halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasya yaṅantād abhāvaḥ iti yaṅlugantasya udāharaṇam //
GS24jvkasipu:53287: ama gatyādiṣu ity etebhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya halāder vā īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53294: iti vikaraṇaluki sati halādisārvadhātukam anantaraṃ sambhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53296: tatra sarveṣām eva chandasi viṣaye vidhir ayaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53297: sārvadhātuke iti anuvartamāne punaḥ sārvadhātukagrahaṇam apidartham,
GS24jvkasipu:53299: śamīdhvam ity atra api yathā syāt iti // [855]
GS24jvkasipu:53302: aster aṅgāt sijantāc ca parasya apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53311: āhibhuvorīṭi pratiṣedhaḥ iti sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedha tena+iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53315: astisicor apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya īḍagamo bhavati bahulaṃ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:53329: rudādibhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya halādeḥ apṛktasya īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53345: rudādibhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ parasya apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya aḍāgamo bhavati gārgyagālavayor matena /
GS24jvkasipu:53360: asmād uttarasya apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya aḍāgamo bhavati sarveṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:53367: akārāntasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati yañādau sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53377: teṣāṃ bhavavān iti kvasau sārvadhātukadīrgho na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:53382: supi ca yañādau parato 'kārāntasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53392: bahuvacane jhalādau supi parato 'kārāntasya aṅgasya ekārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53426: ṅyābgrahaṇe 'dīrghagrahaṇam iti vacanāt iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53431: sambuddhau ca parataḥ ābantasya aṅgasya etvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53438: ambārthanām aṅgānāṃ nadyantānāṃ hrasvo bhavati sambuddhau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53454: talo hrasvo bā ṅisambuddhyor iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:53463: mātrā vyapadeśam arhati ślāghanīyatvād yaḥ putras tadartham /
GS24jvkasipu:53471: hrasvāntasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati sambuddhau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53475: he kumāri, he brahmabandhu ity evam ādīnāṃ hrasvavidhānasāmarthyād guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53477: ambārthānāṃ hrasvaḥ ity uktvā nadīhrasvayor guṇaḥ ity evaṃ brūyāt //
GS24jvkasipu:53480: jasi parato hrasvāntasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53486: jasādiṣu chandasi vāvacanaṃ prāṅ ṇau caṅyupadhāyā hrasva ity etasmāt /
GS24jvkasipu:53487: itaḥ prakaraṇāt prabhṛti chandasi vā iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:53501: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya ṅau parataḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53514: ghyantasyāṅgasya ṅiti pratyaye parato guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53528: nadyantād aṅgād uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyayasya āḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53535: ābantā daṅgād uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyayasya yāḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53542: atikhaṭvāya ity atra akṛte dīrghe ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ iti vacanād yāḍāgamo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53546: sarvanāmnaḥ ābantād aṅgād uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyaysya syāṭ āgamo hrasvaś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53563: dvitīyā tṛtiyā ity etābhyām uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyayasya vibhāṣā syāṭ āgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53570: nadyantāt ābantāt nī ity etasmāc ca+uttarasya ṅeḥ ām ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53582: ikārokārābhyāṃ nadīsañjñakābhyām uttarasya ṅeḥ ām ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53588: yan na nadisañjñaṃ na api ghisañjñam ikārāntam ,
GS24jvkasipu:53601: at iti taparakaraṇaṃ striyāṃ ṭāpo nivrttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:53602: audacca gheḥ iti yeṣām ekam eva+idaṃ sūtram,
GS24jvkasipu:53607: gheḥ uttarasya āṅaḥ na abhāvo bhavati astriyām /
GS24jvkasipu:53615: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ // ______________________________________________________//
GS24jvkasipu:53628: iha tu mā bhavānaṭiṭat iti nityatvād dvitīyasya dvirvacanaṃ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:53629: tathā sati hrasvabhāvino 'ṅgasya akārasya upadhātvaṃ vihitam iti hrasvo na syāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:53631: oṇeḥ ṛdit - karaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ nityam api dvirvacanam upadhāhrasvatvena bādhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53632: ṇau iti kim ? caṅyupadhāyā hrasvaḥ ity ucyamāne alīlavat ity atra vacanasāmarthyāt antaraṅgām api vṛddhim ādeśaṃ ca bādhitvā hrasvaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:53633: adīdapat ity atra hrasvatvena puko bādhaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:53634: apīpacat ity evam ādautu naiva syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:53640: tadedadupadhāgrahaṇam uttarārtham avaśyaṃ kartavyaṃ tad iha api hrasvatvaṃ nivartayati ity evam arthaṃ yena na avyavadhānam ity etannāśrayitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53643: yo 'sau ṇau ṇilopastasya sthānivadbhāvena aglopitvāt aṅgasya hrasvo na prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:53647: aglopinām aṅgānāṃ śāseḥ ṛditāṃ ca ṇau caṅi upadhāyā hrasvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53652: ageva yatra kevalo lupyate tatra sthānivadbhāvād api siddham,
GS24jvkasipu:53653: halacor ādeśe tu na sidhyati iti tadartham etad vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:53660: bhrāja bhāsa bhāṣa dīpa jīva mīla pīḍa ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ ṇau caṅi upadhāyā hrasvo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:53675: pibateḥ aṅgasya ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ lopo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53678: upadhālope kṛte oḥ puyaṇ vacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ ṇau sthānivadbhāvasya iti sthānivadbhāvād dvirvacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:53681: tiṣṭhater aṅgasya ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53687: jighrateḥ aṅgasya nau caṅi upadhāyā ikārādeśo vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53696: ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ ṛvarṇasya sthāne vā ṛkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53702: taprakaraṇaṃ dīrghe 'pi sthānini hrasva eva yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:53708: chandasi viṣaye ṇau caṅi upadhāyā ṛvarṇasya sthāne ṛkarādeśo bhavati nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:53714: dayater aṅgasya liṭi parato digi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53717: dayateḥ iti dīṅo grahaṇaṃ na tu daya dāne ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:53722: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya saṃyogādeḥ guṇo bhavati liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53734: pratiṣedhaviṣaye 'pi guṇo yathā syāt ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53743: atra hi pūrvaṃ dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścād upasargeṇa ity atra darśane liti kṛte,
GS24jvkasipu:53749: upaskṛṣīṣṭa ity atra suṭo bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya asiddhatvāt ṛtaś ca saṃyogādeḥ iti iḍāgamo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:53754: ṝkārāntānāṃ ca liṭi parato guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53767: śṝ dṝ pṝ ity eteṣāṃ aṅgānāṃ liṭi parato vā hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53777: prā pūraṇe ity eteṣām anekārthā dhātavaḥ iti śṝdṝprāmarthe vartamānānāṃ viśaśratuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:53783: tathā ca sati kvasau viśaśṛvān ity etad rūpaṃ na syāt // [863]
GS24jvkasipu:53791: rākā, dhākā ity atra uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1)
GS24jvkasipu:53793: na kapi (*7,4.14) iti pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt kano 'pi sānubandhakasya grahaṇam iha bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:53796: kapi pratyaye parato 'ṇo hrasvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53801: ity ayam api hrasvaḥ kapi na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53803: paścāt kabantena saha samāsena bhavitavyam iti strīpratyayāntasamāsaprātipadikaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:53806: ābantasyāṅgasya kapi hrasvaḥ na bhavaty antarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:53812: ṛvarṇāntānāṃ dṛśeś ca aṅi parato guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53822: asyater aṅgasya thugāgamo bhavati aṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53826: śvayateḥ aṅgasya akārādeśo bhavati aṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53830: pater aṅgasya pumāgamo bhavati aṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53834: vaceḥ aṅgasya aṅi parataḥ umāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53838: śīṅaḥ aṅgasya sārvadhātuke parataḥ guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53843: yakārādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ śīṅaḥ aṅgasya ayaṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53852: upasargād uttarasya uhater aṅgasya hrasvo bhavati yakārādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53867: eter aṅgasya upasargād uttarasya liṅi yakārādau kṅiti parato hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53871: āśiṣi liṅi akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ iti dīrghatve kṛte hrasvo 'nena bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53873: aṇaḥ ity eva, ā īyāt eyat /
GS24jvkasipu:53877: akṛdyakāre asārvadhātukayakāre ca kṅiti parato 'jantasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53905: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya akṛdyakāre asārvadhātuke yakāre cvau ca parato rīṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53919: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya śayak ity etayoḥ liṅi ca yakārādau asārvadhātuke parato raṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53934: guṇo bhavati arteḥ saṃyogādīnām ṛkārāntānāṃ yaki parato ligi ca yakārādau asārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:53940: saṃskriyāt iti suṭo bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya asiddhatvāt abhaktatvāt vā saṃyogāditvam aṅgasya na asti iti guṇo na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:53946: yagi ca parataḥ arteḥ saṃyogādeś ca ṛtaḥ guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53960: ghrā dhmā ity etayoḥ yaṅi parataḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53966: acarṇāntasya aṅgasya cvau parataḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53974: kyaci parataḥ avarṇāntasya aṅgasya īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53984: aśanāya udanya dhanāya ity etāni nipātyante bubhukṣā pipāsā gardha ity eteṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:53985: aśanāya ity aśanaśabdasya ātvaṃ kyaci nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53996: chandasi viṣaye putravarjitasya avarṇāntasya aṅgasya kyaci yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54007: durasyuḥ draviṇasyuḥ vṛṣaṇyati riṣaṇyati ity etāni chandasi nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:54022: aśva agha ity etayoḥ kyaci parataḥ chandasi viṣaye ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54025: etad eva ātvavacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ na cchandasy aputrasya (*7,4.35)
GS24jvkasipu:54029: deva sumna ity etayoḥ kyaci parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati kāṭhake yajuṣi /
GS24jvkasipu:54038: kavi adhvara pṛtanā ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ kyaci parato lopo bhavati ṛci viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:54044: dyati syāti mā sthā ity eteṣām aṅgānām ikārādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54057: śā chā ity etayoḥ anyatarasyām ikārādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti /
GS24jvkasipu:54068: devatrāto galo grāha iti yoge ca sadvidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54072: dadhāter aṅgasya hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54078: jahāter aṅgasya hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati ktvāpratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54085: jahāter aṅgasya vibhāṣā hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye ktvāpratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54090: sudhita vasudhita nemadhita dhiṣva dhiṣīya ity etāni chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:54091: tatra sudhita vasudhita nemadhita iti suvasunemapūrvasya dadhāteḥ ktapratyaya ittvam iḍāgamo vā pratyayasya nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54098: dhiṣva iti loṇmadhyamaikavacane dadhāteḥ ittvam iḍāgamo vā pratyayasya dvirvacanābhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54101: dhiṣiya iti āśīrliṅi ātmanepadottamaikavacane dadhāteḥ ittvam,
GS24jvkasipu:54107: dā ity etasya ghusañjñakasya dad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti pratyaya parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54118: evaṃ hy uktam - tānte doṣo dīrghatvaṃ syād dānte doṣo niṣṭhānatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:54120: yadi tu dasti iti takārādau dīrghatvaṃ tadā tānte 'pi adoṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54121: dāntadhāntayor api sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti natvadhatve na bhaviṣyataḥ iti na doṣaḥ / [869]
GS24jvkasipu:54126: anupasargā vā ete avādayaḥ kriyāntaraviṣayā veditavyāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:54129: ajantād upasargāduttarasya dā ity etasya ghusaṃjñakasya ta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti /
GS24jvkasipu:54141: upasargāt iti paccamīnirdeśād āder alaḥ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:54145: aparam api ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ sthāninirdeśartham ity ākārasya sthāne takāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54148: apo bhi (*7,4.48) ity atra pañcamyantam acaḥ ity anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:54150: dyater ittvād acasta ity etad bhavati vipratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:54155: ap ity etasya aṅgasya bhakārādau pratyaye parataḥ ta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54159: svavaḥsvatavasormāsa uṣasaś ca takārādeśa iṣyate chandasi bhakārādau /
GS24jvkasipu:54166: sakārāntasya aṅgasya sakārādau ārdhadhātuke parataḥ takārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54178: tāseḥ asteś ca sakārasya sakārādau pratyaye parataḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54183: asteḥ akārāsakārayoḥ luptayoḥ se iti pratyayamātram etat padam,
GS24jvkasipu:54188: rephādau ca pratyaye parataḥ tāsastyoḥ sakārāsya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54195: tāsastyoḥ sakārasya hakārādaśo bhavati eti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54200: yakārādau ivarṇādau ca parato dīdhīvevyoḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54213: sani pratyaye sakārādau parataḥ mī mā ghu rabha labha śaka pata pada ity eteṣām aṅgānām acaḥ sthāne is ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54214: mī iti mīnātiminotyoḥ dvayor api grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54230: sani rādho hiṃsāyām aca is vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54236: āp jñapi ṛdha ity eteṣām aṅgānām aca īkārādeśo bhavati sani sakārādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54246: sanīvantardha iti jñapeḥ ṛdheś ca iṭo vikaopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:54250: cakārāt īt ca sani sakārādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54255: muco 'karmakasya guṇo vā bhavati sani sakārādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54266: yad etat prakrāntaṃ sani mīmā ity ādi muco 'karmakasya iti yāvat,
GS24jvkasipu:54269: abhyāsasya ity etac ca achikṛtaṃ veditavyam ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54270: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ abhyāsasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54276: ity evam siddhe yad atragrahanam iha akriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54297: abhyāsasya yad ucyate anaci tad bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54313: tatra abhyāsajāteḥ āśrayaṇāt kvacid api vartamāno halādiḥ anadeḥ sarvatra nivṛttiṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:54320: abhyāsasya anāder halo nivṛttiḥ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54321: sā kim iti āder avidheyāṃ satīm anivṛttim apekṣiṣyate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:54332: ucicchiṣati ity atra uccheḥ antaraṅgatvāt tuki kṛte dvirvacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:54333: tatra halādiḥ śeṣe sati abhyāse takāraḥ śrūyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:54346: kavateḥ abhyāsasya yaṅi parataḥ cuḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54349: kavateḥ iti vikaraṇanirdeśaḥ kauteḥ kuvateś ca nivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54355: kṛṣeḥ chandasi viṣaye yaṅi parataḥ abhyāsasya cuḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54362: dādharti dardharti dardharṣi bobhūtu tetikate alarṣi āpanīphaṇat saṃsaniṣyadat karikrat
GS24jvkasipu:54363: kanikradat bharibhrat davidhvataḥ davidyutat taritrataḥ sarisṛpatam varīvṛjat marmṛjya
GS24jvkasipu:54364: āganīganti ity etāni aṣṭādaśa chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:54366: dhṛṅo vā ślau yaṅluki vā abhyāsasya dīrghatvaṃ ṇilopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54371: atra ca yallakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:54372: bobhūtu iti bhavateḥ yaṅlugantasya loṭi guṇābhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54377: jñāpayati, anyatra yaṅlugantasya guṇapratiṣedho na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54380: yaṅo ṅittvāt pratyayalakṣaṇena ātmanepadaṃ siddham eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:54383: alarṣi iti - iyarteḥ laṭi sipi abhyāsasya halādiḥ śeṣāpavādo rephasya latvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54386: āpanīphaṇat iti - phaṇater āṅpūrvasya yaṅlugantasya śatari abhyāsasya nīk nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54393: karikrat iti - karoteḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari cutvabhyāvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54395: kanikradat iti - krandeḥ luṅi cleḥ aṅādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54401: bharibhrat iti - bibharteḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari bhṛñām it (*7,4.76)
GS24jvkasipu:54403: davidhvataḥ iti - dhvarateḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari jasi rūpam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:54404: atra abhyāsasya vigāgamaḥ ṛkāralopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54406: davidyutat iti - dyuteḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari abhyāsasya amprasāraṇābhāvaḥ attvam,
GS24jvkasipu:54408: taritrataḥ iti - tarateḥ śatari ślau ṣaṣṭhyekavacane abhyāsasya rigāgamaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54409: sarīsṛpatam iti - sṛpeḥ śatari ślau dvitīyaikavacane abhyāsasya rīgāgamaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54410: varīvṛjat iti - vṛjeḥ śatari ślau rīgāgamaḥ nipātyate abhyāsasya /
GS24jvkasipu:54411: marmṛjya iti - mṛjeḥ liṭi ṇali abhyāsasya rugāgamaḥ dhātoś ca yugāgamo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54415: āganīganti iti - āṅpūrvasya gamerlati ślau abhyāsasya cutvābhāvaḥ nīgāgamaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54417: itikaraṇam evaṃ prakāraṇām anyeṣām apy upasaṅgrahārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:54425: narīnarti ity evam ādau abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādo na+utsargān vidhīn bādhate iti uḥ adatve kṛte rugādaya āgamāḥ kriyante //
GS24jvkasipu:54428: dyuti svāpi ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54436: tasya abhyāsanimittena pratyayena ānantarye sati samprasāranam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54447: halādiḥ śeṣeṇa yakārasya nivṛttau prāptāyāṃ samprasāraṇaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54454: iṇo 'ṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya dīrgho bhavati kiti liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54456: iṇo yaṇ (*6,4.81) iti yaṇādeśe kṛte sthānivadbhāvād dvirvacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:54461: abhyāsasya ādeḥ akārasya dīrgho bhavati liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54468: tasmād ato 'bhyāsād dīrghībhūtād uttarasya dvihalo 'ṅgasya nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54478: aśnoteś ca dīrghībhūtād abhyāsād uttarasya nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54480: aśnoteḥ iti vikaraṇanirdeśaḥ aśnāter mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54484: bhavater abhyāsasya akārādeśo bhavati liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54486: bhavateḥ iti kṛtavikarananirdeśād iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:54493: sūter liṭi parasmaipadaṃ vugāgamaḥ abhyāsasya ca atvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54498: nijādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ abhyāsasya guṇo bhavati ślau sati /
GS24jvkasipu:54503: eṣāṃ hi vṛtkaraṇam samāptyarthaṃ paṭhyate eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54507: bhṛñādīnāṃ trayāṇām abhyāsasya ikārādeśo bhavati śalau sati /
GS24jvkasipu:54515: arti piparti ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya ikārādeśo bhavati ślau /
GS24jvkasipu:54520: chandasi viṣaye abhyāsasya ślau bahulam ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54543: sani iti vartate, it iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54544: uvarṇāntābhyāsasya pavarge yaṇi jakāre ca avarṇapare parataḥ ikārādeśo bhavati sani pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54554: etad eva puyaṇjyapare iti vacanaṃ jñāpakam,
GS24jvkasipu:54556: oḥ iti kim ? pāpacyateḥ san - pāpaciṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:54564: sravati śṛṇoti dravati pravati plavati cyavati ity eteṣām abhyāsasya oḥ avarnapare yaṇi vā ikārādeśo bhavati sani parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54578: pūrvasūtrena tu anantara eva yaṇi bhavitavyam iti aprāptabibhāṣeyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54583: yaṅi yaṅluki ca igantasya abhyāsasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54591: akito 'bhyāsasya dīrgho bhavati yagi yaṅluki ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54601: nanu cātra apavādatvān nuki kṛte abhyāsasya anajantatvād eva dīrghatvaṃ na bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:54602: evaṃ tarhi akitaḥ ity anena etaj jñāpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54603: abhyāsavikāreṣv apavādā na+utsargān vidhīn bādhante iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54605: ḍoḍhaukyate ity atra dīrgho 'kitaḥ ity anena sandhyakṣarahrasvo na bādhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54608: mānprabhṛtīnāṃ dīrgheṇa sanītvaṃ na bādhyate - mīmāṃsate, ī ca gaṇaḥ (*7,4.97)
GS24jvkasipu:54612: vañcu sraṃsu dhvaṃsu bhraṃsu kasa pata pada skanda ity eteṣām abhyāsasya nīgāgamo bhavati yaṅi yaṅluki ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54631: anunāsikāntasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya akārāntasya nugāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54642: tena yaṃyamyate ity evam ādau ajhalparatve 'pi anusvāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54647: taparakaraṇaṃ tu bhūtapūrvasya api dīrghasya nivṛttyartham,
GS24jvkasipu:54652: japa jabha daha daśa bhañja paśa ity eteṣām abhyāsasya nugāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54659: dandaśīti daśa iti daṃśiḥ ayaṃ nakāralopārtham eva nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54667: cara phala ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya nugāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54674: caraphaloḥ abhyāsāt parasya ataḥ ukārādeśo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54685: dīrghasya asiddhatvāt iha labhutvaṃ na nivartate // [879]
GS24jvkasipu:54688: takārādau pratyaye parataḥ caraphaloḥ akārasya ukārādeśo bhavati caraṇaṃ cūrtiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54693: abhyāsasya iti ca anuvartamānam api vacanasāmarthyād iha na abhisambadhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:54696: ṛdupadhasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya rīgāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54711: yaṅluki ṛdupadhasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsas tasya rugrikau āgamau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54721: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya rugrikau āgamau bhavataḥ rīk ca yaṅluki /
GS24jvkasipu:54728: kiratiṃ carkarītāntaṃ pacati ity atra yo nayet /
GS24jvkasipu:54729: prāptijñaṃ tamahaṃ manye prārabdhas tena saṅgrahaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:54730: tatreyaṃ prāptiḥ taparakaranasāmarthyād aṅgaviśeṣaṇam ṛtaḥ ity etat,
GS24jvkasipu:54734: laghuni dhātvakṣare parato yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya caṅpare ṇau parataḥ sanīva kāryaṃ bhavati anaglope /
GS24jvkasipu:54755: atra kecid gaśabdam labhumāśritya sanbadbhāvam icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:54756: sarvatraiva laghorānantaryam abhyāsena na asti iti vyavadhāne 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyād bhavitavyam, tad asat /
GS24jvkasipu:54757: yena na avyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt ity ekena vyavadhānam āśrīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54760: ācāryapravṛttir jñāpayati bhavaty evaṃ jātīyakānām ittvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54761: yad ayaṃ tad bādhanārthaṃ samratyādīnām atvam vidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:54765: caṅi eva kevale mā bhūt, acakamata /
GS24jvkasipu:54768: vāditavantaṃ prayojitavān avīvadat ity atra yo 'sau ṇau ṇerlopo nāsāvaglopa ity āśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54772: mīmādīnām atra grahaṇāt sanvadbhāvena abhyāsalopo na bhavati ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:54773: kiṃ ca sanvat iti sanāśrayaṃ kāryamatidiśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54774: na ca lopaḥ sanam eva apekṣate,
GS24jvkasipu:54777: tadabhāvāt amīmapat ity ādau abhyāsalopo na bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:54780: dīrghā bhavati laghoḥ abhyāsasya laghuni ṇau caṅpare anaglope /
GS24jvkasipu:54795: smṛ dṝ tvara pratha mrada stṝ spaśa ity eteṣām abhyāsasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati caṅpare ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54805: ity etad api na bhavati, adadarat //
GS24jvkasipu:54808: veṣṭi ceṣṭi ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya vibhāṣā at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati caṅpare ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54814: gaṇeḥ abhyāsasya īkārādeśo bhavati caṅpare ṇau parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54817: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54821: sarvasya iti ca dve iti ca+etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54824: sarvasya dve bhavataḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54826: iti, tatra sarvasya sthāne dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54828: ye śabdataś ca arthataś ca ubhayathāntaratame /
GS24jvkasipu:54832: yadā tu dviḥ prayogo dvirvacanam tadā sa eva pacatiśabdo dvirāvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:54836: atha padasya ity eva kasmān na+ucyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:54838: iha hi na syāt prapacati prapacati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54840: droḍhā iti ghatvaḍhatvayoḥ asiddhatvād akṛtayor eva tayor dvivacanaṃ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:54841: tatra paścād vikalpe satyaniṣtam api syāt drogdhā droḍhā,
GS24jvkasipu:54843: tasmād vaktavyam etat pūrvatra asiddhīyam advirvacane iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54844: sarvasya ity etad eva vā kṛtaṃ sarvakāryapratipattyarthaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:54847: tasya dviruktasya yat paraṃ śabdarūpaṃ tad āmreḍitasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54856: anudāttaṃ ca tad bhavati yad āmreḍitasañjñam /
GS24jvkasipu:54861: nitye cārthe vipsāyāṃ ca yad vartate tasya dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54867: yāṃ kriyāṃ kartā prādhānyena anuparaman karoti tan nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:54872: lunīhi lunīhi ity evāyaṃ lunāti ktvāṇamulorloṭaś ca dvirvacanāpekṣāyām eva paunaḥpunyaprakāśane śaktiḥ / [883]
GS24jvkasipu:54875: yadā tu tatra dvirvacanam tadā kriyāsamabhihāre paunaḥpunyaṃ draṣṭavyam pāpacyate pāpacyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54880: kā punaḥ sā ? nānāvācinām adhikaraṇānāṃ kriyāguṇābhyāṃ yugapat prayokturvyāptum icchā vīpsā /
GS24jvkasipu:54881: nānābhūtārthavācināṃ śabdānāṃ yānyadhikaraṇāni vācyāni teṣāṃ kriyāguṇābhyāṃ yugapat prayoktum icchā vīpsā /
GS24jvkasipu:54885: yat tiḍantaṃ nityatayā prakarṣeṇa ca yuktaṃ tataḥ kṛtadvirvacanāt prakarṣapratyaya iṣyate pacati pacatitarām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54886: iha tu āḍhyataramāḍhyataramānaya iti prakarṣayuktasya vīpsāyoga iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:54889: pari ity etasya varjane 'rthe dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54899: samāse tu tena+eva+uktatvād varjanasya na+eva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:54903: pra sam upa ut ity etaṣāṃ pādapūraṇe dve bhavato dvirvacanena cet pādaḥ pūrvate /
GS24jvkasipu:54906: upopa me parā mṛśa kiṃ nodudu harṣase dātavā u /
GS24jvkasipu:54914: upari adhi adhas ity eteṣāṃ dve bhavataḥ sāmīpye vivakṣite /
GS24jvkasipu:54924: auttarādharyam eva vivakṣitaṃ na sāmīpyam iti dvirvacanaṃ na bhavati // [884]
GS24jvkasipu:54928: vākyāder āmantritasya dve bhavataḥ asūyāsammatikopakutsanabhartsaneṣu yadi tad vākyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54964: ekam ity etac chabdarūpaṃ dviruktaṃ bahuvrīhivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54973: bahuvrīhir eva yo bahuvrīhiḥ iti vijñānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:54977: ṛk pūḥ iti samāsānto na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:54991: priyasya ciragamanādinā pīḍyamānaḥ kaścid evam prayuṅkte prayoktā // [885]
GS24jvkasipu:54994: ita uttareṣu dvirvacaneṣu karmadhārayavat kāryaṃ bhavati ity etad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55002: kopadhāyā api hi karmadhārayavadbhāvāt puṃvatkarmadhārayaḥ iti puṃvadbhāvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55005: samāsāntodāttatvam anena+eva vidhīyate iti paratvadāmreḍitānudāttatvaṃ bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55006: adhikāreṇaiva siddhe yat uttareṣu iti vacanaṃ tadvispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:55020: tat katham ? vakṣyamāṇam anyatarasyāṃgrahaṇam ubhayoḥ śeṣo vijāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55026: yadyapyatra agniśabdo gośabdaś ca mukhyārthasambandhādavabhṛtabhedaṃ taikṣṇyajāḍyādikamarthāntare gunaviśeṣam eva pratipādayituṃ pravṛttaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55027: tathāpi sarvadā guṇavacano na bhavati iti na dvirucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55033: asmāt kārṣāpaṇād iha bhavadbhyām māṣaṃ māṣaṃ dehi /
GS24jvkasipu:55036: atra hi dvāv eva māṣau dīyete,
GS24jvkasipu:55040: asmāt kārṣāpaṇād iha bhavadbhyāṃ māṣamekaṃ dehi,
GS24jvkasipu:55044: asmāt kārṣāpaṇād iha bhavadbhyāṃ māṣamekaṃ dehi /
GS24jvkasipu:55054: sa bhavān lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayaṃ lunāti / [886]
GS24jvkasipu:55058: nitya ity eva siddha iti tatra+uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:55066: tadarthaṃ kecit ḍāci bahulam iti paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55073: ḍataraḍatamayoḥ samasampradhāraṇayoḥ strīnigade bhave dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55081: tathā strīnigadādbhāvāt anyatra api hi dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55084: karmavyatihāre sarvanāmno dve bhavata iti vaktavyaṃ samāsavacca bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:55085: yadā na samāsavat prathamaikavacanaṃ tadā pūrvapadasya anyamanyamime brāhmaṇā bhojayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:55100: priya sukha ity etayoḥ anyatarasyāṃ dve bhavataḥ akṛcchre dyotye /
GS24jvkasipu:55120: sarveṣāṃ tu yathāyathaṃ yathātmīyam ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:55125: attvaṃ ca+uttarapadasya nipātyate rahasya maryādāvacana vyutkramaṇa yajñapātraprayoga abhivyakti ity eteṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:55137: dvivargasambandhanena pṛthagavasthitā dvanvdvaṃ vyutkrāntā ity ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:55138: yajñapātraprayoge - dvandvaṃ nyañci yajñapātrāṇi prayunakti dhīraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55142: anyatra api dvandvam ity etad dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55150: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ padasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55156: vakṣyamāṇavākyāpekṣayā padasya adhikṛtasya ṣaṣṭhyarthavyavasthā draṣṭavyāḥ kvacit sthānaṣaṣṭhī,
GS24jvkasipu:55160: padāt ity ayam adhikāraḥ prāk kutsane ca supyagotrādau (*8,1.69)
GS24jvkasipu:55162: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ padāt ity evaṃ tad deditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55164: āmantritasya padāt parasya anudāttādeśo bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55173: apādādau iti ca etat trayam adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam ā pādaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55174: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ anudāttaṃ sarvam apādādau ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55178: yat te niyānaṃ rajasaṃ mṛtyo anavadharṣyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55186: sarvagrahaṇam sarvam anūdyamānaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ ca anudāttaṃ yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55187: tena yuṣmadasmadādeśānām api vākyabhedena anudāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55188: yuṣmadasmadādeśāś ca sarvasya subantasya padasya yathā syuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55194: āmantritasya padasya padāt parasya apadādau vartamānasya sarvam anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55207: āmantritāntaṃ tiṅantaṃ yuṣmadasmadādeśāś ca yasmāt parāṇi na teṣāṃ sāmarthyam iti tadāśrayā nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśā na syuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55212: yuṣmad asmad ity etayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vām nau ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55215: anudāttaṃ sarvamapādādau iti sarvam iha sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55222: ekavacanabahuvacanāntayor ādeśāntar avidhānād dvivacanāntayoḥ etāv ādeśau vijñāyete /
GS24jvkasipu:55226: iha mā bhūt, ayaṃ yuṣmatputraḥ ayam asmatputraḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:55229: bahuvacanāntayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam vas nas ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55238: yuṣmadasmadoḥ ekavacanāntayoḥ ṣaṣthīcaturthīsthayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ te me ity etau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55247: dvitīyāyā yad ekavacanaṃ tad antayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam tvā mā ity etau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55252: ca vā ha aha eva ebhir yukte yuṣmadasmadoḥ vānnāvādayoḥ na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55331: yuṣmākam eva svam asmākam eva svam /
GS24jvkasipu:55354: taiḥ paśyārther anālocane vartamānair yukte yuṣmadasmadoḥ vānnāvādayo na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55368: vidyamānapūrvāt prathamāntāt padāt uttarayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhāṣa vānnāvādayo na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55388: iha mā bhūt, atho grāme kambalaste svam,
GS24jvkasipu:55390: apara āha - sarva eva vānnāvādayo 'nanvādeśe vibhāṣā vaktavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55398: na tarhi idānīmidaṃ vaktavyam sapūrvāyāḥ prathamāyā vibhāṣā iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:55410: tiṅantāt padāt parāṇi gotrādīni kutsane ābhīkṣṇye cārthe vartamānāni anudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55444: tena anyatra api gotrādigrahaṇena kutsanābhīkṣṇyayor eva kāryaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:55447: tiṅantaṃ padam atiṅantāt padāt param anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55461: tāseḥ parasya lasārvadhātukasya anudāttatve sati sarvatāsir eva udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55467: yat yadi hanta kuvit net cet caṇ kaccit yatra ity etair nipātair yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55480: tena yogena vidhir ayaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55490: yatra kva ca te mano dakṣaṃ dadhasa uttaram //
GS24jvkasipu:55493: naha ity etena yukte pratyārambhe tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55494: coditasya avidhīraṇe upālipsayā pratiṣedhayuktaḥ pratyāraṃhaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55498: naha vai tasmiṃś ca loke dakṣiṇām icchanti //
GS24jvkasipu:55501: satyam ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ na anudāttaṃ bhavati praśne /
GS24jvkasipu:55508: aṅga ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ aprātilomye gamyamāne nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55518: hi ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantam aprātilomye nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55528: chandasi viṣaye hiyuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃane kam api nānudāttaṃ bhavati, ekam api /
GS24jvkasipu:55529: kadācid ekaṃ kadācid anekam ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55530: tatra anekaṃ tāvat - anṛtaṃ hi matto vadati,
GS24jvkasipu:55533: ekaṃ khalv api - agnir hi pūrvamudajayat tamindro 'nūdajayat tiṅantadvayam api hiśabdayuktam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:55536: ajā hy agner ajaniṣṭa garbhāt sā vā apaśyaj janitāram agne /
GS24jvkasipu:55541: yāvat yathā ity etābhyāṃ yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55551: yāvad yathā ity etābhyāṃ yuktam anantaraṃ tiṅantaṃ pūjāyaṃ viṣaye nānudāttaṃ na bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ?
GS24jvkasipu:55566: yāvadyathābhyāṃ yuktaṃ upasargavyapetaṃ ca pūjāyāṃ viṣaye nānudāttaṃ na bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ?
GS24jvkasipu:55579: tu paśya paśyata aha ity etair yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati pūjāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:55586: pūjāyām iti vartamāne punaḥ pūjāyām ity ucyate nighātapratiṣedhārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:55587: tad dhi pratiṣedhasya pratiṣedhena sambaddham iti //
GS24jvkasipu:55590: aho ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati pūjāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:55596: aho ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ śeṣe vibhāṣā nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55602: pūjāyām ity asay pūrvatra ca anukṛṣṭatvād anadhikāre siddhe śeṣavacanaṃ vispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:55605: purā ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ parīpsāyām arthe vibhāṣā nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55617: nanu ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55622: anujānīṣva māṃ karaṇaṃ prati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55630: kim ity etat kriyāpraśne yadā vartate tadānena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ anupasargam apratiṣiddhaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55636: pūrvaṃ kiṃyuktam iti tan na nihanyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55637: uttaraṃ tu na kiṃyuktam iti tannihanyata eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55639: yady apy ekasya ākhyātasya samīpe kiṃśabdaḥ śrūyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55640: tathāpi sarvasya saṃśayaviṣayasya tena yogaḥ iti ubhayatra pratiṣedhena bhavitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55656: kimo lope kriyāpraśne tiṅantam anupasargam apratiṣiddhaṃ vibhāṣā nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55667: ehi manye ity anena yuktaṃ lṛḍantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati prahāse /
GS24jvkasipu:55679: gatyarthaloṭā lṛṭ ity eva siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55684: prahāse eva hi manyater uttamo vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55701: tat kiṃvṛttaṃ ciduttaram avidyamānapūrvaṃ yat tena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55716: āho utāho ity etābhyām apūrvābhyāṃ yuktam anantaraṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55728: āho utāho ity etābhyāṃ yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttam śeṣe vibhāṣā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55735: gatyartha-loṭā lṛṇ na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyat // PS_8,1.51 //
GS24jvkasipu:55739: tena gatyarthaloṭā yuktaṃ lṛḍantaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55741: yatra+eva kārake kartari karmaṇi vā loṭ,
GS24jvkasipu:55742: tatra+eva yadi lṛḍ api bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55743: kartṛkarmaṇī eva atra tiṅantavācye kārakagrahaṇena gṛhyete,
GS24jvkasipu:55759: lṛṭ iti kim ? āgaccha devadatta grāmam,
GS24jvkasipu:55761: na cet kārakam sarvānyat iti kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:55768: tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca drakṣyāvaḥ enam ity atra api nighātapratiṣedho yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:55769: lṛḍantavācye hi sarvasmin kārake anyasmin na bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:55770: iha tu yat loḍantasya kārakaṃ taccānyacca lṛḍantena ucyate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:55773: loḍantaṃ tiṅantaṃ gatyarthaloṭā yuktaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55775: loḍantayor ekaṃ kārakaṃ yadi bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55787: na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyat ity eva,
GS24jvkasipu:55791: āgaccha devadatta grāmam tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca paśyāva /
GS24jvkasipu:55797: loḍantaṃ sopasargam uttamavarjitaṃ gatyarthalootā yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ vibhāṣitaṃ nānudāttam bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55812: hanta ity anena yuktaṃ loḍantaṃ sopasargam uttamavarjitaṃ vibhāṣitaṃ nānudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55816: nipātair yadyadihanta iti nityam atra nighātapratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55822: āmaḥ uttaram ekapadāntaram āmantritāntam anantike nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55826: nāmantrite samānādhikaraṇe sāmānyavacanam iti nāvidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55835: āma ekāntaram āmantritaṃ yat tasya ekaśruter anudāttasya ca pratiṣedha iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55836: tad ubhayam anena kriyate iti kecid āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55839: anantike ity anena yan na dūraṃ na sannikṛṣṭaṃ tat parigṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55840: tena asminnekadśruteḥ prāptir eva na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:55847: tuparaṃ ca tiṅantaṃ chandasi nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55849: hiparam - indavo vāmuśanti hi tuparam - ākhyāsyāmi tu te /
GS24jvkasipu:55851: iti, tupaśyapaśyatāhaiḥ iti ca nighātapratiṣedhe siddhe vacanam idaṃ niyamārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:55856: ehi ity anena gatyarthaloṭā yuktasya rohāva ity asya loḍantasya highāto bhavaty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:55859: cana cid iva gotrādi taddhita āmreḍita ity eteṣu parataḥ agateḥ uttaraṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55866: iha api gotrādayaḥ kutsanābhikṣṇyayoḥ eva gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:55876: sagatir api tiṅ ity atra ca upasargagrahaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55882: cādiṣu ca parataḥ tiṅantamagateḥ paraṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55886: caśabde tāvat - devadattaḥ pacati ca khādati ca /
GS24jvkasipu:55887: vā - devadattaḥ pacati vā khādati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:55888: ha - devadattaḥ pacati ha khādati ha /
GS24jvkasipu:55892: devadattaḥ prapacati ca prakhādati ca prakhādati ca /
GS24jvkasipu:55893: prathamasyātra tiṅantasya cavāyoge prathamā iti nighātaḥ pratiṣidyate eva,
GS24jvkasipu:55897: agateḥ iti pūrvasūtre ca anukṛṣṭam ity atra nānuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:55898: ca, vā ity etābhyāṃ yoge prathamā tiṅavibhaktir nānudāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55903: yogagrahaṇaṃ pūrvābhyām api yoge nighātapratiṣedho yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55904: prathamāgrahaṇam dvitīyādeḥ tiṅantasya mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55905: cavāyogo hi dvisamuccaye vikalpe ca sati bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55909: ha ity anena yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ nānudāttā bhavati kṣiyāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:55921: aha ity anena yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhktir nānudāttā bhavati viniyoge gamyamāne,
GS24jvkasipu:55933: calope ahalope prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ nānudāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55934: eva iti etac ced avadhāraṇārthaṃ prayujyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55944: grāmaṃ cāraṇyaṃ ca gacchatu ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55952: na kva cid bhokṣyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55958: teṣāṃ lope prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ nānudāttā bhavati vibhāṣā / [900]
GS24jvkasipu:55962: bhavanti ity etad vikalpena na nihanyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55969: vai vāva ity etābhyāṃ yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ vibhāṣā nānudāttā bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:55976: eka anya ity etābhyāṃ samarthābhyāṃ yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ vibhāṣā nānudāttā bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:55992: yatra pade yacchabdo vartate tatsarvaṃ yadvṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:55994: ḍataraḍatamau ca pratyayau ity etan na aśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55995: tasmād yad vṛttād uttaraṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttam bhavati nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:56007: pūjanebhyaḥ kāṣṭhādibhyaḥ uttarapadaṃ pūjitam anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56027: dāruṇam adhyāpakaḥ ity evam ādiṣu na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56028: malopaś ca ity anena apy ayam eva viṣaya ākhyāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:56029: yatra vibhakter abhāvāt makāro na śrūyate tatra audāttatvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56032: pūjanāt ity eva pūjitaparigrahe siddhe pūjitagrahaṇam anantarapūjitapratipattyarthaṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:56033: etad eva jñāpakam iha prakaraṇe pañcamīnirdeśe 'pi nānantaryamāśrīyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56036: anudāttam iti vartamāne punar anudāttagrahaṇam pratiṣedhanivṛttyartham //
GS24jvkasipu:56039: sagatir agatir api pūjanebhyaḥ kāṣṭhādibhyaḥ paraṃ pūjitaṃ tiṅantam anudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56046: nipātair yadyadihanta iti pratiṣedhe prāpte punar vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:56056: kutsane ca subante gotrādivarjite parataḥ sagatir api tiṅ agatir api anudātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56075: vibhāṣitaṃ ca api bahvartham anudāttam bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:56080: supi kutsane kriyāyā malopa iṣṭo 'tiṅi iti coktārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:56081: pūtiś ca cānubandho vibhāṣitaṃ ca api bahvartham //
GS24jvkasipu:56092: yāhi ity etat prati kriyāyogādāṅityeṣa gatiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56093: tasya gatau ity etasmin na sati gatiḥ ity anāśritaparanimittakam anudāttatvaṃ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:56102: tatrānudātto bhavati iti dhātau eva udāttavati syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:56103: pratyaye na syāt yat prakaroti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56104: yatkriyāprayuktāḥ prādayas teṣām taṃ prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti tiṅante dhātum eva prati gatisañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:56109: teṣām avyayapūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratve satyakriyamāṇe 'pi tiṅgrahaṇe paramanudāttavad bhavati iti gatinighāto naiva sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:56111: evam api satiśiṣṭatvādāma eva svare sati gateḥ anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158)
GS24jvkasipu:56113: yeṣāṃ gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ samāsavacanam prāk subutpatteḥ ity anena vacanena kṛdantena+eva prāk subutpatteḥ samāso bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56116: teṣām evaṃvidhe viṣayesamāsena na+eva bhavitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56117: pṛthak svarapravṛttau satyāmanena nighātena prayojanam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:56128: devadatta, yajñadatta ity atra āmantritasya padāt parasya iti nighāto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56133: devadatta mama grāmaḥ svam ity evam ādisu yuṣmadasmadādeśā na bhavanti / [903]
GS24jvkasipu:56135: yāvad devadatta pacasi ity atra api pūjāyāṃ nānantaram ity eva pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56137: tiy etat, devadatta jātu pacasi ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56140: utāho devadatta pacasi ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56142: iti, ām bho pacasi devadatta ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56146: devadatta ity etasya āmantritādyudāttatve kartavye na avidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56147: pūrvatvam ca parāpekṣam bhavati iti parasya+eva kārye svanimitte 'nyanimitte vā tadavidyamānavad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56149: devadatta pacasi ity atra api hi āmantritādyudāttatvaṃ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:56150: iha imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati iti gaṅgeśabdaḥ pūrvamānantritam,
GS24jvkasipu:56151: tataḥ parasya yamuneśabdasya anudāttatve kartavye svayam avidyamānavattvān nimittaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56155: avidyamānavattvasya pratiṣedhaḥ āmantritānte samānādhikarane parataḥ pūrvam āmantritāntaṃ sāmānyavacanam na avidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56178: viśeṣavacane samānādhikarane āmantritānte parataḥ pūrvam āmantritaṃ bahuvacanāntaṃ vibhāṣitam avidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56183: sāmānyavacanādhikāradeva viśeṣavacane iti siddhe viśeṣavacanagrahaṇaṃ vispaṣṭārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:56187: iti vāmanakāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamasya adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:56191: pūrvatra asiddham ity adhikāro 'yam ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56192: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ pūrvatra asiddham ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:56195: ita uttaraṃ ca uttara uttaro yogaḥ pūrvatra pūrvatra asiddho bhavati asiddhavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56202: asā ādityaḥ ity atra vyalopasya śasiddhatvāt, ād guṇaḥ (*6,1.87)
GS24jvkasipu:56206: amuṣmin iti utvasya asiddhatvāt smāyādayo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:56210: ity asya asiddhatvād udīcāmātaḥ sthāne yakapūrvāyāḥ (*7,3.46)
GS24jvkasipu:56215: kṣāmo vā asya asti iti kṣāmī,
GS24jvkasipu:56216: kṣāmiḥ kṣāmī vā yasya asti iti kṣāmimān /
GS24jvkasipu:56217: kṣāyo maḥ ity asya asiddhatvān mādupadhāyāś ca iti vatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56221: iti dvirvacane kartavye ḍhatvadhatvaṣṭutvaḍhalopānām asiddhatvāṇ ṇau ca yaḥ ṭilopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56222: tasya sthānivadbhāvāt tha ity etad dvirucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56223: anaglope iti pratiṣedhāt sanvadittvaṃ na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:56225: aujiḍhat ity etat tu ktinnantasya uḍhiśabdasya bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56226: guḍaliṇmān iti guḍaliho 'sya santi iti matup,
GS24jvkasipu:56234: , tasmād ity uttarasya iti ca kartavye na asiddhatva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56235: kāryakālaṃ hi sañjñāparibhāṣam iti pūrvatvamāsāṃ paribhāṣāṇāṃ na asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56236: vipratiṣedhe param ity eṣā ca paribhāṣā yena pūrveṇa lakṣaṇena saha spardhate,
GS24jvkasipu:56237: paraṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tatprati tasya asiddhatvān na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:56239: agoryam iti guṇaḥ pareṇa hali ca (*8,2.77)
GS24jvkasipu:56241: apavādasya tu parasya api utsarge kartavye vacanaprāmaṇyād asiddhatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56243: dogdhum ity atra ghatvasya asiddhatvād ho ḍhaḥ (*8,2.31)
GS24jvkasipu:56251: vidhiśabdo 'yaṃ pratyekam abhisambadhyamānaḥ svarasañjñātukāṃ vidheyatvāt taiḥ karmaṣaṣṭhīyuktaiḥ bhāvasādhano 'bhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56257: takṣabhiḥ ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvāt ato bhisa ais (*7,1.9)
GS24jvkasipu:56264: svaravidhau - rājavatī ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvāt anto 'vatyāḥ (*6,1.220)
GS24jvkasipu:56267: ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvāt arme cāvarṇaṃ dvyac tryac (*6,2.90)
GS24jvkasipu:56269: pañcadaṇḍī ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvād igante dvigau iti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56271: daśa brāhmaṇyaḥ iti nalopasya asiddhatvāt ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ (*1,1.24)
GS24jvkasipu:56276: yadi pratikāryaṃ sañjñāpravṛttiḥ ity etad darśanam /
GS24jvkasipu:56278: tayā strīpratyayapratiṣedho na kriyate iti sā punaḥ pravartayitavyā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56280: vṛtrahabhiḥ iti nalopasya asiddhatvāt hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,1.71)
GS24jvkasipu:56282: atra kecit sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti tukaṃ prati nalopasya animittatvāt,
GS24jvkasipu:56285: tat tu kriyate paribhāṣadvayasya anityatvaṃ jñāpayitum / [906]
GS24jvkasipu:56291: eteṣv eva nalopo asiddho bhavati, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:56299: mubhāvo nābhāve kartavye na asiddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56302: mubhāvasya asiddhatvāt ghilakṣaṇo nābhāvo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:56303: kṛte tu nābhāve mubhāvasya asiddhatvāt, supi ca (*7,3.102)
GS24jvkasipu:56305: tat sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56307: atha vā ne parato yat prāpnoti tasmin kartavye mubhāvo na asiddhaḥ ity eṣa eva atra sūtrārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56308: ne tu kartavye mubhāvasya yat siddhatvaṃ tadarthāt saṅgṛhītam /
GS24jvkasipu:56309: tena atra mubhāvasya siddhatvāt nābhāvaś ca bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56326: katham idam udāharaṇam yadi udāttayaṇo halpūrvāt (*6,1.174)
GS24jvkasipu:56327: ity udāttatve kṛte vibhakteḥ āṭaś ca (*6,1.90)
GS24jvkasipu:56329: atha tu kṛte ekādeśe udāttayaṇo halpūrvāt (*6,1.174)
GS24jvkasipu:56330: iti svaraḥ, tadā na+etad asya prayojanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56333: ekādeśaḥ svaraḥ gāṅge 'nūpa iti gāṅgeśabde ekāraḥ ekādeśa udāttena+udāttaḥ (*8,2.5)
GS24jvkasipu:56335: tasya siddhatvāt ya punaḥ eṅaḥ padāntādati (*6,1.109)
GS24jvkasipu:56346: nahi sanuṃkaṃ śatrantaṃ śatrantaṃ kiñcid ekādeśasvaram antareṇa antodāttam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:56349: ekadeśasvarasya siddhatvāt tena anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158)
GS24jvkasipu:56355: antaraṅga iti vacanād bahiraṅgasya asiddhatvam eva,
GS24jvkasipu:56363: iti vattve, saṃyogāntasya lope ca kṛte,
GS24jvkasipu:56365: iti rutvam, tasya saṃyogāntasya lopasya asiddhatvāt haśi ca (*6,1.114)
GS24jvkasipu:56370: iṭa īṭi (*8,2.29) iti sijlopasya siddhatvāt savarṇadīrghatva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56374: niṣṭhādeśasya siddhatvāt jhali iti ṣatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56375: kutvaṃ tu prati asiddha eva iti tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56378: yadā kṣīber niṣṭhāyām iṭi kṛte itśabdalopo nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:56379: tadā kṣībaḥ iti sañjñāyām itśabdalopasya asiddhatvāt niṣṭhā ca dvyajanāt (*6,1.205)
GS24jvkasipu:56381: kṣībena tarati kṣībikaḥ iti dvyajalakṣaṇaṣṭhan na prapnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:56386: iti hrasvalakṣaṇo nityas tug na prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:56388: ścyutir kṣaraṇe ity ayaṃ dhātuḥ sakārādiḥ paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:56390: raṭ ścyotati iti ḍaḥ si ḍhuṭ (*8,3.21)
GS24jvkasipu:56400: madhuścyayateḥ punaḥ kvipi kṛte saṃyogāditvāt salopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56404: śakārādau punar etasmin saṃyogāntalopena yakāracakārayoḥ luptayoḥ śakārasya ṣatve sati madhuḍ iti syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:56410: uccheḥ ucicchiṣati iti abhyāsādeśasya asiddhatvāt che ca (*6,1.73)
GS24jvkasipu:56418: talṃ lṃ lokam iti parasavarṇasyāsiddhatvād yaraḥ iti dvirvacanaṃ na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:56437: latvādīnāṃ vikalpitānām asiddhatvāt kṛte dvirvacane satyupariṣṭad vikalpe siti garo galaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56438: galo garaḥ ity evaṃ rūpam api dviruktaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:56439: tad etat sarvaṃ na mu ne iti yogavibhāgena sādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56440: na ity etāvadaniṣṭe viṣaye pūrvatra asiddhasya pratiṣedhārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:56445: udāttayaṇaḥ svaritayaṇaś ca parasya anudāttasya svaritaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56450: tasmāt parasya anudāttasya svaritaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56459: tasmāt svaritayaṇaḥ parasya āśāśabdākārasya anudāttasya svarito bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56460: nanu ca saptamyekavacanasya yadudāttayaṇaḥ iti svaritatvam,
GS24jvkasipu:56465: ity etasya api āśrayāt siddhatvaṃ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:56466: tataś ca dadhyaśā ity atra api svaritaḥ syāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:56467: tasmād ayam eva yaṇsvaro yaṇādeśe siddho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56469: udāttāt svaritayaṇo 'pi parasya anudāttasya svaritatvaṃ dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56470: tathā ca taittirīyake śākhāntare paṭhyate - yāste viśvāḥ samidhaḥ santyagne iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56471: agne ity ayam akāraḥ svaritaḥ paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56472: tathā brāhmaṇe 'pi dadhyāśayati ity ākāraḥ svaritaḥ paṭhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56474: tathā udāttāt svaritayaṇaḥ parasya anudāttasya anena svaritatvaṃ na bhavati iti sthitam /
GS24jvkasipu:56475: tathā ca bhāṣye svaritayaṇgrahaṇam idaṃ pratyākhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56476: sakṛllvyāśā ity evam ādau udāttayaṇaḥ ity eva svaritasya siddhatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:56480: pūrvasmād api vidhau sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam asti,
GS24jvkasipu:56481: svaradīrghayalopeṣu ca lopājādeśasya sthānivadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56492: udātena saha anudāttasya ya ekādeśaḥ sa udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56500: lasārvadhātukānudāttatve kṛte dvayor anudāttayoḥ ayam ekādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56504: anudātte padādau udāttena saha ya ekādeśaḥ sa svarito vā bhavati udātto vā /
GS24jvkasipu:56510: tasya prāditvāt samāse sati avyayapūrvaprakṛtisvaratvena ādyudāttaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56511: śeṣam anudāttam iti ca anudātte padādau ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56512: vīkṣate, vasuko 'si ity atra api tiṅṅ atiṅaḥ (*8,1.28)
GS24jvkasipu:56515: udātte hi vikalpite tasminnasatyāntaryata eva svarito bhaviṣyati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56523: prātipadikasya padasya yo 'ntyo nakāraḥ tasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56533: prātipadikagrahaṇam asamastam eva supāṃ suluk iti ṣaṣṭhyā lukā nirdiṣṭam /
GS24jvkasipu:56544: ahan iti ruvidhau yad upādīyate prathamaikavacanāntam akṛtanalopaṃ tad āvartyate,
GS24jvkasipu:56545: tatra ekayā āvṛttyā tad evaṃ rūpaṃ nalopābhāvārtham anvākhyāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:56549: ṅau parataḥ sambuddhau ca nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56555: etasmād eva nalopapratiṣedhavacanāt apratyayaḥ iti pratyayalakṣaṇena prātipadikasañjñā na pratiṣidhyate iti jñāpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:56557: tathā ca rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ ity atra nalopaś ca bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56561: he rājan vṛndāraka ity atra samudāyārthasambodhanam,
GS24jvkasipu:56562: na pūrvapadārthasambodhanaṃ pratīyate iti sambuddhyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ na+eva samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56567: matoḥ iha kāryitvena upādānāt sāmarthyalabdhaṃ prātipadikaṃ tat māt iti makārāvarṇābhyāṃ viśiṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56568: makārāvarṇaviśiṣṭayā ca upadhayā ity ayam artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56569: makārāntāt makāropadhāt avarṇāntād avarṇopadhāt ca uttarasya matoḥ vaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56606: yasya sati nimitte matupo vattvaṃ na dṛśyate sa yavādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ iha nṛmataḥ idaṃ nārmatam iti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt avarṇopadhasya matupo vattvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56609: jhayantād uttarasya matoḥ vaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56616: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye matoḥ vaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56623: āsandīvat aṣṭhīvat cakrīvat kakṣīvat carmaṇvatī ity etāni sañjñāyāṃ nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:56636: āsandīvat ity eta prapañcārtham iha paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56643: cakrīvanti sado havirdhānāni bhavanti ity etat tu chāndasatvād anugantavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:56654: carmaṇvatī iti carmaṇo nalopābhāvo ṇatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56660: udanvān iti udakaśabdasya matāvudanbhāvo nipātyate udadhāvarthe,
GS24jvkasipu:56662: udanvān nāma ṛṣiḥ yasya audanvataḥ putraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56666: udakavān ghaṭaḥ ity atra tu dadhātyartho na vivakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56671: śobhano rājā yasminniti sa rājanvān deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56676: chandasi viṣaye ivarṇāntād rephāntāc ca+uttarasya matorvattvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56684: chandasi sarve vidhayo vikalpyante iti iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56695: anantād uttarasya matoḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:56701: nuṭaḥ asiddhatvāt tasya ca vatvaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56705: nakārāntāt uttarasya ghasañjñākasya nuḍāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:56713: rathaśabdād eva vā matvarthīyo 'yam īkāraḥ chandasīvanipau iti //
GS24jvkasipu:56722: tato 'yaṃ kevalasya rephasya sthāne lakārādeśo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56732: kṛpā ity etat ṛpeḥ samprasāraṇam ca iti bhidādiṣu pāṭhād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56733: tasya hi kṛtasamprasāraṇasya lākṣaṇikatvāt iha kṛpaḥ iti grahaṇaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:56737: vālamūlalaghvasurālam aṅgulīnāṃ vā ro lamāpadyata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:56744: kapilakādīnāṃ sañjñāchandasor vā ro lamāpadyata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:56754: samānaviṣayatvam eva tayoḥ smaryate ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:56757: ayatau parataḥ upasargasya yo rephaḥ tasya lakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56761: tasya sthānivadbhāvād ayateḥ upasargasya ca vibhāge sati,
GS24jvkasipu:56763: tadā yena na avyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti ekena varṇena vyavadhāne 'pi latvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56764: tathā ca palyayate ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56765: upasargaviśeṣaṇe tu ayatigrahaṇe siddham eva+etat sarvam,
GS24jvkasipu:56767: tatra keṣāṃcid darśanaṃ bhavitavyam eva platyayate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56768: prathamapakṣadarśanābhiniṣṭāstu pratyayate ity eva bhavati iti manyante /
GS24jvkasipu:56769: apare tu pratiśabdopasṛṣṭasya ayateḥ prayogam eva na+icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:56770: nis dus ity etayos tu rutvasya asiddhatvāl latvena na+eva bhavitabyam /
GS24jvkasipu:56775: gṝ ity etasya dhātoḥ rephasya lakāra ādeśo bhavati yaṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56780: kecid graḥ iti girateḥ gṛṇāteś ca sāmānyena grahaṇam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:56787: ajādau pratyaye parato gro rephasya vibhāṣā lakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56792: tena galaḥ iti prāṇyaṅge nityaṃ latvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56793: garaḥ iti viṣe nityaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56795: nigālyate iti ṇilopasya sthānivadbhāvāt aci vibhāṣā iti latvavikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56796: pūrvatra asiddhe na sthānivat iti etad api sāpavādam eva,
GS24jvkasipu:56798: antaraṅgatvād vā kṛte latvavikalpe ṇilopo bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:56799: girau, giraḥ ity atra dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye kāryavijñānam iti latvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56804: pari ity etasya yo rephaḥ tasya ghaśabde aṅkaśabde ca parato vibhāṣā lakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56818: iha śreyān, bhūyān iti rutvam param api asiddhatvāt saṃyogāntasay lopaṃ na bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:56819: jaśtve tu nāprāpte tadārabhyāte iti tasya bādhakaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56822: ity atra tu yaṇādeśasya bihiraṅgalakṣaṇasya asiddhatvāt saṃyogāntalopo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56825: saṃyogāntapadasya yo rephaḥ tasmād uttarasya antasya sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56828: kṣarateḥ tsarateś ca luṅi sicaḥ chāndasatvād īḍabhāvaḥ bahulaṃ chandasi (*7,3.97)
GS24jvkasipu:56832: iti uttve kṛte raparatve ca sati rāt sasya iti salopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56840: dhakārādau pratyaye parataḥ sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56848: itaḥ prabhṛti sicaḥ sakārasya lopa iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56851: tathā payo dhāvati ity evam ādāv api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56852: sagdhiḥ, babdhām iti chāndaso varṇa lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56855: tena payo dhāvati ity evam ādau yatnānataramāstheyam / [916]
GS24jvkasipu:56857: āśādhvaṃ tu kathaṃ jaśtvaṃ sakārasya bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:56858: sarvam evaṃ prasiddhaṃ syāc chru tiścāpi na bhidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56859: luṅaścāpi na murdhanye grahaṇaṃ seṭi duṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:56860: ghasibhasor na sidhyeta tasmāt sijgrahaṇaṃ na tat /
GS24jvkasipu:56865: jhalaḥ uttarasya sakārasya jhali parato lopo bhavati abhitta /
GS24jvkasipu:56869: avāttām, avātta ity atra vā sicaḥ sakāralopasya asiddhatvāt saḥ syārdhadhātuke (*7,4.49)
GS24jvkasipu:56882: hrasvāntād aṅgād uttarasya lopo bhavati jhali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56901: iṭaḥ uttarasya sakārasya lopo bhavati īṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56928: thakāre jhali kakārasya saṃyogāder lopaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:56929: tad atra śakeḥ kvibantasya prayoga eva na asti ity āha kāṣṭhaśageva na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:56932: kākvartham ity atra api bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya yaṇādeśasya asiddhatvāt saṃyogādilopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56940: cavargasya kavargādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ, padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:56949: kruñcā ity atra siṅi iti vacanād ñakārasya cakāre jhali kutvaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56951: nakāropadho vā dhāturayaṃ repharahitaśca kruñca kauṭilyālpībhāvayoḥ iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56953: yujikruñcāṃ ca iti tasyaiva repho 'dhiko nakārasya lopābhāvaś ca iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56954: tatra anusvārasya parasavarṇasya ca asiddhatvāt ñakāra eva na asti iti kutvaṃ na bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:56957: hakārasya ḍhakāradeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:56969: dakārādeḥ dhātoḥ hakārasya ghakārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:56985: dhātor avayavo yo dādiḥ śabdas tad avayavasya hakārasya iti / [918]
GS24jvkasipu:56987: adhok ity atra api ghakāraḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56991: atha vā dhātūpadeśe yo dādiḥ ity evaṃ vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56993: dāmalihyateḥ kvip pratyayaḥ dāmaliṭ ity atra api na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56996: druha muha ṣṇuha ṣṇiha ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ hakārasya vā ghakārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
