GS24jvkasipu:57010: naho hakārasya dhakārādeśo bhavati jhali pare padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:57018: āho hakārasya thakārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57029: udgrābhaṃ ca nigrābhaṃ ca brahma devā avīvṛdhan //
GS24jvkasipu:57032: vraśca bhrasja sṛja mṛja yaja rāja bhrāja ity eteṣām,
GS24jvkasipu:57034: śakārāntānāṃ ca ṣakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:57068: ity atra kṅiti ity anuvartate iti chagrahaṇam iha kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57077: ekāco baśo bhaṣ jhaṣantasya s-dhvoḥ // PS_8,2.37 //
GS24jvkasipu:57079: dhātor avayavo ya ekāc jhaṣantaḥ tadavayavasya baśaḥ sthāne bhaṣ ādeśo bhavati jhali sakāre dhvaśabde ca parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:57080: atra catvaro baśaḥ sthānino bhaṣādeśāścatvāra eva,
GS24jvkasipu:57081: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśe prāpte ḍakārasya sthānino 'bhāvāt ḍhakārādeśo na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:57092: ajarghāḥ - gudheḥ yaṅlugantasya laṅi sipi labhūpadhaguṇe kṛte sipo halṅyādilope ca dhātoḥ avayavasya ekāco baśaḥ sthāne bhaṣbhāvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:57102: asati hy ekājgrahaṇe dhātoḥ ity etad baśo viśeṣaṇaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:57110: dadha dhāraṇe ity etasya yaṅluki loṭi hujhalbhyo herdhiḥ (*6,4.101)
GS24jvkasipu:57115: tasya jhalantasya baśaḥ sthāne bhaṣ ādeśo bhavati takārathakārayoḥ parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:57129: jhalāṃ jaśaḥ ādeśā bhavanti padasyānte vartamānānām /
GS24jvkasipu:57139: jhaṣa uttarayoḥ takārathakārayoḥ sthāne dhakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57173: ra-dābhyāṃ niṣthāto naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ // PS_8,2.42 //
GS24jvkasipu:57175: rephadakārābhyām uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati pūrvasya ca dakārasya /
GS24jvkasipu:57187: raḥ ity atra raśrutisām anyaṃ na+upādīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:57190: rephasāmānyanirdeśe 'pi sati rephāt parā yā 'jbhaktis tadvyavadhānānnatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57199: iha kṛtasya apatyaṃ kārtiḥ iti vṛddheḥ bahiraṅgalakṣaṇāyā asiddhatvānnatve kartavye rephasya asiddhatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:57220: lūñ chedane ity etat prabhṛti vṝñ varaṇe iti yāvat vṛtkaraṇena samāpitā lvādayo gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:57246: grāso 'pi yadā karmaiva bhavati na karmakartā,
GS24jvkasipu:57251: okāreto dhātor uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57279: kṣiyo dhātoḥ dīrghād uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57290: hrasvasya api hi dhātvanukaraṇasya iha iyaṅā nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57294: ity evam ādau tu dhātutvam anukāryagataṃ sadapyavivakṣitatvād jirupasāmānyānukaraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:57297: śyāyateḥ uttarasya niṣthātakārasya asparśe nakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57304: śītam udakam ity atra guṇabhūto 'pi sparśaḥ natvapratiṣedhasya samprasāraṇasya ca nimittaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57307: tena pratiṣīnaḥ ity atra natvaṃ bhavty eva // [922]
GS24jvkasipu:57310: añcateḥ uttarapadasya niṣthātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati na ced apādānaṃ tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57318: divaḥ uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati avijigīṣāyam arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:57326: nirvāṇaḥ iti nispūrvād vāter uttarasya niṣthatakārasya nakāro nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:57334: nirvāṇaḥ pradīpo vātena ity atra tu pradīpādhikaraṇo vātyarthaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:57335: vātastu tasya karaṇam iti bhavaty eva natvam //
GS24jvkasipu:57338: śuṣeḥ dhātor uttarasya niṣthātakārasya kakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57343: paceḥ dhātor uttarasya niṣthātakārasya vakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57353: prapūrvāt styāyateḥ uttarasya niṣthātakārasya anyatarasyāṃ makārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57360: ity asya pūrvatra asiddhatvāt saṃprasāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:57361: tatra kṛte nimittavyāghātān natvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:57364: phulla kṣība kṛśa ullāgha ity ete nipātyante,
GS24jvkasipu:57366: phullaḥ iti ñiphalā viśaraṇe ity etasmād dhātor uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya lakāro nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57371: kṣībakṛśollādhāḥ iti kṣībikṛśibhyām utpūrvāc ca lāgheḥ kta pratyayasya talopaḥ iḍabhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57385: parikṛśaḥ ity atra yaḥ pariśabdaḥ sa kriyāntarayogāt kṛśiṃ pratyanupasarga eva,
GS24jvkasipu:57389: nuda vida unda trā ghrā hrī ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya nakāra ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:57398: vida vicāraṇe ity asya vider iha grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57399: evaṃ hy uktam - vettestu vidito niṣṭhā vidyater vinna iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57400: vinater vinnaś ca vittaśca bhogavittaś ca vindateḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:57404: dhyā khyā pṝ mūrcchi mada ity eteṣāṃ niṣṭhātakārasya nakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57415: radābhyām, saṃyogādeḥ iti ca prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate // [924]
GS24jvkasipu:57418: vittaḥ iti vider lābhārthāt uttarasya ktasya natvābhāvo nipātyate bhoge pratyaye ca abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:57428: bhittam iti nipātyate śakalaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57433: bhidikriyāvivakṣāyāṃ hi śakalaviṣaye bhinnam bhittam ity eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:57436: ṛṇam iti ṛ ity etasmād dhātor uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya nakāro nipātyate ādhamarṇyaviṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:57438: etasmād eva nipātanāt saptamyantena uttarapadena samāsaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:57440: yady evam, uttamarṇaḥ iti na sidhyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:57443: tena uttamarṇaḥ ity api hi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57450: nasatta niṣatta anutta pratūrta sūrta gūrta ity etāni chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:57451: nasatta, niṣatta iti sadeḥ naṇpūrvāt nipūrvāc ca natvābhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57459: praturtam iti tvarateḥ turvī ity etasya vā nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:57462: sūrtam iti sṛ ity etasya utvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57465: gūrtam iti gūrī ity etasya natvābhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57472: kvin pratyayo yasmād dhātoḥ sa kvinpratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:57478: kvinaḥ kuḥ iti vaktavye pratyayagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bahuvrīhivijñānārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:57479: kvin pratyayo yasmād vihitas tasmād anyasminn api pratyaye kutvaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:57488: dṛgbhiḥ iti kvibantasya api dṛśeḥ kutvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57489: evaṃ ca sati rajjusṛḍbhyām ity atra api kutvaṃ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:57518: makāravakārayoś ca parataḥ makārāntasya dhātoḥ nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57521: gamerlaṅi bahulaṃ chandasi iti śapo luk /
GS24jvkasipu:57528: sakārāntasya padasya sajuṣ ity etasya ca ruḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57536: avayāḥ śvetavāḥ puroḍāḥ ity ete nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:57538: puras pūrvasya dāśateḥ mantre śvetavahokthaśaspuroḍāśo ṇvin (*3,2.71)
GS24jvkasipu:57541: śvetavahādīnāṃ ḍaspadasya iti ḍaspratyaye nipātanāni etāni /
GS24jvkasipu:57542: kimarthaṃ tarhi nipātanaṃ yāvatā pūrveṇa+eva ruḥ siddhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:57546: ity atra hi asambuddhau iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:57554: ahan ity etasya padasya ruḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57557: nalopam akṛtvā nirdeśo jñāpakaḥ nalopābhāvo yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57560: ahan ity atra tu lākṣaṇikatvād ahanśabdasya ruḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57565: ro 'supi (*8,2.69) ity asya apavādo rutvam upasaṅkhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57566: apara āha - sāmānyena rephādau rutvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57571: ahan ity etasya rephādaśo bhavati asupi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57580: uktam etat - ahnor avidhau lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57582: yatra tu lopaśabdena lupyate tatra pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ bhavaty eva,
GS24jvkasipu:57585: atra hi halṅyābbhyaḥ iti lopena pratyayasya nivṛttiḥ // [927]
GS24jvkasipu:57588: amnas ūdhas avas ity eteṣāṃ chandasi viṣaye ubhayathā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57595: chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca vibhāṣā pracetaso rājany upasaṅkhyānaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:57602: visarjanīyabādhanārtham atra pakṣe rephasya+eva repho vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:57605: bhuvas ity etasya mahāvyāhṛteḥ chandasi viṣaye ubhayathā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57611: bhuvaḥ ity etad avyavyam antarikṣavāci mahāvyāhṛtiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:57616: tena sambhavāt vyabhicārāc ca vasur eva viśeṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:57622: anaḍuḥ ity eteṣāṃ ca dakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57636: rutve nāprāpte idam ārabhyate iti tad bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57637: saṃyogāntalopas tu na+evam iti tena etad eva datvaṃ bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57646: tipi parataḥ sakārāntasya padasya anasteḥ dakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57653: āḥ ity asteḥ laṅi tipi bahulaṃ chandasi (*7,3.97)
GS24jvkasipu:57657: sipi parataḥ sakārāntasya padasya dhātoḥ ruḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, dakāro vā /
GS24jvkasipu:57665: dakārāntasya dhātoḥ padasya sipi parato ruḥ bhavati, dakāro vā /
GS24jvkasipu:57672: rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ padasya upadhāyāḥ ikaḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57688: hali ca parato rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ upadhāyāḥ ikaḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57704: dhātoḥ upadhābhūtau yau rephavakārau halparau tayoḥ upadhāyāḥ iko dīrgho bhavati hurcchā - hūrcchitā /
GS24jvkasipu:57716: yaṇādeśasya sthānivattvāt asiddhatvāc ca bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvena halparau rephavakārau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57717: caturyitā ity atra api bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt ato lopasya dhātoḥ upadhābhūto repho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57718: pratidīvnā ity atra tu hali ca (*8,2.77)
GS24jvkasipu:57721: asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgamantaraṅge ity etat tu nāśrayitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:57724: giryoḥ ity evam ādiṣu dīrgho na bhavati // [929]
GS24jvkasipu:57727: rephavakārāntasya bhasya kur chur ity etayos ca dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57736: adaso 'ser dād u do maḥ // PS_8,2.80 //
GS24jvkasipu:57738: adaso 'sakārāntasya varṇasya dāt parasya uvarṇādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57742: bhāvyamānena apy ukāreṇa savarṇānāṃ grahaṇam iṣyate iti ekamātrikasya mātrikaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:57747: okārarephayor api pratiṣedho yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57753: tena tyadādyatvavidhāne etad anyatra na bhavitavyam eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57755: adaso 'dreḥ pṛthaṅ mutvaṃ kecid icchanti latvavat /
GS24jvkasipu:57758: yaiḥ aseḥ iti sakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:57759: anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya iti ca paribhāṣā na aśrīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:57765: ye tu paribhāṣām āśrayanti teṣām antyasadeśasya eva bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:57769: yeṣaṃ tu tyadādyatvaviṣaya eva mutvena bhavitavyam iti darśanam teṣām atra na bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:57773: dāt iti kim ? alo 'ntyasya mā bhūt, amuyā /
GS24jvkasipu:57777: adaso dakārād uttarasya ekārasya īkārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57786: pāribhāṣikasya hi bahuvacanasya grahaṇe amī ity atra na syāt // [930]
GS24jvkasipu:57794: yat iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ vākyasya ṭeḥ pluta udattaḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:57801: ṭigrahaṇaṃ vyañjanāntyasya api ṭeracaḥ pluto yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:57805: tatra aśūdraviṣaye yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57817: yāvac ca tasya asūyakatvaṃ na jñāyate tāvad eva pratyabhivādavākyam /
GS24jvkasipu:57818: tasmiṃstvasūyakatvena nirjñāte pratyabhivādaḥ eva na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:57823: abhivādanavākye yat saṅkīrtitaṃ nāma gotraṃ vā,
GS24jvkasipu:57824: tad yatra pratyabhivādavākyānte prayujyate tatra plutiḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57840: dūrād dhūte yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57847: tathāpi hūtāpekṣaṃ yat tadāśrīyate iti yatra prākṛtāt prayatnād yatnaviśeṣe āśrīyamāṇe śabdaḥ śrūyate tad dūram /
GS24jvkasipu:57849: tena yatra apy āhvānaṃ na asti tatra api plutir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57852: asyāś ca pluter ekaśrutyā samāveśaḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57855: dūrādāhvāne vākyasyānte yatra sambodhanapadaṃ bhavati tatra ayaṃ plutaḥ iṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:57860: haiheprayoge yad vākyaṃ vartate tatra haihayoḥ eva pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57865: punar haihayor grahaṇam antyayor api yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:57866: guror anṛto 'nantyasya apy ekaikasya prācām // PS_8,2.86 //
GS24jvkasipu:57869: ity evam ādinā yaḥ pluto vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:57872: apiśabdād antyasya api ṭeḥ ekaikasya sambodhane vartamānasya pluto bhavati prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:57883: sarva eva plutaḥ sāhasamanicchatā vibhāṣā kartavyaḥ iti tadupapannaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:57887: tatra yaḥ oṃśabdaḥ tasya pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57890: om ity etad akṣaram udgītham upāsīta //
GS24jvkasipu:57893: ye ity etasya yajñakarmaṇi pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57896: ye yajāmaha iti pañcākṣaram iti svadhyāyakāle mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:57897: ye yajāmahe ity atra+eva ayaṃ plutaḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57905: pādasya vā ardharcasya vā antyam akṣaram upasaṃgṛhya tadādyakṣaraśeṣasya sthāne trimātramokāram oṅkāraṃ vā vidadhati taṃ praṇava ity ācakṣate
GS24jvkasipu:57915: yājyā nāma ye yājyākāṇḍe paṭhyante mantrāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:57916: teṣām antyo yaḥ ṭiḥ sa plavate yajñakarmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:57921: tatra yāvanti vākyāni teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ ṭeḥ plutaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:57926: brūhi preṣya śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ āvaha ity eteṣām ādeḥ pluto bhavati yajñakarmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:57932: āvaha devān yajamānāya ity evam ādāvayaṃ pluto na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57941: agnīdagnīn vi hara barhiḥ stṛṇāhi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57942: tadarthaṃ kecid vakṣyamāṇaṃ vibhāṣa ity abhisambadhnanti,
GS24jvkasipu:57944: apara āha - sarva eva plutaḥ sāhasamanicchatā vibhāṣa vijñeyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57963: tatra nigṛhyānuyoge yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:57965: tam upālipsuḥ upapatibhir nigṛhya sabhyasūyam anuyuṅkte,
GS24jvkasipu:57972: adya amāvāsyā ity evaṃ vādī yuktyā pracyāvya svamatād evam anuyujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:57975: vākyādeḥ āmantritasya iti bhartsane dvirvacanam uktam,
GS24jvkasipu:57988: aṅga ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantam ākāṅkṣaṃ bhartsane plavate /
GS24jvkasipu:58001: tasya viṣaye vicaryamāṇānāṃ vākyānāṃ ṭeḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58008: bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye vicāryamāṇānāṃ pūrvam eva plavate /
GS24jvkasipu:58017: śravaṇābhimukhyaṃ ca tatra aviśeṣāt sarvasya grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:58018: pratiśravaṇe yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58026: abhipūjite ca agama3ḥ pūrvā3n grāmā3n grāmā3n agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u ?
GS24jvkasipu:58027: agnibhūte, paṃṭo ity etayoḥ praśnānte vartamānayoṇ anudāttaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58028: agamaḥ ity evam ādīnāṃ tu anantyasya api praśnākhyānayoḥ (*8,2.105)
GS24jvkasipu:58034: cit ity etasmin nipāte upamārthe prayujyamāne vākyasya ṭeḥ anudāttaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58047: uparisvidāsīt ity etasya ṭeḥ anudattaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58051: upari svidāsīt ity atra tu anena anudāttaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:58054: svaritaḥ pluto bhavati āmreḍite parataḥ asūyāyām,
GS24jvkasipu:58081: eteṣu gamyamāneṣu tiṅantam ākāṅkṣaṇaṃ yat tasya svaritaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58088: pūrvam atra tiṅantam uttarapadam ākāṅkṣati iti sākāṅkṣaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58089: āśiṣi - sutāṃś ca lapsīṣṭa3 dhanaṃ ca tāta /
GS24jvkasipu:58091: praiṣe - kaṭaṃ kuru3 grāmaṃ ca gaccha /
GS24jvkasipu:58100: anantyasya api antyasyāpi padasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati praśne ākhyāne ca /
GS24jvkasipu:58101: sarveṣam eva padānām eṣa svaritaḥ plutaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58108: tatra aicaḥ plutaprasaṅge tadavayavabhūtau idutau plutau /
GS24jvkasipu:58112: idutau plavete vṛddhiṃ gacchataḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58113: tāvatī ca sā plutir bhavati yayā tāvecau trimātrau sampadyete /
GS24jvkasipu:58114: yadā tu ardhamātrā avarṇasya adhyardhamātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:58118: tat katham ? samapravibhāgapakṣe idutor anena trimātraḥ pluto vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:58119: eco 'pragṛhyasya adūrādhdūte pūrvasya ardhasya ad uttarasya+idutau // PS_8,2.107 //
GS24jvkasipu:58121: eco 'pragṛhyasya adūrād dhūte plutaviṣayasya ardhasya akāraḥ ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:58125: praśnānte - agama3ḥ pūrvā3n grāmā3n agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u /
GS24jvkasipu:58126: abhipūjite - bhadraṃ karoṣi māṇavaka3 agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u /
GS24jvkasipu:58127: vicāryamāṇe - hotavyaṃ dīkṣitasya gṛhā3i pratyabhivāde - āyuṣmān edhi agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u /
GS24jvkasipu:58129: so 'yam ākaraḥ pluto yathāviṣayam udātto 'nudāttaḥ svarito veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58134: parigaṇane ca sati adūrād dhūte iti na vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:58136: iha mā bhūt, bhadraṃ karoṣi gauḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:58143: tayoḥ idutoḥ yakāravakārādeśau bhavato 'ci saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:58145: ita utaram ādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ yad vakṣyāmaḥ saṃhitāyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:58151: iti na prāpnoti ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58153: evam api svarṇadīrghatvanivṛttyarthaṃ śākalanivṛttyarthaṃ ca vaktvayam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:58158: kiṃ nu yaṇā bhavati iha na siddhaṃ yvāvidutoryadayaṃ vidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:58159: tau ca mama svarasandhiṣu sidddhau śākaladīrghavidhī tu nivartyau //
GS24jvkasipu:58160: ik tu yadā bhavati plutapūrvas tasya yaṇaṃ vidadhātyapavādam /
GS24jvkasipu:58161: tena tayoś ca na śākaladīrghau yaṇsvarabadhanam eva tu hetuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:58162: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58167: matvantasya vasvantasya ca padasya ruḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati sambuddhau parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:58168: matvantasya tāvat - indra marutva iha pāhi somam /
GS24jvkasipu:58172: suptakārayoḥ halṅyādilope saṃyogāntasya lope ca kṛte nakārasya ruḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58173: vasvantasya khalv api - mīḍhvastokāya tanayāya mṛla /
GS24jvkasipu:58186: chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca bhavat bhagavat aghavat ity eteṣāṃ vibhāṣa ruḥ vaktavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:58194: atha vā bho ity evam ādayo nipātā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58205: ita uttaraṃ yasya sthāne ruḥ vidhīyate tataḥ pūrvasya tu varṇasya vā anunāsiko bhavati ity etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:58212: adhikāraparimāṇāparigrahe hi sati ḍho ḍhe lopa (*8,3.13)
GS24jvkasipu:58213: ity atra api pūrvasya anunāsikaḥ āśaṅkyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:58216: aṭi parato roḥ pūrvasya ākārasya sthāne nityam anunāsikādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58219: tataḥ pūrvasya āto 'nunāsikavikalpe prāpte nityārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:58223: kecid anusvāram adhīyate sa cchāndaso vyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58247: kecit tu paraśabdam eva anyārthaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:58248: anunāsikāt paraḥ anunāsikāt anyaḥ anusvāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58249: yasmin pakṣe 'nunāsiko na asti tatra anusvārāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58255: samaḥ ity etasya ruḥ bhavati suṭi parataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:58265: tena atra nityaṃ sakāra eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58276: pum ity etasya ruḥ bhavati ampare khayi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58282: puṃskāmā ity atra visarjanīyasya kupvoḥ ḥkaḥpau ca (*8,3.37)
GS24jvkasipu:58285: dvisakārakanirdeśapakṣe tu pūrvasmād eva sūtrāt saḥ ity anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:58296: nakārāntasya padasya praśānvarjitasya ruḥ bhavati ampare chavi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58315: nakārāntasya padasya chavi parataḥ ampare ubhayathā ṛkṣu bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:58324: dīrghād uttarasya padāntasya nakārasya ruḥ bhavati aṭi parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:58326: ṛkṣu iti prakṛtatvād ṛkpādaḥ iha gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58328: devāṃ acchā dīdyat mahāṃ indro ya ojasā /
GS24jvkasipu:58338: nṝn ity etasya nakārasya rurbhavati paśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58344: ubhayathā ity api kecid anuvartayanti nṝn pāhi ity api yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:58347: svatavān ity etasya nakārasya rurbhavati pāyuśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58351: kān ity etasya nakārsya ruḥ bhavati āmreḍite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58357: samaḥ suṭi (*8,3.5) ity ato vā sakāro 'nuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:58359: pūrveṣu yogeṣu sambandhāvṛttyā gatasya roḥ atra anabhisambandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58366: saty api padādhikāre tasya asambhavād apadāntasya ḍhakārasya ayaṃ lopo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58370: śvaliḍ ḍhau kate ity atra tu jaśve kṛte kāryaṃ na asti iti lopābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58371: na ca ḍhalopo jaśtvāpavādo vijñātuṃ śakyate,
GS24jvkasipu:58374: śāstrakṛtaṃ tu yadā nānantaryaṃ ṣṭutvasya asiddhatvena prāptam,
GS24jvkasipu:58376: śvaliḍ ḍhaukate ity atra tu na śrutikṛtamanantaryam,
GS24jvkasipu:58388: tena apadāntasya api rephasya lopo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:58394: rephāntasya padasya khari parato 'vasāne ca visarjanīyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58405: nṛpater apatyaṃ nārpatyaḥ iti vṛddher bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt tadāśrayasya rephasya asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgam iti asiddhatvād visarjanīyo na bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:58408: ru ity asya rephasya supi parato visarjanīyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58414: ror eva supi visarjanīyādeśaḥ, na anyasya /
GS24jvkasipu:58418: bhor bhagor aghor ity evaṃ pūrvasya avarṇapūrvasya ca roḥ rephasya yakārādeśo bhavati aśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58436: ity ayaṃ lopaḥ aśi hali yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:58441: atha tatra+eva aśgrahaṇaṃ kasmān na kṛtam ?
GS24jvkasipu:58447: ity etac ca vṛkṣav karoti ity atra mā bhūt ity aśgrahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:58452: vakārayakārayoḥ bhobhagoaghoavarṇapūrvayoḥ padāntayo laghuprayatnatara ādeśo bhavati aśi parataḥ śākaṭāyanasya ācaryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:58469: vakārayakārayoḥ padāntayoḥ avarṇapūrvayoḥ lopo bhavati śākalyasya ācāryasya matena aśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58478: tena yadā 'pi laghuprayatnataro na bhavati ādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:58482: okārād uttarasya yakārasya lopo bhavati gārgyasya ācāryasya matena aśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58489: yo 'yamalaghuprayatnasya vikalpena lopaḥ kriyate so 'nena nivartyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58494: kecit tu sarvam eva yakāram atra na+icchanti //
GS24jvkasipu:58497: avarṇapūrvayoḥ vyoḥ padāntayor lopo bhavati uñi ca pade parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58503: veñaḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte uñiti bhūtapūrveṇa ñakāreṇa śakyate pratipattum iti /
GS24jvkasipu:58504: atha uñ ity evaṃ rūpo nipātaḥ pratipadokto 'sti ?
GS24jvkasipu:58505: tadā lākṣaṇikatvād veñādeśasya grahaṇam iha na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:58509: hali parataḥ bhobhagoaghoapūrvasya yakārasya padāntasya lopo bhavati sarveṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:58517: sarveṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ śākaṭāyanasya api lopo yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:58521: makārasya padāntasya anusvāraḥ ādeśo bhavati hali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58532: nakārāsya makārasya ca apadāntasya anusvārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58545: samo makārasya makāraḥ ādeśo bhavati rājatau kvippratyayānte parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58556: hakāre makārapare parato makārasya vā makāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58562: yavalapare hakāre makārasya yavalā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vā bhavanti iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:58570: nakārapare he parataḥ makārasya vā nakārādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58576: ṅakāraṇakārayoḥ padāntayoḥ kuk ṭuk ity etāv āgamau vā bhavataḥ śari parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58582: pūrvantakaraṇaṃ prāṅk chete ity atra chantvartham /
GS24jvkasipu:58583: śaścho 'ṭi (*8,4.63) iti hi padantāj jhayaḥ iti tad vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58584: iha mā bhūt, purā krūrasya visṛpo virapśin /
GS24jvkasipu:58585: prāṅk sāyaḥ ity atra api sāt padādyoḥ (*8,3.111)
GS24jvkasipu:58587: vaṇṭ sāyaḥ ity atra ca na padāntāṭ ṭoranām (*8,4.42)
GS24jvkasipu:58591: ḍakārantāt padāt uttarasya sakārādeḥ padasya vā dhuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58600: nakārāntāt padāt uttarasya sakārasya vā dhuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58608: nakārasya padantasya śakāre parato vā tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58611: yady evaṃ kurvajcchete ity atra nakārasya apadāntatvāt ṇatvaṃ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:58615: ṇatvapratiṣedhārthaṃ stoḥ ścunā ṇakāro na bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:58617: ṅamo hrasvād aci ṅamuṇ nityam // PS_8,3.32 //
GS24jvkasipu:58619: hrasvāt paraḥ yo ṅam tadantāt padāt uttarasya acaḥ ṅamuḍāgamo bhavati nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:58633: paramadaṇdinā iti uttarapadatve cāpadādividhau iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhād uttarapadasya padatvaṃ na asti iti ṅamuṭ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58635: ity ataḥ saptamyantaṃ pade ity anuvarvate /
GS24jvkasipu:58639: maya uttarasya uño vā vakārādeśo bhavati aci parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58646: pragṛhyatvāt uñaḥ prakṛtibhāve prāpte vakāro vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58647: tasya asiddhatvād hali iti mo 'nusvāraḥ (*8,3.23) na bhavati // [945]
GS24jvkasipu:58651: visarjanīyasya sakāraḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati khari parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58666: śarpare khari parato visarjanīyasya visarjanīyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58673: na iti vaktavye visarjanīyasya visarjanīyādeśavidhānaṃ vikāranivṛttyartham,
GS24jvkasipu:58677: visarjanīyasya visarjanīyādeśo vā bhavati śari pare /
GS24jvkasipu:58692: kavargapavargayoḥ parato visarjanīyasya yathāsaṅkhyam ḥkaḥpa ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:58705: ity etasminnāprāpte idam ārabhyate iti etasya bādhakam,
GS24jvkasipu:58710: pūrvatrāsiddhe nāsti vipratiṣedho 'bhāvād uttarasya iti śarpare visarjanīyaḥ (*8,3.35)
GS24jvkasipu:58712: kecit tu etad arthaṃ yogavibhāgaṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:58713: kupvoḥ śarparayoḥ visarjanīyasya visarjanīyaḥ ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:58719: sakāra ādeśaḥ bhavati visarjanīyasya kupvoḥ apadādyoḥ parataḥ pāśakalpakakāmyeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:58735: ror eva kāmye na anyasya iti niyamārthaṃ vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:58740: upadhmānīyasya kavarge parataḥ sakārādeśo bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:58747: iṇaḥ uttarasya visarjanīyasya ṣakārādeśo bhavati kupvor apadādyoḥ parataḥ pāśakalpakakāmyeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:58765: tatra iṇaḥ paro yo visarjanīyaḥ tasya ṣakāro bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:58769: namas puras ity etayoḥ gatisañjñakayoḥ visarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58777: ikāropadhasya ukāropadhasya ca apratyayasya visarjanīyasya ṣakāra ādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58799: iti sakāralope kṛte rephasya yo visarjanīyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:58801: kaskādiṣu tu mrātuṣputragrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam ekādeśanimittatvāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya /
GS24jvkasipu:58811: tirasaḥ visarjanīyasya anyatarasyāṃ sakārādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58822: dvis tris catur ity eteṣāṃ kṛtvo 'rthe vartamanānāṃ visarjanīyasya ṣakāra ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyāṃ kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58839: idudupadhasya ity etasya anuvṛttau satyāṃ krtvo 'rthaviṣayeṇa ca padena visarjanīye viśeṣyamāṇe dvistriścatur iti śakyamakartum /
GS24jvkasipu:58841: ṣatvaṃ vibhāṣayā bhūnnanu siddhaṃ tatra pūrveṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:58842: siddhe hy ayaṃ vidhatte caturaḥ satvaṃ yadāpi kṛtvo 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:58844: evaṃ sati tvidānīṃ dvistriścatur ity anena kiṃ kāryam / [947]
GS24jvkasipu:58845: anyo hi nedudupadhaḥ kṛtvo 'rthaḥ kaścid apy asti //
GS24jvkasipu:58847: caturo na sidhyati tadā rephasya visarjanīyo hi //
GS24jvkasipu:58848: tasmiṃs tu kriyamāṇe yuktaṃ caturo viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58849: prakṛtaṃ padaṃ tadantaṃ tasya api viśeṣaṇaṃ nyāyyam //
GS24jvkasipu:58850: evaṃ tu kriyamāṇe dvistriścaturgrahaṇe catuḥśabdasya kṛtvo 'rthe 'pi vartamanasya pūrveṇa+eva nityaṃ ṣatvaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:58851: pūrvatra siddhe na asti vipratiṣedho 'bhāvād uttarasya // [948]
GS24jvkasipu:58855: is us ity etayoḥ visarjanīyasya anyatarasyāṃ ṣakārādeśo bhavati sāmarthye kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58867: samāsaviṣaye isusoḥ visarjanīyasua anuttarapadasthasya nityaṃ ṣtvaṃ bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58876: etad eva anuttarapadasthasya iti vacanaṃ jñāpakam isusoḥ pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt sa vihitaḥ tadādeḥ ity ayaṃ niyamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58881: vyapekṣā ca tatra sāmarthyamāśritam iti samāse na bhavati // [949]
GS24jvkasipu:58884: akārād uttarasya anavyayavisarjanīyasya samāse anuttarapadasthasya nityaṃ sakārādeśo bhavati kṛ kami kaṃsa kumbha pātra kuśā karṇī ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58895: prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:58903: śunaskarṇaḥ ity ayaṃ tu kaskādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58908: bhāskaraḥ ity ayaṃ tu kaskādiṣu draṣtavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58920: adhas śiras ity etayoḥ visarjanīyasya samāse anuttarapadasthasya sakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati padaśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58932: kaska ity evam ādisu ca visarjanīyasya sakāraḥ vā yathāyogamādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58946: yajuṣpātram ity eṣāṃ pāṭhaḥ uttarapadasthasya api ṣatvaṃ yathā syād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:58947: paramasrpiḥphalam ity evam ādi pratyudāharaṇāt iti pārāyaṇikā āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58949: ity atra praramasarpiḥkuṇdikā ity etad eva pratyudāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:58955: chandasi viṣaye visarjanīyasya vā sakārādeśoḥ bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:58967: sa naḥ pāvaka ity evam ādiṣu sarve viṣayaśchandasi vikalpyante iti satvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:58970: kaḥ karat karati kṛdhi kṛta ity eteṣu parataḥ anaditeḥ visarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:58979: pañcamīvisarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati parau parataḥ adhyarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:58987: ebhyo vā etal lokebhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ samairayat /
GS24jvkasipu:58994: pātau ca dhātau parataḥ pañcamīvisarjanīyasya bahulaṃ sakārādeśaḥ bhavati chandasi visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:59001: ṣaṣthīvisarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati pati putra pṛṣṭha pāra pada payas poṣa ity eteṣu parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:59013: iḍāyāḥ ṣaṣthīvisarjanīyasya vā sakāra ādeśo bhavati patyādiṣu parataḥ chandasi viṣaye / [950]
GS24jvkasipu:59032: mūrdhanyaḥ iti caitad adhikṛtam veditavyam āpādaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59041: ṣaḥ ity evaṃ siddhe mūrdhanyagrahaṇaṃ ḍhakārārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:59046: saher dhātoḥ sāḍrūpasya yaḥ sakāraḥ tasya mūrdhanyaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59054: yatrāsya etad rūpaṃ tatra yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:59057: saḥ iti kim ? ākārasya mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:59062: iṇaḥ kavargāc ca ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:59078: nuṃvyavāye 'pi visarjanīyavyavāye 'pi śarvyavāye 'pi uttarasya sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59093: ṇisi cumbane ity etasya etad rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:59098: mūrdhanyaḥ iti vartate, sa iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:59101: pratyayasya ca yaḥ sakāraḥ iṇkor uttaraḥ tasya mūrdhanyo bhavati ādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59109: sa devān yakṣat iti vyapadeśivadbhāvāt pratyayasya iti ṣatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59110: yajater vahateś ca pañcamalakāre parasmaipadaprathamaikavacane ikāralopaḥ, leṭo 'ḍaṭau (*3,4.94)
GS24jvkasipu:59112: iti sip, tataḥ siddhaṃ yakṣat, vakṣat iti //
GS24jvkasipu:59115: śāsi vasi ghasi ity eteṣāṃ ca iṇkoḥ uttarasya yakārasya mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59135: stauteḥ ṇyantānāṃ ca ṣabhūte sani parataḥ abhyāsāt iṇaḥ uttarasya ādeśasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59141: stautiṇyoḥ eva ṣaṇi abhyāsād yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:59146: stautiṇyoḥ ṣaṇi eva iti hi vijñāyamāne tuṣṭāva ity atra na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:59147: iha ca syād eva sisikṣati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59157: abhyāsāt yā prāptiḥ tasyā niyamo yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:59158: dhātoḥ yā prāptis tasyā niyamo mā bhūt,
GS24jvkasipu:59163: svidi svadi sahi ity eteṣāṃ ṇyantānāṃ sani ṣabhūte parato 'bhyāsād uttarasya sakārasya sakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59171: prāk sitasaṃśabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ tatra aḍvyavāye 'pi mūrdhanyo bhavati ity evaṃ tad veditavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:59185: upasargāt sunoti ity atra sthāsenayasedha iti sthādayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:59186: tesu sthādiṣu prāk sitasaṃśabdanāt abhyāsena vyavāye mūrdhanyo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:59187: abhyāsasakārasya ca bhavati ity evaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:59195: sthādiṣu eva abhyāsasakārasy mūrdhanyo bhavati, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:59200: mūrdhanya iti vartate, saḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:59201: upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya sunoti suvati syati stauti stobhati sthā senaya sedha sica sañja svañja ity eteṣāṃ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59260: nirgatāḥ secakā usmasad deśāt niḥsecako deśaḥ iti nāyaṃ siceḥ upsargaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59261: abhisāvakoyati ity atra api na sunotiṃ prati kiryāyogaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ?
GS24jvkasipu:59263: abhiṣāvayati ity atra tu sunotimeva prati kriyāyogaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:59264: na sāvaryatiṃ prati iti ṣatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:59267: sadeḥ sakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt aprateḥ uttarasya mūrdhanya ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59279: stanbheḥ sakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya mūrdhanya murdhanya ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59286: aprateḥ ity etad iha na anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:59293: avaśabdāt upasargāt uttarasya stanbheḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyaḥ ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:59306: veḥ upasargāt avāt ca+uttarasya bhojanārthe svanateḥ sakāsya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59320: pari ni vi ity etebhyāḥ upasargebhyaḥ uttareṣām seva sita saya sivu saha suṭ stu svañja ity eteṣām sakārasya mūrdhanya ādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59377: sivādīnām aḍvyavāye 'pi parinivibhyaḥ uttarasya sakārasya vā mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59381: anu vi pari abhi ni ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya syandateḥ aprāṇiṣu sakārasya vā mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59394: prāṇyaprāṇiviṣayasya api syandateḥ ayam vikalpo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:59401: veḥ upasargād uttarasya skandeḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyo vā bhavati aniṣṭhāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:59409: pariśabdād uttarasya skandeḥ sakārasya vā mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59416: pṛthagyogakaraṇasāmarthyāt aniṣthāyām ity etan na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:59421: pariskandaḥ iti mūrdhanyābhāvo nipātyate prācyabharateṣu prayogaviṣayeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:59422: pūrvena mūrdhanye prāpte tad abhavo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:59430: sphuratisphulatyoḥ sakārasya nis ni vi ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya vā mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59445: veḥ uttarasya skabhnāteḥ sakārasya nityaṃ mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59453: iṇantād aṅgāt uttareṣāṃ ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāṃ yo dhakāraḥ tasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59471: iṇaḥ parasmāt iṭa uttareṣāṃ ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāṃ yo dhakāraḥ tasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:59484: kecidāhuḥ, iṇantād aṅgād uttarasya iṭa ānantaryaṃ yuṭā vyavahitam iti na bhavitavyaṃ ḍhatvena iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59488: tataś ca yakārād eva inaḥ paro 'nantaraḥ iṭ iti pakṣe bhavitavyaṃ mūrdhanyena iti //
GS24jvkasipu:59491: saṅgasakārasya aṅguleḥ uttarasya mūrdhanya ādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:59505: agneḥ uttarasya stut stoma soma ity eteṣāṃ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:59519: jyotis āyus ity etābhyām uttarasy stomasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:59526: mātṛ pitṛ ity etābhyām uttarasya svasṛsakārasya samāse mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59531: mātur pitur ity etābhyām uttarasya svasṛśabdasya anyatarasyāṃ mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:59536: mātuḥ pituḥ iti rephāntayor etad grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:59537: ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvād visarjanīyāntā sakārāntāt ca ṣatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59540: mātuḥ svasā ity eva nityaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:59543: abhinis ity etasmāt uttarasya stanatisakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati anyatarasyāṃ śabdasañjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:59553: upasargasthān nimittāt prādusśabdāc ca+uttarasya yakāraparasya acparasya ca astisakārasya mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59566: atha asatyapi astigrahaṇe sakāram eva prati upasarga āśrīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:59567: prāduḥśabdasya ca kṛbhvastiṣv eva prayogaḥ iti anyatrāprasaṅgaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:59579: su vi nir dur ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya supi sūti sama ity eteṣāṃ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59594: supeḥ ṣatvaṃ svapermā bhūd visuṣvāpeti kena na /
GS24jvkasipu:59596: sthādīnāṃ niyamo nātra prāk sitāduttaraḥ supiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59598: pūrvatrāsiddhīyamadvirvacane iti kṛte ṣtve tato dvirvacanam // [959]
GS24jvkasipu:59601: ni nadī ity etābhyām uttarasya snātisakārasya mūrdhnyādeśo bhavati kauśale gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:59605: supi sthaḥ (*3,2.4) ity atra supi iti yogavibhāgāt kapratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59610: pratiṣṇātam iti nipātyate sūtraṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59617: kapiṣṭhalaḥ nāma yasya saḥ kāpiṣṭhaliḥ putraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59630: viṣṭaraḥ iti nipātyate vṛkṣe āsane ca vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:59639: vipūrvāt stṛ ity etasmād dhātoḥ chandonāmni ca (*3,3.34)
GS24jvkasipu:59640: ity evaṃ vihito ghañ iti viṣṭaraḥ ity api prakṛte viṣṭāraḥ iti vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:59650: gośabdād ahalantād api etasmād eva nipātanāt saptamyā alug bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:59653: vi ku śami pari ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya sthalasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59660: amba āmba go bhūmi savya apa dvi tri ku śeku śaṅku aṅgu mañji puñji parame barhis divi agni ity etebhaḥ uttarasya sthaśabdasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59686: śobhanaṃ sāma yasya asau suṣāmā brāhmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59691: suśabdasya karmapravacanīyasañjñākatvān nirdurśabdayoś ca kriyāntaraviṣayatvād anupasargatve sati pāṭho 'yam /
GS24jvkasipu:59709: ekāraparasya sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśaḥ bhavati iṇkor uttarasya agakārāt parasya sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:59715: pṛthvī senā yasya sa pṛthuseno rājā /
GS24jvkasipu:59721: nakṣatravācinaḥ śabdād uttarasya sakārasya vā eti sañjñāyām agakārāt mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59731: hrasvād uttarasya sakārasya mūrdhanyādeeśo bhavati tādau taddhite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59732: tarap tamap taya tva tal tyap,
GS24jvkasipu:59750: iti saty api pratiṣedhe prakṛtisakārasya syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:59758: nisaḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati tapatau parato 'nāsevane 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:59765: niṣṭaptaṃ rakṣo niṣṭaptā arātayaḥ ity atra sadapyāsevanaṃ na vivakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:59769: yuṣmat tat tatakṣus ity eteṣu takārādiṣu parataḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:59783: yajuṣi viṣaye yuṣmattattatakṣuḥṣu parata ekeṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59793: stuta stoma ity etayoḥ sakārasya chandasi viṣaye mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati ekeṣāmācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:59798: pūrvapadāt ity eva siddhe prapañcārtham idam //
GS24jvkasipu:59803: pūrvapadasthānnimittāt parasya sakārasya murdhanyādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye ekeṣāmācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:59812: asamāse 'pi yat pūrvapadaṃ tadapi iha gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:59818: tasya pūrvapadasthānnimittāt uttarasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:59827: gosaniṃ vācamudeyam pūrvapadāt ity eva siddhe niyamārtham idam /
GS24jvkasipu:59828: atra kecit savanādipāṭhād gosanirniyamasya phalaṃ na bhavati iti sisānayiṣati iti prayudāharanti /
GS24jvkasipu:59833: pṛtanā ṛta ity etābhyām uttarasya sahisakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59837: ṛtīṣaham ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:59839: avagrahe tu ṛtisaham ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59844: rephaparasya sakārasya sṛpi sṛji spṛśi spṛhi savanādīnāṃ ca mūrdhanyo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59847: spṛpi - purā krūrasya visṛpaḥ sṛji - vāco visarjanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:59859: aśvasanigrahaṇam aniṇo 'pi ṣatvam asti iti jñāpanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:59876: sāt ity etasya padādeś ca mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59887: sicaḥ sakārasya yagi parato mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59890: upasargāt iti yā prāptiḥ sā padādilakṣaṇam eva pratiṣedhaṃ bādhate,
GS24jvkasipu:59897: gatau vartamānasya sedhateḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59904: pratistabdha nistabdha ity etau mūrdhanyapratiṣedhāya nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:59919: stambhu sivu saha ity eteṣāṃ caṅi parataḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59921: parinivibhyaḥ iti ca prāptaḥ mūrdhanyaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:59929: upasargādyā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ eva pratiṣedho yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:59930: abhyāsādyā prāptiḥ tasyā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:59934: sunoteḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyadeśo na bhavati sye sani ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59948: idaṃ tarhi, abhisusūṣateḥ apratyayaḥ abhisusūḥ ity udāharanam iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:59949: atra hi sanṣabhūto na bhavati ity abhyāsāt prāptir asti /
GS24jvkasipu:59953: sadi ṣvañja ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ liṭi parataḥ sakārasya parasya mūrdhanyaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:59962: svañjeḥ saṃyogāntād api vibhāṣā liṭaḥ kittvam icchanti iti pakṣe 'nuṣaṅgalopaḥ // [965]
GS24jvkasipu:59965: ni vi abhi ity etebhyaḥ upasargebhyaḥ uttarasya sakārasya aḍvyavāye chandasi viṣaye mūrdahnyādeśo na bhavati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:59970: sadiṣvañjor iti tad iha na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:59974: abhyastaut ity etad api siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:59975: iti vāmanakāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:59998: avarnabhaktyā ca vyavadhāne 'pi ṇatvaṃ bhavati iti kṣubhnādiṣu nṛnamanatṛpnotigrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:59999: athavā ṛvarṇād api ṇatvaṃ bhavati iti etad eva anena jñāpyate //
GS24jvkasipu:60002: aṭ ku pu āṅ num ity etair vyavāye 'pi rephaṣākārabhyām uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60019: aḍvyavāye iti siddhe āṅgrahaṇaṃ padavyavāye ity asya pratiṣedhasya bādhanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:60024: tṛṃhaṇīyam ity atra anusvāravyavāye numabhāve 'pi ṇatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60025: saty api ca numi yatra anusvāro na śrūyate tatra na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:60028: vyavāyopalakṣaṇārthatvād aḍādīnām iha vyastaiḥ samastair vyavāye 'pi ṇatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:60031: pūrvapadasthān nimittād uttarasya gakāravarjitād nakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:60040: pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām eva ṇatvaṃ na anyatra iti / [967]
GS24jvkasipu:60041: samāse 'pi hi samānapade nimittanimittinor bhāvād asti pūrveṇa prāptiḥ iti sa ca niyamaḥ pūrvapadasambadhād uttarapadasthasya+eva ṇatvaṃ nivartayati,
GS24jvkasipu:60049: apare tu pūrvasūtre samānam eva yan nityaṃ padaṃ tat samānapadam ity āśrayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:60051: teṣām aprāptam eva ṇatvam anena nidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:60052: samāse hi pūrvapadottaravibhāgād asamānapadatvam apy asti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:60056: puragā miśraka sighrakā śārikā koṭarā agre ity etebhyaḥ pūrvapadebhyaḥ uttarasya vananakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:60064: etebhya eva parasya vananakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:60071: pra nir antar śara ikṣu plakṣa āmra kārṣya khadira pīyūkṣā ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya vananakārasya sañjñāyām asañjñāyām api ṇakārādeśo bhavati
GS24jvkasipu:60085: oṣadhivāci yat pūrvapadaṃ vanaspativāci ca tatsthān nimittād uttarasya vananakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:60102: satyapi bhede vṛkṣavanaspatyor iha bhedena grahaṇaṃ draṣtavyam // [968]
GS24jvkasipu:60105: adantaṃ yat pūrvapadaṃ tatsthān nimittād uttarasya ahno nakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60112: ahnaḥ ity akārāntagrahaṇād dīrghāhnī śarad ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:60115: āhitavāci yat pūrvapadaṃ tatsthān nimittād uttarasy avāhananakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60119: vāhane yad āropitam uhyate tad āhitam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:60125: pānanakārasya pūrvapadasthān nimittād uttarasya deśābhidhāne ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60129: kṣīraṃ pānaṃ yeṣāṃ te kṣīrapāṇā uśīnarāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60138: bhāve karaṇe ca yaḥ pānaśabdaḥ tadīyasya nakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati vā pūrvapadasthānimittād uttarasya /
GS24jvkasipu:60154: prātipadikānte numi vibhaktau ca yo nakāraḥ tasya pūrvapadasthānnimittād uttarasy vā ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60165: pūrvapadādhikārād uttarapadasya prātipadikastho yo 'ntyo nakāraḥ tasya+idaṃ ṇatvam iṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:60173: māṣavāpinī ity atra tu gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prākṣubutpatteḥ iti kṛdantena+eva samāse sati prātipadikasya uttarapadasya+eva sato nakāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60175: sa hi samudāyabhaktatvād uttarapadasya anto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60184: tasminn ekājuttarapadasamāse prātipadikāntanuṃvibhaktisu pūrvapadasthānnimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60191: ṇaḥ iti vartamāne punarṇagrahaṇaṃ vikalpādhikāranivṛtteḥ vispaṣṭīkaraṇārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:60194: kavargavati ca+uttarapade prātipadikāntanuṃvibhaktiṣu pūrvapadasthānnimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60206: ṇopadeśasya dhātor yo nakāraḥ tasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati asamāse 'pi samāse 'pi /
GS24jvkasipu:60212: pragatā nāyakāḥ asmād deśāt pranāyako deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60214: pūrvapadādhikārāt samāsa eva syāt iti tadadhikāraṇivṛttidyotanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:60220: hinu mīnā ity etayoḥ upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60229: āni ity etasya loḍādeśasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakāradeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60237: ni ity etasya upasargasthānnimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati gada nada
GS24jvkasipu:60238: pata pada ghu mā syāti hanti yāti vāti drāti psāti vapati vahati śāmyati cinoti degdhi ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60285: akakārādirakhakārādiraṣakārāntaḥ ca upadeśe yo dhātuḥ sa śeṣaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:60286: tasmin parataḥ upasargasthānnimittāt uttarasya neḥ nakārasya vibhāṣa ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60306: aniteḥ nakārasya upasargasthānnimittād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60312: upasargasthānnimittāt uttarasya anitinakārasya padānte vartamānasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60317: kecit tu pūrvasūtre eva etad antagrahaṇaṃ sāmīpyārtham abhisambadhnanti /
GS24jvkasipu:60318: nimittasamīpasthaikavarṇavyavahitasya anitinakārasya padānte vartamānasya ṇakārādeśo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:60320: tair dvitīyam api padāntasya ṇatvārtham antagrahaṇam āśrayitavyam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:60321: yeṣāṃ tu paryaṇiti iti bhavitavyam iti darśanam,
GS24jvkasipu:60325: sābhyāsasya aniteḥ upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya ubhayoḥ nakārayoḥ ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60330: pūrvatrāsiddhīyam advirvacane ity etasmin sati pūrveṇa+eva kṛtaṇatvasya dvirvacane kṛte siddham etad antareṇa api vacanam ?
GS24jvkasipu:60331: etat tu nāśrayitavyam iti sūtram idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:60335: akārapūrvasya hantinakārasya upasargasthāt nimittād uttarasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60349: vakāramakārāyoḥ parataḥ hantinakārasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya vā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60358: antaḥśabdād uttarasya hantinakārasya atpūrvasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati adeśābhidhāne /
GS24jvkasipu:60370: ayananakārasya ca antaḥśabdād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati adeśābhidhāne /
GS24jvkasipu:60378: ṛkārāntād avagrahāt pūrvapadād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:60384: yāvatā saṃhitādhikāra ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ ity uktam ?
GS24jvkasipu:60391: nas ity etasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati dhātusthān nimittād uttarasya uruśabdāt ṣuśabdāc ca chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:60400: upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya naso nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:60411: kṛtsthaḥ yo nakāraḥ acaḥ uttaraḥ tasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60441: ṇyantād yo vihitaḥ kṛtpratyayaḥ tatsthasya nakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya vibhāṣā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60455: prayapyamāṇam ity atra yakā vyavadhāne 'pi yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:60459: halādiḥ yo dhāturijupadhaḥ tasmāt paro yaḥ kṛtpratyayaḥ tatsthastha nakārasya aca uttarasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya vibhāṣā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60477: ijādeḥ sanumaḥ halantād dhātoḥ vihito yaḥ kṛt,
GS24jvkasipu:60478: tatsthasay nakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya ṇakāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60490: halaḥ ity adhikārād ṇyante nityaṃ vidhyartham etan na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:60494: niṃsa nikṣa ninada ity eteṣāṃ nakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya vā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60504: bhā bhū pū kami gami payāyī vepa ity eteṣām upasargasthāt nimittād uttarasya kṛtsthasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60527: ṣakārāt padantād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60562: padena vyavāye 'pi sati nimittanittinoḥ nakārasya nakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60573: svādau pūrvaṃ padam iti gośabdaḥ pūrvapadam tena vyavāyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:60577: kṣubhnā ity evam ādiṣu śabdeṣu nakārasya ṇakāradeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60579: ajādeśasya sthānivadbhāvād iha api pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60600: parigahanam iti sañjñāyām pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām iti prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:60601: parinandanam ity atra upasargād asamāse 'pi iti prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:60619: sakāratavargayoḥ śakāracavargābhyāṃ sannipāte śakāracavargāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60620: stoḥ ścunā iti yathāsaṅkhyam atra neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:60653: stoḥ ścau iti saptamīnirdeśo na kṛtaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:60654: pūrveṇa pareṇa ca ścunā sannipāte ścutvaṃ yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:60658: sakāratavargayoḥ ṣakāraṭvargābhyāṃ sannipāte ṣakāraṭavargāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60685: padāntāṭ ṭavargād uttarasya stoḥ ṣṭutvaṃ na bhavati nām ity etad varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:60700: tavargasya ṣakāre yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60707: śakārād uttarasya tavargasya yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60713: yaraḥ padāntasya anunāsike parataḥ vā anunāsikaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60730: aca uttarau yau rephahakārau tābhyām uttarasya yaro dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60740: anacparasya aca uttarasya yaro dve vā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60745: yaṇo mayo dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:60754: śaraḥ khayo dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:60755: atra api yadi śaraḥ iti pañcamī,
GS24jvkasipu:60759: athavā khaya uttarasya śaro dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60764: avasāne ca yaro dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:60771: ādini parataḥ ākrośe gamyamāne putraśabdasya na dva bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60785: cayo dvitīyā bhavanti śari parataḥ pauṣkarasāder ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:60802: triprabhṛtiṣu varṇeṣu saṃyukteṣu śākaṭāyanasya matena dvitvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60810: śākalyasya ācaryasya matena sarvatra dvirvacanaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60817: dīrghād uttarasya ācāryāṇāṃ matena na dvitvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60824: jhalāṃ sthāne jaśādeśo bhavati jhaśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60860: khari ca parato jhalāṃ carādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60872: avasāne vartamānānāṃ jhalāṃ vā carādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60879: aṇaḥ apragṛhyasañjñasya avasāne vartamānasya vā anunāsikādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60889: anusvārasya yayi parataḥ prasvarṇaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60906: vṛṣanti ity atra ṇatvasya asiddhatvāt pūrvaṃ nakārasya anusvāraḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:60907: tasya api parasavarṇena punar nakāra eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60908: tasya api asiddhatvāt punar ṇatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60915: padāntasya anusvārasya yayi parataḥ vā parasavarṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60917: taṃ kathaṃ citrapakṣaṃ ḍayamānaṃ nabhaḥsthaṃ puruṣo 'vadhīt //
GS24jvkasipu:60928: udaḥ uttarayoḥ sthā stambha ity etayoḥ pūrvasavarṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60960: jhaya uttarasya śakārasya aṭi parataḥ chakarādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:60977: hala uttareṣāṃ yamāṃ yami parato lopo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:60982: aditer apatyamādityyaḥ ity atra takārāt paraḥ ekaḥ yakāraḥ, [981]
GS24jvkasipu:60986: ādityo devatā asya sthālīpākasya iti ādityyaḥ ity atra api dvau yakārau kramajastṛtīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:60987: tatra madhyamasya madhyamayor vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:60996: hala uttarasya jharo jhari savarṇe parato lopo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:60999: tatra madhyamasya madhyamayor vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61000: maruttttaḥ ity atra catvārastakārāḥ kramajaḥ pañcamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:61001: tatra madhyamasya madhyamayoḥ madhyamānāṃ vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61007: allopasya ca pūrvatra asiddhe na sthānivat iti sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhāt cakārasya ñakāre lopaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:61014: piṇḍhi iti ḍhakāre ḍakārasya lopo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:61022: asya svaritasya asiddhatvāt anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158)
GS24jvkasipu:61027: udattodayasya svaritodayasya ca anudāttasya svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61036: tasminnudātte parato gārgyaśabdaḥ svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61040: tasmin parataḥ anudāttaḥ svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:61044: teṣāṃ hi matena svarito bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:61056: tasya tathābhūtasya eva prayogo mā bhūt iti saṃvṛtapratyāpattir iyaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61057: dīrghaplutayoś ca anena vivṛtena akāreṇa grahaṇaṃ neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61059: saṃvutena ca sarvaguṇasya mātrikasya grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:61063: iti śrīvāmanakāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamādhyāyasya turīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaścāyamadhyāyo granthaśca //
